item.text: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu byed pa lde mig gi rgyud ces bya ba bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn sarba su ga ta sa mu dA ye tan+t+ra pra b+he da kudz+nyi ka tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa lde mig gi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang yum kun tu bzang mo bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'og min gyi gnas na mtha' dang dbus med cing gzhi tshad las 'das pa/ rgya dang phyogs yongs su ma chad pa ye shes kyi rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang yon tan dpag tu med pas brgyas par gyur pa'i pho brang chen po rnam par dag pa na/ bde

bar gshegs pa til gyi gang bu bzhin du bzhugs pa rab tu gsal ba'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa la/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos kun skye ba med pa la// mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang gnas kyang// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i tshul gyis ni// ma skyes pa las ma 'gag mthong// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad byang chub sems su gcig/ snang ba tha dad sna tshogs te// gcig dang du ma brjod las 'das// kye kye/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ngo bo gcig las tha dad snang// dpe don mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing// ci yang med las cir yang snang/ 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// ma rig pa yang yang dag lam// rnam par rtog pa'ang chos kyi sku// skye ba med pa gzhi yin te// ma 'gags snang ba lam yin no// lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu ste// skye zhing 'pho ba'i gnas med do// rdo rje lta bu'i dgongs pa la// byin rlabs thugs rje chen po yis// stong gsum rgyal ba'i skus khyab kyang// byang chub sems la g.yo ba med// mkha' dang 'ja' tshon ji bzhin no// 'khor ba'i bde sdug rgyu 'bras dang// bde gshegs sku dang ye shes tshogs// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ byang chub sems la skye shi med// chos kyi sku la 'du 'bral med// 'khor 'das chos la bzang ngan med// mnyam pa nyid la rgyu 'bras med// sems nyid rtsal la 'gag pa med// gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i snang ba las// bltar med bsgom zhing dpyad pa med// bsrung med thob med lhun gyis grub// ma nor ma bcos chos nyid la// rang bzhin skye med chos kyi dbyings// mi 'gyur lhun grub byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma 'gags chos// rgya mtshor chu bran 'du ba ltar// 'khor 'das 'ub chub kun tu 'dus// bcud mchog snying po rdo rje'i don// bsam med brjod med bstan du med// nges pa 'di nyid ma rtogs na// rtog pa sna tshogs 'ching ba'i rgyu// nga ni rang byung

bcom ldan 'das// 'og min chos dbyings gnas mchog na// dag pa nyid la dag pa ston// mnyam nyid klong nas gsal bar nyon// kye kye/ dag pa dri ma med pa'i chos// bla med byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog gzhom pa dang// thugs rjes 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// gnyis med dgyes pa'i tshul du mdzod// ces bskul zhing glu blangs pas/ yum kun tu bzang mos bskul ba/ kye kye/ bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid las// gang gis 'dul ba de bstan phyir// gtso bo mchog la gnyis med bya// zhes bskul to// de nas yab kyis bskul ba/ kye ho// dgyes pa chen po gsang ba'i thugs// mnyam panyid las mnyam par bzhengs// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras/ khyab pa'i don du mngon par dbyung// zhes bskul to// de nas yang yum gyis bskul ba// kye kye/ 'gro ba'i ded dpon gnyen gcig po// ma rig mun pa 'joms pa'i bdag/ gnyis med bde ba'i dbyings dkyil du// bde ba chen po dbab tu gsol// zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rdo rje chags pa'i rgyal po rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas dbyings kyi yum chen mo la rab tu bskul ba/ kye ho/ skye med mkha' dbyings dag pa'i yum// bde chen dbyings kyi bdag nyid ma// thugs rje'i gdul bya bstan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i bde chen skyed mdzod cig/ ces bskul to// de nas yang yum gyis bskul ba// ho// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ded dpon gtso// dges pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo yis// byang chub sems rgyun bde ba yi// sprin tshogs char chen dbab tu gsol// zhes bskul bas/ yab kyis sa ma ya ho// zhes bskul bas/ yum gyi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes bskul to// yab kyis ra ho\u0f85haM/ zhes bskul bas/ yum gyis rA ga yA mi/ zhes bskul te/ rol pa chen po mdzad pa las/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ya a nu rA ga Na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM dzaHhUM baM hoH oM hUM trAM hrIHha/ zhes bya bas bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs dpag tu med pa zhing khams kyi bkod pa chen po dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rab tu rdzogs pa dang/ zhi ba dang khro bo'i rnam pa dang/ yab dang yum gyi rang bzhin du snang ba dang/ sku so so'i rgyan gcig par snang ba dang/ sprul pa dang las sgrub pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dpag tu med pa rab tu snang bar gyur to// snying po de kho na nyid las/ rol pa chen po'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i cha lugs kyi bdag nyid can rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye/ bde bar

gshegs pa chos kyi sku// ma 'ongs phyi ma'i dus ci tshe// gdul bya 'dod chags can don du// rigs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i tshogs// kun nas rab tu bsgrub pa'i thabs// cho ga yan lag yongs rdzogs pa// dman dang bar ma mchog rab don// rgyas bsdus shin tu rab tu bsdus// rtog pa'i dra ba gzhom pa'i phyir// ma lus gsal bar bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi zhal 'dzum pa chen po mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa khyab par mdzad nas/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs// ma lus bsdus pa'i sku gsung thugs// dam pa rigs brgya'i ngang nyid de// de nyid bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ni// phun sum tshogs pa'i bcud ldan pas// ma nyams snod dang ldan la bstan// ri bo dben pa'i gnas mchog tu// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan nas// sa yi cho ga rgyas pa ste// brtag sbyang bslang zhing mkhyen par gsol// phyi nang gnas dang sbyar ba'i khyon// chag chag skyad nul legs byas te// khro bo'i stangs stabs mtshams kyis bskor// bka' bsgo bskrad dang bsrung bar bya// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i grogs dang bcas// byin gyis brlabs pa'i srad bu yis// dkyil 'khor pho brang thig gdab pa// rdo rje khu tshur byin brlabs nas// slob dpon shar bltas slob ma yis// nub tu bltas te gdab par bya// pho brang rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dgu// rdo rje'i sa dang gdung gis bcad// spyi dang bye brag phyi dang nang// phyogs dang mtshams kyi phyed kyis dbye// bar khyams sgo dang rta babs bcas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo'i gnas// rin po che yi brtsig pa dang// ka ba rdo rje zla phyed dang// pad+ma dra ba mda' yab bcas// 'khor lo ri dwags gdugs kyi mdzes// rdo rje'i ra ba me 'od 'bar// gzhan yang rgyan rtags sna tshogs pa// rin po che'am 'bru sna yis// phyi nang kun tu legs par bri// pho brang dgu yi dbus nyid du// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kun tu ldan// de nyid gru chad khyams dang bcas// bde gshegs rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma las kyi rigs rnams kyi// dbus nas shar lho nub byang sogs// dkar mthing ser dmar ljang gu yi// rim bzhin kha dog ldan pa'o// phyi rol phan chod gdab pa dang// snang byed dra ba 'phyang bas brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// mnyes pa'i yo byad sna tshogs bstar// cho 'phrul bzhi dang ting 'dzin gsum// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// cho ga gsum dang

yan lag bzhi// dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa kho na'o// snying rje'i yul la dmigs pa dang// byams pa dga' ba btang snyoms kyis// cho 'phrul bskyed de ma lus sbyang// stong zhing bdag med de bzhin nyid// kun tu snang ba'i snying rje gsum// med pa las ni yod pa'i rgyu// phyi nang dngos po kun sbyang ste// ye shes sa la gnas pa las// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma kun bral zhing// rang bzhin chos nyid ngang gis gsal// stong nyid ngang gnas chos kyi dbyings// me long la ni gzugs brnyan bzhin// yul dngos rigs kun gsal bar snang// chos rnams stong pa rab sbyor zhing// bdag gzhan mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid// ma skyes rang bzhin med pa yi// dmigs med chos la so sor brtag/ sems bskyed pa dang smon lam gyis// nus pa mthar thug nan tan bskyed// ji ltar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus// pad+ma nyi ma zla ba'i steng// lha rnams so so'i yi ge nyid// rang gi kha dog mthun pa las// 'od zer sna tshogs rab spros pas// sems can khams kun thabs kyis sbyangs// slar 'dus dmigs pa dag mdzad de// yi ge snying po phyag mtshan thugs// de las yan lag bzhi sbyar bas// rang gi lus kun yongs rdzogs te// 'khor lo dbus kyi gdan steng du// gtso chen rnam par snang mdzad dang// yum chen chos dbyings kun bzang mo// phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la// mi bskyod pa dang rin 'byung ldan// snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub// spyan ma gos dkar mA ma kI// dam tshig sgrol ma rnams kyis bskor// shar phyogs dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du// sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang// yum chen rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// de bzhin 'khor lo'i rtsibs dag la// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po dang// chags pa dang ni legs pa dag/ sgeg pa ma dang bdug pa ma// lcags kyu ma dang me sgron ma// phyogs dang mtshams la rim bzhin dgod// lho phyogs dbus su 'jam dpal dang// rin chen dbyings phyug yum dang bcas// rdo rje rin chen gzi brjid dang// rgyal mtshan dang ni bzhad pa ste// phreng ba ma dang bdug pa ma// zhags pa ma dang bde ba ma// yab yum phyogs mtshams rtsibs la'o// nub dbus spyan ras gzigs dbang la// yum chen pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma// rdo rje chos dang rnon po dang// smra ba dang ni 'khor lo ste// dbyangs mkhan ma dang mar me ma// lcags sgrog ma dang gsal bkra ma// phyogs mtshams la ni rim bzhin dgod// byang phyogs dbus su rdo rje 'dzin// las kyi dbyings phyug yum bcas la// rdo rje las dang srung ba dang// rdo rje gnod sbyin khu tshur dang// gar sgyur ma dang byug pa ma// dril bu ma dang 'bebs pa ma// phyogs mtshams rim

bzhin bskor zhing dgod// shar lho tshams kyi dkyil 'khor dbus// sems dpa' sa yi snying po nyid// yum chen rdo rje sems mar bcas// phyogs mtshams rtsibs la dgod pa ni// sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang// dbang phyug rgyal po bkod pa'i rgyan// rin chen 'od 'phro phyogs bzhir dgod// bde ba rgyas 'debs rmongs byed dang// tshe 'phel ma dang za byed ma// gsang ba'i yum bzhi mtshams la dgod// lho nub 'khor lo'i dbus dag tu// gtso bo nam mkha'i snying po la// yum chen rin chen sems ma ste// phyag rgya'i rgyal po snang ba'i mchog/ spobs pa'i rgyal po spobs pa brtsegs// yum chen khrus kyi lha mo dang// rgyal mtshan bla re gdugs lha mo// sems dpa' sems ma brgyad kyis bskor// nub byang dbus su byams pa dang// yum chen pad+ma'i sems ma la// pad+ma'i rgyal po dam pa dang// rdo rje mi g.yo thogs med dang// pad+ma can dang 'dzin byed ma// skyon bral rnam rgyal ma yis bskor// byang shar dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// gtso bo sgrib pa rnam sel dang// yum chen las kyi sems ma la// rin chen dbang phyug thub pa'i las// dga' bar ston dang mi g.yo'i mtha'// lta mo skyabs can dri med ma// sgra gcan ma dang thogs med ma// thabs ldan sems dpa' sems mas bskor// phyi rol khyams kyi cha dag la// lha dang lha min mi rnams dang// byol song yi dwags dmyal ba yi// thub pa chen po drug bzhugs bya// phyi nang phyogs kyi sgo bzhi ru// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog ma// dril bu ma rnams rim bzhin bsgoms// de dag kun gyi phyag mtshan dang// sku mdog rgyan rtags ma lus pa// nga yis sngon du bshad pa bzhin// so so'i ming gis bskyed par bya// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid 'bar// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// mtshan dang dpe byad ma lus rdzogs// mnyam la ma 'dres 'ja' tshon 'dra// gsal la mi rtog me long gi// gzugs brnyan bzhin du bsgom par bya// rigs kyi bdag po so so yi// sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlab cing// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// oM AHhUM/ gnas gsum so sor bsgom bya ba// dkar dmar mthing ga'i mdog ldan pa// 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram la// khyad par ldan pa bsgom par bya// oM hUM trAM hrIHhA/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rigs kyi gtso bos dbu brgyan cing// ye shes sems dpa' rang lta bu// tshon gang so so'i snying la gnas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA prat+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa

b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA kr-i t+yA nuSh+ThA Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bar+t+ta ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ phung po khams dang skye mched dang// yul dngos snang ba ma lus tshogs// dam tshig sems dpa'i lhar bsgoms nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug pa ni// gtso chen thugs ka'i yi ge las// 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// 'og min gnas su spros pa las// chos dbyings dkyil 'khor thugs rgyud bskul// nam mkha'i dbus kyi mdun bzhag nas// mchod bstod mnyes pas tshogs bsags te// gsol gdab bshags dang sngo ba yis// bdag nyid rung ba'i snod du bya// slar yang 'od kyi cho 'phrul gyis// rang gi lus su gzud par bya// gsal ba 'od ldan gnyis med rdzogs// slar yang mnyes par bya ba ni// thugs las sprul pa'i gsang yum bzhis// gzhal yas khang gi sgo bzhi nas/ gnas gsum mnyes pa'i phyag gis mchod// 'dod yon lha mo sna tshogs kyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis// mchod cing yongs su rdzogs par bstod// bzlas pa'i spro bsdu bya ba ni// phyi nang gtso bo dgu rnams kyi// rang gi ye shes sems dpa' yi// snying dbus so so'i srog rten la// yi ge'i phreng sngags 'od 'bar 'phros// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab byas te// bde bar gshegs kun mnyes mdzad nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdus// sems can khams kyi rgyud sbyangs shing// thams cad rang rig lhar gyur nas// chos sku thig le gcig tu bsgom// yang na dam pa bsdus pa'i sngags// oM dz+nyA na pany+tsa sa twa kro d+ha mu ne ye swa hA/ gnas gsum yi ge gsum dag las// rang gi mdog ldan 'od 'phros pas// ma lus rgyu gsum dag byas te// 'bras bu gsum la sbyar bar bya// de nyid 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// bdag gzhan don gyi bzlas pa rnams// brtan pa'i rtags dang ldan pa yi// dngos grub gang 'dod tshad dang sbyar// ting 'dzin thun gyi mtshams dag la// bstod cing bshags dang mchod sbyin bya// grub pa'i tshad ldan 'dod pa smos// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyings su gshegs// dam tshig tshogs ni sgo bzhi dang// phyogs mtshams byang gi ngos nas brtsams// rim gyis dbus kyi gtso la bsdu// de nyid ye shes sems dpa' la// de yang thig le gcig la'o// de ni mtshan ma'i spros dang bral// de las slar yang lha rnams kyi// nga rgyal ldan pas spyod lam bya// gal te bde ba'i gnas 'dod na// dpag med blo ldan skyes bu yis// lus gnad rlung dang bcas pa yi// rnam shes dang ni byang chub sems// ye shes thig ler rab sbyor ba// dus bzhi gcig tu mngon

mthong ba'i// blo can de yis kun tu bzang// nga dang gnyis med myur du 'grub// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la rab tu gzung ba'i sbyor ba'o//// de nas rab tu sbyor ba yis// ma 'ongs dus na bsgrub pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon thabs ldan gyis// rdo rje slob ma nyer bzung nas// rim pa'i dbang bskur byed 'dod na// bkra shis dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dus tshod gza' skar shis pa la// 'dus byas dge bas tshogs bsags te// phyi nang srung ba yongs rdzogs nas// lhag gnas sta gon bya ba ni// sa yi cho gas yongs sbyangs shing// legs par bstar ba'i stegs bu'i steng// lha rnams so so'i bzhugs gnas sar// dri bzang thig le mdzes pa'i steng// me tog tshom bu dgod par bya// rang rang snying po dbab byas pa'i// 'khor lo'i gtso 'khor tshul bzhin bsam// yan lag bdun gyis tshogs bsags shing// byin brlab dngos grub 'dod gsol bya// gtso chen dbus dang phyogs mtshams kyi// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa rnams// rten 'brel rgyan dang rdzas sbyar te// rang gi gnas su legs bkod pa// 'khor lo'i bdag rnams nang du bskyed// sngar bzhin mnyes sbyang gsol bar bya// gzhan yang phyi nang gsang ba yi// rjes gnang stsal ba'i rdzas rnams dang// bsangs shing bkrus te sta gon bya// rdo rje slob ma'i tshogs dag kyang/ khrus byas rgyan gdags dris byugs te// sangs rgyas dang ni sras tshul gyis// thun mong ba dang khyad par gyi// yul gyi mchog la skyabs su 'gro// don dam kun rdzob smon 'jug gi// byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed// sdig pa sbyangs shing tshogs chen bsags// ku sha br-im zhing so shing dor// srung ba'i sbyor ba 'bad par bya// 'di ni lhag gnas sbyor ba'o// nangs par skya rengs shar ba'i dus// sta gon lha rnams mkha' la bzhugs// tshogs bsags dge ba cung zad bya// slar nyid rdul tshon pho brang bzhengs// mchod cing sgrub pa'i rgyan dang rdzas// legs par bsags te dgod par bya// de nas ji ltar 'byung ba yi// lha rnams rang gi cho gas bskyed// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang bstim// mchod bstod bzlas pas mnyes par bya// de nas slob ma 'jug pa ni/ khrus byas phyag btsal sems bskyed de// rin chen mdzes pa'i me tog thogs// phyi rol gnas nas gsol ba gdab// rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas des// bar chad dris te gnang ba sbyin// dkyil 'khor bdag por mkhyen par gsol// slob ma yis ni me tog dor// gdong g.yogs bkrol te pho brang bstan// dam tshig rdzas dang bro tshig gis// mi 'da' phyag rgya mchog gis so// bsam pa brtan por bzung ba dang// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang// dngos grub

mtshan ma ma thob par// rab 'bring tha ma'i rtsal gyis sgrub// rtags dang mtshan ma mthong gyur nas// phyi nang gsang ba yongs rdzogs pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa skur ba ni// tshul bzhin sbyangs pa slob ma'i tshogs// mdzes pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni// mthar thug mthong bar gsol ba gdab// rdo rje slob dpon mchog de yis// byang chub sems kyi nga rgyal gyis// rnam rgyal rtsa ba'i bum pa rnams// rnam pa chu la ngo bo lhas// lus kun khyab par bstim byas te// nang gi bsam pa brtan po dang// sngags tshig sgra yi bden pa brjod// gzugs brnyan la brten de bzhin te// rin chen dpung bdun bkra shis brgyad// tshul ldan de yis phyi dbang bskur// chos nyid gzugs brnyan me long dang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang// chos dung rdo rje rgya gram dang// cod pan phyag rgya ming gi dbang// las dang chos dang gzungs sngags rnams// nang gi dbang du bskur bar bya// thabs dang shes rab mchog gi rgyud// rgyud dang 'bras bu rab sbyor ba// gnyis med mnyam pa'i bde chen te// nges par bstan pa gsang ba'i dbang// de dag rdzogs nas smon lam gdab// slob ma bla ma lha rnams kyis// rim bzhin bshags byang me tog dbul// gtang rag tshul bzhin rgyas par mchod// bkra shis brjod cing bsdu gshegs brtsam// rtag tu spyod lam dam tshig gzung// 'di ni kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin// go 'phang sbyor ba'i las yin no// rdo rje slob ma nye bar bzung ba'i las rab tu sbyor ba'o//// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs kyi rten// gzugs brnyan tsam la ye shes lha// rab tu gnas par bya ba ni// rgyas bsdus shin tu bsdus pa las// rgyas par sbyor la zhu ba pos// lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab// ri bo rtsi shing skye ba'i dbus// bkra shis yid 'ong gnas mchog tu// ji ltar bshad pa bzhi yi las// ma lus rdzogs par byas nas ni// gang la bya ba'i rten la sogs// lhag par gnas pa rim bzhin bya/ khyad par bgegs bskrad bsrung ba dang// bdug dang bcing dang bsreg par bya// rdo rje slob dpon sgrub pa pos/ khrus byas gos bgos brgyan byas te// bka' bsgo srung ba yongs rdzogs bya// sems bskyed tshogs bsags dge ba sbyar// tshul bzhin bsgrubs la byin brlabs dbab// mchod sbyin rgya cher sbyar nas kyang// dbang dang mkhyen par gsol ba gdab// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rtags dbyung bya// de nas dkyil 'khor shar phyogs su// rnam lnga'i stegs bu legs bshams la// grub pa'i rten de bzhugs su gsol// nye reg 'thor 'thung byas nas ni// sngags kyi sbyor bas bar chad bskrad// 'bras zan chang bus dri

ma phyi// me chu rlung gis bsreg gtor bkru// ba byung rdzas lnga yis kyang bkru// til mar 'bru mar bzang pos byugs// dar ram ras ser gyis byibs la// dbang stegs gnas pa'i steng du bzhugs// tsan dan gur gum dzA ti dang// gla rtsi a ga ru yis byugs// dam tshig pa ni gang yin bskyed// de yi ye shes spyan drangs te// bzhugs shing bstims la phyag btsal zhing// de nyid mchod bstod bzlas par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// bum pas dngos su dbang bskur bya// bkra shis brjod cing rol mo bsgrag/ byin brlab dbu rgyan cod pan sbyin// yi ge gnyis kyi go cha bgo/ slar yang mchod bstod bzlas par bya// de nas lha rnams snyan gsan dbab// rten nyid na bzas g.yogs te bzhugs// yon bdag gam ni slob ma la// dbang bskur phyir ni bdag 'jug bya// de nas slob ma gzhug byas la// dbang bskur ma lus rdzogs par bya// slar yang lha tshogs brtan bzhugs la// nga rgyal ldan pas ku sha'i steng// chos nyid thabs kyis nyal bar bya// de ni lhag gnas chen po'o// de nas skya rengs shar dus su// byin brlabs ldan pas khrus byas te// mchod sbyin sngon song bum pa bsten// stegs bu la ni dri bzangs sbyar// lha rnams mchod bstod rdzogs par bya// de nas rten de zhal bshus la// bkru sbyang phyi ba sngar bzhin bya// stong par sbyang zhing lha bskyed de// ye shes dbab cing bsre bsnan bya// gnas gsum 'bru gsum gsal bar dgod// gong bzhin dbang rim rdzogs par bya// rten 'brel sngags kyis brtan par bya// sngags dang phyag rgya se gol gyis// skur gyur gdul bya'i ngo gang la// gang gis 'dul ba der bsam zhing// spyan dang shangs dang zhal dbye zhing// tshems 'bru dbu skra bshad dang gzhar// na bza' rgyan dang rol mo dbul// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul skur dbye// yon bdag mdun du bkug nas ni// rten de mchod pa'i rjes gnas sbyin// gdan khri'i steng du drang por bzhugs// me tog la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs// ci 'byor pa yis rgyas par mchod// sbyin bsreg gis kyang tshogs bsag bya// de rjes dkyil 'khor bdag por bya// de nas mchod pa maN+Dal dang// gtor ma rgya chen phul byas la// chos kyi srung mar bka' bsgo bya// bkra shis glu gar rol mo'i sgra// gal te glegs bam yin pa na// sbyangs shing bkru ba gzugs brnyan sbyar// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun rdzob don dam ston pa yi// nges pa'i gsung du bsgom par bya// de las gang yin lhar bskyed de// spyan dbye sku rags na bza' dbul// rgyas gdab sku gsung thugs kyi ming// rten 'brel bcas pa bri bar bya// sngar bshad rab gnas la sogs bya// gtsug

lag khang pa yin na ni// lha rnams so so'i sngags kyi ni// rang gi ye shes bskyed par bya// spyan dbye la sogs sngar bzhin no// mchod rten sku gzugs yid na ni// bkru sbyang bskrad pa byas nas ni// rdul bral sku gsum rdzogs par bsam// mnyes pa'i bya ba sngar bzhin no// gal te bsdus par bya ba ni// gang la bya ba'i rten de nyid// cho ga gsum gyis sbyang bya ste// rang gi ye shes ngo bor bsam// yo byad mchod pa ma lus bstab// yang dag rten du nges par bzung// shin tu bsdus pa skad cig gis// chos kyi sku yi ngo bor bsam// phyi nang snang srid ma lus kun// chos dbyings sku las ma g.yos na// dag pa'i rten la smos ci dgos// thams cad mchod pa'i gnas yin te// dman pa'i blo la snang ba min// de bas blo ldan thabs chen gyis// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas ma lus bsnyen cing bkur// gnas pa'i che ba mchog yin no// rten mchog tu bya ba'i las rab tu sbyar ba'o//// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// tshe 'das phung po'i rnam smin de// 'byung ba'i me la bsreg pa'i phyir// dang po chas su gzhug pa ni/ dang po bgegs bskrad sngags kyis gdab// dri zhim sman gyis byugs shing bkru// bdud rtsis byugs pa'i ras kyis dkri// sngags dgod phyag rgya'i mtshan ma brdab// gnas lngar sa bon drug dgod cing// phyi rol lha yi phyag mtshan dgod// mar me lha grangs mnyam par gzug/ zhi ba'i stegs bu'i steng du bzhag/ pho brang dkyil 'khor bzhengs gsol ba'i// steng du mdzes pa'i khri la bzhag khang bu sum thog gru bzhir bya// tha ma zhi ba'i shing gis brdzangs// steng du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dgod// phyogs bzhir gzugs thag btags te gzung// rdo rje slob dpon las bdag gis// dkyil 'khor bsnyen pa gzhung bsrangs la// phung po'i rnam shes gnas nas dgug/ las bdag 'jug pa tshul bzhin bya// phan pa'i dbang dang nus pa dang// nang dbang bcu gcig phyi dbang bcu// sgrub dbang bcu gsum gsang dbang gnyis// sum cu rtsa drug bskur bar bya// yang na bka' rtags phyag rgya dang// rgyud 'dzin phyag rgya shes rab gzung// bkra shis rdzas dang rin chen bdun/ khyad par gdan dang mdzes pa'i rgyan// rdo rje ming dang 'khor los sgyur// dbang bcu rim pas bskur bar bya// don ldan lus de rol mos bsu// bsreg khang nang bzhugs yol bas bre// phyi rol mchod rdzas rgyas par bshams// til 'bras gro dang yungs kar dang// 'o ma zho dang mar dang bcud// yam shing rdzas dang dgang blugs bsar// bdag nyid las kyi lhar bsgoms la// phung po me lhar bsgoms pa yis// thugs kar lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom// ye shes me

lha spyan drangs te// mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas rim bzhin dbul// bstod cing phrin las gsol ba gdab// de nas lha rnams spyan drang bstim// mnyes byas mchod rdzas bdud rtsir bsam// phung po sdig sgrib sbyang phyir dbul// lha rnams so so'i snying po la// che ge'i sarba durga ti shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ zhes btags bdun las mi nyung bzlas// bsreg rdzas rnams kyang de bzhin no// bstod tshig sngags kyis lha rgyud bskul// lhag mas me lha'i gtang rag bya// sdig sgrib ma lus sbyangs par bsam// bzod par gsol la ye shes gshegs// dam tshig rang gi gnas su bsdu// rnam shes lhar byas dbyings su bstim// thal chen sku gdung 'bar bar sbyangs// thabs 'dis rang bzhin don chen rdzogs// kun bzang nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur// phung po'i lus rab tu sbyong ba'i sbyor ba'o//// gzhan yang rab tu bshad pa ni// gal te phung por mi ldan na// ming byang la rten sbyang ba ni// gro ga shing shun ras dag la// gzugs mdzes ming rus ldan pa bri// 'phan gdugs bcas te rten la gdags// dkyil 'khor lho phyogs stegs bur bzhag/ lha rnams mchod bstod rdzogs pa dang// bdag po'i ting 'dzin gsal ba yis// mchod sbyin rgya chen byas nas su// bar chod bgegs la bka' bsgo zhing// bden pa chen po brjod par bya// bar do rigs drug gar gnas kyang// rnam shes 'od zer lcags kyus dgug/ gzugs la bstim ste gson bzhin bsam// lus ngag yid kyi bar chad bgegs// gshin rje gshid dang rta mgrin dang// rnam par rgyal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// yungs kar sngags te tshar gcad bya// 'jam dpal rnon pos rtog pa gcad// ngan song kun 'dren gyis ni drang// stobs po rdo rje gnod sbyin no// drag po'i nus pas mtshan ma gzhom// sgrib pa rnam par sel bas bkru// ye shes me yis bsregs par bya// lan chags sbyin pas de nyid dpral// dug gsum sbyang ba'i khrus chab gsol// ngan song gsum dang bde 'gro gsum// rigs drug g.yang sa'i mtshan ma bcad// de nas dkyil 'khor nang du gzhug/ skyabs 'gro sems bskyed tshogs bsag cing// me tog phul te lha ngo bstan// bum ba'i dbang bskur rdzogs par bya// lam sbyang chos bshad nor rdzas bstab// bsngo ba smon lam rgyas par bya// lam bstan rgyal ba'i sras su bya// de nas bsregs sbyang rdzogs tshul gyis// thal ba chos sku'i rten du bsgyur// gnas pa dam pas mchog tu bya// go 'phang chen por gdon mi za// dbyer med kun tu bzang po yin// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ las rab tu grub par byed pa'i sbyor ba lnga bstan pa'i le'u+u ste gnyis

pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs mnyes par bya ba dang/ dam tshig can dang/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang/ 'gro ba phal pa dang/ rigs skyong ba dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang/ gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas tshogs rab tu 'phel bar byed pa ni 'di dag bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus pa'i// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'am// yang na bar chad bsal ba'i phyir// mchod mgron chen po dgye ba ni// gnas khang gtsang ma dris byugs la// snod gtsang mdzes pa du ma ru// chu gsum me tog bdug sbos dang// mar me dri chab zhal zas dang// rol mo sgra dang 'dod yon lnga// bla re gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan// mchod pa'i dngos paur rab bstar nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rten bkod de// khrus byas gos bzang bgos nas ni// rnam par mi rtog ngang nyid las// dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis// dri chab nang du hUM las ni// khro bo las rnams rgyal byed pa// mthing nag ral gri zhags pa thogs// mchod rdzas bgegs kun bskrad cing gzhom// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+ho\u0f85haM/ oM badzra ya k+Sha hUM/ sbyangs shing bsang ba nyid du bya// oM AHhUM/ badzra puSh+pe hUM/ badzra ng+hu pe hUM/ badzra A lo ke hUM/ badzra gan+d+he hUM/ badzra ne bi te hUM/ badzra A ha ra hUM/ badzra shap+ta hUM// lha rdzas dam par byin gyis brlab// nam mkha'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bsgom// rang bzhin gnas nas snyan gsan dbab// snying ga'i 'od kyis spyan drangs te// zla ba chu skyes gdan la bzhugs// gnyis med dbab pa mchog yin no// zhal bsil zhabs bsil brda sbyor ba'i// yon chab phul te 'dud phyag 'tshal// de nas me tog dbu la dbul// bdug spos shangs la mar me spyan// dri chab thugs kar dbul bya zhing// bshos gtsang zhal la sgra ni snyan// rim pa'i rdzas kyis mchod pa'o// 'dod yon lnga dang rin chen bdun// lha mo brgyad sogs legs pa rnams// kun bzang blo yis sprul te mchod/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun gyis// spos sman rin chen dpag bsam shing// me tog shing tog 'bru bcud rtsi// chu gtsang sgra snyan gzugs mdzes pa// mchod 'os dngos po ma lus kun// bdag med blo yis blangs te mchod// gnas gsum sbyor ba'i tshogs mchod kyis// 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes bdag nyid la// las sbyangs dngos grub gsal bar gsam// drin lan bsab phyir de dag la// cha lugs don rtags mthun pas bstod// sdig pa bshags te yi rang dbul// 'gro don mdzad phyir bzhugs gsol gdab// skyabs song sems bskyed lam bstan cing// yongs su bsngodang smon lam gdab// 'dod pa'i don gsol phrin

las bcol// ma dag bshags te bzod par gsol// bkra shis smon lam tshig brjod cing// ye shes gshegs te dam tshig bsdu// bsod nams tshogs kyi mchog yin no// gzhan yang mchod sbyin stobs ldan ni// legs par bstar ba'i gnas de ru// gshos gtsang 'bras dang khur ba dang// zho dang 'o ma mar mthud phrum// gtsang mar sbyar ba gsum du bgos// sbyang spel rang mos 'thob byed pa'i// bshad pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// oM AHhUM b+h+rUMH/ kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// bskrad cing dbang du bsdu bar bya// dang po phyi yi mchod mgron ni// mgon mdzad bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen bzhi// dregs pa bcu dang lha chen brgyad// klu brgyad gza' brgyad gnod sbyin brgyad// rgyu skar tshogs dang bcas pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i chos srung tshogs// bskyed cing rang gi gnas nas dgug/ oMHaHpreHtaHyaHk+ShaHaHpaH krA+o tA yak+Sha a sa byung ra sha nan sa yag bi na yang/ iHaHyaHbaHyagaHgaHbiHnaH de de de de de de de de/ phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuH ra ra ra ra ra ra ra raH ya ya ya ya ya ya ya yaH dza ba ri shaH/ rang gi ming dang phyag rgya yis// dam tshig pa la nges par dbab// spos dang me tog mar me dri// zhal zas stobs dang ldan pa ni// rang gi ming dang sbrel te mchod// tshul ldan tshig gis rab tu bstod// dam las mi 'da' dngos grub gsol// las kun byed pa'i tshig brjod bya// cha gnyis pa ni bsngo ba'i yul// rgyud lnga rigs drug spyi yin te// 'od zer lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug/ a nr-i su tri pre du badzra A gats+tsha hUM dzaH/ mdun gnas 'khor gyi tshul bsams te// rnam snang mdzad pas bsrungs shing brjod// rang gi 'dod yon tshogs sbyin zhing// chaus dang zang zing tshims par bsngo// tha ma nyid ni sha 'khon dang// lan chags tshul du byin brlabs te// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang// gnod sbyin srinapo mi'am ci// lto 'phye grul bum yi dwags dang// srul po sha sa za lus srul po// skem byed smyo byed brjed byed dang// nam gru sa yi bdag la sogs// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs tshogs// rta mgrin can gyi ting 'dzin gyis// ma lus dgug cing dbang du bsdus// bi nA ya ka ma hA dzi bi tAn+tak+Sha ra min nam ma tsa bi tan ta aM ku sha dzaH len chags nor sbyin tshul du bsngo// bka' bsgo chos bshad bden pa bdar// drag po'i tshig gis spyo zhing bsdigs// rang gi gnas su gzir cing 'phang// byang chub sems skyes ma gyur bar// thar med mnar ba'i tha tshig brjod// slar yang go bgo bsrung bar bya// kun bzang mgon po rgyal mchog ste/ nyes pa'i lan du legs par

mdzad// 'di ni don grub tshogs chen rdzogs// gzhan yang mchod sbyin bya ba ni// dad ldan kun bzang rigs can gyis// rin chen snod mdzes chu yis dgang// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// snying po 'bru dang me tog stsal// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// go bgos bsrung shing bar chad bsal// dag byed bdun gyis rgyud sbyangs te// tshad med bzhi yis gzhan don 'bad// mngon par byang chub ting 'dzin gyis// gzhal med khang pa mngon gsal bya// cho ga gsum dang yan lag bzhi// rang gzhan dam tshig bdag po bskyed// sri zhu can rnams gnas nas dbab// yon tan lha tshogs phyi bzhin 'brang// bar snang dang ni mdun gyi sar// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la bzhug/ las bdag lha yis phyag 'tshal 'dud// mchod sbyin brtag pa'i las chen drug/ oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+b+haHsarba d+harmaHswa b+hA ba bi shud+b+ho\u0f85haMH na maHsarba ta thA ga teb+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tat+khaM ut+ga te s+pha ra na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM a mr-i kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a ba lo ki te na maHsa man+ta s+pha ra Na rasmi b+ha ba sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dz+wa lA ni swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nan gra he shwa ri pra b+hany+dza ti ma hA sa ma ya swA hA// sbyang zhing spel te mos par bsgyur// spyod par dbang bsgyur thob par bya// phrin las bcol zhing dbang bsdus la// tshul bzhin bsngo ba rgyas par bya// bshags sbyang las sbyar bden pa brjod// chos kyi sbyin pa bsngos nas ni// 'phags pa rnams ni dbyings su gshegs// gzhan rnams rang rang gnas su bskrad// skye med don gyis rgyas gdab cing// spyod lam kun bzang ngang gis spyad// mtshan ma rdzas kyi mchod sbyin yin// skad cig tsam gyis mnyes byed pa'i// blau stobs ldan pa'i mchod sbyin dang// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// byang chub sems kyis yongs su khyab// de nyid ma skyes dag pa'i ngang// chos dbyings zab mos rgyas btab pa// rtse gcig khyab pa nyid yin no// gzhan yang chos sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi// rten gyur bsod nams tshogs bskyed pa// chos dbyings mnyam nyid gnas mchog tu// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhi nyid la// ye shes lnga yi khri 'phang brtsig/ yang dag mtha' yi bum pa bskyil// stong nyid snying po'i srog shing btsug/ bcu+u gsum sa yi 'khor lo 'bar// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gdugs kyis bkab// chos sku 'gyur med rin po che// mi rtog gzugs sku'i dar 'phan 'phyar// rnam dag skyon bral na bza' bgos// chos nyid don gyi sku gdung yin// de yi don rtags 'byung ba ni// rtags mtshan sku gdung bzheng 'dod na// rdo rje las kyi ting 'dzin gyis// sa brtag byin

brlab bsrung zhing bskor// bdud rtsi 'khyil bas sbyang ba dang// brdung dang bskrad pa'i bar du bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin chu yis sbru// ting 'dzin chen pos 'bi 'bi bya// thams cad snying po'i til mar bsku// gzugs sku 'byung ba'i brkos phor du// 'bi 'bi chos sku'i rnam par gsal// sor mo rigs lnga'i ngang gis dbyung// sku gsum tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam// stobs bcu ldan pa'i ri rab ni// byang chub chos kyi sa la bzhugs// mi 'jigs bzhi yi bang rim la// so sor rig pa'i bum pas mdzes// rnam par thar pa'i sgo btod cing// tshad med bzhi yi bre bzhag nas// thabs dang shes rab skar khung btod// srog shing stong pa bco brgyad de// 'khor lo pha rol phyin pa bcu// mkhyen pa'i thugs rje char khebs gdugs// rin chen tog ni sku gsum rdzogs// dril bu gsung dbyangs drug cu'o// dar dpyang rin chen ma 'dres chos// bsrung med gsum gyi rgyal mtshan btsug/ na bza' bsnyel med chos nyid du// byin gyis brlabs shing bsam par bya// rang bzhin chos sku spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan dag la bstim zhing dbab/ khrus gsol gdan dbul gus phyag 'tshal// rdzas dang ting 'dzin blos sbrul dang// 'dod yon bdag bzung med pas mchod// don rtags tshigs gis rab tu bstod// dbang bskur mnga' gsol me tog dor// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// 'phags pa'i tshogs kun de la dbab/ khyad par las kyi bye brag ni// lha rnams bsgyub dang sdig pa bshags// shi ba'i don la skye ba dang// bgegs bsal ba dang bsod nams spel// rbod gtong bzlog cing nad gdug bcad/ khrims nyams gso dang dam tshig bskang// byang chub bar chad bsal phyir dang// lhag pa'i lha dang sngags kyis bya// 'dod pa so so'i don gsol zhing// smon lam gdab cing dge ba bsngo// bskor zhing 'dud pas brtan par bya// 'byung bas mi gnod gnas su bzhugs// tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sku gnyis 'grub// gzhan yang tshogs chen bshad pa ni// bkra shis dben pa'i gnas dag tu// ting 'dzin ldan pas bka' bsgo zhing// mchod sbyin rgyas par btang byas nas// byin gyis brlab cing sbyang ba dang// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab tu sbyar// stegs bu legs sar bstar ba'i steng/ khru gang khru phyed zlum por bskor// sor bzhi phyir dor dbus su ni// rdo rje sor brgyad tshad tsam bri// phyi rol me ri 'od kyis brgyan// bud shing dkar po 'o ma can// dri zhim khru gang tshad du brtsig/ rtse mo lo 'dab 'bras bcas la// mchod sbyin yam shing bya ba yin// 'bras chan til sogs 'bru sna tshogs// ku sha spos chu g.yas su bzhag/ mchod rdzas phal pa g.yon du'o// dgang blugs dam

tshig mdun bzhag nas// gos dkar rgyan bgos ku sha'i steng// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal gyis// sems dpa'i skyil krung tshul gyis 'dug/ 'khor yug dri zhim chu yis gtor// dag byed rtse mo phyir bstan bskor// cho ga lnga'am gsum dag gis// lha yi rnal 'byor gsal bya ste// snying po hUM gi 'phro 'du yis// dgang blugs rdo rje dril bur bya// bum pa sbyangs te kyil 'khor bskyed// ku sha bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsang// gtsub shing me 'am bram ze'i me// rlung g.yob kyis sbar me yi lha// raM las mdog dkar drang srong tshul// tshangs pa'i skud pas rab tu brgyan// phyag g.yas dbyug pa bgrang phreng 'dzin// g.yon na gun+d+he skyabs sbyin mdzad// rang dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes dgug/ bgegs bskrad bstim te mchod rdzas dbul// dkar gsum mngar gsum til dang nas// yam shing 'o ma 'bras chan rnams// rim bzhin phul te bshags sbyang bya// bstod de 'bod pa'i phrin las bcol// me lha'i thugs kar dkyil 'khor gyi// lha rnams pho brang gsal byas te// ye shes phab la mchod rdzas dbul// lha rnams so so'i sngags phreng la// mchod bsreg rdzas kyi sngags btag dbul// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du 'o// dgang blugs kyis ni mthol bshags te// bstod cing gsol gdab phrin las bcol// dkyil 'khor bsdus te me lha gso// mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas sngar bzhin bskyar// bshags gsol bcol ba de bzhin no// ye shes gshegs te dam tshig bsdu// smon lam bsngo ste bkra shis brjod// nad gdon bar chad zhi ba dang// mthar thug sdig sgrib sel ba'o// phyi ma'i dus kyi sgrub pa yis// rnal 'byor gnas pa'i tshe bsring ba// phun tshogs dben pa'i gnas dag tu// pho brang legs par gnas byas la// rin chen bum pa mdzes pa ru// bkru zhing brab bdug rgyan gyis brgyan// nang du bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis dgang// tshe bshos mdzes pa steng bzhag ste// rdo rje rgya gram rgya yis gdab// sems dpa'i ting 'dzin skad cig gis// b+hUM las bum pa gzhal med khang// nang du sngar bshad lha rnams bskyed// gtso bo'i thugs kar tshe dpag med// dmar po tshe bum 'dzin pa bskyed// thugs kar rdo rje nyi zla sbyar// bla gnas yi ge nr-i dang bcas// bsgom pa dam tshig mchog yin no// chos dbyings gnyis med de bzhin no// 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis// 'chi bdag bdud dang gshin rje yi// lag nas bla tshe stobs kyis dgug/ dpag med thugs ka'i ga bur sba// de nyid gnas nas hUM brgyud nas// gzungs thag rdo rje'i khong sbu gnas// mnyes byed 'od 'phros kun tu khyab// snod bcud tshe dbang bkrag mdangs bsdu// gnas

dbus su ni ma lus bstim// tshe dbang sngags kyi 'phro 'du yis// lha rnams nyi zla'i bar du gzhug/ snying po lnga po 'od du thim// gnas lngar yig 'bru 'od du bzhu// slob ma'i lus la bstim zhing dbab// tshe dbang mthu stobs rgyas par bsam// gnas pa'i sa bon 'od du zhu// skye med snying po \u0f84gyur pa las// mi 'gyur chos dbyings chen por bsgom// rdo rje las kyi slob dpon gyis// rtags byung bdag po'i phyag tu drangs// de yis slob ma'i tshogs chen la// bden pa'i tshig brjod dbang bskur bya// 'chi med gzi brjid brtan par bsgom// g.yas g.yon bskor te smon lam dang// bkra shis bden pa brjod par bya// 'di yis yun gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ma lus thams cad kun// kun bzang nga yi ngang gis bsgrub// ces bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu byed pa las/ las phra mo rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i snying po yang dag par gsang ba sgra'i tshogs sku gsung thugs gsang ba chen po las rab tu phyung ngo// oM sngags sor bzhag ya ga smin pra be sha/ ba man+te ba nA ga yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa b+hu ta ya/ tsa ti pra ti si na dun du ya ya na// mu ta na pa sa ya mi hUM phaT swA hA/ bka' rab tu bsgo ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA pra ti sa ya b+he b+he rna be sa ma ya stAM/ mkhyen par gsol ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA A ra li hUM dza/ dbab pa'o// oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha bi shwa tsakra nan/ bstim pa'o/ oM bi shwa ma ru ma hA shUn+ya tA dz+nya na badzra sarba swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM badzra sa ma ya su kra ma ti hUM/ dbye ba'i sngags so// na maH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa na dzA lA ni/ k+Sho ba ga naM gan ka ra swA hA/ dra ba'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yo badzra kI li kI la ya A kar+Sha ya swA hA/ rdo rje phur pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya sarba mu khe b+h+yaH badzra pra ka ra Na ta thA gA tA nAM/ ku ru ku ru tsaN+Da swA hA/ rgya gram gyi sngags so// oM badzra kI li kI la ya pad+ma A lo ka sarba nan ma ra sha du ru du ru oM/ phur pa'i sngags so// oM ko ka la sha badzra dun du ru da ra swA hA/ mda'i sngags so// oM badzra tik+Sh+NA shak+ti ha sa swA hA/ ral gri'i sngags so// oM sha na bi dru a mo ka ka la sha bu pa la sha sa ta hUM// bum pa rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags so// oM badzra b+han+d+ha du na ta ta tsi ti na hUM/ skud pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta e h+ya hi b+ha ga wan dr-i sh+ya dza A ra li ho// bod pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta th+wa ga ta pad+ma b+ha tra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bzhugs pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta th+wa ga ta At+ma nAM ni ta yAr+ya mi pu ru sha ya ho// 'dud pa'i sngags so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha naM ga ga na sa ma ya

swA hA/ mchod yon gyi'o// oM badzra gan+d+he bi shud+d+ho ga tod b+ha ba swA hA/ dag pa'i'o// oM badzra puSh+pe su me ma hA me tr-i bu da ga te swA hA/ me tog gi'o// oM badzra d+hA pe d+hu d+harma d+ha tu a nu ga te swA hA// bdug spos kyi'o// oM badzra a rtsi te pa ri na da ga na a ti ri ye swA hA// snang ba'i'o// oM sarba ke du shi go ta thA ga ta swa b+hA sarba ka ti ya swA hA// bza' ba'i'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a shu te shap+ta ya swA hA/ sgra'i'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn// oM a b+hisma s+pha ra na hi maM ga ga na khaM// d+harma tang tha A kar sha ya sa man+ta ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pa ri shA da maM ta le/ na ma pra ti su ma dz+nyA na b+ha ye/ sarba ta thA ga te b+ha seM/ d+harma tad tha a sti ta na b+ha seM tsa swA hA/ mchod pa chen po rab tu sgrub pa'i snying po rnams so// oM a d+hi tiSh+tha dz+nya na sa ma ya hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa me/ me tog gtor ba'o/ oM pra ti gr-i h+Na hUM pra tits+tsha hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ brtag pa'i sngags so// oM badzra tsak+Shu pra be sha phaT// mig dbye ba'i sngags so// oM a hUM sid ti ta ya maM/ blta ba'i sngags so// oM badzra badzrod g+ha TA ya/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya shI g+h+raM/ sma ra sa ma yahUM/ sgo dbye ba ste shar gyi'o// oM sarba ta th+wa ga ta pU dza sta na At+mA nAM// nir+YA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa twa a ng+hi tiSh+Thi swa maM/ phyag btsal ba shar gyi'o// oM badzra A be sha ya a a/ dam tshig sbyin pa shar gyi'o// oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi ShIny+tsa hUM/ bkru ba'i shar gyi'o// oM rat+na pa tod+g+ha TA ya sa ma ya pra be sha shI g+h+raM/ sma ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ lho'i'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na a b+hi She ka ta At+mA nAM nir+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bra dza rat+na a b+hi ShIny+tsa maM/ phyag gi lho'i'o// oM rat+na A be sha ya sa ma ya a/ dam tshig sbyin pa lho'i'o// oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi ShIny+tsa traM/ bkru ba lho'i'o// oM pad+ma ka tong+g+ha TA ya sa ma ya pra be sha shI g+h+raM/ sma ra sa ma ya hUM/ nub kyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra bar+t+ta ya At+mA nAM nIr+YA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra bar+t+ta yA nAM/ phyag gi'o// A+oM pad+ma da ma A be sha ya sa ma ya AH/ dam tshig gi'o// oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi ShIny+tsa hrIH/ bkru ba'o// oM karma ba tod+g+ha TA ya sa ma ya pra be sha/ shI g+h+raM sma ra sa ma ya hUM/ sgo dbye ba'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ni At+mA nAM nIr+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA badzra karma ku ru maM/ phyag gi'o// oM karma A be sha ya sa ma ya a/ dam tshig gi'o/ oM karma ka la sha a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ bkru ba byang gi'o// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta bung+ng+ha ba tod+g+ha TA sa ma ya pra be sha shI g+h+raM// sma ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ dbus kyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha kA ya bA ka tsit+ta pra Na me naM ban+da naM ka ro mi/ phyag gi'o// oM swa b+ha ba bud+d+ha A be sha ya a a/ dam tshig gi'o// oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi ShIny+tsa maM/ bkru ba'o// oM badzra ka po ta mA le hUM/ stegs bu'i'o// oM AM hUM trAM hUMM swa b+ha ba shung+ng+haHsarba ng+harmA shung+ng+haHswa b+ha

ba a shu pa ki ra si ti hUM/ bum pa bskyed pa'i'o// oM tsa turma hA mu tra ka la sha sid+d+haM mu me sti ti/ phyi sbyang ba'o// oM ka la sha sarba bung+ng+ha gu Na sing+ng+hi hUM// nang sbyang ba'o// oM dz+nyA na rasmi ma hA ka ru+u Ni/ par sha sing+ng+hi hUM/ chu'i sngags so// oM rat+na pany+tsa sing+ng+hi hUM/ rin po che'i'o// oM pany+tsa b+hai Sha dz+yA ya/ sman gyi'o// oM ng+hU pa pany+tsa sing+ng+hi ku ru+u hUM// spos kyi'o// oM gar+b+ha pany+tsa sing+ng+hi ku ru hUM/ snying po lnga sbyin pa'o// pany+tsa ng+hA n+yaM sa ma ya sing+ng+hi hUM/ 'bru'i'o// oM AHhUM mu kha la bid sha swa hA/ rgyan gyi'o// oM kalpa br-i k+Sha srig sha hUM/ kha rgyan gyi'o// oM pany+tsA li ga hUM/ mgul bcing pa'o// oM A yu d+hA ro sU'u tra ka pa shi sa ta ka ru hUM/ gzungs thag gi'o// oM shri bai ro tsa na badzra satwa rat+na saM b+ha ba a mi d+he ba a mo g+ha sing+ng+ha A yu She rA dza hUM/ yungs kar gyis dbang bskur ba'o// oM bo ng+hi tsit+ta hUM// 'o ma btsal ba'o// oM ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta a d+hiSh+Tha na hUM/ oM dz+nyA na ka la sha badzra sing+ng+hi sid+d+hipad+ma badzrA ya// byin gyis brlabs pa dang bzhugs pa'i'o// oM bung+ng+ha badzra rat+nA pad+ma karma a b+hi ShIny+tsa oM hUM trAM hrIHha// mu dra hriM// phyag rgya sbyin pa'o// oM shub ri ka ri sid+d+hi hUMM// ril ba sbyin pa'o// oM ma pa ne ka na bi shung+ng+he hUM/ chu sbyin pa'o// oM pany+tsa naM pa sing+ng+hi hUM// 'bru sbyin pa'o// oM a mr-i ta pany+tsa rasmi ma hA ku+u ru hUM// sman sbyin pa'o// oM ng+hU pa pany+tsa a ba de sha ma hA sing+ng+hi hUM/ spos sbyin pa'o// oM sarba pany+tsa rat+na sing+ng+hi hUM/ rin po che sbyin pa'o// oM pany+tsa gar+b+ha sid+d+hi hUM/ snying po sbyin pa'o// oM kaM pa shri sha su me pa ta hUM/ gu na hUM/ kha rgyan sbyin pa'o// oM da na smi ti la ka shi ka si ka hUM/ mgul chings sbyin pa'o// oM shu pa ya sa ri su pa ka sha sa mi ta ku+u ru hUM/ gzungs thag sbyin pa'o// oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ me long sbyin pa'o// oM dz+nyA na tsakra a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ 'khor lo sbyin pa'o// oM ma hA su+u ra ta ma ku ta a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi/ dung sbyin pa'o// oM badzra rak+Sha ti ta baM hUM// rgya gram sbyin pa'o// oM bung+ng+ha hUM badzra trAM rat+na hrIHpad+ma hA karma a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi// dbu rgyan sbyin pa'o// oM sarba bud+d+ha ka ya a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi// bum pa sbyin pa'o// oM rat+na mA la a b+hi ShIny+tsa trAM/ phreng ba sbyin pa'o// oM badzra a laM ba ne a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ cod pan sbyin pa'o// oM bung+ng+ha badzra rat+na pad+ma karma ma hA mu dra ab+hi ShIny+tsa a/ phyag rgya lnga sbyin pa'o// oM nA' ma pu tra a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ ming sbyin pa'o// oM sarba pany+tsa bid+yA ng+ha ra man+t+ra a b+hi ShIny+tsa ya/ gzungs sngags sbyin pa'o// oM sarba ta th+wa ga ta gu ya sa ma ya a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ gsang ba sbyin pa'o// oM sarba ha thA ga ta ma hA ma hA pradz+nyA sa ma ya a b+hi ShIny+tsa maM/ thabs dang shes rab sbyin pa'o// rab tu dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// na mo badzra kro ng+ha ya ma hA daM Sh+Thot+ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/

gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA ya kA na/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzi bi tAn+ta ka rA ya sA hA/ bskrad pa'o// oM sarba sa man+ta da na badzra swA hA/ phyi ba'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu phra ra na su sti sta re swA hA/ bkru ba'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi shwa ng+ha na swAhA/ byug pa'o// oM ra dza to a ba ha ri ni hUM/ bdar ba'o// oM AHhUM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ya s+t+waM/ dbang bskur ba'o// oM tsak+Shu maN+Da la bi sho ng+ha nA ya swA hA/ mig dbye ba'o// oM dib bya karnA ya ne da ka lo ki ti pa sad ta hri/ rna ba dbye ba'o// oM dib bya ga nA sA sarba laM po daM ra hri hri/ sna dbye ba'o// oM dib bya mu khA ya gan+d+ha swA hA/ kha dbye ba'o// oM sarba bo ki sha sa ng+ha ra ni tri/ so shing sbyin pa'o// oM sarba sho da na kha tshe da hUM/ oM karma ni ha ra ni hUM/ skra breg pa dang bshad pa'o// oM rat+na a laM kA' ra hUM/ rgyan gdags pa'o// oM dib pa pra bu ye swA hA/ na bza' sbyin pa'o// oM ba su tsa ga pa ri ga re swA hA/ rgyan dbul ba'o// oM rat+na maN+Da la u pa hUM/ gnas dbul ba'o// oM e ma ye ga ga na sa pa ri ka ra ye swA hA/ oM badzra si ta pa se ye swA hA/ bsil ba'o// oM AHhUM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li sarba big sha ha na hUM phaT/ bsang ba'o// oM a ga ne te b+ha ga ya swA hA/ bskyed pa'i'o// A gats+tsha/ bod pa'o// oM ag+na ye d+hu pe puSh+be A lo ke gan+d+he i maM gr-ih+na pU dza a la la ho// dbul ba'i sngags so// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya hUM/ til dbul ba'o// oM bi ma la ye swA hA// mar gyi'o// oM sarba pA pa maM b+han+d+ha la swA hA/ chan gyi'o// oM A yu She swA hA// dUr ba'o// oM ye ma ye gA ga la pA ri ka ri ye swA hA/ 'bru'i'o/ oM be ne ta sta badzra swA hA/ yam shing gi'o// oM a ha ra su spe ma hA da re be sha shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ma lus pa'i sngags so// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ las chen po rab tu bsgrub pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i don rab tu dbab pa'i rnam par dag pa'i cha lugs kyi bkod pa rgya chen po dang rang gi gnas dang yongs su mthun pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bstod pa 'di bka' stsal to// hUM rigs lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// gtso chen rigs kun bdag po ste// rnam snang mdzad pa sku mdog dkar// byang chub phyag rgyas 'khor lo 'dzin// rdo rje mi bskyod sku mdog mthing// sa gnon phyag rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser// mchod sbyin rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar// ting 'dzin mnyam gzhag pad+ma bsnams// don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang// skyabs sbyin rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// gnyis med rigs kyi

yum rnams ni// kun bzang spyan ma gos dkar mo// mA ma kI dang sgrol ma ste// so so'i yab kyi tshul bstan zhing// gtso la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs// yab yum bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// shar phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang// yum chen rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// mdog dkar rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// rgyal po mdog ser lcags kyu 'dzin// chags pa mda' gzhu 'gengs mdzad dmar// legs pa ljang gu rgya gram bsnams// sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje 'dzin// bdug pa mdog ser sprin 'phro ma// rdo rje lcags kyu mdog ni dmar// rdo rje me sgron mdog ljang gsal// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang// yum chen rin chen dbyings phyug ma// mdog ser rin chen ral gri 'dzin// rdo rje rin chen 'dzin mdzad ser// gzi 'arjid mdog ser nyi ma 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dmar// bzhad pa mdog ljang so phreng 'dzin// rdo rje phreng ba 'dzin ma dkar// rdo rje me tog 'dzin ma ser// rdo rje zhags pa 'ch-ing mdzad dmar// rdo rje 'bebs ma bsil mdzad ljang// nub phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs dbang dang// yum chen pad+ma dbyings phyug ma// mdog dmar pad+ma dmar po bsnams// rdo rje chos dkar pad+ma 'dzin// rnon po mdog ser ral gri 'dzin// smra ba lce 'dzin sku mdog dmar// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin pa ljang// rdo rje dbyangs dkar pi wang 'dzin// rdo rje mar me 'dzin ma ser// rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin ma dmar// gsal bkra ljang gu rma bya 'dzin// byang phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje dang// yum chen las kyi dbyings phyug ma// mdog ljang rdo rje dril bu bsnams// rdo rje las dkar rgya gram bsnams// srung ba ser po go cha bsnams// gnod sbyin dmar po mche ba bsnams// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin mdzad ljang// rdo rje gar bsgyur sku mdog dkar// byug pa dri chab 'thor ma ser// rdo rje dgyes mdzad dril 'khrol dmar// rdo rje 'bebs mdzad chu rgyan bsil// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan sa yi snying po dang// yum chen rdo rje sems ma ni// mdog dkar rin chen snye ma bsnams// rdo rje rgyal mtshan sku mdog dkar// chu srin gser mdog phyag na bsnams// dbang phyug rgyal po ser lcags kyu// bkod pa'i rgyan dmar me tog bsnams// rin chen 'od 'phro ljang rin chen// bde ba rgyas 'debs kha T+wAM dkar// za byed ma ser mda' gzhu 'gengs// rmongs byed dmar mo phyag rgya bsnol// tshe 'phel ma ljang dril bu 'dzin// lho nub

mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan nam mkha'i snying po dang// yum chen rin chen dbyings phyug ma// mdog ser rin chen za me tog/ snang ba'i mchog dkar rdo rje bsnams// phyag rgya rgyal ser mda' gzhu 'dzin// spos kyi glang po 'od phung dbang// spobs pa brtsegs ljang lcags kyu bsnams/ khrus ma dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma sku mdog ser// bla re 'dzin mdzad lha mo dmar// gdugs 'dzin ma ni mdog ljang sngo// nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan byams pa chen po dang// yum chen pad+ma'i sems ma ni// mdog dmar klu shing pad+ma bsnams// pad+ma 'dzin mdzad rgyal po dkar// pad+ma dam pa 'dzin ma ser// rdo rje mi g.yo dmar po ti// thogs med rgyal ljang lcags kyu 'dzin// lha mo pad+ma dpal be'u dkar// 'jigs byed ma ser 'khor lo bsnams// skyon bral dmar po pad+ma bsnams// rnam rgyal ma ljang rgyal mtshan bsnams// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan sgrib pa rnam sel dang// yum chen las kyi sems ma ni// mdog ljang phyag na po ti bsnams// rin chen dbang sdud rin chen dkar// grub pa'i las ser rgya gram bsnams// dga' bar ston dmar me long bsnams// mi g.yo mtha' ljang bsam gtan mdzad// lha mo skyabs can gdugs 'dzin dkar// lha mo dri med bum bsnams ser// sgra sgrogs dmar mo 'bud dung bsnams// thogs med ma ljang gser nya bsnams// kun kyang sems dpa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// yab yum gnyis med 'dud pa'i tshul// gsal 'tsher lhun sngug gzi 'arjid 'bar// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// shar phyogs khyams na gnas bzhugs pa// brgya byin mdog dkar pi wang bsnams// thags bzang ris sngo go cha bsnams// lho phyogs khyams kyi logs dag na// shAka thub gsil byed 'dzin gser mdog/ nub phyogs khyams kyi logs dag na// shAkya seng mthing po ti bsnams// nam mkha'i mdzod dmar rin chen sgrom// byang phyogs khyams kyi logs dag na// chos rgyal mthing nag me chu bsnams// dkyil 'khor phyi yi sgo bzhi na// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dkar// lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ser// nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar// byang sgor rdo rje dril 'khrol ljang// cung zad khro ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ gtso chen yab la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// rigs kyi yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs mkhas thugs rje 'gro don mdzad// sems dpa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes sgyu ma'i tshul 'chang ma// sems ma'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma lus don mdzad

rgyal ba che// sems dpa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnyis med phyag rgya 'dud tshul can// sems ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro drug so so'i don rdzogs mdzad// thub pa drug la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// sgo skyong bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs bcu so so'i bgegs rigs 'dul// chos srung tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di dag gis// lha rnams la ni gang bstod pas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// kun zang nyid dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ sku'i phyag rgya rab tu grub pa bstod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rje rgya chen po rab tu grub pa gzhan gyi don dpag tu med pa sbyor ba'i rigs sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ oM swA b+hA ba sarba d+harmAHbi shud+d+he swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni thams cad du dag pa'i sngags so// oM ba ra bi da na khargats+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ dang po rgyud kyi sgo gcad pa'o// oM sarba du khaHsarba rak+She sha hUM phaT/ gnyis pa gcad pa'o// oM ma tha ma tha sarba tir+Ya ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ gsum pa gcad pa'o// oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT// bzhi pa gcod pa'o// oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ lnga pa gcad pa'o// i d+ha ma te kha tham// badzra sa ma ya na rag kan/ ma ra hr-i da ya// na ma pa ti nan/ sa ma rak+Sha sing+ng+ha bi ti a mr-i ta he ho// gzhug cing bsgrag pa'o// oM b+ha ba ya ag+na ye A ga ts+tsha ya ga ts+tsha ma dr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dgug gcing bzhugs pa'o// oM b+ha ba ag+ne ye mA ma sarba pA paM shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ ma mA sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shung+ng+he shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mchod cing sbyin pa'o// oM brah+ma Ne sUr+ya tsan+d+ra a ng+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ oM bai shra ma NA ya ma hA rA dza a ng+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ oM d+h+r-i tra raSh+tA ya ma hA rA' dza a d+hi pa tra ye hUM dzaH/ oM bi rU TA kA ya suM ban+de/ ma hA rA dza a ng+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ oM bi rU'u pa k+ShA nA ga ma hA rA dza a ng+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ oM in+d+ra ya/ ag+na ye// ya mA ya/ nair r-i tA ya/ ba ya be/ ba ru NA ya/ ku be rA ya// I sha nA ya// biSh+Na be/ sUr+ya tsan+d+rA ya/ A gats+tsha hUM dza/ ma hA de ba aSh+tA b+h+yaHhUM dza/ phu nA' ga aSh+tA b+h+yaHhUM dza/ gra ha aSh+tA b+h+yaHhUM dza/ yak+Sha ma hA se na pa ta ye hUM dza/ badzra ha pa ri a ta ya hUM dza/ a ng+hi pa ta ye hUM dza/ A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya hUM dza/ bod pa'i sngags soH// oM brah+ma Ne// sUr+ya ya/ tsan+d+rA ya/ in+d+rA ya/ ag+na ye/ ya mA ya// rak+ShA ya// ba ru NA ya/ bA ya be/ ku be rA ya// I sha nA ya/ biSh+Na be/ de bA ya/ nA' ga ya// gra hA ye/ yak+ShA ya/ i daM gr-i h+Na/ d+hU pe// puSh+pe/ A lo ke// gan+d+he/ ni bi d+ye pU dza ya sA hA// mchod pa

dang rab tu sbyin pa'i sngags so// oM ti sta na badzra sa da ta hUM// bskyed pa'i sngags so// oM na maHsa man+ta naM hUM hUM/ gtsug tor gyi sngags so// na maHsa man+ta bung+ng+hA nAM ga ga pa ra lak+Sha na ka ru+u na ma hA ta thA ga ta badzra tsak+Shu kru swA hA// ye shes spyan gyi sngags so// na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM badzra ka ba tsa rak+Sha hUM/ rdo rje go cha'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo sarba tad khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba le/ sarba ta thA ga ta pud na ni ra dza te hUM hUM tra thA tra thA a pra ti ha te swA hA/ bsrung ba'o// oM A badzra aM ku sha nr-i trUM A gats+tsha hUM dza// ming byang la dgug pa'i sngags so// oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha ya ma rA dza pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ lus la bskrad pa'o// oM badzra ma hA kro ng+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hUM phaT/ ngag la bskrad pa'o// oM badzra ma hA kro ng+ha bi dza ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ yid la bskrad pa'o// oM badzra ma hA kro ng+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ thams cad du bskrad pa'o// oM ma hA sarba durga ti bi sho ng+ha ni ra dza ya dza/ drang ba'i'o// oM ma hA many+dzu shri sarba khang+ga ti/ shag ti ti k+Sh+Na dza pa ya phaT/ sgrib pa gcad pa'i sngags so// oM sarba karma a ba ra Na bi sho ng+ha ya sarba dur ga ti bi sho ng+ha ya dz+wa la dz+wa la ka ta ka ta ha na ha na sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra ha ra ha ra s+pho Ta s+pho Ta pre ta pre ta ma tha ma tha tra tha tra tha tshin+d+hatshin+d+ha da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa ma tha ma tha a ni nirki te a pa ra hUM hUM phaT/ brab pa'i sngags so/ / oM badzra ma hA yak+Sha sarba pA paM pA paM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ bstab pa'i sngags so// na mo b+ha ga ba te a ng+hi pa ti sarba pA bi bi shung+ng+ha ye pra sa da ka ka ra ni swA hA/ bkru ba'i sngags so// oM sarba pA paM ka da ha na badzra yak+Sha dz+wa la raM raM/ bsregs pa'i sngags so// oM na mo b+ha ga bA te sarba durga ti pa ri sho ng+ha ni rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaka saM bung+ng+hA ya/ ta d+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho ng+ha ni/ sarba pA paM bi sho ng+ha ni shung+ng+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra ni bi sho ng+ha ni swA hA/ sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM na maHtrai ya ng+hi kA nAM sarba ta thA ga hr-i da ya gar+b+he dz+wa la dz+wa la d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he san+d+ha ra ma ma a yus+saM sho ng+ha ya ma ma sarba pA paM// sarba ta thA ga ta ya man+to Sh+NI Sha bi ma lai bi shung+ng+he swA hA/ mchod rten bya ba'i sngags so// oM badzra rat+na sarba dz+nyA na hUM phaT/ sa byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM badzra kI li kI lA ya sarba duSh+tAM hUM phaT/ phur pa gdab pa'i sngags so// oM badzra sU tra ha phaT// thig gdab pa'i sngags so// oM amr-ita pra ti ha ta ha na ha na hUM phaT/ yungs kar gtor ba'i sngags so// oM badzra kha na kha na hUM phaT/ sa rko ba'i sngags so// oM badzra a mr-i ta mA ma ki bi shung+ng+he swA hA// chu gdab pa'i sngags so// oM badzra A yu She A be sha ya swA hA// brdzi ba'i sngags so// oM badzra dz+nyA na mud+ga rA A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ brdung ba'i sngags so// oM badzra dz+nyA na bo ng+hi tsit+ta rat+na pany+tsa sing+ng+ha ye swA hA// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags

so// oM badzra bim+ba sA ra ng+harma kA ya swA hA/ 'bi 'bi'i sngags so// oM ma hA ng+harma ng+hA tu dz+wa la gar+b+he swA hA/ phyag rgya gzhug pa'i sngags so// oM badzra A yu She dz+nyA na bo ng+hi tsit+ta a a// gdab pa'i sngags so// oM ng+harma d+ha tu nirma saM b+ho ga kA ya ng+harma swA hA/ dbyung ba'i sngags so// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swA hA/ bzhugs pa'i sngags so// oM dz+nyA na tsakra badzra pra marda ni swA hA// 'khor lo'i sngags so// oM ma hA a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ na bza' gsol ba'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma Ni sha ta dIp+ti swA hA/ ng+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he hr-i da ya swA hA/ gnas pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na pany+tsa kro ng+ha sa twa mu+u na ye swA hA// da du pa ra ta bi ru ma hA maN+Da la ga Na de ba tsakra/ badzra ka ni ki swA hA/ dkyil 'khor gyi sngags so// oM sho ng+ha ni sho ng+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho ng+ha ni sarba ta thA ga ta a pa nA ya swA hA/ las sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM a mr-i ta sarba bid badzra tir+Ya ka pre ta ka na ra ka ga ti pa ra na tra tha hUM phaT/ shi ba la phan par bya ba'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na a ba lo ki te/ sa man+ta s+pha ra na rasmi b+ha ba ma hA ma Ni du+u ru du+u ru hr-i da ya dza lA ni hUM/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ra mi ta A yu b+h+rUM dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ skye ba la phan pa'i sngags so// oM na maHsarba bung+ng+ha nAn a mo de ba laM laM laM sarba a ba ra Na bi sho ng+ha ne sarba yaM pA paM bi ma la A yur+d+ha ra puN+ye pun+ye ma hA puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sgrib pa gcad pa'i sngags so// na mo badzra pA Na ye ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ oM badzra kro ng+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+hAn+sa ya/ dza TI lam+bo da ra u tsuSh+ma kro ng+ha hUM phaT/ bgegs gcad pa'i sngags so// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ spong gdon gcad pa'i sngags so// oM ka kyi ka kyi du ru du ru hUM pa pha ra dza/ khe rgyas khe rgyas tsa sa me na maM tshe/ nad b+hi sa nan/ ng+ha re badzra ka ru da ta ya swA hA/ mdze nad gcad pa'i sngags so// oM tsa du ar+ya sad twa du kha pa ha sad ta oM sa mud ne ng+harma ka ma ka/ thA k+Sha sa nad ar+ya oM na ro ta ni rud da na de a smig sarba k+She shi sing+ng+hi swA hA// oM rga man+ti a ti na ni ti ri mi ti swA hA/ sdom pa gso ba'i sngags so// oM badzra twa sa ma ya/ na nu pA la ya/ badzra sa twa twe no pa/ tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba// su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sing+ng+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+tiM shre yAM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga lbAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya sa twa a/ dam tshig gso ba'i sngags so// oM bung+ng+ha bai ro tsa na/ hUM badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya/ trAM rat+na saM b+ha ba/ hrIHpad+ma a mi de ba/ a karma a mo g+ha sing+ng+hi/ bA gI shwa ra ya/ lo ke shwa ra ya/ badzra shar+ya sa ma ya ng+harma kA ya nirma Na kA ya sam+b+ho ga kA ya maN+Da la sa ma ya hUM/ gzhugs pa'i

sngags so// dam pa'i rigs mchog brgya dag kun// sku yi phyag rgya chen po nyid// snang la rang bzhin yongs ma grub// gsung nyid sgra yi dam tshig yin// yongs su grags pa de nyid stong// rdo rje thugs kyi dkyil 'khor de// yod med spros dang bral ba'o// 'di la gang zhig nges gnas pa// bde gshegs kun tu bzang po yin// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ nye ba'i las kyi rig pa chen po sprul par byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje mi 'gyur ba chen po yang dag par spro ba las nye bar 'du ba'i sbyor ba chen po 'di nyid kyi gsang ba las phyung ngo// kye kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen kun// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ nga dang rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog/ phyogs tsam dang ni rab tu rtogs// don la dgongs dang dgongs min dang// ji bzhin sgra dang ma yin nyid// nges pa nyid dang drang ba tsam// sbas tshig spyi yi yi ge las// bdag po'i snying la nges gnas pa// blun po gzhan la snying brtse dang// go ba bzang la rab bstan te/ lhag par sbyod pa nyid la gdams// de yis dben pa'i gnas nyid du// ting nge 'dzin gyi yo byad bsten// tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bzhi dang// gzhan don sems la brtan byas te// mthing nag hUM gi 'bar 'phro las// dag pa'i tshogs rten rab tu blta// de la mnyes sbyang yi rang dang// phan pa'i don gsol bya ba yis// nang du rung ba nyid yin no// bar chod bgegs kun gzhom pa'i phyir// snying po bzhi las skyes pa yi// rdo rje'i sa gzhir bsam par bya// rnam rtog 'du shes spang byas nas// bgegs kyi gnod pa ngang gis bsrung// dang po byang chub sems nges pa// stong nyid skye 'gag med gsal nas// snying rje'i yul gyi sa bon mthong// 'phel 'grib med gsal spro bsdu ba// dngos grub brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu// mtha' bral nam mkha'i chos 'byung la// g.yo sbyang bsreg cing brten byed rnams// rim 'byung so so'i nus par ldan// rin chen ri rab gzhal med khang// mtshan nyid kun ldan khyad par du// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi brgyad kyis mdzes// rtsal stobs shugs mdzes rigs ldan pa// 'degs byed steng du drod bsil 'od// 'jam mdangs ldan pas gsum dbyung ste// rtsal chen steng du med pa'i rgyu// rdo rje chu skyes ming gis mtshan// gzugs sku 'jig rten khams su spro// gzhan don mdzad pa rdzogs slar thim// phyag rgya yongs gyur byed pa'i yid// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brgyan dkar 'od// lnga bdag cod pan don mdzad bcas// bya ba'i chos bdag sgeg ldan

ma// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dzin cing// thabs dang shes rab brda mdzad cing// rdo rje dril bu thugs kar 'dzin// pad+ma nyi ma 'od phreng ldan// 'dud pa'i tshul du bsams nas ni// gnyis med sbyor bas kun 'dus nas// yab la kun thim gsang gnas phyung// yum gyi mkha' dbyings 'phro 'du las// dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs rjes chags kyis// yul rnams kun bsdus phyi rol dgod// 'jug par gsol te 'od kyis sbyang// sems can don gyur byin brlab kyis// rang nyid ye shes ngo mtshar brjod// e ma phung po rdo rje'i 'od// 'byung ba'i nus pa dang bcas pa// sangs rgyas yab yum rnams su snang/ khams dang skye mched sems dpa' ste// byung mthong bcings grol rig ma rig/ gsang chen skyon bral nyid yin no// de bstan yum gyis 'di brjod do// e ma chos kun gdod nas dben// snyigs ma lnga yang bde ldan te// gzhan nas btsal du yod min te// rang gi snying po rang la nye// de nas rgyal po gnas su dgod/ sbyong byed yi ge yab la thim// bde 'byung yum la gnyis su med// snyoms zhugs 'bru tshogs rab tu 'phros// byang chub lnga dang bsam pa lnga// rtogs pa bzhi yis mngon du bskyed// gtso bdag chen po mthing ga'i 'od// zhal gcig phyag gnyis phyogs kun snang// phyag g.yas rdo rje thugs kar brten// g.yon pa dril bus yum la bzung// btsun mo snang ba'i dbyings phyug ma// mthun pa'i tshul dgus rab tu 'khril// sna tshogs rigs kyis dbu rgyan cing// g.yon pa dril bu thugs kar brten// g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'khril// phung po'i rnam shes lha ru bsgom// sku mchog bde chen gnas su bsgom// longs sbyod gnas su AHyin no// snying ga lte ba gsang ba ru// hUM dang swA hA rim bzhin dgod// mthong thos tshor dang myong ba la// k+Shi traM hrI dziM rim bzhin bsam// mai th+l+hiM hUM dang muM rnams ni/ de dag phyi rol yul la dgod// yi ge sku yi dkyil 'khor las// gnyis med sems dpa'i thugs ka nas// 'od 'phros sku gsung thugs bsdus nas// mdun gnas de la gsol ba ni// oM 'bar ba'i rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad byung ldan// 'di nyid kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sku gsung thugs kyi nga rgyal bskyed// yum gyi sku yi dkyil 'khor dgod// 'dod yon lnga dang mUM bsgoms te// spyi bo mgrin par laM dang mUM// lhag mar muM pyaM tAM maM bsam// mthong thos tshor myong hUM trAM hrIHa/ phyi rol dzaHhUM baM hoHdgod// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas lnga ru// 'bru lnga bsgoms te sku rdzogs nas// dkyil 'khor sbrul phyir 'byin pa'i gnas// 'bru gsum rdo rje

pad+mar bskyed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM// yum gyi bde chen thugs dkyil du// byin brlabs thabs sogs yi ge las// sa bon mtshan ma'i sku rdzogs nas// sum cu rtsa brgyad ming gis dbyung// rang gi cha lugs yongs rdzogs pa// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// sna tshogs 'od kye phreng bas 'khrigs// kun tu khyab cing lhun gyis grub// ma rig sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i phyir// skal ngan gyi yang gzugs bstan pa// bcu gnyis mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// 'gro ba so so'i phyogs 'dul ba// rgyan ldan rdzogs par gsal bar ldan// thugs kyi sa bon 'od phreng las// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// rang gi mdun du mngon par bsam// e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad du byung// de nyid kyi ni mnyam bzhugs pa'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ badzra sa ma ya hUM// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rang shar dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa rab rdzogs dam tshig mchog/ ye shes dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bya// sgyu ma lta bu'i kun la brdal// mchod phyir dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing// de yi phyag rgya chen por bsgom// bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi// mchod pa'i tshogs bsdus thugs kar thim// gsang bar phyung ste mkha' dbyings nas// 'od las mchod pa'i lha mo 'phros// de yi bde gshegs dkyil 'khor la// dgyes pa'i glu dbyangs snyan pas bstod// rgyal bas gzhan don rdzogs mdzad de// slar bsdus thugs kar gsang bar bsgom// bde chen stangs dpyal gsum mam lnga// dgyes ldan rab zhugs yid 'dod mnyam// cho ga lnga rdzogs yo byad lnga// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs shing// ma nyams 'jug par rab brtson na// zla gsum drug gam bcu gnyis kyis// dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// dus grangs mtshan ma ma thob bar// rab tu bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// zhing dag longs spyod rdzogs pa yi// 'bras bu mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal to// rtsa ba las yang dag par bskyed pa'i sbyor ba'o//// de nas las kyi snying po nye bar byed pa rnams bka' stsal to// oM hUM trAM hrIHha/ oM AHhUM/ b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shung+ng+he hUM/ gzhi bzung ba'o// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM// gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn bir+ya rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ oM bi dza ya ma hA kro ng+ha ha na ha na hUM/ oM nI la daN+Da ma hA kro d+ta da ha da ha hUM/ oM ya mAn+ta ka ma hA kro d+ha pa tsa pa tsa hUM/ oM Ar+ya a tsa la ma hA kro ng+ha

ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM pad+man+ta kr-ita ma hA kro d+ha hu lu hu lu hUM/ oM ma hA krod+ha Tak+ki rA dzA tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM a mr-i ta ma hA kro ng+ha ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM/ oM big+ha nAn ta kr-ita ma hA kro ng+ha b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM/ oM ma hA kro d+ha hUM ka ra gardza gardza hUM/ oM ma hA kro ng+ha ma hA ba la s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM/ bsrung ba'i sngags so// oM dz+nyA na dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra badzra hUM phaT/ dbab pa'i sngags so// oM dz+nya na tsakra dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM/ brdeg pa'i sngags so// oM badzra mud ga ra hUM A ko Ta A ko Ta ya hUM/ brdung ba'i sngags so// oM badzra kI li kI li ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ brdab pa'i sngags so// oM badzra tik+Sh+Na shak+ti ha la ha la hUM phaT/ gcad pa'i sngags so// oM badzra raM pa raM dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ bsreg pa'i sngags so// oM ma hA shUn+ya ta dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma hA kA ru Na hUM// oM ma hA su kha hUM/ rim pa'i sngags so// oM bo ng+hi tsit+ta s+pha ra Na hUM phaT/ oM bo ng+hi tsit+ta saM ha ra Na hUM/ spro bsdu'i sngags so// e A ka sha maN+Da la/ yaM karma rak+Sha haM/ baM ma ma k+sha ni ri maN+Da la/ suM truM me hUM/ laM ti sha maN+Da la/ raM dz+nyA na dz+wa la maN+Da la// b+h+rUM rat+na tre lo kya bi shung+ng+he hUM/ bskyed pa'i sngags so// saM haM maM khaM gaM/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la/ a tsaN+Da maN+Da la/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ raM rat+na maN+Da la hUM/ gding ba'i sngags so// oM badzra tsit+ta A be sha a a/ a nud paM sata ta/ na mo ha ra ti/ badzra ti tsit+ta pra brta s+pha ra Na hUM phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ bzhag pa'i sngags so// oM muM ng+hA twI shwa ri/ dzi na dzika pad+ma maN+Da la e/ tiSh+Tha badzra hUM/ tsit+ta sing+ng+hi s+pha ra Na phaT/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rwa go\u0f85haM/ rwa ga ya mi// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ tsi tr-i e pra maN+Da la hUM s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ dbab pa'i sngags so// oM laM/ hUM mUM/ swa mAM/ AM/ pAM/ hA/ tAM/ k+ShiM/ hUM/ traM traM/ hri hrIM/ dziM aM/ mai dzaH th+l+hiM hUM/ hUM baM/ mu+uM hoH hUM a/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ kriM truM sruM k+ShaM braM ye/ ming gi snying po dang bcas te dbyung ba'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta shAn+tiM ma hA kA ru Ni ka e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn e a sa mo dri sh+ya ho// bod pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra pad+ma sa ma pra be sha ya A be sha ya/ sa ma ya s+t+waM// dbab pa'i sngags so// oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te b+h+yo badzra swa ra pra marda ni/ ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bung+ng+he b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzre badzre ma hA badzra ma hA te dza badzre/ ma hA bid+yA badzre/ ma hA bo ng+hi tsit+ta badzre/ ma hA bo d+hi man+d+ro pa saM kra ma Na badzre/ oM badzra sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho ng+ha na badzre swA hA/ mchod pa'i sngags so// oM AHbadzra sur+ya to bi bi sha ma hA rat+na ga Na tsakra pU dza me g+ha pra tI ts+tsha ba len+t+ra/ ma hA maN+Da la su kha ho// pU dza kha kha khA hi khA hi/ bstab pa'i sngags so/ las sna tshogs pa'i rig pa'i sngags so// rab tu snang ba dbyung ba'i khyad par ro//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po la gsung gi sgra mnyes pa'i brjod pa rnam pa lnga spro bar mdzad de/

chos nyid kyi snying po rang gis rtogs pa'i don las sgra brnyan lta bur grags pa ni/ e ma/ ma skyes dbyings las skye ba'i cho 'phrul ni// dug lnga rnam dag sku lnga rigs lngar gsal// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// chos sku khyad par ye shes lnga yi ngang// rnam par snang mdzad mdog dkar 'khor lo bskor// mi bskyod mthing ga rdo rje sa gnon mdzad// rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rin chen dbyig/ snang ba mtha' yas mdog dmar ting 'dzin mnyam// don yod grub pa ljang gu rgya gram 'bar// go 'byed kun tu bzang mo dril bu bsnams// brtan mdzad sangs rgyas spyan ma thor tshugs bsnams// bsreg mdzad gos dkar ma ni rin chen 'bar// sbyong byed mA ma kI ni pad+ma bsnams// bskyed mdzad dam tshig sgrol ma rgya gram bsnams// so so'i rigs mchog yab kyi tshul 'dzin ma// thabs kyi sku las shes rab bskyed pa'i yum/ gsang mchog mkha' dbyings rnam dag bde 'byung gnas// bde gshegs sras tshogs ma lus yum gyur ma// 'gro don mdzad phyir thugs rje'i sku sprul ma// rigs lnga yab yum tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi sras// sa lam yon tan ma lus rab rdzogs shing// 'gro kun bla med gnas su bgrod mdzad phyir// sa bcu'i rgyal tshab gnas bzhugs sems dpa'i gtso// sa snying dkar po rin chen myu gu bsnams// nam mkha'i snying po mdog ser ral gri bsnams// spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar po pad+ma bsnams// phyag na rdo rje ljang gu dril bu bsnams/ kun bzang mdog dkar rin chen snye ma bsnams// byams pa dmar ser klu shing gun+d+he bsnams// sgrib pa rnams sel sngon po po ti bsnams// 'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar ser ut+pal bsnams// tshogs brgyad dag pa rnam thar brgyad rdzogs dang// sems dpa' brgyad kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// 'dod yon tshogs kyis ma lus thugs dam skong// nyon mongs spangs pas ye shes rab rgyas shing// sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs rgyud bskul mdzad pa'i// lA s+ye dkar mo me long rgya gram bsnams// mA le ser mo rin chen phreng ba bsnams// gir ti dmar mo pi wang rgyud mang bsnams// nirti ljang gu gar gyi phyag rgya bsgyur// ng+hU pe dkar mo spos kyi sprin 'phro ma// puSh+pe ser mo me tog pad+ma 'thor// gsal ba'i mdangs ldan dmar mo mar me bsnams// gan+d+he ljang gu byug pas mnyes mdzad ma// yul brgyad rnam dag sa brgyad rab rdzogs pa'i// sems ma brgyad kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs drug 'jig rten khams kyi don mdzad phyir// mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pa rab tu ston// bcu

gnyis mdzad pa'i tshul gyis gdul bya sbyong// mngon shes byin rlabs cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston// lha yi thub pa mdog dkar pi wang 'dren/ lha min thub pa sngon po go cha bsnams// mi yi thub pa ser po gseg shang 'dzin// byol song thub pa mthing ga po ti bsnams// yi dwags thub pa dmar po sgrom bu bsnams// dmyal ba'i thub pa nag po me chu bsnams// thugs rje chen pos 'gro drug so sor 'dren// bcom ldan thub drug sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i sku// dus bzhi rnam dag phrin las yai shes bzhi// rab tu rdzogs mdzad drag shul khro bo'i sku// gtso chen las mdzad thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul// rnam par rgyal ba dkar po be con bsnams// ro langs ma ni mdog dkar lcags kyu bsnams// gshin rje gshed po mthing nag thod dbyug bsnams// mi pham ma ni mdog sngon zhags pa bsnams// rta mgrin dmar po thod sbrul pad+ma bsnams// ral gcig ma ni mdog dmar lcags sgrog bsnams// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang gu rgya gram bsnams/ khro gnyer ma ni mdog ljang dril bu bsnams/ khro tshul spyan gsum zhabs gnyis dor thabs bgrad/ khro rgyal yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbyings kun rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'dul byed skur bstan pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// thabs dang shes rab sbyor la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces phyogs bcu thams cad du chos nyid kyi sgras khyab par mdzad de/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i gzugs kyis thams cad la snang bar gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i sgo nas bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// sku lnga lhun rdzogs ye shes kyi// thig le snang ba'i rim pa ni// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa'i zhing// bsam yas rnam dag gzhal yas khang// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// ma lus mthong thos nyai bsnyen dang// rgya cher gsungs pa'i don 'byung ba// ye shes mthun par snang ba'o// gcig dang du+u mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs te// rab byung ye shes snang med snang// log par rtog pa'i rgyud dag cing// ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan pa'i// thugs rje chen pos mi gtong ba'i// 'gro drug so so'i lus su snang// de ltar rang lus dpal ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bsgrub par bya// lus dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni lus kyis bsgom// lus kyi dkyil 'khor las byung

ba// sems dang lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le lus kyi dbyings// 'byung ba'i shes rab rigs kyi yum// thabs chen gsang rigs de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// yul snang kun bzang dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid lhag pa'i yig 'bru las// thugs rje ye shes sgyu mar snang// snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dbyings la mchod pa 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le de nyid dbyings// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bzhi dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag gi zhal mthong ba'i// dbang bsgyur mchog ni 'di yin no// 'byung ba phung po sangs rgyas lnga// rnam shes brgyad dang de yi yul// sems dpa' sems ma brgyad yin no// 'byung ba bzhi ni sgo ma bzhi// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs thub pa drug/ lus las byung ba'i 'khor lo nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// ma lus mnyam sbyor
