dbang bskur// las kyi khyad par bstan nas kyang// so so'i gnas su brtan par bsgom// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// bzhugs dang rten dang mi g.yo bas// dam tshig zil gnon phyag bya dang// mchod dang bstod dang bza' ba dag/ tshul bzhin goms pa'i blau dag gi/ ci rigs su ni spyad par bya// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dang// skul tshig dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes// 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs nas ni// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad// zhag grangs dus ni brtags pa'am// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba na// bsgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya byin gyis rlobs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi// byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ji snyed pa thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i skur byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ rnam par grol ba mtshon pa'i phyir// badzra he ru ka dpal gyi// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar ro// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// rdo rje kha T+wA~M rnge'u chung g.yas// dril bu rgyu zhags khyung khra/ dril bu dung dmar rgyu zhags g.yon/ g.yon// he ru ka yi ye shes rgya// shes rab dbyings ma'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas pa thabs kyi yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// kro d+hI shwa rI dbyings kyi rgya// bud+d+ha he ru'i phyag rgya ni/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// smug nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal// ti ra/ 'khor lo ti ra khyung chen g.yas/ rdo rje khyung chen g.yas// b+han dmar rgyu zhags ba su g.yon// bud+d+ha kro d+hI yum dang sbyor// rat+na he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ ser nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal/ rin chen byis dbyug dgra s+t+wa g.yas/ b+han dmar ri rab rgyu zhags g.yon/ rat+na kro d+hI yum dang sbyor// pad+ma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dmar nag mthing dang dkar ba'i zhal/ pad+ma be con dgra s+t+wa g.yas// b+han dmar thang gshol ri rab g.yon// pad+ma kro d+hI yum dang sbyor// karma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// rgya gram ral gri dgra s+t+wa

g.yas// thod khrag ri rab thang gshol phur pa g.yon gang/ g.yon// karma kro d+hI yum dang sbyor// yum chen rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis 'khyud// so so'i gtso bo'i sku mdog la/ g.yas pa kha T+wAM yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kun// nyi zla pad+ma rU tra gnon// khro bo'i gar nyams dgu ldan zhing/ dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// ko'u ri b+han dmar byis dbyug sngo// tso'u ri mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// be ta byi za rdo 'phyar nag/ puk+ka dmar ser byis rgyu 'dren// g+hasma dung dmar khrag 'thung ljang// sma sha mthing nag byis snying za// tsan d+ha ser skya mchog lus 'bral// phra men rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// seng ha ser mo zhing za ser// byA g+h+ra dmar mo lag bsnol stag/ sri la nag mo byis ldag wa// shwa na mthing ga sha 'drad spyang// gr-i D+ha dmar mo dung gri rgod// kang ka dmar smug zhing khur dur// kA ka bya rog b+han gri gnag/ u lU mthing nag lcags kyu 'ug/ lha mo dang ni phra men rnams// khro mo'i lus la cung zad zhi// khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// hUM ka ra ni sku mdog sngo// phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog dkar// g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon tri shUl// dbyug pa sngon po sku mdog sngo// me dpal g.yas la dbyug to g.yon// gshin rje gshed po sngo skya'i mdog/ g.yas pa thod dbyug g.yon dgra s+t+wa// mi g.yo ba ni mdog ljang sngon// ral gri g.yas la zhags pa g.yon// rta mgrin can ni sku mdog dmar// spu gri g.yas la lcags sgrogs g.yon// 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar skya'i mdog/ b+han+d+ha g.yas la rnga yab g.yon// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag ste// g.yas pas rgya gram g.yon dril bu// khams gsum rnam rgyal sku mdog mthing// rdo rje g.yas la sbrul zhags g.yon// stobs po che ni dud kha'i mdog/ tho ba g.yas la zhags pa g.yon// khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang// dpal gyi chas kyis rab brgyan pa'o// rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren// phag gdong sngon mo mche zhags bsdam/ spre'u gdong dmar mo lcags sgrog 'chings/ spyang gdong ljang gu dril 'khrol brdeg/ khro mo'i chas kyis cung zad brgyan// kun kyang gtso la 'dud cing blta// de nyid rigs kyi dbu brgyan cing// rang gi sems dpa' snying la gnas/ gzugs su brtags pa'i dngos po kun// nga yi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des// dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad gsung gi rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par 'byung ba 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jigs pa'i sgra chen pos g.yo bar mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha/ he he he he/ he he he he/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rtsa ba'i snying po'o// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// A+oM badzra shrI he ru ka hUM/ A+oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM/ A+oM rat+na shrI he ru ka hUM/ A+oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM/ A+oM karma shrI he ru ka hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI shwa ri s+t+wAM/ bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa ri s+t+waM/ rat+na kro d+hI shwa ri s+t+waM/ pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ti s+t+waM/ oM karma kro d+hI shwa ri s+t+waM/ badzra ko'u rI ha/ badzra tso'u rI ha/ badzra pra mo he ha/ badzra be tA lI ha/ badzra puk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+hasma rI ha/ badzra sma sha nI ha/ badzra tsan+da lI ha/ badzra sid+ha mu kha he/ badzra byA g+h+ri mu kha he/ badzra shri ga la mu kha he/ badzra shwa na mu kha he/ badzra gr-i D+ha mu kha he/ badzra kang ka mu kha he/ badzra kA ka mu kha he/ badzra u lU mu kha he/ badzra hUM ka ra hUM/ badzra bi dza ya hUM/ badzra nI la daN+Da hUM/ badzra ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ badzra Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ badzra ha ya grI ba hUM/ badzra a pa ra dzi ta badzra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ badzra trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ badzra ma hA ba la hUM/ badzra Ar+Ya te dza tang dza/ badzra a mu khe hUM/ badzra lo ka baM/ badzra b+hasmi ba la ya ba tu ho/ rab tu bskyed pa'i snying po'o// A+oM badzra shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa ri s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rA go\u0f85 haM/ rA ga yA mi/ badzra sarba ta thA ga ta A nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ nges par 'byung ba'i snying po'o// A+oM sarba ta tA ga ta tsakra kA ya a d+hiSh+Tha na A+oM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra pad+ma wAka a d+hiSh+Tha na AH/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra tsit+ta a d+hiSh+Tha na hUM/ byin gyis rlabs pa'i snying po'o// A+oM ma hA shU n+ya ta a d+ha ri sha sa ma tA pra t+ya be k+Sha Na kr-i t+yA nuSh+ThA na dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ dbang skur ba'i snying po'o// A+oM badzra shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa ri e tsakra maN+Da la A ra li hring hring dza dzaH/ bod pa'i snying po'o// A+oM badzra shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa ri e tsakra maN+Da la sa ma ya dzaH/ pra be sha tiSh+Tha a AH/ bzhugs pa'i snying po'o// A+oM badzra shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa ri ka ru Na ma hA mAM sa rak+ta a mr-i ta i daM gr-i h+Na ba liM ta pi pa ho// kha kha khA hi khA hi a la la ho// bstab cing bza' ba'i snying po'o// A+oM badzra shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shA ri ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+nyA na a ho su kha/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM hUM hriM hriM/ dngos grub bsdu ba'i snying po'o// thams cad nye ba ni 'dis bya'o// A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dag pa'i he ru ka nyid kyis// gnyis med don la rab brtson pas// dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug

rdzogs// sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra bsgrags pas// dkyil 'khor lha rnams gsal bar bskyed// 'brug ltar zab cing sgra bsgrags pas// gtum dang gdug pa lhan ner 'gyur// mkhur ba dbugs kyi rlung 'byin gyis/ khro bo khro mo'i sprul pa 'gyed// rdo rje srin po'i ngur skad kyis// gdug pa can rnams spa bkong 'dul/ 'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra 'byin pas// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams rdul du rlog/ tshangs pa dbyangs kyi 'dren tshul gyis// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// ces gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yi ge phreng ba'i don yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje de kho na nyid kyi snying po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par spro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi don dam pa lhun gyis grub pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por byin gyis brlabs nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// nga yi ngang las ma 'das kyang// nyon mongs las kyi 'khrul pa yis// brtags te nga la gzugs su mthong// sgra dang dri ro reg dang chos// thos shing tshor myong brtags shing spyad// skye bo de yis nga mi mthong// nga la gzugs med mthong ba med// sgra med thos pa'ang yod ma yin// ro dang reg med myong tshor med// yi chos rtog pa ga la yod/ brten pa'i gzhi ni gzhal med khang// 'byung ba lnga ni dag pa'i yum// phung po lnga ni grol ba'i yab/ dbang po dag pa phyag yin te// phyag mtshan drug ni yul drug 'dzin// khams chen bco brgyad dpa' bo yi// nyams dgu dang ni chas brgyad do// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs dbu gsum ste// khams bzhi zhabs su snang ba yin/ de nyid stong zhing shin tu stong// rab tu stong pa chen po'i ngang// grol zhing shes pas nga yi gzugs// dges shing chags pa'i thugs rje yis// snyoms mdzad ye shes gang yin pa// he ru ka ste nga yi sgra// dri ni dag pa'i phung po lnga/ ro ni sku drug ye shes drug/ stobs dang mi 'jigs reg pa yin// ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad de// sems can rnams kyi sems byung dang/ ye nas 'brel pa nga yi rgyud/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa las// cung zad 'khrul pa rgyud kyi gzhi// lam ni smin cing grol ba'o// rang gi de nyid legs mthong zhing/ sar gnas dbang thob 'bras bu ste/ bsags shing thob la rten gyur pas/ nga yi sku zhes brjod pa yin// yang dag mtha' dang ma lus pa// mi rtog pa yi rtogs pa ni// ye shes yin te nga

nyid mthong// kye tshogs kun brtson pas nga la nyon// nga la gnyis su ma blta zhig/ nga dang so sor ma 'dzin cig/ bshang gci khu ba khrag dang sha/ nga yi tshogs rnams mchod pas mnyes// dur khrod mi gtsang bam pa'i rdzas// ma byin blangs te yid bzhin spyad// ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// nus dang ldan la mi tshangs spyad// blo chung shes rab dman pa yis// skal med rnams la rdzun du smra// log pa'i lam zhugs stobs can ni// ka ngu Na tsha ga ru Da yis bsad cing bsgral// spar zhing mchod de sbyangs pa yis// nga yi ngang du gzhag par bya// e ma yul dang bsam pa'i dngos// skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro 'ong dang// yod med rtag chad bral ba ste// rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab bsnyad nas// nga dang gnyis su med pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ snying po de kho na nyid yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje dngos grub nye bar gyur pa'i snying po rab tu bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rig pa ma yin pa'i dngos po ma lus pa rnam par dag pa mchod pa'i rdzas su byin gyis brlabs te/ gtsang ba dang sme ba'i rtog pa ma lus par bzlog pa/ rdo rje dam tshig chen po rab tu blang ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan zhing// tshul rim goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du 'gro ba'i las spyad de// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen yang// 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog/ dngos grub sbyin pa'i gzugs brnyan yang// re dang chags dang dogs pa yis// ngan pa'i don gyi sems mi dbyung// byin gyis brlabs pas ma lus byang// nga dang lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i// ji ltar bshad pa'i pho brang du// rigs chen rigs lnga b+han+d+ha lnga// rnam par dag pa'i bcud kyi dngos// phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig ste// sdong po lo ma me tog dang// 'bras bu gar+b+ha shun pags dang// rtsa ba dang ni skogs ma'o// don snying lnga dang b+he ra log/ lam gnyis brgyad ni nang yin no// sems bcud dri ni gnyis dang ni// go ro tsa na mAM sa lnga// gsang ba yin te rtsa ba brgyad// mngon pa phyi dang sbas pa nang// rgyal blon skyobs dang bcas pa ni// lo thog shing thog me tog dang/ rtswi thog 'bru dang rdo shing bcud// sems can bcud dang rin po che// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// dug lnga sman du bsgrub pas na/ dgag bya gang yang yod ma yin// ro dang nus pa kha dog rnams// rnam

dag rtsa ba yan lag bcas// spang bya gang yang yod ma yin// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas su dgod// snang ba chen po shar ba dgram// sgrub pa po rnams rgyan rtags ldan// so so'i gral du 'khod nas ni// khrol bu btags btsags phye ma dang// gong bu skyo ma lde gu dang// ri lu byas pas so so yis// dus dang rtags kyi rim pa bzhin// lnga dang de nyid nyi shu yi// bar du sbyar bar bya ba ni// snga ma'i dkyil 'khor las la gzhug/ tshangs pa dang ni drang srong tshogs// spyan drang gzhug cing rtog pa bzlog/ mdzes dga' spro ba'i spyod pa brten// ngo bo rnam dag ngang du gsal// 'od zer 'phro 'du bya ba dang/ thams cad bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis sbyangs// de nas rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i sngags kyis sbyangs// ye shes lha rnams spros nas ni// dbang gi rgyal pos bsrung bar bya// rdo rje rigs kyi bsdus shing sbyangs// slar yang thabs dang shes rab kyis// mthun pa'i rdzas ldan btag cing btsag/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs// yi ge dgu yi sngags kyis sbyangs/ 'bras bu lnga sbyar bdud rtsir bcas// mu+u sa la yis sprad cing sbol// rgyas gdab mnga' gsol gdab par bya// gcig tu bya ba'i tshul dag kyang/ dkyil 'khor bdun dang sbyor ba brgyad// bzhu dang btul dang dbab dang bskyil// yi ge dgu yi 'phro 'du yis// mdzad pa'i tshul gyis 'gro don spyad// mchod bstod bskul dang bshags pa dang// bzlog cing bskul dang bcol sogs kyis// rtags dang ldan par mthar dbyung ste// rtsa bzhi'i rgyud ldan dgongs par bya// tshogs chen mchod pa rgyun mi gcod// gtsang sbra gsum la gnas par bya// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// rtag tu nyan thos brgyar bsags pas// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// mthar thug par ni de bshad bya// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// dngos grub chen po blang bar bya// mchod chen 'di ni yon tan mchog/ lha rnams nyer skong las rnams 'grub// rig 'dzin bzhi dang grub pa brgyad// thams cad nga yi gsungs bzhin du// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za// gal te bsod nams yon tan la// gzugs dang dngos po grub 'gyur na// 'jig rten srog chags ma lus kyis// brjod par nus pa 'gyur ma yin// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchod chen te// phyi nang gsang ba ldan pas bshad// mdor na de yi bsod nams kyis// bde bar gshegs pa kun mchod pas// 'di nyid bsgrub pa'i khyad par ni// lhag pa bas kyang ches lhag ste// 'di ma rtogs pa'i mchod pa'i stobs// phyogs gzhan kun na yod ma yin// de bas rtag tu 'bad par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mchod

pa chen po'i las yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khams gsum gyi dngos po myur du bde ba chen po'i sa la sgrol zhing 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa dang rigs thams cad rab tu bsgral ba'i zhing du byin gyis brlabs te// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos bdag gi ba dang pha rol tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yang dag par sgrib pa/ rdo rje dngos grub chen po'i las rab tu bsgrubs par bya ba'i phyir// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dngos grub myur du bsgrub 'dod na// rdzas mchog mtshan ldan brtag la btsal// rdzas bzhi gang la brtags te sbyar// rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze dang// rje rigs la sogs rigs btsun zhing// byad bzhin bzang la smin dkyus ring// skra ni bung ba ltar gnag la// so dam mchu ni bim pa 'dra// mtshan dang ldan pa bkra shis rdzas// lus bzang skad snyan tshig gsal zhing// skra kham shel mig so zur lhag/ skra mtshams nas ni sna rtse'i bar/ sme ba bdun ldan skye bdun par// mi lus skyes pa'i rtags mtshan te/ dag pa'i lha rdzas yin zhes bshad/ skyes pa gzhon nu 'bad rtsol can// glang po g.yul du zhugs pa de// bsgrub pa mchog gi rdzas yin no// bsgral zhing spyad pa'i bsgrub rdzas ni// mi rta glang chen mkha' lding khyi// shel nag smug dang tsa ra sogs// thugs dam bskang zhing tshangs par bya// sgrub pa po yis rol pa'i rdzas// ma traM bsgral ba'i zhing bcu de// dmigs kyis bsgral zhing mngon sum btsal// gzhan yang dbang phyug chen po yis// dur khrod rdzas mchog ma nyams pa// blangs te bsgrub pa bya ba yang// rgyud bzang rigs btsun mtshan dang ldan// bkra shis gtsang zhing yid tu 'ong// dus tshod rab 'bring tha ma la// dus la bab pas blangs pa'i dus// bdag nyid khrag 'thung yab yum gyi// rgyal thebs karma ging gsum la// dbang bskur bsrung ba byas nas ni// mtshon cha bskur te pho nyar btang// srid pa'i rgyu mchog bsgrub rdzas 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dngos grub rdzas// kha T+wAM mtshon cha thogs nas su// dpal chen khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// khams gsum zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// nyi zla'i spyan gyis gsang bar bya// rdo rje'i 'graus kyis rab tu btsal// gshin rje'i khang khyim gzhom pa'i phyir// kha T+wAM rdo rje sa la gdab// 'chi bdag bdud dang dpral ba'i phyir// gshin rje gshed kyi phur pas btab// dug lnga skye bzhi rtsad gcad phyir// rdo rje sder mos

blang bar bya// ro nyid gshed dang dbral ba'i phyir// seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad tshad// stobs po che yi skur byas la// drag sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// snga ma'i bdud dang phyi ma'i lcags// gzugs dang mtshan mar bcas pa ni// phur bus btab ste snga gos grib// khung bur mnan te de srod gzir// phrin las bzhi yi gzir gnan bya// nor bu yid bzhin gyur bsam ste// las kyi karmas khyer nas ni// rgyal thebs kyis ni byin gyis brlab// ging gis phra men 'jo tshul bya// dur khrod ma mo khro ba'i gnas// srin po stag dred 'thab pa dang// gcan gzan 'dab chags 'dus sar drangs// gnas der bsrung dang bskrad par bya// sgrom du stsal te rgya yis gdab// las dang ye shes pho nya yis// de yi rnam par shes pa dang// 'dod yon rdzas su bcas pa kun// snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// phung po rdos bcas bem po de// phyogs bzhir bro bzhis sbyang bar bya// ye shes lha dang mkha' 'gro ma// thugs dam bskang zhing bskul bar bya// khrus byas zla gam nub tu bzhag/ 'bru lnga bkod la lam lnga dgag/ de la lha rnams dgod pa ni// bdag nyid yab yum sa bon las// yan lag lnga la bsam pa ni// rigs lnga yab yum dgod par bya// mdun rgyab gnyis su dgod pa ni// A li kA li bsam par bya// rnam shes dbang po yul dus la// sems dpa' yab yum dgod par bya// spyi bo rgyab dang lce yi steng// rkang mthil yan chad thub pa drug/ mchan khung gnyis dang mkhal khung gnyis// sgo ba yab yum bsgom par bya// rnam smin zag bcas phung po la/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// 'od zer 'phro 'dus sbyangs byas te// don gnyis mthar phyin phyag rgya grol// cho ga lnga dang yan lag lngas// yang du yang du sbyang bar bya// byang shar mtshams su drangs byas la// de yi bsha' thabs rgyab nas bsha'// de nyid khrag 'thung lha tshogs rdzas// glo snying dpal chen yab yum gyi'o// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// rigs bzhi phrag 'thung yab yum rdzas// bum pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// dpung pa g.yas g.yon bzhag sha dang// rgyu mchin mgo sha gsang ba rnams// rtsa ba'i lha dgu'i rdzas su bzhag/ go ro tsa na rgyung ba dang// rkang dang tshil bu sha dang khrag/ srog rtsa mkhris pa brgyad rnams ni// mu kha phra men brgyad kyi rdzas// yan lag rnam thar bzhi rnams ni// ye shes sgo ma bzhi yi rdzas// sgal tshigs phrugs rer bsdeb pa ni// dbang mo nyi shu brgyad kyi'o// nying lag che phrar bsdeb pa ni// rang byung khro bo bcu yi rdzas// sha khrag rus pa rkang dang tshil// mkha' la 'gro ma kun gyi rdzas// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha ni// dpal chen

bzhugs pa'i rten yang yin// dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa'i snod// de yi nang du stsal ba'i rdzas// go ro tsa na dri chen dang// snying dang srog pa rtsa yi khrag/ mAM sa mkhris pa dri chu dang// de dag mnyam pa'i chang dang sbyar// tshil chen snying po lngar sbyar ba// brla rkang gnyis dang rje ngar rkang// dung chen 'bud pa'i sgra yi rdzas// dpung pa'i rkang 'go rnams gnyis ni// rak+ta sbreng ba'i gzar bu'o// ba su ta yi rgyu zhags ni// thig gdab maN+Dal bskor ba dang// bi nA ya ka bcing ba'i rdzas// shun chen zhing gi g.yang gzhi ni// bla rer bre dang dpa' bo'i chas// ya 'gal ma 'gal gnyis po de// kha tham bya ba'i rdzas kyang yin// de dang sogs pa'i ma mdo ni// ya ma dam sri mnan pa'i rdzas// shar sgor dngos grub gsol byang dang// rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang// bdud rtsi bum pa dngos grub rdzas// de dag kun tu bya ba ni// dngos grub rdzas dang ngo bo nyid// slob ma lha dang rU tra dang// bsgrub pa'i rdzas su blta ba rnams// gnas su dgod cing lha ru dmigs// sman du bkro dang rdzas su bsgrub// mchod par dbul dang rgyan du dgram// 'bar bar bsregs dang bgegs su mnan// nga yi spyod pa mthun par spyad// he ru ka dpal nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dngos grub chen po nye ba'i sgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des khams gsum pa thams cad rang gi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid du brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por phyi dang nang gi dngos po ma lus par snang bar byas nas/ chos kyi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar bya ba bla na med pa'i sa non par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams kyis bkur ba'i gnas su 'os pa// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin pa// gnod sbyin la sogs pa dregs shing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad 'dul zhing tshar gcod par nus pa// rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad he ru ka'i rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba'i don ma lus par byed pa'i thabs chen po 'di dag bka' stsal to// rdo rje rigs kyi gnas mchog ni// dur khrod dang ni lha rten gnas// ma mo'i khyim dang yid 'ong gnas// der ni sa yi cho ga byas// skyes bu rtogs pa'i blo gros can// dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis// srog lus man chad rdzas rnams kun// ser sna med pa'i sems kyis dbul// tshul dgu ldan pa'i bla ma yis// rtag par dbang bskur dam par bya// he ru ka nyid don

gnyer zhing// 'jig rten dregs pa'i phyir ma yin// brtul zhugs spyod pa mngon nus la// khur chen khur du khur nus pa'i// ye shes rdo rje 'thob byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang snying po dam pa 'dir// bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bya// rin chen me tog gang gtor ba// gang la bab pa de yi rigs// gtso bor bltas nas bsgrub na ni// dngos grub myur bar the tshom med// ye shes dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan ni// kun rdzob gzugs su bstan pa yin// 'di la dad pa rab tu bskyed// dngos grub ma lus mngon du 'gyur// dam tshig mchog ni 'di bzung bas// bla ma spun grogs lha dang 'khor// sngags dang phyag rgya gsang tshig rnams// bskur dang mi spang bsgrub pa dang// rgyun mi gcad cing ltang ma btang// 'di ni gzhi yi dam tshig yin// spang bar mi bya dang du blang// spyad par bya zhing shes par bya// bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnams// sems dang sems nyid 'dres pa na// ma bcings pa dang bsgrub pa dang// gcig pu dang ni lhun gyis grub// de las mi 'da' dam tshig yin// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na bsreg par bya// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis grub// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor du// slob ma rab zhugs dbang bskur te// bya bral rdzogs pa'i man ngag bstan// ting 'dzin brten pa'i dkyil 'khor du// slob ma 'bring gzhug dbang bskur te// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i man ngag bstan// gzugs brnyan bsnyen sgrub dkyil 'khor du// tha ma gzhug cing dbang bskur te// rim gyis blo sbyang man ngag bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po he ru ka chen po de la/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul snyed du phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po de dbang bskur ba yongs su rdzogs shing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su sprul nas bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po de/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la sogs pa he ru ka rigs lnga// byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs so// de'i tshe nam mkha'i khams kyi dbyings thams cad rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan

'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag por byin gyis brlabs so// dbang bskur ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de'i tshe na nam mkha'i khams kyi dbyings na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed du byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs shing/ dbang bskur ma thag tu thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur nas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang la ngo mthon du ngam zhing bstod do// yang de'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams kyi don gyi phyir na/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te// byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba dka' ba dpag tu med pas byang chub kyi snying por gnas pa ga na ba der gshegs te// thams cad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rab tu 'bar bar bstan nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la spro bar byed// 'di ni rnam par dag pa ma yin zhing mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan te// rang gi sems nyid 'od gsal zhing dri ma med pa la gnas par byos shig ces bka' stsal nas// thams cad kyi phyag gis spyi bo'i gtsug tu reg par mdzad pas// byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis bskul te dbang bskur bar rig nas/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes brjod de/ tshul de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje lho phyogs kyi shing sA la'i drung byang chub sems dpa'i yul stobs can dang lcang lo can gyi gnas su dbang bskur to// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus su// za hor me ri 'bar ba dang// gnam lcags me ri 'bar ba dang// ma la ya yi rtse mo dang// lang ka grub pa'i yul dag dang// chu bo gang gA'i 'gram dang ni// ang+ga ma ga d+hA yi yul// shrI na lan+dA'i yul du ni// byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// sngon tshe tshe rabs grangs med nas// dge ba'i las kyis bstan pa yi// lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin pa// da lta nyid du khyod la dbab// A+oM

dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i skur ni mdzad du gsol// A+oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na A+oM// AHchos kyi ngag lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rdo rje'i gsung du mdzad du gsol// a mi de ba hrIHA/ hUM dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rdo rje'i thugs su mdzad du gsol// hUM badzra satwa hUM// 'di ni sngon du 'gro ba ste// phyi nang gsang bar yongs su sbyor// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang// me tog phreng dang phyag rgya dang// b+han+d+ha rdo rje dril bu dang// 'dod yon lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// sha lnga dang ni rdzas brgyad dang// rgyal po'i bka' rtags rnam pa bdun// thun mong byin gyis rlabs pa'i rdzas// khyad par gsang bar gyur pa ni// yid 'ong bkra shis rigs kyi yum// zhi rtags rgyan gyis mdzes par bya// thabs ni g.yas kyi phyogs su ste// de bzhin shes rab g.yon du'o// thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas lnga ru// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i snying po la// rgyas gdab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// bde gshegs yab lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// de yi gzugs kyi phung po la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga// 'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa ni// rgyas gdab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// bde gshegs yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// spyi bo'i gtsug dang lce yi steng// nu ma'i bar dang lhe ba'i steng// gsang gnas yan lag dbang rnams ni// rigs lnga sems dang sgo ba bsam// zhi ba dang ni khro bo rnams// sbyang dang bstan pa'i tshul du bya// lha rnams brda' 'phrad 'od zer gyis// dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod bstod nas// dbab cing bstim pas yab yum gnyis// rgyal po rgyal mor byin gyis brlab// ye shes dam tshig chen po yis// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te// dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung ba ni// rang rig ye shes de la 'od// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal dag pa'i// dri med nyi ma'i 'od bas 'tsher// byang chub sems ni kun tu dag/ khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang// ma lus snying rjes khyab byas te// 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzud// rgyal po yab yum gnyis med sbyor// rang rig bde 'byung gsal ba'i rgyun// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i rin chen gyis// slob ma byin brlab dbang bskur bya// de ni phan pa'i byin rlabs so// nus par byed pa'i byin rlabs ni// nyan pa dang ni bsgrub pa dang// las byed pa dang 'chad pa dang// nus pa chen por bsgrub pa'o// de yi khyad par bsgrub pa ni// zla gam

gcig gam drug cu'i bar// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal thebs dang// sbyor sgrol ging dang las mkhan dang// bsgrub pa grogs mchog dbang rnams ni// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te// rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa 'dzin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi// chos la 'dod bzhin byin gyis brlab// blo bral 'di la gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang// bdag dang gzhan don mi 'byed pas// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol// rang gi mthu yi rig pa las// chos ni gzhan nas 'byung mi 'gyur// ci ste rnam pa yongs kyis med// rnal 'byor nam mkha'i lam la gnas// ma byung ma skyes snying po la// sgro btags chos kun ga la yod// dbang thob mdzes pa de dag gi// dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas ni// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// rdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang khyod kyis long// pha rol bud med spyad par bya// rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis// sems can thams cad bskul bar bya// dka' thub dag gis gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni sangs rgyas byed spyod yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis kyang ma 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyi khyod ma 'jigs// gzhan yang dag tshig la sdang zhing// skye bo gang dag bstan la gnod// brtul zhugs khyod kyis de drangs la// khrag chen po ni btung bar gyis// skal ngan 'jig rten nyan thos la// nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste// skal bzang he ru ka dpal gtso// khyod kyis rtag tu bsgrub par gyis// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ he ru ka byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rab tu gnas par byed pa'i he ru ka chen po des/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ba spu'i bu gar bsdus te/ sku'i dbyibs su brgyud cing rdo rje'i lam du phyung ste/ yum gyi mkha' la phab nas/ byang chub kyi sems hUM gi rang bzhin du byas nas/ dpal he ru ka 'jigs byed chen po'i sku la/ dur khrod chen po'i chas kyis brgyan pa/ phyag na gdug byed kyi mtshon cha thogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bor bzhengs te/ srid gsum gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// zhe sdang chen po'i skur bstan te// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid nas// khro mo dbang phyug mngon du phyung// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// chos kun gnyis med byin gyis brlabs/ dbang bskur thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// gnas mchog dam par byin gyis brlabs// rol pa chen po'i ting

'dzin gyis// sgrub pa'i bdag por byin gyis brlabs// shes rab snying rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// yum dang rgyu la byin gyis brlabs// tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sgrub pa'i rdzas mchog byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// slob ma gsar bu byin gyis brlabs// khams gsum yongs sgrol ting 'dzin gyis// ta na chen po'i byin gyis brlabs// srid gsum bde sbyor ting 'dzin gyis// ga Na mkha' 'gro'i byin gyis brlabs// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang chos kun byin gyis brlabs// kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin gyis// snying rje'i yul rnams byin gyis brlabs// rnam dag rgyu yi ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi sems nyid byin gyis brlabs// dbang chen mkha' dbyings ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang 'byung ba byin gyis brlabs// bsod nams gter 'byin ting 'dzin gyis// gzhal med khang pa byin gyis brlabs// yi ge 'phro 'du'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs// gnas gsum dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mchod pa'i rdzas kun byin gyis brlabs// shes rab rtsal gyi ting 'dzin gyis// lhag pa'i rgyan rtags byin gyis brlabs// dus bzhi mnyam sbyor ting 'dzin gyis// sbyor dang sgrol ba byin gyis brlabs// zhes gsungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid byams pa dang snying rje rab tu brtan pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi ngang las thugs chos nyid kyi zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang khro bo 'bar ba khrag 'thung chen po'i tshul du phyung ba ni// mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang// chos kyi sku las bzhengs nas kyang// sems can thams cad khro ba'i phyir// rdo rje yang ni khro bar bya// zhes gsungs nas// nyon mongs can gyi sems can ris so so'i gnas nas drangs pa dang// dngos grub kyi rnam par bsdu ba dang// gnas sbyang ba dang/ bsgral zhing slar gso ba dang// las rab tu grub par bya ba'i rim pa dag dang// gzhan yang dpal chen po'i ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa phyi dang nang gi rnal 'byor ma dang/ grub pa mo dbang phyug chen mo dang bcas pa dpang du gsol te/ gang zhig bstan pa la sdang ba thugs rje chen pos ma bsgral du zin na// rnal 'byor chen po'i sgo zhugs kyang tshul bzhin du ma gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ma bzung bar 'gyur bas// rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral bar bya ba ni// chos nyid kyi khyad par ro// thar pa chen po'i lam chen 'dir// brod pa can dag 'gro ba ltar// skal bar ldan pa'i nang na khyod// bde bar 'ongs so legs

par 'ongs// bde gshegs thugs rje sgrol la mkhas// blo ngan sems can snying ring can// gnyis su med par bsgral bar snang// khams gsum nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje'i sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gis gzugs la gzud// spro bsdu rdo rje thams cad kyi// sku dang ye shes mchog tu bsgral// las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus la bab pa'i sems can 'di// gnyis med phyag rgya chen po yi// dus la bab po sa ma ya// A+oM ka re ka ha tsa ro pa ho sa ma ya s+t+waM// mtha' med 'gog med mi 'dzin pa'i// rnal 'byor mnyam nyid thod rgal du// khro gtum rngam zhi la sogs pa// sna tshogs ston yang sems mi g.yo// a tsa la sa ma ya d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ khro bo'i mtshan med byams par gnas// gsod byed snying rje'i mtshan nyid de// bsgral nas bstab pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// A+oM ma hA ka ru Na ma hA mi tri swa b+hA wa at+ma ko\u0f85haM/ drod dbugs rlan las raM yaM khaM// bsreg cing rtog la bkru bar bya// chu shel dkyil 'khor skye med bsam// zhe sdang ser sna gti mug ni// dmyal ba byol song yi dwags lam// nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog ni// lha dang lha min mi yi lam// dge bcu bsam gtan snyoms 'jug ni// gong ma gsum du skye ba'i rgyu// de dag rang bzhin med shes shing// sems mi skye ba skye rgyun gcod// a nr-i su tri pre du dzaH/ rgyud drug 'khor ba rtsad bcad nas// rgyud lnga lam gyi sgo dgag phyir// A+oM AHhUM hrIHswA hA// so so'i skye gnas sgo bkag nas// mnyes pa lnga dang stong pa lnga// skong ba dang ni grub pa lnga// 'bras bu lnga yi 'di dag bstan// zhes gsungs so// zhes dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po sgrol ba bla na med pa'i phan yon yang dag par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka de/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rab tu bsdig pa'i phyir// nyid kyi sku las khro bo chen po nyon mongs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa zhal du rngub par byed pa'i khrag 'thung gi tshogs bye ba grangs med pa dang// khro mo dbang phyug gi gtso mo dang// ma mo dang phra men ma dang// mkha' 'gro ma dang/ ma mo dang/ srin mo dang/ lu gu rgyud dang/ pho nya mo dang/ sa'i bdag mo dang/ lang ka'i tshogs dang/ ging gi gtso bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang/ 'bar ma dang/ srin mo'i tshogs dang/ bar snang yangs pa la rgyu ba'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams mngon du phyung ste/ de dag kyang sha za khrag 'thung ba la dga' ba dang/ mche ba can dang/ gshog pa can dang/ nu ma can dang/ sder mo can gyi tshogs ji

snyed pa gang dag gi/ gang dag 'da' bar byed pa rnams tshar gcod par dbang bskur te/ bran gyi tshogs bzhin du mdzad nas/ dam tshig gi bya ra la bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig gdug pa can gyi tshogs// nga yi bstan pa'i tshul 'di nyid// ma 'ongs pa na snyigs ma'i dus// shin tu gdul bar dka' ba 'byung// byams dang snying rjes gzhi bzung ba'i// kun tu bzang po'i sa chen la// myur du 'bad pas bsgral bar bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag/ tshe lung rdo rje'i dngos grub gzhi// khyed kyis de la myur du gsol// nyon mongs las dang bag chags dang// rnam par smin pa snyoms par 'jug/ sprul pa dang ni chos kun gyis// nga yi sa la sgrib pa sbyangs// rtogs pa dang ni thugs rje yis// gzas pa po dang bdag nyid dang// thun mong phal pa bsgral zhing gso// rgyal po me dang chu dang dug/ sprul dang gcan gzan khro bo dang// mi rgod chom rkun gdon rnams kun// nga la gang ltos zhi bar gyis// tshe dbang dpal dang dbang phyug dang// grags pa dang ni langs spyod tshogs// gang 'dod de la rgyas pas gsol// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang// rgyal po rje dpon tshul dag ni// ma lus de yi dbang du bsdus// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs dang bdud// mi dang mi ma yin gyi tshogs// nga la mi mthun mngon du spyod// kye kye khyed rnams brtson pas nga la nyon// nga yi bstan pa 'di lta bu// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus rnams la// shin tu bkod zhing rnyed par dka'// de phyir nga yis khyed rnams la// gdams shing yongs su bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal chen po nyid las sprul pa'i khro bo dang khro mo'i tshogs dang// ma mo dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang// phra men ma dang// pho nya'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag gi mgrin gcig tu// 'di skad ces bstod do// bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing// byams dang snying rjes dgra zin mi mnga' zhing// gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jig byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa la sogs pas bstod de// phyag 'tshal zhing zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas// dpal chen po nyid kyi bstan pa'i gnyer gtad pa rnams bsrungs shing skyong bar khas blangs shing// dam bcas so// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang phrin las rnams la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par dga'o// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs ma lus pa de dag ni// dpal chen po nyid kyi sku la 'od zer gyi tshul du thim par gyur te/ dpal chen po he ru ka yab yum nyid kyang/ rol pa chen po'i ros tshims par

mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po'i ngang skye ba med pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid kyi klong du thim par gyur to// sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyang/ dpal chen po yab yum gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste// chos kyi mig rnam par dag nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la rab tu nye bar gnas par gyur to// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ byin gyis rlabs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsdus pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba dpal he ru ka'i gal po bsdus pa/ dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa na bdag gi bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya//// rgya gar skad du/ ya mAn+ta ka sa mu dA ya mU la tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje thams cad kyi gshed/ sku 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po chen po de/ 'og min gyi gnas ri rab chen po'i khang bzangs dam pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa na/ sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pas bzhugs pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'khor 'dus pa ni/ sku gsung thugs kyi sras dam pa'i mchog tu gyur pa gshin rje gshed kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ myos byed 'bar ba zhes bya ba dang/ 'phags pa dmar po zhes bya ba dang/ ral pa dgu pa zhes bya ba dang/ rigs kyi sras chen po de dag gi sku la dgyes par sbyor ba'i yum/ ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba dang/ gtum mo chen mo zhes bya ba dang/ 'od zer can ma zhes bya ba dang/ dpal chen mo zhes bya ba dang/ de dag gi phrin las rdzogs par byed pa/ sgrol ba'i yum nag mo chen mo zhes bya ba dang/ 'dod chags khrag gi bdag mo zhes bya ba dang/ gling bzhi rab tu 'byams ma zhes bya ba dang/ srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma zhes bya ba dang/ gzhan

yang gshin rje'i gtso bo chen po nag po'i tshogs 'joms zhes bya ba dang/ dbang phyug rdzogs pa zhes bya ba dang/ srid pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang/ dom gyi glang mgo can zhes bya ba dang/ ya ba ti zhes bya ba dang/ mig dmar zhes bya ba dang/ rab tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba dang// shin tu tel tsha rtil pa zhes bya ba dang/ bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang/ chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ 'bar ba dmar po zhes bya ba dang/ thod dbyug can zhes bya ba dang/ de dag gi sku la rab tu sbyor ba'i yum nag mo ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang/ shel gyi gdong dgu ma zhes bya ba dang// khro mo shel mig ma zhes bya ba dang/ dkar skya mche gtsigs ma zhes bya ba dang/ dred kyi ag sham can zhes bya ba dang/ khrag gi ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang/ klu mo bus 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang/ spyan gsum mche gtsigs ma zhes bya ba dang/ smug nag ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje'i ral pa can zhes bya ba dang/ dmar mo mgo dgu ma zhes bya ba dang// nag mo phag mgo can zhes bya ba dang/ gshin rje bya rgod kyi mgo can zhes bya ba dang/ stag gi mgo can zhes bya ba dang/ kang ka'i mgo can zhes bya ba dang/ spyang ki'i mgo can zhes bya ba dang/ gzhan yang gsod par byed pa'i pho nya bzhi dang/ gsod par byed pa'i bdud bzhi dang/ khram la 'debs pa'i rtsis pa bzhi dang// srog la dbang ba'i bshan pa bzhi dang// gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can pho dang mo'i rnam pa dang/ rje dang bran gyi rnam pa dang/ 'khor dang g.yog gi rnam pa dang/ bu dang bu mo'i rnam pa dang/ gzhan yang lha'i gzugs dang/ lha ma yin gyi gzugs dang/ nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang// klu'i gzugs dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs dang/ srul po'i gzugs dang/ lus srul po'i gzugs dang/ yi dwags kyi gzugs dang/ sha za'i gzugs dang/ grul bum gyi gzugs dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs dang/ dri za'i gzugs dang/ srin po'i gzugs dang/ dud 'gro'i gzugs dang/ byol song gi gzugs dang/ dmyal ba'i gzugs dang/ sku'i sprul pa dang/ gsung gi sprul pa dang/ thugs kyi sprul pa dang/ yon tan gyi sprul pa dang/ phrin las kyi sprul pa dang/ rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa dang/ de la sogs te thugs zhi ba chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis ngang las ma g.yos kyang/ sku dang gsung gi cha lugs dang/ nga ro'i sgra drag po dang/ gtum po dang/ 'jigs pa'i sgra dang/ gdug pa'i gzugs dang/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'chang ba dang/ ma rungs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa rnams dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don rjes su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phrin las kyi

rol pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ dpag tu med pa dang gzhal du med pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnas der rab tu 'dus par snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ zhe sdang de bzhin gshegs pa dang// nga rgyal de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ 'dod chags de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ phrag dog de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ ral gri de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ 'khor lo de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ dpal gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ grags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ brtson 'grus de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ bdud bcom pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul ba ni/ kye kye de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi sku ste sku yi mchog/ rnam par dag pa'i dbang phyug che// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// ma lus thob cing spangs pa'i bdag/ bsags dang sbyangs pa las byung ba// ji bzhin ma lus sna tshogs pa'i// mkhyen pa dang ni ye shes bdag/ rang dang gzhan dang phyi rol ba// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa la// che chung tshad ma'i skur ston pa// gang la dges pa der snang zhing// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas sbyin pa// yang dag pa dang nges pa dang// brang ba'i gnas dang lam tshol dang// ji bzhin ma yin dgongs pa dang// ldem po dang ni spyod pa dang// sar gnas pa dang rdzogs pa dang// rang byung ba dang rtsol ba dang// rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa dang// gzhi dang khams dang bsam pa dang// las dang rigs dang gnas la sogs// ma lus rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can// thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pa'i// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug po// mthu stobs 'chang ba'i dregs pa can// yi dwags gshin rje kun gyi gshed// 'jam pa'i dpal las byung ba yis// 'jigs byed chen po sku bzhengs la// khyod kyi zhing khams gzhal yas khang// bsgrub pa nye ba'i sgrub pa dang// mngag pa'i las dang yon tan rigs// rang ngo gtan tshigs bye brag dang// khyad par de yi dgos pa dang// gnas sbyor ba dang tshogs chen dang// 'gyur ba'i gnas dang rang gi mtha'// phrin las dang ni mthar thug pa// gsal bya rjes bzung longs spyod dang// dmigs pa'i ched du bya ba dag/ rang gi 'khor lo legs par ston// gdul

bya yongs su min mdzod cig/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngon gyi phrin las dam pa'o// zhes bskul te// skad cig de nyid la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par gyur to// gshin rje gshed 'dus rtsa ba'i rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gshin rje'i khro bo kun gyi gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa che// rab tu bstan nas 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor// nga ni thog ma med pa nas// ngang gis gnas te shin tu bgros// rang rig byang chub sems kyi gzhi// spros med brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// nyon mongs sems can las kyi mnar// skye 'chi 'khor ba'i gshin tshogs la// 'dul zhing sgrol ba'i gshed yin pas// de dag nyid kyang skyob pa'i rjes// rang bzhin dang ni bgrod pa dang// grub pa dag ni las rnams kyi// gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// gdul bya sna tshogs snang ba yis// las kyi sde dang zhi gnas dang// rang sangs rgyas dang 'gog pa dang// sbyang bgrod rab tu dka' spyad dang// 'gyur ba 'gog dang bzang ngan blta// dag pa'i cho ga gtsor spyod las// brtag shes mthong bas khyad par yin// blo dang dbang po bsam pa yis// myung 'gro rdzogs pa'i don du bstan// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gshin rje'i tshogs// gnas ngan len tshogs de yis sbyongs// thun mong ba dang khyad par gyis// phung po ma yin las las ldog/ 'byung ma phung po khams dang ni// skye mched rten cing 'brel la sogs// rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// rgyu stobs ldan par 'gyur byed do// gnas dag gcig gnyis gsum bzhi dang// lnga dang drug gi yon tan tshogs// ji snyed ji bzhin ma lus pa'i// shes bya dang ni sbyang bya dag/ thogs med mkhyen pa grub pa'i mtha'// mi 'dod pa dang dbang med dang// gnod pa zhi dang sbyor ba dang// rang dbang thob dang tshar gcod pa// de yi phrin las rdzogs pa yin// gsal bya rang bzhin rtags dang ni// thabs dang 'bras bu nges par bya// rang bzhin bde ba chen po yi// mtshan nyid bzhi dang mtshan nyid dngos// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// thams cad de nyid kho na'o// 'khor ba'i gnas lugs shi ba'i gshin// kun gzhi'i rnam shes de yi rje// de dag 'dul sbyong gshed du 'gyur// rtags ni ma lus gzugs kyi sku// rang gi gdul bya gnyen pos 'dul// sgrub byed rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// gnas gsum shes pa thabs yin no// mi gnas grol ba'i sku gsum gyis// dag pa gsum gyi bdag nyid ldan// gzhi dang lam gyi rtog pa 'joms// khams gsum 'gro ba rigs drug dang// khyad par gdug pa can gyi rigs// gnas ngan

len pa che la sogs// thams cad ma lus gzung bya'o// gnas srid sprul pas yongs su gcod// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku yi bsgrub pa dmigs pa'i ched// 'di dag rigs kyi bdag po'o// de yi gsung du snang ba yang// a zhes bya ba chos kyi sgo// ma skyes thabs kyis rdzogs pa'o// kro zhes bya ba de nyid las// ma 'gags snang ba'i bdag nyid yin// te ni gnyis med rang byung ste// zung 'jug mthun par ston pa'o// ka ni sku ste sna tshogs snang// rang gi gdul bya rtogs pa'o// ya ni gsung ste stong nyid sgra// grag pa med par brjod pa'o// mAn ni thugs kyi ngo bo ste// ma lus 'dul ba'i bdag nyid can// ta ni yon tan rdzogs pa te// srid zhi mthar thug rtogs pa'o// ka ni thugs rje shugs kyi rtsal// 'jig rten chos la snang ba'o// ha ni phrin las grub pa ste// rang gi dmigs pa ched du byed// na ni ming gi sgro 'dogs te// sna tshogs btags pa ma 'gags chos// ma ni yi kyi rnam rtog la// ma lus skyob byed rab tu brtags// tha ni 'gro ba'i ded dpon rje// gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ b+han ni 'ching byed rgya las grol// 'khor ba'i 'brel thag bcad pa'o// dzaHni bdud las rgyal ba ste// byang chub sems kyi khyad par ro// A+oM ni rigs kyi gtso bo ste// hUM gis rab tu brtags pas sdud// phaT kyis las kyi phung po gtor// gsung gi dbang phyug smra ba che// ma 'gags rtsal gyis longs spyod byed// thugs ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid// rab tu spros pa ma g.yos chos// gnas pa'i 'khor lo g.yo ba med// srid pa'i 'khor lo longs spyod che// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'gro don rdzogs// spyod pa'i 'khor lo drag shul spyod// 'di ni rigs kyi 'khor du shes// zhes bka' stsal to// gshin rje gshed 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo bzhi// lta ba dang ni longs spyod dang// cho 'phrul phrin las ston mdzad phyir// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen la// dgyes pa'i mdangs kyis bka' stsal pa// e ma nga ni yon tan tshogs// ma lus kun gyi ngo bor snang// yid bzhin nor bu ji lta bar// yang dag thugs kyi ye shes de// rab tu mchod cing bstod par bya// shes bya'i yul dang shes byed gzhi// sna tshogs nga yi thugs la gnas// bsam zhing 'dod pa 'di las byung// rang gi byang chub sems nyid 'di// thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid de// sku gsum rdzogs par rang la gnas// rig pa'i rgyal pos dbang bsgyur dus// phyi dang nang dang bar ma dang// snang dang srid dang rtog pa dang// bsdus pa dang spros dang 'tsham pa

dang// thams cad rang rig sems las byung// de nyid gnas su gyur pa yis// gzhi dang ngo bo rang bzhin dag/ ma bcos ma byas grub pa ni// spros bral chos kyi sku yi gnas// de nyid gzugs su bstan pa ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan ma bkag chos// ji ltar 'dod pa ngang gis rdzogs// longs spyod mi zad 'khor lo las// bya dang byed pa snang ba'i dus// gnas 'gyur rung ba spyod dus na// thogs med 'dod pa yid las skyes// don rigs snang ba sprul sku'i gnas// ye shes thugs ni nam mkha' bzhin// stong zhing snang ba'i mtshan nyid can// 'ba' zhig snang ba skye med pa// chos dbyings ye shes gnas pa'o// spro dang bsdu ba phyag rgya'i las// 'dod pa'i dngos po ma lus pa'i// me long chu zla la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan snang ba dang 'dra zhing// shes dang shes bya ma lus gsal// sna tshogs snang ba dngos po de// ma grub rang gi ngang du gsal// gsal ba'i ye shes gnas pa'o// rang rig thugs la bkod pa yi// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po lnga dang rnam par shes// yul lnga kha dog byed pa lnga// yab yum rigs dang phrin las lnga// ma lus rnam dag ye nas gnas// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnas// de dag kun gyi gzhi dang yul// khams kyis bsdus pa'i sna tshogs lus// ma lus dbyings su rim gyis mnyam// mnyam nyid ye shes rang rig gnas// kun gyi rang rig byang chub sems// de las byung ba'i phrin las ni// nan tan spyod pas kun la khyab// ye shes bzhin du gnas pa'o// sems nyid me long brtags pas ni// sngar byas byang chub de nyid do// 'jig rten gsum yang rang gi dngos// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yang// sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med// de nyid 'khor ba las kyi sa// mya ngan 'das pa ltar snang zhes// rang gi thugs la de nyid gnas// don dam snying po byang chub sems// thams cad bden pa'i chos nyid do// brtags shing dpyad pas shes min te// nam mkha' lta bur spros dang bral// kun rdzob snang dang srid pas bsdus// log pa dang ni yang dag ste// rtog pa phyir 'gyur med bzhin snang// ma 'bres brtags bzod gnyis su gnas// don gyi gnas lugs blta ba ni// mig gi dbang po ji bzhin du// mthar thug rdzogs par mthong ba yis// spang blang skyon yon sbyang thob dang// shes bgrod yul dang gnyen po'i tshogs// ma lus rtog par nyams su myong// yan lag nying lag bya ba bzhin// 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug spyod lam gyis// gnas dus yul gyi bye brag la// byas shing spyod pa chud ma zos// rang gzhan gnas kyi don spyod cing// yid la 'dod rdzogs spong ba'i gnas// thun mong pa dang khyad par gyis// phyi nang rtsol ba ma

'gags pa// sna tshogs pa dang kho na yis// nges par spyod pa thabs kyi gnas// shes rab kyis ni blo phye nas// de bzhin nyid du yang dag mtha'// gnas nyid skyon med phyogs kun rtogs// mngon par byang chub shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi sems zhi nas// de nyid ngang la ma bcos gnas// stobs kyi ye shes lhag par mthong// phyin ci ma log spyod pa'i gnas// rlabs chen rnam par dag par sbyang// sems las rung ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dri ma med pa'i shes rab kyis// sku gsum mngon du gsal bar rdzogs// yang dag ye shes thugs kyi dngos// nges pa yis ni bkag pa dang// bsgrub pa med pa'i chos thams cad// 'khrul gzhi 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'o// las kyis ma lus gcod pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag/ ye shes rig pa'i mtshon cha yis// mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang du gcod// 'khor ba'i bag chags gnas ngan len// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// rab tu 'brel ba'i ye shes kyis// nyon mongs bag nyal len cing bsreg/ brtse ba gsum dang snying rje las// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med pa'i// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// cho 'phrul sna tshogs snang ba yis// 'khor ba'i mun khang thib po 'joms// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// don dam ma bcos rang byung me// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs sbur ma dang// mi gtsang ljan ljin ma lus skem// gnyis med thugs kyi 'khor lo dag/ phrin las thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis// rab bskor srid pa'i gsum gyi dngos// mi shes rmongs pa rab tu gcod// rtogs pa dang ni thugs rje yis// bdag dang gzhan du snang ba las// srid pa sgo nga mngal dang drod// de ma thag tu brdzus te skye// gnas gzhi rtsa ba yongs gcod cing// bsreg 'joms gcod dang skem pa yin// thugs las byung ba'i nyi ma bzhis// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// dgongs pa dang ni ye shes tshogs// khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyi// las dang sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras dag/ gsal bar smin rgyu gzhan dag las// ma ltos pa dang rang la rdzogs// thugs kyi nyi ma bzhi yin te// gnas pa lte ba'i 'khor lo ste// ma lus yongs su rdzogs pa'o// srid pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba// kun gyi lto phal gnas pa ste// gnas ni 'jig pa'i mkhar lta bu// dbang gal gnad bcud rdzogs pa ste// de bzhin 'jam dpal mkha' las byung// gshin rje kun gyi gshed gyur pa// gnyis med thugs kyi ye shes 'chang// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams// lha klu mi yi srid pa dang// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// dbang po lus ngag yid gsum dang// thig le gnas dang longs spyod

gsum// rtag chad dbu ma mtha' dang bcas// skye 'jig gnas pa rang gi gzhi// ma lus sku gsum 'du zhing rdzogs// rang gis dbang bsgyur spyod pas na// gsang gal dbang rdzogs pa'i spyod pa'o// mngal skyes srid pa dang po yi// lte ba'i gnas na brtsam pa ste// btsan khang khri mon bcug pa yis// steng 'og bar gsum zo khyu'i khyud// las kyi shugs kyis 'khor zhing chags// stobs gzhan gyis ni bskyod mi nus// 'jigs byed chen po bdag nyid kyis// las kyi gshin rje gzir ba yis// lto na srid pa gsum gnas shing// 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kyi// rnam par shes pa'i rten 'phos tshe// de nyid las kyi rgyal po yis// phyag gi 'du byed byas pa yis// las kyi 'phen pa gnas mthud cing// nying mtshams phung po nyer len pas// srid pa'i 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// kun gyi ma rig 'khrul pa las// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yis// chags dang zhen pa rab tu brtag/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// las kyi mnar med yan chad du// las kyi dbang gis 'khor bas na// 'khrul pa'i snang ngo zad mi shes// las kyi 'khrul 'khor de nyid las// rtsa ba yan lag sna tshogs kyi// nyon mongs phra rags ma lus pa// rang byung shugs kyi ye shes kyis// ma lus mthar thug gcod par byed// shes pa'i srid pa gnas ma yin// zhi la mi gnas snying rje dag/ tshogs gnyis lam gyi yon tan gyis// ma lus gcod pa'i 'khor lo'o// de las yon tan sprul pa yis// 'khor lo cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni// sems dpa' gnyis gyi zhabs 'og gnas// rmi lam sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin// ci dran cir snang cir spyod pa'i// las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ gshin rje rgyal po brjid pa'i zhabs// 'bar ba'i stobs kyis gnon pa ni// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs drug las byung// nyon mongs gzhi bcas 'gro ba drug/ snang ba yul gyi tshogs drug dang// sgo lnga lam gyi rgyud drug dang// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// nyan thos rang rgyal chos dang gsum// las dang nyon mongs sprul pa drug/ rang gnas las kyi 'khor lo drug/ 'gyur med rang gi sar gnon cing// thugs rje thabs kyi sprul pa drug/ rigs dang khams dang byed pa drug/ las dang dbang po bsam pa dag/ mthun 'jug blo yis don mdzad cing// tha dad snang ba sprul pa ste// so so'i las kyi rnam smin gyis// gcig nas gcig tu kha brgyud cing// 'khrul zhing 'khor bas 'khor lo ste// nyon mongs drug po gcod byed las// sna tshogs 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul te// don la ma nges snang ba'o// phrin las gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni// gdug byed mtshon cha rnon po bzhin// phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'i tshul gnas shing// gang la dmigs

pa thogs med gcod// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyi// phyag mtshan 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi// zhi bar bya dang rgyas par spel// dbang du bsdu dang tshar gcod pa'i// las kyi rnam bzhis dngos po gcod// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob// skyob pa'i bar gcod de yis gcod// rgyas pas 'byor pa drug ldan zhing// 'byor pa'i bar chod gcod cing sel// dbang gis mos pa rnam bzhi 'du// gang gis mi 'dul phyogs kun gcod// drag pos dgra bgegs tshar gcod cing// mi 'dul bar gcod 'khor los gcod// phrin las bzhi yis gang dmigs gcod// gcod pa'i 'khor lo phrin las mchog/ rtsol med rang byung shugs las 'byung// rab tu 'khor bas 'khor lor brjod// gnas pa gzhi yi 'khor lo ni// ma lus sems la 'dus pa las// bcos med snying po'i don dang ldan// chos kyi sku zhes bya bar mdzad// bsam byung srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// rten pa lus kyi ngo bo ste// snang ba rnam dag ting nge 'dzin// rdzogs par longs spyod sku yi mchog/ 'dul ngo sprul pa'i 'khor lo ni// brjid gnon zhabs kyi stobs byung ste yang bcu ste// rigs drug sar gnas chos kyi las// nges 'byung sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i sku// gcod pa'i 'khor lo tshogs kyi las// brgyad dang drug dang bzhi gnyis kyi// yan lag las kyi 'phro 'du byed/ sna tshogs mngon par byang chub sku// dang po don gyi 'khor lo ste// lhag ma gsum gyi rtags 'khor lo// lta ba phrin las gnyis su 'gyur// lta spyod so sor ma gyur na// don dang ldan zhing de min pas// gsang ba'i sngags dang spyod pa dang// lta ba tshig tu tsam brjod kyang// mtha' drug rdzogs par mi nus na// lta spyod ya bral gyur pa'o// cho 'phrul nges don ldan pa yang// phyi nang 'byung ba'i nus pa dang// yul sems 'phrad pa'i rtogs pa yis// snang ba stong pa tha mi dad// de nyid kyis ni rnam par 'phrul// phrin las gcod pa'i 'khor lo yang// 'byung ba 'dus pa'i dngos po yis// myur mgyogs rtsal gyi drag shul can// rdzas kyi nus pa shugs 'byin du// gang la phog par 'joms shing gcod// gcig gis las kun bsgrub par byed// ma grub srid du mngags pa yang// rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor shugs bzhin no// gcod byed 'dra ba'i 'khor lo ni// nyi ma bzhi yi so sor bskor// phyi nang gsang ba'i rnam grangs kyis// dgu dang drug dang gsum dag tu// chen po chung ngu bar ma yis// rnam grangs dgu dang 'od zer brgyad// pho mo sbyar ba bzlas lugs bcu// ru bzhi bsdom pa brgyad nyid dang// a lon don du bskor ba dang// gsal byed mtsho sdebs dmigs sel dang// 'byed par byed pa gang yin yang// che dang chung

bas gzhung bsrangs te// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las rnams kyi bsgrub par bya// rang nyid dmigs pa'i rtsa ba gsum// gsal byed mtsho sdebs dmigs phyed bzhi// rtsa ba de ni yan lag gi/ kha bskang ba dang bsdus pa dang// mthar thug gi ni gnad la dbab// gzhan yang lta ba spyod pa yis// don dang rtags kyi khyad par las// snying po rig pa'i byang chub sems// 'khrul 'khor 'khrul dmigs dmigs sel dang// gsal byed rnams su don gyis gnas// dam tshig bsrung ba'i srog 'khrul dang// dge sdig las kyi 'khrul pa las// srog dang srog gi snying po las// ngo bo rang bzhin yon tan no// dge sdig gis ni gsod pa dang// gso ba'i phrin las grub pa'o// mi sdug ltas dang drag po gnyis// yan lag zhi ba rgyas pa dang// zhi bar gnas dang rgyas par sgro// dbang du sdud dang bsad pa dang// dgug dang dbye ba bskrad pa dang// smyo 'bog lkugs dang gnan pa dag/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chos mthun zhing// gsal zhing bsil dang dngos po chu// the tshom med par 'grub pa'o// glang po chen po che ba'i tshul// ye shes byin rlabs 'jig rten pa// tha mal pa yi yon tan gyis// rgyas pa rab tu 'grub pa'o// dbang du bsdu ba b+ha ga ste// bsad pa gshin rje'i lto bar ro// seng ge'i snying la dgug par ro// dbye ba rta dang ma he'i bar// bskrad pa rnga mo'i gsang sgo ste// smyo 'bog ri dwags rgyab tu'o// lkugs pa lug gi khog pa ste// gnan pa ri rab rmang du bskor// rang gi yon tan chos mthun gyis// dbang du bsdu dang drag po 'grub// me chu dug dang mtshon dang ni// pha rol dmag dang mu ge dang// dgra dang dus min par 'chi ba'i// 'jigs pa rnams la zhi bas skyobs// tshe ring ba dang dbang ched dang// bkra shis pa dang gzi mdangs che// 'khor dang longs spyod rgyas pas spel// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang// rgyal po rje dpon tshul dag gi/ mos par bcas te dbang du bsdu// dgug dang bskrad dang dbye dang lkugs// myos dang gsad dang gnon pa yis// drag shul spyod pas phrin las 'joms// chags pa'i tshul gyis dbang sdud cing// drag shul khros pas sgrol ba dang// myur ba'i shugs kyis sdud cing dgug/ mi mthun phyogs kyi so sor 'byed// lkog gyur chags pa gzhan sgrod bskyod// gtsang sbra lus kyis myos pa dang// rmugs pa'i nus pas lkugs byed cing// ri rab brjid pa yis ni gnon// nyi ma bzhi yi go mtshams bzhi// phyi nang gsang ba so sor drug/ rus 'gro mi reg glang po 'gros// mtha' dang dbus med dbus nas mtha'// mtha' nas dbus su so sor bskor// tshogs bsag pa dang bsrung ba dang// bskyed dang spyan drang bzhugs

pa dang// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags// bstod dang bskul dang gsol ba dang// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub pa dang// bsgrub pa chen po'i phrin las kyis// nye dang brtan pa thob pa dang// myur mgyogs rdo rje'i las la sbyar// gdug pa can gyi mtha' bsdu zhing// phyi nang gsang dang rab tu gsang// mtshams sbyor ba dang bsdam pa dang// gzhug dang gdags dang dbyung ba dang// yon tan mthar thug bsam mi khyab// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa yis// shes bya don gyi gnas lugs te// nges pa don gyi lam mchog kyang// rten lus rtsa dang rlung dang dbugs// thig le byang chub sems kyi ngang// chos nyid byang chub rdzogs pa'i dngos// khyad par gzhi dang lam 'bras bu// snang ba gzhi dang gtso bo sems// sems las byung ba de yi 'khor// chos dang chos nyid 'dus ma byas// 'dus byas ston pas gzhi ru 'gyur// tshogs brgyad yul la kun nas ldang// theg pa dgu dang gnas pa gsum// sbyor ba bzhi la sogs rnams kyis// lam gyi rtogs pa sna tshogs skye// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo khyad kyis// gong nas gong du rab bgrod cing// 'jig rten 'jug dang rnal 'byor spyod// gong ma dag gis sun 'byin zhing// 'og tu gyur pa de yi rten// thams cad rdzogs pa'i rim pa las// nyams thos rang sangs rgyas pa dang// bla med sa la rgyu gsum gyis// 'bras bu gsum gyi ngo bor gnas// dag dang ma dag rnam par dag/ yul la nges pa rab tu ston// gshin rje gshed 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bzhi'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dir bshad 'khor lo 'grub byed pa'i// rtsa ba bsgrub pa sku gsung thugs// yongs su rdzogs pa bka' stsal pa// thog mar mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dag/ 'di nyid sku gsung thugs rdzogs shing// yon tan ldan pas phrin las tshogs// bsgrub 'dod bsgrub rung smin gyur pas// nga yi rigs dang tshul mthun zhing// mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'i gnas de ru// brten pa'i gzhi nyid rab brtags te// bslang dang bsrung bas bdag gir byas// bya chen sha za mang po'i 'khor// cho ga brtan pas rab sbyangs te// dur khrod rdzas dang bdud rtsi lngas// gnas la dmigs pa'i pho brang bzhengs// bzhi dang bcu gnyis pa dag gi/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i dbyibs su bya// rgyas dang bsdus pa'i khyad par gyis// rigs lnga rigs bzhi'i dbye ba dang// gsum dang gcig gi dbye ba yis// dkar ser dmar nag mthing ga'i mdog/ ji ltar rigs dang sngags pa yis// bshad pa'i rgyan rtags ma lus ldan// dmigs rten rdzas kyi mdzes par bya// yul

gsum gsal zhing brtan pa dag/ zhi gnas lhag mthong ting nge 'dzin// gzugs brnyan sa yi sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang chos rnams ni// dbang po gsum gyi yul du 'gyur// rin po che dang 'bru mchog dang// sa sna lnga yi yo byad ni// rab 'bring tha ma'i 'byor pa ste// gang gis brtsam par gyur pa des// phyi nang gsang ba'i yo byad kyis// phangs pa med pa'i 'bad pa dag/ mchod cing bstab pa'i longs spyod kyis// yongs rdzogs mnyes par bya phyir rtsol// de nas rab tu bsrung bya zhing// mngon du snang dang mi snang las// bka' bsgo dbang bsdu mtshams bcad de// sbyang dang bsreg dang gtor ba dang// bskrad dang bcing dang mnan pa yis// ma lus tshar gcad rdzogs par bya// de nas tha mal rtog sbyang phyir// dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mkha' las sprul// phyogs bzhi sgo bzhir gsol gdab cing// gzhal yas blta ba'i smon pa bya// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba yis// phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab pa dang// rkyen gyur phyi nang gsang ba yi// mchod pa'i khyad par rim pa yis// mchog gi sku gsung thugs mnyes bya// de nas bsgrub pa'i dam bca' zhing// lhag pa'i ye shes byin rlabs blang// nyes pa bshags shing tshangs par spyad/ rang gi byin rlabs yongs rdzogs pas// gnas sbyangs rgyud smin snod bzang 'gyur// lhag pa'i lha yi nye bar bsnyen// de nas rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir// dngos dang dngos min chos dang rten// ma lus rang gi mtha' la blta/ de nyid ma rtogs snying rje'i yul// rgyu ba kun la dmigs pa bsam// rang gi snying po de nyid ni// dmigs pa gsal rdzogs rgyu ru bsgom// de la spro dang bsdu ba yis// sbyang dang mnyes pa'i las rnams bya// thog ma'i gzugs la thim bsam nas// rang bzhin gnas dang grub pa yis// dag dang ma dag gnas gyur pa// ye shes 'byung ba lnga nyid kyis// rang gi sa bon rnam par bsam// eHyaMHraHsuMHraM keMH/ mthing nag ljang ser dmar dang dkar// gzugs bral zla gam gzhu 'dra zhing// gru gsum gru bzhir rab tu brtsegs// rang gnas de nyid ye shes dang// 'phro 'du las kyi sbyor ba yin// bdag med stong pa'i ngo bor bya// kun rdzob nus pa rdzogs ldan zhing// rang gi mtshan nyid so sor 'dzin// 'ja' tshon sgyu ma'i tshul ltar snang// de yi steng du bsam pa ni// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang// gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan pa la// rgyu ni 'jigs byed rnam par snang// rang gi khams dang byed pa dang// gdul bya dang ni 'dul bar byed// gang la bsngags pa der snang zhing// tshad med rdzogs pa nyid kyis gsal// ma bsgribs mnyam nyid ldan par bsgom// rang

sngags snying po las kyi gzhi// byin rlabs cho 'phrul byung ba ni// a dang maM dang paM dag las// gsal byed snying po bsil byed can// dag pa gsum la spyad pas mnyes// ma he chu glang brjid pa ni// ha yi haM gyi yang rnam par spros las byung// de dag steng du bsgom pa ni// hUM chen 'bar ba'i 'od 'phros pas// 'jam dpal mkha' las byung ba ni// gshin rje kun gyi gshed gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur med pas// mthing nag 'bar ba'i 'od mdog can// zhal g.yas dkar ba zhi ba'i ngang// phrin las drag po gtsor spyod pas// g.yon zhal dmar nag gtsigs pa'o// sa dgu rdzogs shing gnon pa yis// spyan dgu sdang mig rab tu blta// chags pa'i thugs rje dang ldan pas// spyan rtsa dmar zhing phyogs bcur 'phrul// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa yis// mche ba bzhi ni rab tu gtsigs// sgrib pa'i bag chags gtor ba yis// shangs nas ye shes 'thong rlung mdzad// ag tshom dmar po mer 'bar bas// gdug pa'i tshogs kun zil gyis gnon// dregs pa dbang du sdud mdzad pas// zhal nas hUM sgra drag po sgrogs/ rgyud drug dbyings su sgrol ba yis// phyag drug mtshon cha rang rtags 'dzin// g.yas pa'i dang po dug lnga'i tshogs// gtan nas 'joms mdzad be con bsnams// bar ma ral gri 'dzin pa yis// skye shi'i 'jigs pa rtsa ba gcod// 'og ma dgra s+t+wa 'dzin pa yis// stobs kyi dug zhi gnas bzhi 'joms// g.yon gyi dang po sdigs mdzub kyis// gdug byed zil gnon 'bigs pa'i brda'// bar ma thugs kyi ye shes kyis// 'khor ba'i gting 'byin mdung ring bsnams// tha ma dbang sdud thod khrag 'dzin// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs kyis// dregs pa mang po dbang du sdud// sku gsum rang bzhin lhun grub pas// thod pa gsum gyi phreng bas brgyan// gdug pa klu yi dug 'joms pas// rigs lnga'i sbrul gyis lhu tshigs bsdams// blo yi theg pa sna tshogs rdzogs// phrin las bzhi yi cho 'phrul ston// rU tra gdug pa sgrol mdzad pas// glang chen stag dang mi dbang po// lpags pa sku yi na bzar gsol// dug gsum gtan nas 'joms 'dul bas// rak+ta thal chen khu ba yis// thig le'i tshom bu ri mor byas// mtha' gnyis spangs shing khyab pa yis// rdo rje rin chen gshog pa gdengs// nyon mongs rtsa ba yan lag tshogs// bsreg mdzad bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar// gti mug ma spangs don mdzad pas// ma he chu glang zhabs kyis gnon// skyon med gsal ba'i ye shes ldan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs pas// g.yon phyogs khro mo be tA lI// nag mo gtum chen dbyings kyi yum// sku gsum rdzogs

pa'i spyan gsum ldan// khro gnyer rlabs kyis rab tu bskyod// 'khor ba ma lus gnas nas 'dren// dbu skra kham nag rab tu 'tsher// sku yi cha lugs gdug pa 'dul// za byed rngam pa'i rol pa'i stabs// zhal gdangs tshems gtsigs ljags 'dril zhing// me dpung 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs// dug gsum rtsad gcod dgra sta g.yas// g.yon na b+han+d+ha khrag gis bkang// spros bral nyon mongs zhal du rngubs// sgrol mdzad ral pa gcig ma ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// dbu yi thor tshugs gcig tu 'khyil// chos nyid yang dag ye shes dbyings// ma lus rtogs pa'i rtags yin te/ g.yas kyi tri shUl rtse gsum 'dzin// dug gsum 'dzin pa rtsad nas gcod// g.yang gzhi pags pa'i ru mtshon gyis// bdud bzhi'i rtog pa zil gyis gnon// g.yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs dbang du sdud// 'gro drug dbyings su sgrol ba yis// khro gnyer drug gis rab tu 'bar// gtso chen dgyes pa'i rol pa stob// ha hi gsang ba'i nga ro yis// rang sngags gsang ba'i sgra sgrogs shing// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros// yig 'bru'i rnam pa cho 'phrul gyis// 'dul byed rang gi sprul pa dag/ ji bzhin pa yi snang ba las// rigs kyi sras mchog byung ba ni// hUM zhes bya ba yi ge'i gzugs// mthing ga 'od dang ldan pa dag/ rang gi gnas su bskyed pa las// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i shar phyogs su// ya ma rA dza zhes bya'i sras// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo ral gri lcags kyu g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra s+t+wa rgyu zhags g.yon// sbyor yum nag mo ral gcig ma// gtso la 'khyud cing dung dmar stob// sgrol yum nag mo nam gru yang/ re ma ti// g.yas g.yon ral gri ne'u le 'dzin// lho phyogs su ni myos byed 'bar// ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// be con ral gri dgra s+t+wa g.yas// b+han d+ha 'khor lo rgyu zhags g.yon// gtum mo ser nag sbyor mdzad ma// gtso la 'khyud cing dung khrag stob// ser nag khrag gi bdag mo ni// g.yas na spu gri snying zhags g.yon// nub phyogs 'phags pa ma ru tse// dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug ldan// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar nag/ be con dbyug to kha T+wAM g.yas// thog khrag 'khor lo rgyu zhags g.yon// rasmi can ni gnyis med sbyor// gtso la 'khyud cing dung khrag stob// gling bzhi 'joms mdzad khros ma ni// dmar mo mi snying thod khrag 'dzin// byang phyogs ral pa tshar dgu ni// ljang nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ljang nag/ be con

gtun shing rgya gram g.yas// dung khrag 'khor lo rgyu zhags g.yon// re ma ti ni sbyor ba'i tshul// srin mo ljang nag mgo 'phyangs ma// dgra s+t+wa 'phyar zhing dung dmar stob// sras mchog yab yum 'khor rnams ni// so so'i rigs kyi sku mdog dang// rgyan bcas gtso bo yab yum gyi// tshul ldan rab tu rdzogs pa'o// phyi rol khyams sam 'khor lo la// gdul bya'i gshin rje bskyed pa ni// steng phyogs gnas pa'i gshin rje ni// nag po'i phyogs 'joms zhes bya ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon dgra s+t+wa// nag mo ral gcig yum dang bcas// dbang phyug rdzogs pa sku dkar ser// tshe bum thong gshol phyag gis 'dzin// gdong dgu ma ni sbyor ba'i yum// brag 'joms mdog dkar g.yas rdo rje// phyag g.yon gyis ni 'khor lo 'dzin// khro mo shel mig ma dang bcas// smug nag chen po glang mgo can// phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon lcags kyu// mche gtsigs ma dang gnyis su med// sngo nag ya ba ti zhes pa// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon lcags kyu// ab sham can zhes yum dang bcas// mig dmar smug nag g.yas ral gri// g.yon gyis ti ra'i dbyug pa 'phyar// dmar mo ral gcig yum dang bcas// rab tu dmigs pa'i dud kha'i mdog/ thog phreng g.yas te lcags sgrog g.yon// klu mo pus 'gro yum dang bcas// gshin rje tel pa sngo nag mdog/ g.yas pa spu gri thod khrag g.yon// sbyor yum spyan gsum ma dang bcas// bdud 'joms smug nag phyag g.yas na// tho ba g.yon na b+han+d+ha rgya gram yang/ 'dzin// smug nag ral gcig ma dang sbyor// chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dkar ser rdo rje khram shing 'dzin// rdo rje ral pa can dang sbyor// 'bar ba dmar po g.yas kyis ni// rtsis byang g.yon na gtun shing thogs// dmar mo mgo dgu yum dang 'khril// thod dbyug can ni mthing nag mdog/ g.yon na shwo rdai g.yas ti ra// nag mo phag mgo can dang sbyor// phyogs kun skyong ba'i gshin rje ste// khro bo gar dgu'i tshul dang ldan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rab tu mtshungs pa'i yum chen yang// kha T+wAM shel gyi lcags kyu dang// skar mda' khram shing tsit+ta mdung// thod rlon ral gri nyi zer dang// tri shUl rdo rje zhags pa dag/ rim par g.yas pa'i phyag gi 'dzin// g.yon pas dung dmar yab la stob// rang gi phyogs nas brjid pa'i tshul// sgo bzhi shar lho nub byang du// khro chen dkar mthing dmar ljang gdong// phra men lta bu bya rgod dang// stag dang kang ka spyang ki'i mgo/ rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// rgya gram rim bzhin g.yas kyis 'dzin// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang// shel gyi dril bu g.yon na bsnams// khro bo'i gar dang

ldan pa dag/ rang sngags gsang ba'i don gyis dbyung// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dag/ nga dang gnyis med dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs shing// chos dbyings mnyam nyid me long dang// so sor rtog dang nan tan gyi// rang gi ye shes ldan par byas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug sgrub pa yis// lus ngag yid kyi nus pa yis// yul gsum gsal bar rab tu bsgom// de la brtan par gnas pa dang// gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor che// rang bzhin grub pa'i pho brang na// khyad par nga rgyal snying po nyid// lhag pa'i gnas su sbyong byed pa// mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin can// dgug cing bstim dang dbab pa dang// mnyes dang mchod pa bstab pa dang// rab tu bsnyen dang shin tu bsnyen// 'phro 'du las kyi sbyor ba dang// zhi bar bya dang rgyas par spel// dbang du bsdu dang drag pos 'dul// 'khor lo bzhi yi longs spyod kyis// las kyi mtha' dang bcas pa dag/ mngon sum nus par rab tu bshad// ces bka' stsal to// gshin rje gshed 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku'i 'khor lo rgyas par sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byang chub tshul gyis sbyor ba dag/ gsung gi snying po gsang ba dag/ 'dus pa'i 'khor la rab tu bstan// lta ba spyod pa cho 'phrul dang// phrin las rigs kyi khyad par gyis// nga rgyal gti mug 'dod chags dang// zhe sdang phrag dog snang ba yis// thugs kyi snying po 'di nyid ni// blo chen rnams la nges snang ba// mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// so sor rtog pa'i shes rab dang// kun tu gsal dang nan tan spyod// gcig la kun rdzogs gcig gi ngang// gcig las spros dang gcig tu bsdu// snang zhing rtog pa ji snyed pa// don gyi ngo bo de nyid las// mthong ba'i yul tshul blta ba las// yang dag nyid la yang dag blta// 'jig rten pa dang de las 'das// gang zag dang ni chos kyis brtag/ tshu rol dang ni pha rol tu// srid pa dang ni zhi ba'i chos// mnyam pa nyid kyis gang bsgom pa// mtshan mar snang dang mtshan ma med// rgyu 'bras stong pa nyid la gnas// gang la gnas pa de bsgom pa'o// 'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang// za dang 'thung dang nyal ba dang// bya dang byed dang gnas pa dang// gnas 'gyur rtog pa'i khyad par spyod// ji ltar gang la cir spyod pa// 'jigs byed gshed kyi brtul zhugs te// dang po ba dang mnyam gzhag dang// bde bar gshegs pa kun spyod do// de dag kun gyi phrin las tshogs// ma lus sgrub byed nus pa ni// dmigs pa'i yul gyi bya ba dang// lam dang gang zag 'bras bu rnams// 'thob byed gsang

sngags 'di dag go/ A+oM a kro te ka ya mAn+t+ra ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT// rtsa ba'i nye ba'i snying po'o// A+oM kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ sku'i snying po'o// A+oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT// gsung gi snying po'o// A+oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHbi kri tA nan hUM phaT// thugs kyi snying po'o// A+oM ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya hUM phaT/ rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o// A+oM a sngags sor bzhag kro te ka hUM phaT/ A+oM b+he tA li rak+sha ma na hUM phaT/ A+oM e ka dza TI trag rak+sha mu tra snying kha rag ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma rA dza ti ta tha tho la ya hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma rA dza pre ta b+hi tri ti ma ra ta ka hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma rA dza pre te dza la hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma rA dza ka la k+She pre tod ka ta hUM phaT/ A+oM rag mo rag mo snying rtsa la sha la b+h+yo// A+oM rag mo rag mo khrag la mu sham b+h+yo// A+oM rag mo rag mo ti sa ma ma ma b+h+yo// A+oM rag mo rag mo ting ting ka la ma b+h+yo// A+oM he ma de b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM ya ma de b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM na ga de b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM kha rag de b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM badzra ya ma rak+ta kro ta hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma hri ti hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma ma hA pa ta hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma hri ku ru hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma ya ba ti hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma ar+ya da ra hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma rak+sha tsa li hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma sarba pa ta hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma a mr-i baM hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma d+harma rA dza hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma dz+wa la raM hUM phaT/ A+oM ya ma hri ti baM hUM phaT/ A+oM ma ma rag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM rag mo rak+Sha ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM ma ma yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM ma ma rag sha hri ti snying ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM ma ma rak+sha ma ti ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM rag mo sta na ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM ma ma na ga ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM ba ya ng+he ba ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM yag mo yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM ma ma badzra e ka ru lu hUM/ A+oM ma ma yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM ka la rag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ A+oM ya ma aM gu sha dzaH/ A+oM ya ma pa sha hUM/ A+oM ya ma s+pho Ta baM/ A+oM ya ma g+han+d+he hoH/ rab tu bskyed pa'i snying po'o// A+oM sa man ya many+dzu shrI mu tra yA man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hUM dza/ ma ma e ka dzaHti trag rak+sha kha mun+t+ra/ mu tra ma ma snying kha rag+ma b+h+yo/ rag mo te/ ke tsa tsha kha la ma hi b+h+yo/ ya ya lo na tsin+han ma ma b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ bsgrub pa bya ba'i snying po'o// A+e ma ma te k+She ra tsa sa twa ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni hUM phaT/ ya ma ra tsa sa twa me ya/ a mu ka pra ma ya ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT// ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ a mu ka rag ta ra tsa ya ni sha ku ru hUM phaT/ ya ta yo ni
