ra ya k+She ya// srog rtsa a mu kaM ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT// ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ a mu kaM ma ra ya ni sha ku ru hUM phaT/ phrin las kyi snying po'o// gshed chen lto ba dkrugs pa yi// srid sbyar yab yum 'khor lo bskor// brab dang 'phangs dang las kyi mchog/ bzlog dang gzir dang dkrugs par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i snying

po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sngon gyi phrin las dgongs mdzad de// gang gis btul ba'i gdul bya de// phyi ma'i dus na dgongs mdzad de// mngon du spyod pa bka' stsal pa// nga yis sngar bshad gnas dag tu// gsum dang gcig gi khru tshad kyis// pho brang dkyil 'khor mdzes par brtsigs// dur khrod rdzas kyis rab tu bstar// dbus la gru gsum sgo bzhengs bya// 'khor lo mu khyud ldan par byed// gtso chen sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// ji ltar rigs pa bsam bzhin dgod// gla glo a ba b+h+raM shi ta/ rang skad smra ba de dag gi/ mtshan ngan snod du drag po'i rdzas// myos 'thib gsod par nus pa dang// dran pa'i rten dang 'khor ba'i rgyud// mdzes shing mnyes par bya phyir dgod// mi rta rgyu mchog glang po che// chu glang ma he dran dbang rten// gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo dang// spu gri gri gug bshan gri dang// mtshon lcags phur pa dug shing khram// shwa rde dkar nag dmar dang sngo// bzhi pa'am bdun nam nyi shu gcig/ so so'i grangs dang mthun par dgod// gzhan yang ging bdud bshan pa dang// rtsis pa rang gi gzugs brnyan rnams// dus gzhan dag tu+u ngas bshad bzhin// sku gsung thugs kyi rten du dgod// mchod pas mnyes gyur dam tshig rdzas// bza' dang btung dang myang dang ldag/ brab dang bdug pa brdeg pa dang/ bskrad dang bcings dang mnan pa dang// gtor dang spar ba'i rdzas kyis bstar// ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa dang// las kyi rim pa bya ba dag/ gtso dang 'khor gyis gnas bsgyur te// maM las ma he bsnol ba'i steng// nyi zla 'khor lo gsal ba'i steng// ya hUM rnam pa'i 'phro 'du las// gshed chen 'jigs byed bskyed par bya// dmar nag gser ljang las kyi mtha'// gang gi dmigs pa de dag gi/ zla gam yum gnyis sras dang gsum// gri thogs bzhi dang khram thogs bzhi// rtsis pa bzhi dang bshan pa bzhi// bzhi'am brgyad dam bcu drug gi/ ging bdud gnod sbyin srin po rnams// so so'i gtso dang 'khor du bcas// lus dang longs spyod ldan par bsgom// rang rgyud gnas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dmigs par ldan pas bos shing bstim// gnas nas drangs shing bos dang bskul// 'jigs byed ngang gis bzlas par bya// ya ma rA dza sa do mi ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i phrin las spyad/ ging ka ra ging ka ra/ karma rak+sha hri/ tri ku ru rak+sha khA hi/ sta sha rU tra mA ya/ rU tra thu na ya/ rU tra thu+u na ya/ rak+ta thun rbad/ rak+ta thun rbad/ bdud tri ni ra zung/ ya tri ni ra zung/ tri tsa pa la ni ra zung/ chu ma shig yang tri ni ra zung/ dun tri ba tri da na tri sho

ma tri thun dza/ ma ra tr-i dza dza/ ya yA/ thing thiM/ kro ta ni kro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ ga shu+u la ga shu+u la/ d+ha sha g+h+ri wa d+ha sha g+h+ri wa/ yag sha g+h+ri ba yag sha g+h+ri ba hUM phaT/ badzra badzra da ra libs/ kha la mu ting snying gang chod/ mu la dun ting mA' ra ya rbad/ badzra tig+Na rbad/ tsakra du tri rbad/ badzra shu tri da ra tri ya rbad su rbad su/ rbad du rbad du/ da raka sha ta sa ma ya/ mdangs dang ldan pas bod par bya// nye dang bsnyen pa'i rtags mthong nas// las la sbyar ba 'di dag go/ ging ka ra ging ka ra srog la rbad su rbad su/ sha la ha ba ha ba/ rus la chem chem/ rtsa la myag myag/ khrag la hub hub/ rbad rbad rtub rtub/ a mu ka tsit+ta mugs/ ra ma mA ra ya khug ling/ snying khrag ti ma tsa ti rbad thun rmugs khram hor rbad/ a mu ka mA ra ya ma trig na gug ling rbad/ bdud tri rbad thum ri li li/ a mu ka shig kha la ku ru/ a mu ka mu tri hri ma du na tri phob ya/ ya tri rbad thum ri li li/ rbad rbad/ d+ha sha g+h+ri ba rbad/ thum ri li li/ yak+sha g+h+ri wa rbad bu thum ri li li/ yak+sha tsakra tsit+ta mA ra ya b+h+yo/ sa ma ya da ma dza dza/ taM ti du na rbad/ su da ra breng breng rbad/ rat+na tsakra a mu ka ha ri ni b+h+yo/ ya ma mun ting sha ling tri tsa ra nr-i tri ba ra tri rbad rbad/ ging ka ra tsa d+ha ma ru tse las la yam yam rtsa la rgyug dbugs la hur thum/ srog la dun dza/ sha la gug thun// sngags 'di rdzas la bzlas shing gdab// byung dang brtan dang las byed dang// grub dang mthar phyin rtags dang sbyar// dang pos 'bod cing gzugs la dbab// gnyis pas dpung dang dbral bar bya// gsum pas gnas su dgug cing bcings// bzhi pas bsad dang brdegs pa ste// nyi ma bzhi pa'i 'khor lo yis// g.yas gcod g.yon gcod go rim gyis// 'phang dang bsreg dang gnan pa dang// las kyi mtha' ma rdzogs pa yis// gcod pa'i 'khor lo cho 'phrul yin// gzugs med gzugs can 'dod pa'i khams// ma lus ngo bo nyid kyis bde// 'khrul pa'i las kyis 'khor lo rdzogs// gnas nas 'pho zhing sdug bsngal gyi// ngang gis bde la sgrib cing gcod// de las bzlog pa de nyid de// 'khor zhing 'pho dang gcod pas so// byang chub lam dang srid pa'i gnas// rten 'brel phyogs chos rjes 'gro zhing// bzlog pa ma lus kun tu brtag/ de nas gzhan dbang bsam pa'ang 'byung// yongs su grub pa rjes yin no// dus bzhi skye ba'i gnas bzhi dang// sdug bsngal bzhi dang 'gyur ba bzhi// yul bzhi khams dang byed pa bzhi// lam bzhi sa bzhi ye shes bzhi// sku bzhi rdzogs pa'i lta ba bzhi// ma lus 'pho dang gcod pa dang// 'gro zhing ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste// bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang// bcu drug bar gyi gnas yul mtshon// phyi nang yul dang

dngos thams cad// gzhi dang gnyen po 'byung ba dang// rgyu dang 'bras bu byed pa'i rkyen// 'jig dang gnas pa'i rten 'brel 'byung// brtan g.yo dbang po drug gi yul// rang gi nus par bcas pa dag/ rang bzhin ngang dwangs bdag nyid kyis// bya dang byed dang chags sdang dang// bag la nyal dang kun nas sdang// 'byung dang ldog pa'i rten 'brel gyis// bag chags las dang nyon mongs dang// shes bya tsam gyis sgrib par 'gyur// bcu gsum pa dang yan lag dang// sbyor dang mnyam nyid rig pa yis// rgyu mthun dbang dang rnam smin gyis// dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu bskyed// nga ni thog ma med pa nas// dus gsum spros bral chos skur gyur// chos mthun longs spyod rdzogs par bstan// cho 'phrul byin rlabs 'khor lo bzhis// ma 'gags thabs las sbrul pa'i sku// dag pa rang gi ngo bo nyid// phrin las sna tshogs 'byung ba las// som nyi za bar ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal to// gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// gcod pa'i 'khor lo'i khyad par gyi las bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// khyad par sku yi ngo bo bdag/ bsdus pa'i yon tan 'di gsungs so// hUM chen 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du dang// rdo rje rtse lnga'i byin rlabs kyis// 'jam dpal mkha' las byung ba'i sku// bcom ldan gshin rje kun gyi gshed// gnyis med kun la khyab pa'i sku// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// ye shes sgyu ma'i skur snang ba// 'gyur med rdo rje sku yi mchog/ zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing// sku gsum rdzogs pa'i dbu gsum gsal// rgyud drug sgrol ba'i phyag drug ni// dug lnga 'joms mdzad be con 'byar// skye shi rtsad gcod ral gri gdengs// bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i dgra s+t+wa 'dzin// gdug byed 'bigs ba'i sdigs mdzub mdzad// 'khor ba'i gting 'byin mdung thung bsor// ma lus dbang sdud thod khrag stob// srid zhi mnyam nyid zhal mdog can// bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes kyis// rnam dag sku yi rgyas gdab cing// dbu skra ral pa srid rtser 'bar// sa dgu rdzogs pa'i spyan dgu gzigs// nyon mongs bag chags sgrib pa'i tshogs// shangs kyi ye shes rlung gis gtor// sma ra me 'bar srid gsum bsreg/ zhal nas hUM chen chos sgra sgrogs// ljags kyi klog 'od khams gsum gsal// mche ba gtsigs pas skye bzhi sgrol// khro gnyer brjid pas dbang du sdud// sku gsum rdzogs pa'i thod phreng brgyan// gdug pa 'joms mdzad sprul gyis dkris// theg pa rim pa dgu rdzogs pas// glang ko rlon pa na bzar gsol// phrin las

rnam bzhi rab rdzogs pas// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs gsol dkris// dregs pa rU tra 'dul mdzad pas// mi dbang lpags pa sku la gsol// rak+ta'i thig les 'dod chags 'joms// thal chen mtshan mas gti mug sel// zhag gi zo ris zhe sdang spong// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkhar gdengs// rin chen gshog pas 'gro don rdzogs// mtha' gnyis ma spangs kun la khyab// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// bag chags rtogs pa ma lus bsreg/ dug gsum sa gsum rab sbyor bas// yi dwags ma he chu glang gnon// ye shes gsum gyis don mdzad pas// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// snyoms mdzad rgyal ba kun gyi yab// sku mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings gnyis med sbyor ba yi// yum chen khro mo be tA lI// gtum chen dbyings kyi yum gcig ma// mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku mdog can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro gnyer ma// dug gsum rtsad gcod dgra s+t+wa g.yas// nyon mongs rngub mdzad thod khrag stob// dpal chen sku dang gnyis su med// chos nyid dbyings su yang dag sbyor// sgrol mdzad yum chen ral gcig ma// bai DUr sngon po'i mdog 'dzin ma// g.yu yi ral gcig gtsug tu 'khyil// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo che// dpal 'bar khro mo mi thung ma// g.yas kyi tri shUl rtse gsum 'dzin// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod cing sgrol// g.yon na zhing ljags rgyal mtshan phyar// bdud bzhi'i rtog pa 'dul bar mdzad// gtso chen phrin las myur bsgrub ma// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i bdag nyid kyis// 'gro don rdzogs mdzad dpal 'bar ma// chos dbyings rgyal ba kun gyi yum// 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnyis med thugs kyi sprul pa las// phyogs bzhi 'dul ba'i gshed chen bzhi// zhe sdang ye shes gshin rje'i gshed// gti mug ye shes gshin rje'i gshed// 'dod chags ye shes gshin rje'i gshed// phrag dog ye shes gshin rje'i gshed// 'jigs byed chen po'i skur bstan pa// gsung gi dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dpal// thugs mchog rnam dag chos kun gsal// yon tan mnyam nyid ma lus rdzogs// phrin las mi bzad gdug pa 'dul// sbyor dang sgrol mdzad yum dang bcas// byang chub sems kyi phrin las kyis// srid pa'i 'khor lo gnas nas sbyongs// ye shes sems dpa' rgyal ba'i sras// 'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid rdzogs// gshed chen tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan sngon gyi phrin las las// bdud 'dul pho nya'i las mdzad pa// gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'gror bcas// phyogs mtshams steng 'og ma lus pa'i// phyi nang skyong ba'i dam tshig can// nyi ma bzhi

pa'i las mdzad cing// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bka' stsal nas// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams thams cad ma lus par khyab par mdzad nas/ sems can gyi khams snang ba thams cad/ rang rang gi mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rang rang gi rigs dang khams byed pa dang// las kyi khyad par dang rab tu mthun pa'i chos ston cing gnas pa dang/ srid pa dang/ sprul pa dang/ gcod pa'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ dbang phyug chen po gzhon nu dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ bram ze dang/ glang po dang/ cang shes dang/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dang/ ru ru dang shing rta mo dang/ sdig pa dang nya dang srin bu la sogs pa sems can gyi gzugs sna tshogs bdag gis/ kha cig la ni zhi ba dang/ kha cig la ni rgyas pa dang/ kha cig la ni dbang du bsdu ba dang/ kha cig la ni tshar gcad pa dang/ kha cig la ni bskrad pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dgug pa dang gnan pa la sogs pa gang gis gnyen por gang 'gyur ba de bzhin du bstan te/ thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i zhing khams su snang bar mdzad do// gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i yon tan rdzogs par snang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de nyid kyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i rol pa'i phrin las de dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su snyigs ma lngar gyur pa'i sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang la gdams te yongs su gtad nas/ smon lam gyi dbang gis mi 'gyur bar mdzad de// nyid kyi thugs khyad par du dka' thub kyi lus rnam par dag pa'i phung po las bzhengs nas dge sbyong du sprul te/ de dag dang mthun pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs kyi thun mong ba dang/ drang ba'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa dang/ spyi'i don dang yi ge'i don dag gis rjes su bzung ste thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la myur du 'god par dgongs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya po'i bla dpe/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya////

rgya gar skad du/ shri b+ha ga bAn ma hA ba shaM sa mu dA ya mU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal po de/ 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba'i bde ba chen po/ rnam par dag pa'i dbyings/ pad+ma mchog gi pho brang dam pa rgya dang tshad med pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par dag pa na/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen pos dges pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa la/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rigs kyi sprul pa snang bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi lha tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang las kyi rigs su snang ba'i zhi ba'i tshogs dang/ rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang/ gtso mo chen mo dbyings kyi yum chen mo drug dang/ 'dab chags kyi gzugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo rigs lngas bsdus pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can pho'i tshogs dang/ mo'i tshogs su gyur pa rnams dang/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang/ klu dang srin po'i tshogs ma rungs pa las byung ba'i gza' dang rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang/ de dag la sogs pa dregs pa'i tshogs mthu'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa// 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir sprul pa'i 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba las byung ba'i zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad yum dang bcas pa'i dang// phrin las bzhi so sor bsgrub pa'i phyir sgo bzhir gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi dang/ gzhan yang sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las sna tshogs las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro bzhi dang/ ye shes las byung ba'i spyan dang ldan pa'i sprul pa brgyad dang/ phrin las kyi pho nya za byed chen po'i tshogs kyi gtso bo bcu drug dang/ lus kyis mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshul du sprul pa'i phrin las kyi mgyogs ma brgyad dang/ sbas pa'i ma mo rtsal dang ldan pa'i mgos brgyan pa'i mo tshogs kyi srin mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi las la grub pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor gdug pa can bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po gsung gi mnga' bdag/ snang ba mtha' yas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chen po chos nyid mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos kyang/ thugs rje chen po dang byams pa chen pos gdul byar mi nus pa'i dregs pa can rnams

'dul ba'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs 'jigs byed chen por sbrul pa 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad ni mthing nag gru gsum yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings rlung gi khams thams cad ni 'thor rlung drag po ljang gu zla gam rgya gram/ rigs kyi yum dang dam tshig sgrol ma'i mkha' dbyings chu'i khams thams cad ni chags pa'i gzhi khrag gi rang bzhin dmar zhing zlum pa/ rigs kyi yum mA ma kI'i mkha' dbyings sa'i khams thams cad ni phung po ti ra'i rang bzhin/ ser po gru bzhi pa/ rigs kyi yum sangs rgyas spyan gyi mkha' dbyings/ me'i khams thams cad ni rab tu 'bar zhing sreg par byed pa rigs kyi yum gos dkar mo'i mkha' dbyings/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pa thams cad ni/ keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab chen po/ rab tu rngams pa'i gzugs/ rigs thams cad kyi bdag po chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du sbrul zhing byin gyis brlabs so// gzhan yang snod kyi 'jig rten rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes par snang ba rnams ni thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang sha khrag ras ris su chags pa brtsigs pa'i gzhal med khang rdzogs pa'i sku gsum gyi rang bzhin/ 'jig rten gyi lha dang klu dang gza' chen po bsgral zhing tshar bcad pa dag la ka gdung gi tshul du byas pa ni dman pa'i theg pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin/ bar snang gi lha bran dang rgyu skar gyi tshogs thog grab kyi tshul du byas pa ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin/ nyi ma dang zla bas gsal ba'i 'od 'phel 'grib med pa ni mthongs khung gi tshul ni/ thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'jig rten gyi mthu dang dregs pa can dbang phyug chen po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dbang du bsdus te rgyal mtshan du btsugs pa ni/ chos kyi sku dngos po ma lus pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rang bzhin// phyogs bzhir sgo bzhir snang zhing dus bzhi shes la 'byed pa ni tshad med pa bzhi'i rang bzhin/ phyi dang nang gi phyogs thams cad du bskal pa'i me 'od chen po 'bar ba ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin stong gsum gyi klu'i rgyal po gdug pa can gdan du byas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dug ma lus pa 'joms pa'i rang bzhin/ pad+ma rnam par dag pas gdan byas pa ni/ thugs rjes sems can la chags par mdzad kyang// de'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rang bzhin nyi ma dang zla ba pad+ma 'bar bas bteg pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag pas bskyed pa ste/ de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad dbang du bsdus pa'i sprul pa rnam par 'phro bar mdzad do// gzhan yang bcud kyi 'jig rten skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyang

bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal por snang bar byas pa'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ nga ni bde gshegs kun gyi gtso// nga ni skye 'gro kun gyi yab// nga ni gshin rje kun gyi gshed// nga ni ma mo kun gyi rje// nga ni sbyor bdag chen po ste// yag sha shrI he ru ka/ nga ni sgrol bdag chen po ste// rag sha shrI he ru ka/ nga ni sbas pa'i rang bzhin te// gu ya dpal chen he ru ka/ nga ni dam tshig chen po ste// sa ma ya shrI he ru ka/ nga ni dus gsum mngon du dbyung// dus gsum 'di ni nga yi dbang// thams cad nga yi dbang du bsdus// bka' dang dam las khyod 'das na// gso glag med par dmyal thag gcod// de bas nga yi las rnams sgrubs// zhes gsungs shing thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i rol pa'i cho 'phrul chen po drag cing rtsub pa'i shugs spyod pa kun tu bltas pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba rab tu bstan te/ gsung yang 'di skad rab tu sgrogs so// A+oM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta ha ya g+h+rI ba ma hA kro d+ha e ka dza TI sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A ra li dza/ hrIH sngags sor bzhag de ma da ri ha ya g+h+rI wa e ka dza TI sa ma ya hu lu hu lu hrIHdzaHdzaH/ e dza b+h+yo nr-i dza rbad/ hrIHpad+mAn+ta kr-ita ha ya g+h+rI wa e ka dza TI hu lu hu lu hrI dzaHdza/ a ti sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ ces pa'i gsung gi sgra stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas pas/ phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can gyi tshogs thams cad 'jigs shing sngangs skrag brgyal bar gyur te/ sa la kha bub tu 'gyel nas dbang gi rgyal po'i bka' nyan cing bran bzhin du las byed par khas blangs shing dam bcas so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ pad+ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par sbrul pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de la 'khor gyi thog ma rigs kyi khro bo pad+ma he ru ka chen po chu bdag gi rigs dpag tu med pa rnams dang lhan cig mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal// pad+ma rigs mchog de bzhin gshegs// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi rang bzhin gsung gi bdag/ gsung gi gtso ste gsung dbyung ba// gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i sku// ma chags mi chags chags med gsung// gsung gi dbang phyug smra ba che// bdag cag nyan par 'tshal lags kyis// khyod kyi sku yis ci zhig mdzad// de bzhin gsung gis ci zhig gsung// thugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// khyod la yon tan ci zhig mnga'// mdzad pa'i phrin las ji lta bu// gzigs pa yis ni ji zhig blta// ting nge 'dzin ni gang la bsgom// dus bzhi yis ni spyod pa gang// 'thob par bya ba ci zhig lags// bdag cag rnams kyi the tshom 'di// myur du chod cig lha yi

lha// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams// ljags kyi dbang pos khyab mdzod la// khams gsum ma lus thams cad kun// gsung dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra brjod de// gsal la rdzogs shing ma 'dres la// lhag dang chad pa'i skyon bral bar// legs pa nyid du bstan du gsol// zhes gsol te gus pa chen po dang bcas pas mdun du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug des/ chos thams cad kyi sgra'i snying po gsung gi phyag rgya'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen po rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bstan te zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho// nga ni thams cad sku yi rgyan// nga ni thams cad gsung gi klong// nga ni thams cad thugs kyi dbyings// nga ni thams cad yon tan tshogs// nga ni phrin las ma lus mdzad// nga nyid gzung 'dzin bral bar blta// mnyam nyid g.yo ba med par bsgom// ma 'gags rtsol ba med par spyod// sku dang ye shes dbyer med par// nga yi thob par bya ba yin// gal te khyod kyi the tshom dag/ sel byed nus pa ma thob na// nga yi legs par bstan gyis nyon// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nga'i lus byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba'i sems can la thugs rjes rab tu chags pas sku dmar po'i kha dog dang ldan pa'o// rdzogs pa'i sku gsum dang ldan pas dbu gsum gyis mdzes pa'o// dbu skra ral pa gyen du brdzes pa ni ma rig pa tshangs pa'i sgo'i sbubs gnon pa'o// spyi bo'i gtsug na rta mgo ljang gu rta skad drag po 'tsher ba ni khyad par du dbang gi phrin las kyi sgo nas dregs pa can tshar gcod cing dbang du sdud pa'o// zhal nas hrIHdang phaT kyi gsung sgra drag po sgrogs pa ni/ ma rungs pa log par lta ba can rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa'o// shangs nas rdo rje'i rlung 'tshubs ma drag por 'khyil ba ni// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yo zhing mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa 'dul bar byed pa'o// ag tshom dang sma ra smin ma ser po la bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar bar snang ba ni/ mi shes mun pa'i phyogs ma lus par sel bar byed pa'o// spyan dgu nyi ma dang zla ba'i zer ltar 'bar zhing 'tsher ba ni/ 'gro ba rnams la thugs rjes gzigs nas rang gi rigs la 'god par byed pa'o// phyag drug gis ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pas 'gro don mthar phyin par mdzad pa'o// rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis

su med pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o// kha T+wAM ga ni nyon mongs pa dug gsum gyi dngos po rtsad nas gcod pa'o// sbrul chen po'i zhags pa 'dzin pa ni gdug pa can rnams gdul zhing thugs rjes 'dzin par mdzad pa'o// b+han+d+ha dmar po khrag dang zhag gis bkang ba gsol ba ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa thugs rje chen pos zad par mdzad pa'o// lcags sgrog gi rgyun 'dzin pa ni// khams gsum thams cad thugs rjes mi gtong bar bde ba chen po'i ngang du 'khrid par mdzad pa'o// glang po che'i pags pa dang zhing lpags chen po gsol ba ni/ theg pa rim pa dag gi gang du phyin cing thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa rgyun du 'phro ba'o// stag gi pags pas sham thabs su dkris pa ni/ phrin las kyi khyad par ma 'dres par so sor grub par mdzad pa'o// dur khrod chen po'i chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa ni/ ye shes dang las las grub pa'i ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dbang du sdud pa'o// klu'i rgyal po chen po rigs lngas brgyan pa ni/ gdug pa can gyi tshogs zil gyis gnon pa'o// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dang dor stabs su bzhugs pa ni/ bdud dang mu stegs kyi phyogs 'dul ba'o// klu pho mo gdan du bting ba ni zhe sdang dang gti mug rang sar sbyong ba'o// pad+ma dang nyi zla'i gdan bting ba ni/ ma chags pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs skyed pa'o// yum e ka dza TI ral gcig ma dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba ni// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang la gnas pa'o// sku mdog dmar nag la 'od 'phro ba ni// chags pa dang bde ba chen po gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin no// zhal gcig ni chos sku mnyam pa chen po gcig tu mtshon pa'o// phyag gnyis ni snying rje dang stong pa zung du 'brel ba'o// kha T+wAM ga ni sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don rgyun du mdzad pa'o// thod khrag ni 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par stob pa'o// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa ni/ thabs thugs rje'i rol pa chen pos/ 'gro ba'i don rnam par 'phrul bar mdzad pa'o// nyon cig pad+ma he ru ka/ nga yi sku yi rang bzhin ni// chos kyi sku ste spros dang bral// nga yi sku yi ngo bo ni// longs spyod rdzogs te mtshan dper ldan// nga yi sku yi mtshan nyid ni// sprul pa'i sku ste 'gro don rdzogs// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'o// sems can khams kun thams cad la// nga yi sku ni re re gnas// gol te 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur pas// ma mthong ma rtogs las kyis nongs// 'di la goms par byas pa ni// nga dang gnyis su med par spyod// mthong dang rtogs pa lta ci smos// zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/

sku rnam par dag pa'i dbang phyug gsang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des khams gsum pa thams cad yi ge sgra'i rtog pa rnam par spong ba 'khor lo yongs su gcod pa'i dbyangs stong zhing grags pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hrIHde nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rdo rje'i snying po 'di spro ba chen pos smras so// A+oM pad+mAn+ta kri ta ha ya g+h+rI wa e ka dza TI sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM A ra li dza/ rab tu bzlas pa'i snying po'o// hrIHb+h+yo dza dza/ hrIHhrIHhrIHhrIHhrIHhrIHhrIHhrIH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha/ he he he he/ he he he he/ muM muM muM muM/ muM muM muM muM/ muM muM muM muM/ muM muM muM muM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rab tu 'grub par byed pa'i snying po'o// oM ha ya g+h+rI wa hUM dza/ A+oM e ka dza TI hUM dza/ A+oM pad+ma he ru ka hUM dza/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI hUM dza/ A+oM badzra tsakra rat+na pad+ma karma hUM dza/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+hI/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+han+da b+han+da/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ gardza gardza/ s+phoT s+phoT hUM dza/ A+oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ A+oM badzra pA sha hUM/ A+oM badzra s+phoT baM/ A+oM badzra g+haN+De hoH/ A+oM A ra li hrIM hrIM dza dza/ ming gi bod pa'o// A+oM ru lu ru lu+u ta sha ma ta ga ru ga te tsit+ta baM ba~M laM ru tra yo he sa ma ya/ k+Shen ro sha kha/ ma ra pra be sha/ pra ta tsa la/ b+ha ru b+hi bi ta na ga b+hin du hi ra ya dung dung tsa/ rung ga pa sha ga pa/ ma hA ka ma la hUM/ ha he hUM pra be sha phaT/ ba ha b+han+da b+han+da tik+Sh+Na pra be sha na ga le du ma ba le/ a ka le/ spo ta le a ka ra sha i na ta b+ha ha b+ha ha phra ma phra ma bram bram yak+Sha sa ma ya pra be sha phaT phaT/ bsgral te dbang du bya ba'i snying po'o// ta ki na ta ki na hUM/ ta keM ta keM phaT/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha chom/ tik+Sha tik+Sha shig rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ tshin+da tshin+da phaT/ kro ta kro ta raM/ ha la ha la baM/ rag sha rag sha baM/ dz+nya na tsakra ke tu traM/ rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir sbreng ba'i snying po'o/ A+e kro d+hI shwa rI ma d+ha la hUM/ yaM karma rak+Sha hUM/ ra rak+ta dz+wa la ma d+ha la hUM/ baM tik+Sh+Na ma d+ha la hUM/ keM ni ri ti dz+wa la ma d+ha la keM raM badzra dz+wa la raM/ b+h+ruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra ma d+ha la hUM b+h+ruM/ gzhi rab tu bskyed pa'i snying po'o// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku/ sa'i khams ma lus pa'i rdul gyi cha dang mnyam pa'i tshad kyi rang rang gi gsung tshad dpag tu med pas bskal pa khri phrag bcu'i bar du nga'i gsung gi mtha' brjod par mi lang ste hrAMHhUM zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po yang dag pa'i sgra'o// 'di ni phyogs bcu ma lus par khyab pa'i sngon du lhun

gyis grub pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs dbang gi rigs mthun pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i lha mor gyur te/ mchod pa dang bstabs pas mnyes par byed cing sems can gyi khams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len pa mtha' dag sbyangs shing zad par byas nas/ 'od zer gyi tshul du spros pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang bar byed pa'o// A+oM hrIH/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ chos kyi gsung ni dpag tu med// e ha hi yi yan lag ni// dregs pa can rnams dbang du sdud// ces gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsung rnam par dag pa dbang phyug gsang ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi de kho na nyid rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo de nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa la snang zhing gsal bar mdzad pa ni/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// byung dang mthong dang myong ba dang// gnas dang dran pa ma lus pa// snying po byang chub sems yin te// 'di las g.yos pa ci yang med// gzugs dang kha dog mtshan ma dang// ming dang brda' dang tha snyad kun// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin te// snang yang 'di las 'gyur ba med// 'on kyang rang las 'byung zhing snang// byung ba nyid kyang rang byung la// snang ba de yang rang las snang// rig pa'i dus na rang gis rig/ rnam par shes pa mi gcig pas// rtogs dang ma rtogs tha snyad snang// 'on kyang gang gis gang nyid la// gang du ji ltar ji bzhin du// rtogs su yod pa ma yin te// tha snyad tsam du rtogs zhes brjod// kun rdzob don dam rang bzhin las// yod dang med dang gzung dang 'dzin// skye dang 'gag dang rtag dang chad// snang stong srid dang zhi ba dang// bde dang sdug bsngal stong mi stong// mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma dang// smon med smon pa yod pa dang// bdag dang bdag med 'gro dang 'ong// zag pa med dang zag bcas dang// kha na ma tho yod med dang// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das dang// spro dang bsdu ba la sogs pa// dngos dang ngo bo tha dad dang// mthu dang nus pa sna tshogs dang// rang gi mtshan nyid so so dang// ming dang brda' dang tha snyad du// btags pa tsam ni ma lus dang// rgyu dang 'bras bu rten dang gnas// phyi nang snga phyi dus gsum kun// sems dang sems las byung ba dang// rtogadapyod rigs dpyod mkhas dpyod dang// bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang// mngon du rgyu dang g.yo ba dang// yongs su grub dang kun tu brtags// gzhan gyi dbang las gyur pa dang// gang zag bdag

las byung ba ste// nga yi thugs las ci yang med// dper na mkha' la sprin tshogs dang// 'ja' tshon khug rna na bun dang// rdzi rlung kha char 'od dang glog/ snang yang mkha' las g.yos pa med// de bzhin nga yi thugs kyi bdag/ ma skyes mi skye skye ba med// ma 'gags mi 'gag 'gag pa med// ma g.yos mi g.yo g.yo ba med// snying po don gyi gzhi nyid las// rang bzhin du ni lhun gyis grub// rtogs pa tsam gyis mngon du 'gyur// rtsol med rgyu ni ye nas sbyangs// rang la rdzogs shing gzhan la snang// e ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung// zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thugs rnam par dag pa dbang phyug gsang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rab tu snang bar sgrub par byed pa'i don rnam par dag pa'i che ba 'di nyid ston pa 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul cir yang 'gyur zhing ston pa thams cad la snang yang gcig tu ma nges pa'i phyir/ thugs kyi che ba nyid dang/ gsung gi che ba nyid dang/ sku'i che ba nyid la sogs pa gang yang ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas/ byin gyis rlabs sna tshogs su 'byung ba ni/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i don// zab pa dang ni rgya che ba dang/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyi theg pa chen po blta bas ma mthong ste/ 'dul ba'i dus la gnas pa'i sbyong bas bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin mthu bo ches rgyu nye bar bzhag pa dge ba'i chos la spyod par nus shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la gzhag par sla'o// nyan thos kyi skyes bu ni smad par bya ba rnams 'dul zhing rang gi sa la dgod nus par zad kyi/ bla na med pa'i lam la spyod par mi nus pa rnams kyang// nga'i thugs dang gsung dang sku'i yon tan thogs pa med pa spyod pa la ni rgyu tsam du yang mi nye'o// de ltar dbang gi rgyal po nga'i thugs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis thugs rjes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa le snang ba bzhin/ sems can gyi khams rnams kyi sems kyi rgyu las snang ba thams cad bdag gi ye shes la snang bar byung ba ste thub pa chen po yan chad yin no// ri rab kyi rtse mor rnam par snang mdzad gang gi mtsho chen po'i lus lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu'i tshe na/ nga'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen por sems bskyed do// bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// mthon mthing lcang lo can bsgyur te// bar snang khams kun rab snang zhing// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og kun// khro bo khro mos bkang byas te// rin chen rtsal chen seng ge dang// rta dang

glang chen nam mkha' lding// grangs med gnon pa 'og min gnas// rdo rje khro bo rnam par rgyal// zhabs 'bring rdo rje rol pa mo// bye ba khrag khrig rjes su 'brang// lus dang yan lag thams cad kun// thod rlon phreng dang sbrul gyis brgyan// spyan dgu 'bar bas sa dgu gzigs// dbu skra ral pa me stag 'phro// rin chen 'bar ba'i zur phud lnga// se mo do dang do shal dngar// mgur chu chun 'phyangs za ra tshags// de bzhin zhabs kyi chas brgyad kyis// khro bo chen po brgyad 'dul bas// tshangs dang brgya byin smos ci dgos// dbang chen nga yi 'khor rnams kun// bka' bzhin byed pa yon tan yin// gzhan yang nga yi yon tan ni// blo dang dbang po bsam pa dang// khams dang rigs dang yul dang dngos// dman dang bar ma mchog tu byed// bya ba'i chos dang byed pa'i yid// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes dang// 'du byed rnam shes phung po'i tshogs// dbang po yul dang skye mched khams// de ni nga yis rab tu byed// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang// rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang// nyan thos rang rgyal lha rnams kyi// yon tan tshogs kun ji snyed pa// nga la de nyid mnga' ba ste// tshig dang ming dang rnam grangs dang// dpe dang tshad kyis brjod mi yang// gzhan yang nyon cig he ru ka/ nga la gzugs dang tshad dang dbyibs// yod dang dngos por ma blta cig/ nga la rigs dang rgyu dang rkyen// byed pa po ni ga la yod// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// thugs rje mkhyen pas thabs dang ldan// 'di ni nga yi chos kyi sku// ston byed pa dang dus dang 'khor// gang gis bstan pa'i ngo bo de// nges pa can du rnam pa lnga// nga la phun sum tshogs pa ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa nga yi sku// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// dman pa nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// 'di las gzhan pa'i phyi rol pa// dbang phyug dang ni tshangs pa dang// drag po gtum po gzhon nu dang// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang// seng ge glang chen ri dwags dang// 'dab chags srin bu la sogs pa// gang gi gang la gang gis phyir// ji ltar nus pa'i dbang mdzad cing// rang dang gnyis med mnyam sbyor ba// nga yi sku las rnam sprul sku// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// shes par byos shig he ru ka/ zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yon tan rgya chen po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las ma lus pa bsgrub par byed pa dang/ de la nye bar byed cing skal ba can du byed pa dang/ myur du 'grub par byed pa dang/ legs par 'grub

par byed pa dang/ yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang/ bde bar 'grub par byed pa'i thabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i gsang ba dang gsung gi gsang ba dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po nye bar bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi dkyil 'khor rang nyid la rdzogs par gsal bar mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye kye dbang chen he ru ka/ ma 'ongs shin tu snyigs ma'i dus// tshe dang dus dang longs spyod dang// las dang blta bas mnar ba'i tshe// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog ser sna yis// rab tu gzir zhing nyon mongs pas// gdung ba'i sems can rnams kyi phyir// nga'i sgrub mchog bshad par bya// byang chub sems dang ldan pas nyon// dper na mkha' la 'gro ba'i lus// de nyid kyis ni 'dul ba ltar// nyon mongs tshogs rnams de nyid kyis// rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs kyis 'dul// de bas blo ldan skyes bu yis// thog mar nga yis bsgrub pa'i gnas// nub tu kha bltas dben pa'i gnas// brag dmar cho zangs 'dra ba'i ni// rang gi rigs la gshis pa'i gnas// chags chen mdog dmar shes rab ldan// bsgrub pa'i grogs la bsngags pa yin// ting 'dzin yo byad phun tshogs pas// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// khams gsum pa yi ngo bo nyid// snang dang srid pa 'di dag kun// me dpung 'bar pa'i 'od bzhin bsgom// nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor dbus// srog rten snying po yi ge hrIH// spro dang bsdu bas brtan par bzhag/ yul dang de yi yul can kun// ma lus dmigs pa rab tu bya// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dngos// so so'i las kyi rab tu sbyang// nga dang mtshungs par gyur pa na// mi g.yo tshad kyis brtag par bya// de yis thog mar bsnyen pa yin// bsnyen pa yi ni ting nge 'dzin no// de nas nye bar bsnyen pa'i phyir// skad cig tsam mam yud tsam gyi// rang gi lus kyi nus pa gsum// dbang chen sku gsung thugs su blta// bar chad brtsams pa bzlog pa'i phyir// phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis// bsrung dang bzlog dang bskrad par bya// rngams pa'i 'khor tshogs mkha' la sprul// sgo dbye gsol zhing 'dud par bya// mnyes par bya ba'i yo byad bsten// tshul bzhin ma gyur tshangs par bya// byin gyis brlab pa nyid la gzung// dam bca' brtan po bdag gir gzungs// thugs kyi snying po spro zhing bsdu// las su rung pa tshad kyis blta// de nas chos kun ngo bo ni// yang dag pa la bdag med bsam// de yi mtshon par ma nus pa'i// yul rnams la ni rjes chags bya// nyid kyi dran pa'i rgyal po de// srog gcig 'bru la dmigs pa bsgril// cho ga yan lag 'phro 'du yis// mchod

bstod mnyes dang sbyang ba rdzogs// rang gi ngo bo nus dang ldan// hrI:s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ e yaM ra suM raM hri s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ stong zhing g.yo dang bskyod dang gzhi// gtsang sbra chen po lnga dag ni// dag pa'i dag byed ting nge 'dzin// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga// rang gi ngo bo las bskyed pa'i// byin gyis rlobs pa'i mchog yin no// b+h+ruM s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM// sra zhing mkhregs pa'i rgyu 'di las// mdzes shing 'jigs pa'i phyi dang nang// ji ltar bshad pa'i rgyan dang rtags// 'byung ba'i nus pa 'od ldan zhing// rol zhing 'bar ba rnam par bsam// gzhi rab tu bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dbang gi rgyal po nga yi lus// che ba'i che mchog rta mgrin can// dges pa'i yum dang mnyam sbyar nas// 'phags pa'i tshogs kun ma lus pa'i// mnyes pa'i mchod pa rab bstab ste// 'gro ba rnams kyi zhing dang rgyu// dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du sbyangs// slar nyid sa bon mngon du gyur/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+wam/ rA go\u0f85haM/ rA ga yA mi/ hrIHsarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ nga nyid dbang chen rdo rje ste// khams gsum ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// sras kyi tshul du mngon par gzung// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs su dgod// nga nyid pad+ma he ru ka/ mdog dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon thod pa// de dang rjes su chags pa'i yum// kha T+wAM thod pa 'dzin cing stob// phyogs nas gcod pa'i lce bzhi las// dbang po yi ni phyogs ngos su// rdo rje dbang chen he ru ka/ mthing nag gzhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rdo rje thod khrag bsnams// gshin rje gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu// rin chen dbang chen he ru ka/ ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rin chen thod khrag bsnams// klu dbang gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu// pad+ma dbang chen he ru ka/ dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po pad+ma thod khrag bsnams// gnod sbyin gyi ni phyogs de ru// phrin las dbang chen he ru ka/ ljang nag zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rgya gram thod khrag bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni sbrul zhags dang// kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'dzin par mdzad// tha ma dbang gi phur pa 'dril// dbang chen khro bo 'di dag kun// dbus ma'i zhal ni sku yi mdog/ g.yas zhal dkar la g.yon zhal ljang// rta mgrin ljang gus kun la mdzes// dur khrod dpa' ba'i chas kyis brgyan// zhabs gnyis brkyangs bskum phyogs dag gi/ dregs pa pho mo brdzis pa ste// 'di dag kun gyi rol pa'i yum// rigs kyi dbang phyug khro mo bzhi// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// so so'i yab la 'khril mdzad cing// zhal gcig phyag gnyis chags

pa'i tshul// sku yi kha dog yab dang mtshungs// cung zad dmar ba'i mdangs kyis mdzes// kha T+wAM thod pa phyag gis 'dzin// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kun// khro bo'i gar nyams dgu dang ldan// spyan gsum gzigs shing mche ba gtsigs// me dpung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs// rang gi phrin las nges par mdzad// A+oM ha ya g+h+rI wa badzra kro ta hUM/ A+oM ha ya g+h+rI wa rat+na kro d+ha hUM/ A+oM ha ya g+h+rI wa pad+ma kro d+ha hUM// A+oM ha yag+h+rI wa karma kro d+ha hUM/ b+h+yo e ka dza TI badzra kro d+hI hUM// b+h+yo e ka dza TI rat+na kro d+h+rI hUM/ b+h+yo e ka dza TI pad+ma kro d+hI hUM/ b+h+yo e ka dza TI karma kro d+hI hUM// hrIHhrIHhrIHhrIH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ hrIHs+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ rtsa ba'i dbang chen bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ hrIHhrIHhrIHhrIH/ hrIHhrIHhrIHhrIH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ hrIHs+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ nga nyid dbang chen rdo rje ste// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// 'jigs byed sprul pa rnam par 'phro// 'bar ba'i khyams la mdzes par dgod// khro bo chen po 'di rnams ni// mdog dmar zhal gsum phyag drug po// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// dbu gtsug rta mgo re re thon// 'jigs byed dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// khyad par zhi ba zil gnon ni// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen g.yas// pad+ma ral gri dril bu g.yon// sangs rgyas rigs lnga zhabs kyis gnon// mi pham khro mo yum dang sbyor// las kyi khro bo zil gnon ni// pad+ma dbyug to spu gri g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra s+t+wa rgya gram g.yon// las kyi khro bcu zhabs gyis gnon// lha mo khro gnyer ma dang sbyor// ye shes ma mo zil gnon ni// sdigs mdzub lcags kyu sprul zhags g.yas// lcags sgrog rnga dang kha T+wAM g.yon// gtso mo dbyings kyi yum drug gnon// ro langs ma dang gnyis med sbyor// ye shes khyung rnams zil gnon ni// rdo rje sa dang me khyung g.yas// nam mkha' chu rlung khyung ni g.yon// zhabs kyi rigs lnga'i khyung rnams brdzis// khro mo spyan gcig yum dang sbyor// pho rgyud zil gnon rta mgrin ni// rdo rje thod skam sbrul rgyu yang zhags g.yas// thod rlon thod phreng zhing dbyug g.yon// dregs pa'i lha brgyad zhabs kyis brdzis// rdo rje las byed ma dang sbyor// mo rgyud zil gnon rta mgrin ni// rdo rje ral gri g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na zhags pa sdigs mdzub ste// tha ma mda' bzhu 'gengs pa'o// ma bdun sring bzhi zhabs kyis gnon// gshin rje las byed ma dang sbyor// klu rnams zil gyis gnon pa ni// klu rigs drug gi sbrul zhags 'dzin// rigs bzhi'i klu ni khyo shug gnon// klu mo las byed ma dang sbyor// dregs pa'i gza' rnams zil gnon na// rdo rje zhags pa ral gri g.yas// dung khrag dbyig pa khyung chen g.yon// gza' chen brgyad ni

zhabs kyis gnon// gnod sbyin las byed ma dang sbyor// khro mo yum chen 'di rnams la// mdog dmar chags pa rgyas pa'i tshul// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud// kha T+wAM 'dzin cing thod khrag stob// yab yum bcas pa'i khro tshogs kun// shar nas brtsams te rim bzhin dbyung// A+oM pad+ma kro d+ha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+ha da ha da ha hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+ha pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+ha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+ha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+ha b+han+da b+han+da hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+ha b+hin+da b+hin+da phaT/ A+oM pad+ma kro d+ha hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ A+oM gu h+ya kro d+hI hUM/ A+oM dz+nyA na kro d+hI hUM/ A+oM rA ga kro d+hI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI hUM/ A+oM ya ma kro d+hI hUM/ A+oM na ga kro d+hI hUM/ A+oM yag mo kro d+hI hUM/ A+oM tsit+ta kro d+hI hUM/ dregs pa can gyi tshogs zil gyis gnon pa'o// khro bo dbyung ba'i ting 'dzin ni// nga ni dbang chen rdo rje ste// phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir// sprul pa pho nya las la khrid// tshad med sgo bzhir gdab par bya// dzaHhUM baM hoH// khro mo mdog dkar lcags kyu 'dzin// ser mo zhags pa 'dzin ma dang// dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom byed ma// ljang mo dril bu 'dzin ma ste// phrin las bzhi mdzad pho nya ma// rim par phyogs kyi sgo la dbab// A+oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ A+oM badzra pA sha hUM/ A+oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ A+oM badzra g+haN+De hoH// pho nya 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa nye ba'i lha rnams nges par dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// gzhan yang nga yis bshad kyis nyon// bdag gi dam tshig brtan gyur nas// gsal zhing mi g.yo tshad ldan na// gnyis med ye shes gzhug par bya// bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i dbyings// bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin// longs sku rdzogs sku kun gyi mchog/ thams cad nga yi tshogs kyis gang// dag pa'i mkha' la skar tshogs bzhin// dam tshig pa la rab tu dbab// dbye ba med pa'i chos nyid kyis// chu la chu bzhag bzhin du blta// de la 'dud cing mos pa dang// stob cing mnyes pa ma lus pa// chos nyid sgra las byung ba yi// rang las sprul pa'i lha rnams kyis// ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'grub// de nas khyad par bya ba'i las// gnyis med lus kyi srog gi dbus// chu skyes phyogs bzhi rab ldan pa'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi dbus// nga yi sems kyi ngo bo nyid// tshon gang dmar po zhi zhing khro// rang gi sku dang mtshungs gyur pa// nyin mtshan gsal nus 'od ldan pa// sran tsa na yi phyed cha'i steng// kun gyi gsung ste khyad par thugs// srog yig le brgan til 'bru'i tshad// gsal zhing 'od dang ldan pa la// yi ge phreng ba'i gzugs kyis 'dud// de ni tshogs pa'i tshad dang mnyam// rang gi lus dang

tshul gcig pa// kun nas re rer bzhugs par bya// rang gi ming gi sgra brjod pas// nam mkha'i khams kun gsal bar 'phro// dus gsum gyi ni 'phags pa mnyes// kun tu sbyor ba gsum rnams kyis// srid pa'i zhags pa ma lus gcad// thams cad kyang ni rang gi tshul// nyid las gzhan pa yod ma yin// de nyid brtan pa'i tshad kyis bltas// gal te lhag par bsgrub 'dod na// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs rnams kyis// brten pa'i gnas gsum pho brang du// gcod byed 'dam skyes rdo rje la// rgyu gsum rtsa ba rnam dag med// shel mdog bye ru baiDUr+ya// yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa yis// dngos po ming dang rtogs pa yid// ma lus nga yi ngang du sbyangs// khyad par du ni dbang gi rgyal// nga yi sngon gyi dam tshig ste// lus kyi steng phyogs mthar thug pa'i// rigs kyi bdag pos lus kun gnas// rta gdong zhal gyi dkyil 'khor bcas// rlung gis bskyod cing spros pa yis// gser gyi ba thags gzings pa dang// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang// me dbal tsha ba 'phro lta bus// rang dang pha rol phyi dang nang// kun tu spro ba'i las rnams kyis// sbyangs shing bsdu dang bsgral dang gso// mchod bstod bar dang bcol zhing bskul// gang dang gang la bsngags pa des// 'bad pa'i stobs kyis dmigs par bya// slar 'dus rang gi gzhi nyid la// thim pa'i tshul gyis byin brlabs nas// gnas pa'i ngo bo de nyid du// rdzogs dang rab tu rdzogs pa yis// don de nyid la bsam zhing blta// nga dang gnyis su med par 'gyur// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ nye bar byed pa'i las rdzogs par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung 'grol bar byed pa'i tshig ma lus pa yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas nyid kyi ming gi 'khor lo sgra tshig rab tu g.yo bar byed pa/ gsung gi ngo bo 'ub cing chub pa rang gi ngo bo las mi gzhan pa// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad nye bar sdud cing sbyong ba/ las thams cad thog pa med par bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// A+oM ni ye shes lnga nyid rtogs pa'o// pad+ma dngos po kun la ma chags pa'o// ta kr-ita khro bo'i gar dgu rdzogs pa'o// ha ya g+h+rI ba ni khams gsum dbang sdud rta mgrin no// ma hA kro ta che btsan 'dul ba'i khro bo chen po// e ka dza tI ral gcig ma dang gnyis su med cing dges pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o// sa ma ya dam tshig la dgongs pa'o// ru lu ru lu khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kun dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud pa'o// hUM

dregs pa'i tshogs rnams bod pa'o// b+h+yo de dag las la rbad pa'o// hUM dngos grub nye bar bsdu ba'o// A ra li dza thams cad mnyes par bsgrub pa'o// drag sngags gsang ba 'di nyid la// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin 'bad par bya// hrIHthams cad nga yi ngang du bsam// pad+man+ta kr-ita pad+ma rigs kyi khro chen tshogs// di ma dA ri thams cad 'dus pa'i gsungs yin no// ha ya g+h+rI ba ma lus dbang gi rgyal po'o// e ka dza tI sbas pa'i yum dang sbyor ba'o// ru lu rigs kyi sras dang bcas pa'o// ru lu sbrul pa'i zil gnon yab yum mo// hrIHdza dza ni dbang gi pho nya sgo ma'o// e ka dza b+h+yo lha rnams 'gugs shing rbad pa'o// dam tshig tshogs kyi bsgrub pas na// rbad pa'i lung bzhin brtson par bya// pa hrIHdregs pa'i tshogs bcas dbang du sdud// di ma dA ri kun la go bar byed pa'o// ha yag+h+rI ba rta mgrin dbang gi lhar gsal ba'o// e ka dza TI chags rab don gyis bskyod pa'o// hu lu hu lu khro tshogs sbrul pa 'gyed pa'o// hrIHdza dza pho nya las la rbad pa'o/ a/ ti yang phri sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ pha rol nus pa bzlog pa'o// phu dza nA ga rbad// klu gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'o// pha rol nus pa 'joms byed pa// bzlog pa'i dus su mngag par bya// dbang chen gsang ba lta rgyud kyi// srog snying thugs rgyud bskul ba ni// 'bar zhing gsal ba grangs las 'das// bsrungs shing bzlog dang gsad dang 'dul// gang la dmigs pa myur du 'grub// A+oM kA ya tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ bAk+ka tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ tsit+ta tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ gu Na tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ karma tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ sarba tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ kham rgya ma drug gi drag sngags so// oM shwa ri khA hi shwa ri khA hi hUM// rgyab sbrel rnams kyi drag sngags so// oM tIb+ta tsakra shwa na mu khA kha long kha hUM phaT/ oM ku ku rA dza rak+sha rak+ta tsa mun ti kha lang ka hUM phaT/ pho nya khyi spyang drag sngags so// hUM hUM phaT/ hrIHhUM phaT/ trAM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ mche gshog bzhi yi drag sngags so// A+oM dza na lang te tse te/ yak+Sha ku ru b+hany+dza hUM phaT// 'brug mo bzhi yi drag sngags so// oM badzra sha ra sing ha hUM// rat+na sha ra sing ha hUM/ pad+ma sha ra sing ha hUM/ karma sha ra sing ha hUM/ rtsal chen rnams kyi'o// nyon cig dbang gi 'khor tshogs rnams// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ yon tan dang ni phrin las dang// ma lus bsgrub par 'dod pa yis// shes par bya ba 'di dag yin// lus kyi mdun rgyab yab dang yum// g.yas dang g.yon ni dbang gi sras// snod dang don snying bcas pa ni// dbang chen rigs bzhi yab yum mo// yan lag nying lag thams cad kun// khro brgyad yum dang bcas pa ste// mthil bzhi sgo srung bzhi ru bsam// spu dang ba spu bka' nyan tshogs// bya ba'i chos dang byed pa'i yid// phyi dang nang gi shes pa yis// gzung ba'i yul

dang 'dzin pa'i sems// yul lnga nyon mongs rtogs pa dang// rnam shes brgyad dang de yi yul// dag pa'i 'byung ba bzhi nyid kyang// rim gyis shes par bya ba yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog ni// dbang chen nga la yod ma myong// snang ba snang min sku yi tshogs// grags dang grags min gsung gi bdag/ stong dang stong min thugs kyi ngang// yod dang yod min yon tan te// bsgrub dang bsgrub min phrin las so// 'di la the tshom byar mi rung// zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid can du gyur te// chos thams cad kyi dbyings ma lus pa la rab tu gzigs pa'i lta stangs chen po mdzad nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor// nga ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// dbang mdzad dbang gi lha yin no// nga yi dbang du gyur pa las// sangs rgyas nyid du ma lus mthong// 'di la blta bar bya ba med// ma bltas pa nyid blta ba yin// de bzhin mthong dang dran pa dang// blo dang rig pa yod min yang// kun rdzob tsam du rig par snang// phyi rol dngos po snang ba'i yul// ma 'gags dpyad cing btags yod tsam// 'di ni phyi yi dbang chen no// nang du 'dzin byed sems kyi dngos// ma skyes rang gi ngang gis stong// nang gi dbang chen yin zhes bshad// gnyis 'dzin rtog dpyod rlung lta bu// dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba// sbas pa yin te kun la snang// 'di la dbang thob gyur pa na// dbang gi rgyal po mngon du gyur// nga ni ma yengs mi rtog pas// gang yang bsgom par bya ba med// ma nor ma bcos kho na nyid// dmigs med tsam du snying rje'i ngang// rang la gnas pa bltar ma nus// 'khrul pa'i gzugs la blta ba yang// kun rdzob tsam du bsgom zhes bya// phung po nga rgyal brtan gyi bar// 'byung bzhi mthun pa'i phyogs tsam spyod// bla med gnas su ma stobs par// dus bzhi mnyam par lus kyi lam// bar chad gdug pa gdul gyi bar// ma rig mun pa thibs po 'joms// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// khams gsum srid gsum dbang du sdud// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// bla med byang chub gnas su 'god// dug lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// tshogs drug mngon par shes par drug/ yul brgyad yid chos 'byung ba bzhi// stobs dang mi 'jigs rig pa'o// khams dang skye mched bco brgyad po// ma 'dres bla med rdzogs pa'i chos// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// so sor rtogs pa

de yi 'khor// nga yis thob par bya ba ste// 'dod pa'i blo yis thob mi nus// ma thob pa nyid thob pa'o// 'di la som nyi ma za zhig/ ces gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lam gyi de kho na nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas pad+ma he ru ka la sogs pa yongs su dag pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ dpal dbang gi rgyal po la mgrin gcig tu snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa// hrIHrig dbang sku yi nga rgyal sgra sgrogs shing// srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba'i thugs// gar mkhan 'gyu 'dra thabs kyi rgyal por grags// gar dbang rta mchog pad+ma dbang gi rgyal// zhe sdang dpal 'bar khro bo'i hUM sgra can// che bas 'phags pa dbang phyug che ba'i dpal// 'bar gsal lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang chen gnyis med rnal 'byor zab mo'i sku// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med 'brel mdzad cing// 'gro don yid bzhin thugs las dbyung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du spel mdzad ma// dbang mchog gsang ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo// hrIHdbang gi rta gdong phrin las mgyogs pa'i mthu// ye shes myur mgyogs shes rab pha rol phyin// rtsal gyi rlabs kyis sa gsum cig char bgrod// 'tsher skad gdangs snyan gsang ba'i thugs dam bskul// rngams pa'i kha rtsal 'khor tshogs dbang du sdud// stabs drug 'gros kyis rgyud drug thabs kyis 'dren// rol pa'i rta bros bdud bzhi thal bar brlag/ 'jig rten sgrol mkhas mi bsnyel thabs kyis mchog/ rta skad rngams pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// hrIHdung chen rang bzhin rgyu ma'i khong gseng can// yul drug dbang po rtogs pa'i rgyan du che// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten nas// skal med 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i skye 'gro dang// zhe sdang shugs kyis myos pa'i srin po dang// gti mug ldongs pa'i dbang gyur gnod sbyin dang// nga rgyal dregs pas khengs pa'i bdud rig sogs// dbang bsdus drags po'i shugs kyis bsgral ba rnams// che ba'i rtags ldan thabs kyis rgyas mdzad phyir// gdug byed so so'i b+han+d+ha bcad nas kyang// lhun gyis brjid pa 'jigs byed rgyan du sprul// dur khrod gsang ba chen po rdzas kyi mchog/ dbang phyug gsang ba'i sku la rgyan du bklubs// thod rus me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// ral pa dmar po dbu gtsug me ltar 'bar// skye med chos sku'i yon tan tshang bar rdzogs// dbang chen thabs kyi rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pas// bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des 'khor rnams la nyid kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// dbang bsgyur ba thabs kyi phyag rgya de dag gi spyi gtsug tu myug par

mdzad de// hUM hrIHdbang chen rdo rje thog dang ser chen 'bebs// hrIHdang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hUM mdzad hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem// mtshon chen gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mthu rtsal gyis// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i dregs pa 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka ru// gdug pa 'dul zhing dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// srid gsum 'dul ba'i bdag tu dbang bskur ro// A+oM ha ya g+h+rI ba sarba bi nA ya ka a d+hiSh+Tha na a b+hi Shiny+tsa a A/ zhes dregs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa 'dul zhing tshar gcod par dbang bskur ro// 'jig rten las 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyi dbang gi rgyal por bzhag go/ de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi bdag po rnams kyis// dbang gi rgyal po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// A+oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na A+oM// hUM badzra satwa hUM// swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ hrIHpad+ma a mi de ba hrI/ hA karma prany+dza d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'jig rten gyi bdag po lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo// A+oM ma hA de ba u ma de ba lang phra ma ni rak+sha kaM ka pa ya hUM d+he ba ra tsa g+ha na hUM dza/ de nas gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// A+oM ya ma me da k+She rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra yats+tsha ni hrIHSh+t-IHbi kr-i tA nan/ ya ma snying la khrag baM ril rbad/ de nas klu'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// A+oM nag po ti ba tsa ya nA ga rA dza he phul la phe sha phos phos shig shig chum chum tu ya tir ya dza dza/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// A+oM yak+sha a ba ma ra b+ha ru da ri ma g+ha la b+ha ga sha ru tra ma ru tra hUM dza/ de nas bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo// bdud tri ru tra tsa pa snying khrag tir rbad dug mug hri ti ra to rbad/ de nas srin po'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM rag sha mu la sa mun dza ru tra hur b+h+yo rak+sha mu lo shig tri ta hu ra dza/ de nas 'jig rten gyi ma mo'i chogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// A+oM trag rak+sha snying kha rag ma tsit+ta ma srog tsa khrag la breng breng/ kha la dun ting mu la sod/ de nas gza'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// A+oM pa sha me ki ru ru ma ti dza la ti a tra biSh+ti sa tra rA hu hri ni dza/ de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// ma ma trag sha snying khrag la hubs badzra ma ni snying la thun rag mo myog rbad dza/ gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can ji snyed pa thams cad kyis kyang rang gi ming dang snying po phul te// thams cad kyis dbang gi

rgyal po nyid kyis bka' ji ltar stsal pa bzhin las sna tshogs bsgrub cing bsgo ba mtha' dag nyan par khas blangs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ ji ltar bsgrub pa phrin las kyi khyad par gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dbang gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i bdag nyid can du bzhugs te/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bor snang bar mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// nga yi sku yi ngo bo ni// rang rig byang chub sems las snang// rta mgos skad gsangs mthon po yis// bde gshegs gsung gi dngos grub sdud// yang dag don nges chos kyi sku// gzugs su snang ba mtshon pa'i rtags// dper na rta yi 'gros dgu yis// ji ltar smon pa'i sar 'gro bzhin// theg pa'i rim pa ngang gis bgrod// rtsol med rab tu rdzogs par snang// rta skad yon tan mang ba ltar// lam lnga dang ni sa bcu dag/ yongs rdzogs de nyid ngang las mnga'// dpe dang don gyi rtags rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyi// gsang sngags lam gyi bye brag shes// gdul bya'i thabs su snang ba yang// chos rnams dkyil 'khor lhun grub cing// snang srid ma lus bsgral ba'i rgyu// bka' sdod phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// sngon gyi tha tshig dbyings nas bskul// brda' sprad klong rdol dbang bsgyur te// ma lus 'dul ba nga yi thabs// ye nas ma bcos nga yi sku// thabs dang shes rab dbyings ye shes// don dam kun rdzob snang dang stong// gnyis med ngo bo'i don yin no// dbang gi rgyal por bsam sbyor bas// khros pa'i phyag rgya gsung gi sgra// 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen kun// dbang med skrag pa'i tshul bzung zhing// myur du phrin las gnas bzhin byed// dbyings nas gzugs snang thams cad kun// dbang bsgyur snang ba mnyes mdzad de// 'gal ba de nyid ngang du sbyangs// bsrung dang bzlog dang tshar gcad pa'i// rig pa'i rgyal po spu gri'o// A+oM thub thub myag myag mug mug/ shar shar da ha klag klag du haM du haM// rbad rbad dza dza hUM hUM// zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po yis// rab tu bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// nub tu phyogs pa dbang gi gnas// shis pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i drung// chags ldan rigs kyi khyad par gyis// yid dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsigs// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas byin brlab// phyi nang gsang ba mnyes pa'i rdzas// ci 'byor pa yis rgyas par dbul// sngags tshig bstod pas nye gyur

nas// dmigs pa'i ched dang sbyar ba ni// sgrub pa po nyid bsrung ba dang// pha rol gzhan gyi nus pa rnams// bzlog cing gzhig dang gtor ba dang// bsreg cing gnan dang 'phar ba dang// bskrad dang bcing dang dbab pa dang// gug cing mngag dang dbang du bya// A+oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badzra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya g+h+rI ba hu lu hu lu ma hA ka s+ya rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ A phris sarba ma ma ra tsa thun b+h+yo bzlog/ tro ma ri sha sha thun b+h+yo bzlog/ he ka sa ra ke dum phra ma ya thun b+h+yo bzlog/ rU tra srog ti rbad thum thum// tsa pa sha ling sa ma ya shig shig/ ma ma e ka dza ti phyung yaM rbad// ro du ro du rag mo tsit+ta la rbad rbad// nA ga hu ya nag po ti pa tsa ya// tsa re tsa dus du shag yaM/ nA ga rA dza sod sod/ byangs byings rmugs rmugs hal hal dun dun/ myos myos bying bying rbad rbad/ thum ril ril dza/ snying rbad ya khrag ro ma ro brag sha ya/ g+ho khrag dza tri chod sa la sod mu la sod a mu ka mA ra ya phaT/ hu lu hu lu dza dza nA ga badzra yag+sha kI li kI li ya mA ra ya phaT// a mu ka sarba sha truM mA ra ya rbad nr-i hur thum dza/ ma hA pa sha ha ki dz+wa la dz+wa la ram ram/ b+hi sha tsakra ha la ha la s+t+waM b+ha ya nan nan// d+ha ru nan d+ha ru nan// a mu ka ha li hi mu nyod sod// tri bu ta mA ra ya sod/ nr-i yag+sha rak+sha ka li ra tsa nA ga tri du mA ra ya sod// a ni lu phri du tri/ krang ka ri krang ka ri/ mi tsi mi tsi ra ra/ traM traM tri tri gam gam gum gum u pa ra tsa yaM d+ha she baM he/ nA ga rA tsa sru sru traM ri traM ri pra pri lam lam/ sarba a pa sma ra b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ ti li ti li/ ma ta ma ta/ pra b+han pra b+han/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ra da ra/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ hu lu hu lu/ ku ta ku ta/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tri ta tri ta ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad thun rbad thun/ kI li kI la ya thun rbad/ hu lu hu lu ka ma ha la myos myos thun rbad/ tik+Sh+Na tik+Sh+Na shag ti shag ti tshal tshal thun rbad rbad/ a mu ka ka ta ka ta thun rbad/ ma ra ma ra thun rbad/ ta ra ta ra thun rbad/ mo ta ma ta thun rbad/ phra mo ta phra mo ta thun rbad/ sarba pu ta ma ra ma ra thun rbad/ ya ra ya ra thun rbad/ ma ra tri sod sod/ rig pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i sngags// ji ltar bsngags pa'i rdzas dang bcas// zla gcig drug gi sbyor ba yis// gang la dmigs pa myur du 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yi ge'i phreng ba drag po'i snying po rnams brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi bdag nyid chen po des/ nyid kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la gsung gi sgra chen pos rab tu go bar mdzad de/ bka' stsal pa/ kye ma 'ongs pa'i dus phyi ma// snyigs ma'i dus rab tu snyigs mar gyur pa na/ rigs kyi bu gang dag nga dang nga'i bdag po

snang ba mtha' yas dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ pad+ma'i rigs 'chang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la dad pa dang 'dun pa dang mos pa dang gsol bar byed pa de dag la ni/ bdag cag rnams kyi tshe dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang/ grags pa dang longs spyod dang/ yon tan gyi tshogs dag myur du stsol bar byed do// gzhan yang nga'i sku dang/ gsung dang thugs kyi de kho na nyid yang dag par yongs su shes par 'dod pa'i yon tan dag la/ bde ba dang dga' ba dang spro bar longs spyod par nus pa dag gis ni/ nga dang dus gsum du phyogs bcu dag na 'tsho zhing zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs mnyes par byas shing gnyis su med par bsgrub pa yin te/ nga'i tshul 'di lta bu 'di la ni/ gang zag dbang po dman pa dang/ blo chung ba dang/ shes rab rtul ba dang/ yid mi gzhung ba dang/ blang ba dang dor bar spyod pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang/ log par blta ba can dang/ skal pa chung zhing myos pa rnams kyis gzung ba dang/ bcang ba dang/ bri ba dang/ bklag pa dang/ blta ba dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ bstan pa dang/ bshad pa dang/ mnyan pa la sogs pa'i rngo mi thogs shing dbang du mi 'gyur te/ rna lam du yang grags par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rig pa 'dzin pa rang bzhin grub pa dang/ sa la spyod pa dang/ tshe ring bar dbang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi thugs nye ba'i sras su gyur pa/ khyed rnams kyis yang dag par zung zhig longs shig chongs shig/ klog cig/ sgrubs shig gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ 'di ni nga'i bstan pa bla na med pa/ gong na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpe med pa/ zla med pa/ mchog tu gyur pa/ rab dang gtso bo dang/ phul dang dam par gyur pa ste/ rnyed par dka' zhing ngo mtshar ba 'di/ khyed rnams la rjes su gtad kyis/ nga'i bstan pa 'di yal bar ma dor cig 'di nyams par 'gyur ta re/ zhes gsungs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa rgya chen po de dag 'od zer gyi tshul du spro ba mdzad de/ yang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i klong du rab tu bsdus nas/ rol pa chen po'i 'od zer gyis khyab par mdzad de/ thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa mnyam pa nyid g.yo ba med pa la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yongs su bstan pa'i nye bar gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum

pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya//// rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta sarba karma sa mA dza kI la ya mU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las 'dus pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las thams cad gdon mi za bar yang dag par grub pa khro bo thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba mchog gi dbyings/ phrin las rgya chen po rnam par rol par mdzad pa'i dur khrod chen po rab tu bskyod cing 'khrugs par byed pa'i rlung ljang nag 'bar ba/ phrag dog gi ye shes las grub par byed pa'i pho brang chen po na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las rdo rje sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ 'jig rten gsum rab tu sgrol bar mdzad pa de/ dbyings kyi yum chen mo 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma dang gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen pos mnyam zhing dges par bzhugs pa la// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i drag po'i phrin las yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sras kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ bud+d+ha kI la ya dang/ rat+na kI la ya dang/ pad+ma kI la ya dang/ karma kI la ya dang/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi rgyal po hUM kA ra dang/ rnam par rgyal ba dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/ gshin rje gshed po dang/ g.yo ba med po dang/ rta mgrin can dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang/ khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang/ stobs chen por gyur pa dang/ gzhan yang rol pa'i yum chen mo sgra 'byin ma dang/ snyems ma dang/ sder mo dang/ dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang/ gtun khung ma dang/ gtum mo chen mo dang/ mda' snyems ma dang/ rlung 'byin ma dang/ gsod byed ma dang/ spyod par byed ma dang/ de dag thams cad kyang sprul pa dang/ sprul pa'i yang sprul pa dang/ sprul pa'i pho nya dang/ pho nya'i pho nya dag dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar cing bskor te/ gzhan yang byis pa so so skye bo dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu dang/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i bar du bgrod cing sbyangs pa la smon pas dka' ba spyod par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nye ba'i thugs mi thub cing 'dul ba'i skal ba dang mi ldan

zhing/ longs spyod thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa'i sku khro ba dang/ rab tu khro ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang rab tu 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa khro bo chen po drag shul can du snang bar mdzad kyang/ thugs rab tu zhi ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i thugs gsang ba chen po las byung ba'i khro bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis nyid kyi sku'i yon tan dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dang bcas pa la rab tu spro zhing ngo mtshar ba'i sgo nas/ dga' ba chen po yang dag par 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig gis mngon par bstod pa/ e ma ho// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// rlung nag rdo rje rgya gram gtams pa'i steng/ khrag gi rgya mtsho rba klong 'khrugs pa'i dkyil// keng rus chen po brtsegs pa'i ri rab steng// gser gyi sa gzhi zhing chen ti ras gtams// me ri smug nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i klong// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs gzhal yas khang// rin chen 'bar ba thod pa gsum gyis brtsigs// lha klu nyi zla gza' skar sbrul gyis brgyan// ye shes tshad med gru chad sgo bzhi rdzogs// phyi nang me dpung rin chen 'od dang ldan// dregs pa'i bdag dang nyi zla pad+ma'i dbus/ med pa'i rgyu las yod par mngon byung ba// bde gshegs dpal chen phrin las rdzogs pa'i sku/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum stabs// g.yas kyi zhal gdong dkar bar bstan pa ni// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku mthar phyin cing// g.yon zhal dmar nag sprul sku'i 'gro don mdzad// yongs rdzogs sku dang dbus zhal mthing nag ni// skye med chos kyi sku la 'gyur ba med// ral pa gyen brdzes dbang drag dus gcig rdzogs// ye shes lnga bdag rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// spyan dgus sa dgu mi dmigs dbyings la gzigs// snyan drug rgyud drug nyon mongs 'khor bar 'dren// shangs nas stong gsum sgrol ba'i rlung nag 'byin// zhal gsum nyon mongs dug gsum dbyings su sgrol// rdo rje'i mche bas bdud bzhi rtsad nas gcod// le brgan ljags 'dril shes rab mthar phyin gsal// gsung gi nga ros 'jig rten mthu chen dang// phyag drug phyag mtshan rang rtags yon tan ni// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i yon tan rdzogs// rtse lngas rgyud lnga rtsad bcad rigs lngar sbyor// me dpung 'bar bas nyon mongs dug lnga bsreg/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// rdo rje'i phur pa srid gsum dbyings su 'debs// zhabs bzhi tshad med rnam bzhi'i phrin las mdzad/ dpa' bo'i na bza' rgyan gyi che ba ni// glang chen ko rlon theg mchog stobs bcus bgrod// stag

gi sham thabs phrin las sna tshogs mdzad// zhing chen g.yang gzhis thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul/ sbrul gyi chun pos dpa' chen gdug pa 'dul// thod pa'i phreng ba sku gsum ngang la gnas// don dam bcud ldan gzi brjid sa la dgod// rak+ta'i thig le chags med pad+ma'i spyan// thal chen mtshan mas sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs// rdo rje'i gshog pas ma lus zil gyis gnon// rin chen gshog pas dgos 'dod re ba bskang// ye shes me dpung rnam rtog bag chags bsreg/ gnyis med yum chen don dam dbyings su sbyor// yon tan mtha' yas kun gyis rab brgyan pa'i// phrin las rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings skye med ngang las ma g.yos kyang// sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston mdzad pa// thugs rje'i thabs kyis gdug pa 'dul slad du// drag shul spyod pa'i phrin las kun gyi bdag/ don dam byang chub sems las 'gyur med kyang// ting 'dzin longs spyod thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad// byin rlabs phyag rgya'i 'od zer 'phro 'du'i klong// rang bzhin spros bral nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pas slar yang rol pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs shing snang bar gyur to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang 'khor chen po de rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// phrin las khyod mdzad ci yi phyir// rdo rje zhes ni ci phyir brjod// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// gzhon nur grags pa ci zhig lags// dngos por snang ba'i chos nyid la// khyad par phur pa ci'i phyir 'dzin// thugs rje zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// khro zhing 'jigs par ston mdzad cing// drag po'i rgyan bcas mdzad pa gang// gzhan yang khyod kyi sku gsung thugs// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba// rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul la// bdag cag the tshom skyes gyur te// ji ltar ji ltar mdzad pa yi// don de bdag la nges ston cig/ ces gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las mdzad par bya ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi ngo bor bzhengs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad sngon du 'gro bar mdzad nas// nyid kyi gsung gi gsang ba chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi las bsgrub par nus pa'i yang dag pa'i snying po 'di sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba pa las phyung ngo// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// 'di phyung ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad

g.yo bar gyur te// gang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje zhi ba chen pos 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i dregs pa can rnams kyang rab tu 'bar zhing sngangs skrag ste brgyal zhing sa la lhung nas shi ba'i dus la ma bab tsam du gyur pa la/ yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis de dag gi lus khyab par bkye nas/ thams cad kyang lus dang ngag dang yid bde ba dpag tu med pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing/ dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams zhi ba dang dul ba'i sems kyis gnas nas gsung rjes su bsgrub pa'i bran bzhin las byed par khas blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba'i// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir gsal bas// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje yis// 'dus byas rdzas las ma byung zhing// dus gsum kun tu 'dus ma byas// spros pa'i mtshan ma kun dang bral// gdod nas ma byung skye ba med// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i ngang// de ni sra mkhregs rtsal shugs ldan// cis kyang mi shigs rdo rje'o// dper na pha lam rnon po bzhin// sus kyang gzhom par mi nus shing// stong nyid snying por ldan pa yis// go cha mchog gi rdo rje'o// dus gsum bzhugs pa ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// nga nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ myur du sprul pas gzhon nu ste// nga la bgres rgud yongs mi mnga'// skad cig nyid las byung ba'o// oM shrI badzra ku mA ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// thabs kyi shes rab yum dang sbyor// byang chub sems rgyun ye shes che// A+oM tIb+ta tsakra ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// gnyis med ye shes 'od zer gyi// 'phro 'du+u gsal ba'i byin rlabs las// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje 'grub par mdzod// srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo 'grub par mdzod// oM bud+d+ha kI la ya hUM phaT// oM rat+na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM karma kI la ya huM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI dI pa ya ti hUM/ oM badzra sU ka ra mu kha hUM/ oM badzra i khu ba mu khI hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro ta bi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI lA se ki hUM/ oM badzra byA g+h+ra mu kha hUM/ oM badzra gr-id+d+h+ra mu khI hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro ta nI la daN+Da hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI ta na pa ti hUM/ oM badzra tsa ma ra mu kha hUM/ oM badzra dro Na mu khI hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM kro ta ya mAn+ta ka

hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI sh+ma shA' na pat+nI hUM/ oM badzra ha ri Na mu kha hUM/ oM badzra u lU ka mu khI hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI mu sa lI hUM/ oM badzra byA g+h+rI mu kha hUM/ oM badzra bA ya sa mu khI hUM/ b+han+da b+han+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI tsaN+Da lI hUM/ oM badzra pi DA la mu kha hUM/ oM badzra pak+Sha ti mu khI hUM/ oM badzra pa tsa la mu kha hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro ta a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI sa bya ti hUM/ oM badzra shwa na mu kha hUM/ oM badzra pa tri mu khI hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI sa mI ra NA hUM/ oM badzra sid+ha mu kha hUM/ oM badzra kro ti tI la mu khI hUM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI mA ra Na hUM/ oM badzra tak+Shu mu kha hUM/ oM badzra na ku la mu khI hUM/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro ta ma hA ba la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI tsun+dA hUM/ oM badzra r-ik+Sha mu kha hUM/ oM badzra mu Shi mu khI hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Shi Ni hUM/ ang+ku sha dzaH/ oM badzra b+hai ra ba hUM/ pA sha hUM/ oM badzra a mr-i ta hUM/ s+pho Ta baM/ oM badzra ma ra Na hUM/ g+haN+De hoH/ hri s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ 'di ni srid pa'i tshul du byung// yab yum byang chub sems las bskyed// yi ge 'phro 'du'i rkyen las gyur// rang las byung ste dbyings su 'debs// srid pa'i phur pa zhes su bshad// snang zhing gsal ba'i chos rnams kun// ma lus 'di yis legs par btab// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// 'ub chub 'dus pas phur pa ste// kun rdzob rtags su nga yis bzung// yon tan tshogs chen las byung zhing// ma lus phrin las rdzogs mdzad phyir// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas zhing// kun gyi mdzad pa rdzogs spyod cing// sems can khams kun yongs sgrol ba'i/ 'jigs byed khro bcu byung ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa gnon par mdzad// phyag drug dang po gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje dang ni thod khrag 'dzin// tha ma phur pa 'dril zhing sdom// hUM chen sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs// rnam rgyal 'khor lo tri shul dkar/ dbyug sngon me dpal dbyug to 'phyar// gshin rje gshed ni mthing ga ste// thod dbyug dang ni dgra s+t+wa 'dzin// mi g.yo ljang sngon ral gri zhags// rta mgrin zhags pa spu gri dmar// 'dod rgyal dmar skya b+han+d+ha rnga yab// bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram dril// khams rgyal sbrul zhags rdo rje mthing// stobs chen dud kha tho ba zhags// yum rnams yab kyi mdog ldan zhing// sgra 'byin ma ni g.yas be con// snyems ma ral gyi 'dzin par mdzad// rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu'o// dur khrod bdag mo thod dbyug 'dzin// gtun khung ma ni tho ba'o// rdo rje gtum mo spu gri 'dzin// rdo rje mda' snyems tho ba can// rlung 'byin ma ni dgra

s+t+wa'o// rdo rje gsod byed ma gri gug/ skul byed rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// phyag g.yon rnams ni thod khrag stob// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kyis// srid pa'i phur pa spros pa las// rang gi sku mdog dang mthun pa'i// zhal gcig phyag gnyis lcam dral tshul// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs gnas shing// yab yum phyag mtshan so sor 'dzin// g.yon gyis mtshon byed phur pa 'dzin// sngon gyi 'dul gzhi las byung ba'i// so so'i gdong gi khyad par ni// stag dang bya rgod bya rog g.yag/ sha ba 'ug pa gzig dang khwa// byi la pu shud spyang ki khra// seng ge pha wang sre mo dom// phag dang smig bu byi ba dred// rim bzhin du ni rang gnas blta// phyogs bzhir pu shud skya ka dang/ srin bya khra yi mgo can rnams// kha dog dkar ser dmar dang ljang// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// rim bzhin g.yas bsnams g.yon phur bu// nye ba'i sras mchog phur bu ni// bde gshegs rin chen pad+ma las// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba'i zhal// khyad par bud+d+ha kI la ya// zhal gsum mthing dmar dbus dkar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje rgyu zhags g.yas// g.yon na dgra s+t+wa ral gri'o// sras mchog rat+na kI la ya// zhal gsum dkar dmar dbus ser zhal// g.yas na beng dang ral gri'o// g.yon na dgra s+t+wa be con 'dzin// dbang gi kI la ya zhes pa// zhal gsum dkar ser dbus dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po ral gri mdung// bar pa gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs// phrin las mdzad pa'i sras mchog ni// zhal gsum dkar dmar ljang gu ste// g.yas na mdung dang lcags kyu ste// g.yon gyi gri gug ral gri'o// tha ma'i phyag gnyis thams cad kyi// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po yi// ri rab phur pa rim bzhin 'dzin// 'di dag ma lus thams cad kun// dpa' brjid dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// phyi rol dngos po'i chos rnams kun// gzugs su snang dang sgra ru grag/ dran dang bsam dang rtog dpyod tshogs// 'di dag rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// 'di dag nyid kyang de dag ste// chos nyid khyab pa'i phur pa'o// de nyid thabs kyi shes 'gyur zhing// shes rab nyid kyang de yi thabs// don dam gnyis med phur pa
