ste// kun gyi dam pa 'di zung zhig/ rtog pa'i 'ching bas 'ching byed cing// grol ba yang ni de nyid do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang chen 'di// rtogs pa dang ni shes bya'i yul// khyod kyis the tshom ma bskyed cig/ ces gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa phrin las rtsa ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// dam pa'i dgongs pa 'di bshad do// ngo bo rig pa byang chub

sems// kun gyi sa la ma lus 'debs// chos nyid ye shes gnyis su med// chos can kun la gdab par bya// de nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid du'o// ma lus mkhyen pa de yis ni// dngos po chos can de bzhin no// rnam rtog tshogs la chos skus gdab// yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa'i lha// kun rdzob snod bcud snang la gdab// thugs rje chen po thabs kyi mchog/ ma lus sems can khams la'o// mtshon byed rdzas kyi gnod pa 'joms// ji snyed btags pa'i ming tsam mo// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// spros med gsal la phyogs dang bral// chos dbyings rig pa'i ye shes te// skye 'gag med pa'i klong du'o// snang zhing srid pa de yi yul// gnyis med sems su rtogs pa thabs// de las de nyid 'char zhing stong// mthong yod sems las ma 'das par// de nyid kyi ni yon tan yin// dkar dmar snang ba byang chub sems// mnyam nyid yum gyi mkha' la btab// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// skye 'gro rigs kyi sras su grub// mngon gyur longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'gyur med gsal ba 'bras bu yin// snying rjes sems can blos mi 'dor// ma dag sdug bsngal sbyang phyir gdab// rgyud drug yul te tshad med bzhi// dag pa'i go 'phang snang bar byed// 'khor ba'i gnas ngan spar ba yin// de nyid rtogs pa sprul pa'i sku// 'og min bde chen lhun grub gnas// rgyud dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa// de yi bdag po de 'dir gnas// bsgom bya rnam par rtog pa'i lha// snang zhing nges pa sprul pa'i tshogs// zhi rgyas dbang drag bye brag gis// rang gi dmigs pa'i yul la'o// sngags rdzas ting 'dzin de yis grogs// yon tan rtags dang 'bras bur bcas// mthar phyin de yi byed pa'o// rigs bzhi sras kyi mchog gyur pas// dmigs pa'i rU tra sems kyi rten// gnas gsum rtsol bas de bsgral tshugs// gang 'dod las la sbyar bar nus// byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags 'byung nyid// phyogs dbus rigs lnga ye shes lnga// tshad med bzhi dang rnam thar brgyad// rigs lnga stobs bcu mi 'jigs rig pa bzhi/ zhes pa'ang 'dug khro bcu sgo ba bzhi// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sku gsung thugs// sprul par bcas te rdzogs pa'o// 'di nyid rten dang brten pa dang// phyag mtshan pho nyer shes par bya// shes rab blo che dbang po rno// 'dod chags lam nus brtson 'grus che// dad ldan snying rje gzhan don spro// blos bcas zhe gdug gnag par ldan// 'di dag don byed nus pa'i rgyu// rdzas bzhi so so'i nus mthu bsgrub// chu shel bdud rtsi me long dang// nyung dkar dmigs pa'i rdzas yin te// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor thig le dang// ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs brnyan te// de

nyid dang bsnyen bsgrub gsang ba yis// lha dang sprul pa pho dang mo// lha ni gcig lnga brgya rtsa brgyad// sprul pa phyi nang gsang ba yis// sku yi phyag rgya gsung yig 'bru// gru gsum rgya mdud e khram bcas// 'chol dang 'dus dang bsad pa dang// bang rim gsum pas mtha' bsdus te// 'dus byas rdzas su snang ba yin// 'di dag nga yi tshul shes pas// ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang// ji ltar gnas pa'i mthar thug don// de 'dir rig pa bya ba yin// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thugs rnam par dag pa'i dgongs pa rab tu bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rim par bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// shin tu gtum zhing gtum pa'i gnas// byang gi phyogs su gzhol ba der// mthun pa'i rdzas dang yo byad bstar// bla ma mnyes byas grogs kyi mchog/ gang la dmigs pa de ldan zhing// re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs te// brtul phod drag pos 'jug par bya// phyi nang bsrung ba 'bad pas brtsam// rnal 'byor cho ga yongs rdzogs nas// nam mkha' sbyangs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// oM ma hA shu+u dz+nyA ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ chos rnams de nyid yin mod kyang// sdug bsngal spyod la thugs rje bskyed// oM ma hA d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ 'dus sbyangs rtags kyi gnyen po ste// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// 'bar bas mi rtog yi ge hUM// rtog pa bskal pa gsum gyis sbyangs// ye shes 'byung ba yum gyi mkha'// rnam dag dbyings las shar ba'i b+h+rUM// phrin las yongs gyur gzhal med khang// rang lus rdzogs pa 'di nyid de// mtshon chen rdo rje hUM sngon po// lus kyi sgo bcur shar ba dang// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// snying ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhi ru// rigs kyi sras bzhi bsam pa'o// spyi gtsug hUM mdzad yab yum ste// dpral bar rnam par rgyal ba'o// mgrin par rta yi mgrin can dang// snying gar bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgom// lte bar gshin rje gshed po ste// gsang ba'i gnas su stobs po che// dpung pa g.yas su dbyug sngon can// g.yon du khams gsum rnam rgyal lo// rkang pa g.yas la mi g.yo ba// g.yon la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// yan lag mthil bzhi sgo ma bzhi// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyang// hUM sngon 'bar ba rdo rjer bsgom// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// steng 'og gnas gsum sku gsung thugs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hUM ldan pa'i// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// spyi gtsug ye shes rgyun sbyar bas// dri ma

bsal bar rigs chen lnga// snyoms mdzad byang chub sems kyi rgyun// mgrin par babs pas dngos por 'dzin// bsal ba'i 'bras bu snang mtha' yas// ye shes 'khor lo lha mor gyur// bdag la thim pas bde bar gyur// shes rab ye shes gsal ba'i dbang// gnyis med thim pas dbang bzhi rdzogs// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// ma lus mdzad pas kun drangs te// rgyal ba'i sras su bya ba las// gsad cing gnan par ma yin te// 'phro 'du las la kun sbyor bas// 'di ni bsnyen pa'i mchog yin no// gsol btab dbang bskur rab rdzogs nas// mkha' dbyings gsang gnas byin brlabs shing// mnyes mdzad bskul pa'i 'od phung las// 'phro 'du las kyi gsal bar shar// hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUMM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo/ ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// srid pa'i phur pa mngal skyes tshul// rang gi ming gi 'od kyi dbyings// slar 'dus so so'i gdan yin te// brgya byin me lha gshin rje dang// srin po klu dang rlung gi lha// gnod sbyin dbang ldan sa bdag dang// tshangs pa nyi zla 'di rnams kun// rang gi ming nas byung ba'i steng// 'khor bcas rdzogs pa'i lus su blta// bdag nyid gsal ba dam tshig gi/ snying ga'i 'od 'bar hUM sngon las// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang// mthun pa'i gzugs la rab tu dbab// oM badzra ku mA ra kI li kI la ya g+ha na tsakra e A ra li hUM hUM hriM hriM/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// srid gsum gdug pa bsgral ba dang// nga rgyal bdud rnams gzhom pa yi// dpa' bo rdo rje 'khor bcas la// rtse gcig yid dang lus kyis 'dud// thun mong dang ni khyad par gyis// khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa yis// mnyes mdzad byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM AHhUM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ badzra puSh+pe hUM/ badzra A lo ke hUM/ badzra gan+d+he hUM// badzra ni wi te hUM// oM badzra lA s+ya hUM// oM badzra mA le trAM/ oM badzra gI tI hrI/ oM badzra nir ti a/ oM AHhUM badzra mUM d+hA tI shwa rI/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti// maM mo ha ra ti/ pU dza g+ha na tsakra sa ma ye hUM/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA ba liM ta i daM gr-i h+Na sa ma ya kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA mAM sa go ro tsa na ba su ta tsit+ta rak+ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM ma hA dza gad ma ma gar ti sarba kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta ga ta ru ru ti kha kha khA hi khA hi/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan sbyin ma yi// btab cing gsal ba nyid du bya// khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa'o// sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// rtag dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// sku gsung thugs

kyi byin rlabs kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlabs mdzad cing// bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// 'grub par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// bskyil zhing rgyan yang bskyil ba la// sems kyi chos la sku mi mnga'// sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes so// srid gsum 'joms mdzad mnyam nyid ngang// khro bo rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad// khro bo 'gro don mdzad phyag 'tshal// dgug cing bsdam dbab phyag rgya yis// nam mkha'i khams dang gnyis med sbyor// de nyid bdud rtsi btung ba'i mchod// sngags la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor des// bdag gzhan don gyi bzlas pa brtsam/ sngags 'od yum gyi zhal sgor zhugs// sdig bral dbu ma'i nang brgyud de// dbyings nas gsang ba'i lam la thim// de nyid dbyings nas hUM las bskul// lu gu brgyud kyis brjod par bya// rten 'brel lugs las bzlog pa'o// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i bzlas pa ni// gtso chen yab yum thugs bskul bas// chos sku spyan drangs zhal du thim// dbu ma'i nang brgyud pad+mar babs// 'phro 'dus sras mchog 'dus kun rdzogs// kI la ya yis nges phyung ste// gtso dang mthun pa'i sku mdog la// sku smad zur gsum sku gsung thugs// rgyan ldan 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// ye shes khro bo de 'dra dbab// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyis// mnyes pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin bya// 'bru nag dug khrag bdud rtsi yis// dbang byin brlabs te las la mngag/ snying dbus sa bon las sngags spro// tshul 'dra'i gzugs la nges par bstim// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// ldeg 'bar 'od dang sgra 'byin dang// bzang po ma mthong bar du'o// skyo dub thun mtshams bya ba'i dus// 'di ni sgrub pa bla med pa'o// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa bstan pa rtsa ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan khro rgyal gyis// nyid kyi sku yi dpa' bo'i chas// yon tan khyad par 'di bshad do// glang chen ko rlon theg chen stobs// dpa' gtum za byed stag gi rgyan// mnyen lcug 'khril yum sbrul gyis brgyan// byang chub sems ldan tsarma ste// thod phreng gsum ni sku gsung thugs// thugs rje chags pa rak+ta'i rgyan// gdul bya'i phrin las thal chen po// zhag gi ri mo don dam bcud// rgyu yis mtshon nas don drug ldan// glang chen rgyas stobs ches rgyab yang// lus rags rin thang che 'gyur zhing// khrom btags gzhan gyi dpung 'joms nus// theg chen 'dir ni lam kun shongs// dge dang mi dge mnyam par 'degs/ mtshams med las sogs byas pa'ang shongs// nyon mongs 'dod yon ma spangs 'grub// lam 'di yon tan dpag tu med// ma rig zag pa myur du

'joms// stag lpags mdzes shing dpal 'bar 'dzin// rtsal ldan sha rus mi 'byed za// ri dwags chen po'i gnyen por 'gyur// gcan gzan phra mo zil gyis gnon// dug lnga rigs lnga shes pas dpa'// nyon mongs ye shes grub pas mdzes// thugs rjes dbye bsring yongs mi mdzad// bag chags stug po dus gcig 'joms// dregs pa rU tra'i gnyen por 'gyur// dman pa'i spyod pa zil gyis gnon// sbrul 'jigs brjid pa gdug pa che// mnyen zhing lcug la dri ma 'byar// kha dog gsal zhing du mar snang// spyod pa 'di nyid sngangs shing 'jigs// nyid la brjid cing gzhan la gdug/ rang gzhan don la 'dud cing mnyen// 'bras bu'i khyad par gsal zhing mthong// bskyed rdzogs che dang lam 'bras bu// gang zag blo la sna tshogs ston// dug gsum lam gyis log lta 'dul// thugs rje zin pa dman mi gtogs// zhing lpags mthong 'jigs tshil khrag chu ser ba sbur bcas// grang mnyen rlung skyob yan lag tshang// 'di ni zab pa'i spyod blangs pas// ngan pa'i blta ba 'jigs pa bskyed// dman la mos pa'i yid skrag 'gyur// gnas dang 'pho dang zhi ba dang// khro brtan spyugs bskrad bsdus dang gtor// rgyas zhum 'pham rgyal dbang du bya// rdo rje'i theg mchog 'di la gnas// bstan pa dang ni nges pa dang// sgra tsam sgra min dgongs pa dang// thol byung dang ni yi ge dang// spyi dang gab sbas brda dang thabs// bla ma mnyes la drang zhing mnyen// las kyi rlung dang g.yul ngo bzlog/ gzhi lam 'bras bu lta spyod dang// dam tshig byin rlob yan lag tshang// skam rlon ra ri dbang po tshang// rigs ldan pa dang zlum pa dang// spros pa nyer zhi chos kyi sku// dus gsum dgongs pa tshang zhing gtsang// longs spyod rdzogs sku rol pa skra// dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnang// khyim na spyod pa'i cha lugs 'dzin// gzhan don sprul pa drug la sogs// sku gdung ring bsrel lhag mar bcas// rigs dang pha ma gnyen 'dun dang// 'khor dang bstan pa gnas pa'i tshad// phyir mi ldog dang skye ba gcig/ thogs pa tsam dang srid mtha' ma// mngon por byang chub gsal bar ldan// sems dpa' che ba'i lam thob nas// yongs rdzogs srid kyi pho brang rags// mi rtog pa la rnam mi dmigs// mtshan ma'i spros las dben pa yis// thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel zhing// skabs don rdo rje theg par gsal// rak+ta rlan gdong dmar nag ldan// ser 'dres bgos sla bsgyur bar nus// mi dmigs thugs rje chags shing brlan// chos dbyings ye shes kun las gdong// nye bar dgongs shing ngang la gnas// che ba'i yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan// ye shes phra rags skad cig mkhyen// tha dad snang

zhing gzhan bsgyur bas// gdul bya'i rigs la 'tshams pa'i rkyen// lhag par rtags kyi don ldan pa'i// dkar zhing gsal mnyen zhi bsgo myur// phyir bsal sla tsha phyir gsal sla ba phrin las don// thog ma'i mun pa ma lus sel// ye shes snang ba'i tshogs kun bskyed// drag pos las sogs myur du 'dul// khams dang bag la nyal ba dang// ji ltar 'tshams pa de bzhin ston// nges 'byung skal ba yod pa yis// rnam grol go 'phang myur 'thob byed// bag chags cung zad mi gnas par// 'byin pa'i don de nye bar gnas// bcud mchog snum zhun rog pa mnyen// 'gyu ba'i nad sel bsal mi nus// dri dang kha dog rab gsal bzhin// rdo rje thog mchog gya nom pa// rig pa can gyi gnyen por 'gyur// nyon mongs lnga dang drug nyid kyis// yan lag nad du gyur pa sel// grangs med dbar du chud mi za// blo ngan shes rab chung ba yis// 'di la nges 'byung skal med de// dus la bab na sar gnas byed// 'di dag rdzogs phyir rab tu brgyan// gzhan yang nga yi bstan pa 'dis// rdo rje'i theg pa cher ldan zhing// khong du chud pa'i mthu mnga' bas// glang chen ko rlon rab tu bgos// rgol ba mthun par tshar gcod phyir// stag gi sham du dkris pa'o// lto 'phye'i dug 'joms sbrul gyis brgyan// sems gnyis mi 'gyur tsarma'o// sku gsum ngang gi thod phreng brgyus// zhi ba'i snying rjes mi gnas chags// gzhan don gzigs pa rak+ta'o// dge ba 'phel byed thal chen te// kun gyi sems rtogs bcud kyis brgyan// gzhan yang gti mug 'dod chags dang// zhe sdang 'jig tshogs phrag dog dang// ser sna nga rgyal ma brtags spyod// dbang byed rim bzhin rtags kyis brgyan// kha cig tu+u na sngon bzhin du// phrin las chen po mdzad pa'i dus// dregs pa rU tra de 'khor bcas// byi na ya ga glang chen gzugs// mkha' 'gro chen mo stag mgo can// mtha' yas klu dang lha chen po// bsgral ba'i pags pa thod phreng dang// khrag zhag dang ni thal bas brgyan// thun mong khyad par phyi dang nang// rtags kyi don mtshon tsam nyid de// don dam nges pa yul dang dngos// de la bya dang byed pa med// gtum zhing khro bas 'dul ba la// rang gi snang ba sangs rgyas mthu// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dur khrod chen po'i chas rgyan gyi rtags dang yon tan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// mngon spyod las kyi rim pa las// mchod sbyin drag po 'di gsungs so// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi drung// gru gsum khru gang rgya dang dpangs// mu ran sor gsum slar bstod de// khru gang e yi dbus nyid du// gcod pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// ming dang mtshan ma

dbyings su dgod// phyi rol sras mchog phyag mtshan no// gri sa tshangs sgo can dag gi/ ro bsreg thal ba sa nag dang// rnga bong bong bu'i bdud rtsi byugs// 'bru nag me tog nag po dgram// tsha zhing rtsub la rno ba'i shing// e yi dbyibs su brtseg par bya// dug shing gis ni phyogs mtshams bskor// 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan bla re dang// ba dan zhal khebs nag pos brgyan// sor bcu rtsa gnyis rno dbal ldan// dug khrag 'bru mar nag por bcas// khre 'bru khrag dang lan tshwa dang// skye tshe nim pa ro thal dang// nyung nag dug dang me tog nag/ sngon po gyo mo rdo phye dang// rtsub pa'i sha khrag sna tshogs dang// bong bu rnga bong bya rog gi/ bdud rtsi sha khrag spu dang sgro/ tsher ma rus phye bshang gci dang// grog mkhar sa dang spru ma dang// dmigs pa'i bdud rtsi la sogs bstar// dus ni nag po'i phyogs dag gi/ phyi dro srod dang gung gnyis la'o// nga rgyal 'chang ba bdag nyid ni// khrag dang dug gsher gos nag bgo/ rkang pa g.yon gyis g.yas mnan cing// byang gi phyogs su khros stabs blta// ba glang chu dang bdud rtsi sbyar// bdud rtsi rgyal po yum dang bcas// rang gi sngags bzlas las kyi chu// g.yas kyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// rdzas gzhan rnams ni g.yon phyogs su'o// stong pa nyid la bsam pa'i dngos// a yis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyung// steng du sgra yig dang po las// rdo rje rtse dgu 'od 'bar ba// sa bon rgyu yis mtshan par bsgom// las kyi sgra brjod 'phro 'du yis// gtso chen rdo rje 'chang ba de// sbar bshad rtags dang ldan par bya// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu mnan cing// rang gi sems dpa' snying la gnas// gsang ba'i gnas byung b+h+yo las ni// dgyes pa'i yum nyid tshul bzhin dbyung// de nyid dbyings kyi gnas mchog tu// ming gi sa bon rig pa spro// spro dang bsdu ba mngon gsal bas// tshul 'dra'i ye shes dkyil 'khor bdag/ gnas dbus nyid du 'bod par bya// phyi rol du ni sras mchog dang// ji snyed pa yi 'khor rnams nyid// gtso bo dang mthun rigs kyis dbyung// las la 'bad pa'i tshogs kyang bzhag/ snying na rdo rje rnam bsams nas// lag pa rdo rje bsdu mdzad de// dgug gzhug bcing dang dbang du bya// lce la chos kyi phyag rgya bzhag/ rgyas gdab phyag rgya chen po'o// gdan bstab pa dang 'dud pa dang// mchod bstod mnyes bya sgra tshig dbul// de nas me lha mdog nag po// pad+ma nag po la 'dug cing// khros pa'i tshul can bskyed par bya// gdol pa'i khyim mam dur khrod nas// blangs pa'i me la drag por 'bud// g.yon pas bdud rtsi bsang gtor bya// spyan drang ba dang bgegs bskrad dang// bsrung dang phyogs bcing nges par bya// byin gyis brlab pa

rab ldan pa// dam tshig gsang ba'i bka' dbang bya// mchod yon nag po dri nga bas// nag po'i cha lugs 'dzin pa mnyes// lce gzar kha la rang sngags bsam// g.yon gyis blug pa'i gzar bu bzung// bdud rtsi gdug pa'i mar bcus te// shin tu gdangs pa'i zhal de ru// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul// oM badzra a na la ag+ni ma hA pu dza sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba shu ta hUM phaT/ mnyes shing bgegs bskrad dngos grub gsol// mchod bsreg rdzas gzhan rnams kyang dbul// 'bar ba dang ni 'khyil pa brtag/ de nas rigs kyi bdag po nyid// rig mar bcas pa'i rdzas kyi gsang// khrag 'thung khro bo 'khor dang bcas// 'bar ba'i dbus su drangs byas te// sngar bshad cho gas mnyes par bya// lce yi dbus dang blug gzar mthil// chos kyi yi ge 'bar bar bsam// oM badzra ku mA ra dIp+ta tsakra kI li kI la ya sa ma ya mu dra pra b+han tsakra me ti raM raM kha kha khA hi khA hi// dgang blugs kyis ni dang po ru// dug dang bsku ba'i 'bru mar dbul// de nas rdzas kun thams cad de// tha mar dug dang 'bru mar te// brgya'am stong du dbul bar bya// lhag ma lha rnams rang rang gi/ sngags kyi phreng bdag gis so// de nas rdzas kun gcig bsdus te// dug dang kha ba'i 'bru mar la// dmigs pa'i gzugs bcas gzhug cing dgug/ mthe chung nas brtsam mtshon gyis gtub// gtso bo nas brtsam re re dbul// a mu ka mA ra ya dz+wa la raM raM// bka' las 'da' ba'i sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlog/ gang la dmigs pa gtan nas 'pho// snang zhing srid pa 'di rnams kun// 'ub chub gcig tu 'bar bar bya// ma dag tshangs par gsol nas ni/ gtso bo rnams dang me lha gshegs// rtsa ba las byung rang la bsdu/ slar yang rjes mthun rol pa ston// bso dang gnas pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg mchod pa'i phrin las kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rig pa chen po 'di gsungs so// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas nyid du// rgyan dgod pa dang bsrung bya ste// srid pa'i phur pa bsgrub byas shing// khyad par dmigs pa nyid la gzhug/ phreng ba drag pos sras mchog spro// dmigs pa dgug bstim snying nas gzir// srog rtsa thod rlon la sogs rtags// rmi dang mngon sum nyams la rtags// ma byung bar du 'bad la bsgrub// dus mtshungs gsal ba gsum gyis brdeg/ snying gar nyi ma dbang chen gyi// 'od dmar thugs las khams gsum 'phro// khu ba khrag gi rgya mtsho ste// khro bas de rngub shin tu khros// khams gsum yongs sgrol mchod pa'o// rang gis gzhibs

pas bkrag mdangs bskyed// drag po'i las la 'jug par nus// gnas nas dgug par bya ba ni// sngags bzlas 'od zer drag po las// stong gsum gang ba'i khro bo'i tshogs// yul de dgug cing stim par byed// sngon du bshad pa'i chos rnams kyis// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// kun gyi sbyor ba'i byin rlabs sprul// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// de dag bka' sdod pho nya ma// phyag brnyan chen mo'i dus la bab// ji ltar nos shing khas blangs pa// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// dang po dam pa don gyi phyir// byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa'i// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang// dngos grub 'phrog cing 'tshe ba rnams// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// yud cig gis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul du bshigs nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// pho nya 'jig rten rab gang bas// gdug pa kun bstim las kun byed// oM badzra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM hoH// 'dren pa'i snying po 'di yis ni// yud tsam de nyid gnas su dgug/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM hUM hUM// phaT phaT phaT/ badzra ging ka ra hUM hUM a A/ rlung gis shing lo bskyod bzhin du// dbang sdud zil gyis gnon pa ni// oM badzra ku mA ra b+hud+d+ha he ru ka rat+na he ru ka pad+ma he ru ka kI li kI la ya hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ de yis ri rab bzhin du 'gyur// g.yo 'gul dran pa med par byed// de nas kha sbyar rab tu dge/ gzhan bsrung ba la dbye ba ni// brnag pas thun bzhi 'bros par 'gyur// de nas gzugs la bsdu ba ni// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// rdegs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// oM a ba ra bid+h+wan+sa tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ ta tha ya ta tha ya hUM phaT// phur pa dang ni 'bru thun brdeg/ ha sa ya ra na da ha na hUM phaT/ khrag dug sbyar ba'i thun gyis brdeg/ shri kri A na ya hUM phaT// dud pa dang ni thal bas brdeg/ dza la pa ya dza la pa ya hUM phaT/ mtshon cha drag pos gtub par bya// A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT// bi da ya bi da ya hUM phaT// 'di yis dbab cing dbang du sdus// byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ni// thugs ka'i hUM gi spro bsdu las// gdul bya'i snying la khro bo zhugs// gong ma'i gnas bskul skyo bas phyung// nyes pa'i tshogs bshad bdag nyid khros// snying rtsa bcad cing bdag la bsdus// de ni de yi dbye ba'o// thog ma'i dus na gnas

dbye ba/ kyo ba 'dzin mdzad khro bo spros// de nyid gnas bcu dag nas dbyung/ gzugs la bsdu ba'i gnas yin no// gdab pa'i gnas ni 'du byed kyis// lag pa yum bzhir byin brlabs nas// rnam dag skye med yi ge yis// snang ba gsum nyid gsal bar blta'o// rgyu gsum ldan pa'i dbyings su bzla// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun no// oM badzra ku mA ra kI li kI la ya hUM hUM/ a A/ sras mchog hUM mdzad la sogs gdab// de yis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khyab// gnas ngan sbyangs la slar la bsdu// kun gyi mthu dang gzi byin bskyed// byin gyis brlabs te dngos grub stsal// tshe dang bkru ba'i las yin no/ phaT kyis rab mtshan sras kyi mchog/ 'bru dgu'i rjes la gze ma spar// dngos bcom dbus su 'dus pa yang// sa bon drug la 'od kyis btab/ 'bras bu pho nyar bcas pa dbab// phur pa gsang ba'i gnas su bstim// khyad par las su rab bshad do// bdag nyid sras dang dmigs pa rnams// gsal ba gsum ldan byin brlabs te// pho nya gdab cing bskul ba ni// bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// de yi snying pos gnas bcur gdab/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ ka taM ka ye badzra/ a dzi ti a pa ra dzi ti badzra/ mA ra sai na pra marda ni hUM phaT/ 'khor tshogs kun yang sngags kyis gdab// drag po'i rdzas dang phur pas brdeg/ khrag rlung rnal te rul myag bsam// bsad dang gso ba las kyi mchog/ ma lus gnas 'dir rdzogs par bya// zab cing rgya che'i don yin no// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gtan 'pho ba bsgral ba'i phrin las kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// drag shul bsgral ba gsungs pa las// mtshon rnon gdug pas byin brlabs te// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// zhes brjod yan lag nying lag dang/ khog pa don snying bcas pa dag/ bcad cing gtub pa nyid du bya// de nas mtshan sngags brjod pa ni// hUM ma ma ba shaM ku ru ma ma ku ru ma sta ma nya/ i dam ku ru/ i daM d+ha d+hi ma ma ma shI g+h+raM/ karma ka ra ya hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ gzugs sgra bsam pa 'dus pa yis// ma lus rdul phran bzhin du dmigs// de nas lhag par gnas pa yi// mthu dang brdzu 'phrul 'phrog pa ni// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// bdag la bar chad byed pa

rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// snying po 'di yang brjod par bya// sarba A na ya hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ pha rol mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'phrog/ bdag la bstim pa de ldan bsam// bag chags sa bon phra ba yis// gal te lhag lus brdung ba ni/ rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas na// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// kha thaM kha thaM ha na ha na hUM phaT// mud+ga ra mud+ga ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ byin brlabs dbyings mchog gru gsum du// gsang 'byung rdo rje tho bas brdung/ gnas sgo drag po gsum gyi las// rten dang brten pa'i lha rnams kyis// hUM hUM hUM/ sgra brjod de dag thugs ka nas// nam mkha' las sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor/ phaT phaT phaT/ de dag thugs khros drag shul gyi// badzra yag+sha kro d+ha hUM/ slar yang thugs rje shin tu khros/ lha mos thod bkang sha khrag stob/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ phul ba zhal du gsol bar dmigs/ ha ha hi hi mnyes par bsam// mthar phyin rdung ba'i phrin las so// rang bzhin khyad par bzlas pa yi// slar yang rim pas gso ba ni// chos dbyings don dam bden pa dang/ gsang sngags mthu yi byin rlabs kyis// sangs rgyas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa'i// rdzu 'phrul 'byin pa'i las yin no// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// bdun nam bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/ snying gar dril zhing btab pa yis// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs su sprul// de dag sras kyi sku la 'dus// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas// bdag nyid stong pa'i gnas su dril// slar 'dus sbyor ba sngon bas lhag/ rdzas dang bdag nyid gso ba yin// ngas bstan lung bzhin gnas pa ni// yab yum sbyor ba'i sems phab pas// pha rol sems rgyud nam mkha' gdon// hUM phaT ces pa'i sgra yis ni// rang bzhin gnas la gsol ba gdab// dbang bskur bas ni 'od 'bar gyur// yab kyi zhal nas yum gyi mkhar// hUM las skur gsal phaT kyis gdon// slar yang bsdu dang gtor ba yis// 'og min gnas la gsos gdab cing// dbang bskur 'od zhu hUM du dmigs// phaT kyi sbyor bas lhums su 'phang// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bar bsnyen// bsgrub pa bsgrub pa chen po ni// rdzogs pas skur bzhengs phyir byon nas// dbu rgyan ldan pas dbang bskur te// phaT kyis 'og min gnas su 'phang// tog dkar rgyal tshab dam pa yis// bcu gnyis mdzad pas 'gro don rdzogs// rdo rje'i gnas su lus sbyor ba'o// srid chad mdze can mtshon shi ba'i// thod rus nang du dmigs pa gzhug/ mi shis gnas su gnan pa ni// A+oM laM AHlaM hUM laM/ stam b+ha ya nan/ mo ha ya/ shri kro b+hi

kri/ badzra hUM ka ra hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ rdo rje ri rab 'phros pa yis// rab tu gnas pa'i sbyor ba brtsam/ ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// gnas ngan bag chags yongs mi ldang// rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag shul mngon par spyod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po des// drag shul rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin// mngon du spyod pa'i phrin las bshad// nga nyid nga dang 'dra ba yis// 'khor bcas sgra tshig drag po yis// rang gi gnas lnga 'bar zhing spro// mthar thug yul mnyes dngos grub bsdu/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya d+ha d+hi ma ma karma/ mA ra se ni// sra marda na ya// sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// kun gyi rtsa ba'i phrin las so// yab yum bcas pa'i thugs ka nas// mgal me lta bu'i 'od 'phros pas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor brtan zhing gsal// rgyud bskul byin brlab dbang bskur bya// A+oM badzra kI li kA la ya d+ha d+hi ma ma karma/ a dzi ta a pa ra dzi ta/ dza ya bi dza ya ka tang ka ye mA ra se ni// phra marda ni ye sarba big+h+naM baM hUM phaT// 'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub cing/ rnam par rgyal ba'i phrin las so// bdag nyid khro bo'i tshogs kun gyis// drag sngags sgrag ni gnam lcags kyi// zhun ma sa la brdab 'dra ba'i// 'ong 'phros gdug pa tshar gcod byed// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ a dzi ta a pa ra dzi ta dza ya bi dza ya ka tang ka ye/ ma ma ba shaM ku ru ma taM ka ra nya ka ra i daM/ d+ha d+hi ma ma karma a ra i dan shI g+h+raM kA ra ya/ mA ra se na sra marda ni ye sarba big+h+nAM hUM phaT/ 'di yis ma lus gdug pa can/ tshar gcod las su 'dzud par byed// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kun// srog nas drangs pa bsgrub pa che// gtso chen 'phro 'dus thams cad bsgral// oM badzra kI li kI la ya ba ra bi d+h+wan+sa mA ra se na pra marda ni ye hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+nA a na ya ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha// gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ ma tha ma tha/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ ta thA ya ta thA ya/ ha sa ya ra hri da na/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ shi kri A na ya/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya/ ta thA ya ta thA ya/ bi ta ya bi ta ya/ shi traM kA' ra nya ya/ dza yi bi dza ye/ ka taM ka ye/ a dzi ti a pa ra dzi ti ba ya baM hUM phaT/ 'di yis 'jig rten dregs pa can// thams cad 'du byed las la 'khol// phyogs bcu khro bo'i lha rnams kun// mthing nag ba spu'i dkyil 'khor spro// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ mo ha yag+ha ta ya badzra kI li kI la ya hUM kA ra bi dza ya ni la daN+Da ya mAn+ta ka/ a tsa la ha ya g+h+ri wa/ a par dzi ta a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ trai lo kya bi dza ya/ ma hA ba la pa ra bi d+h+wan+sa/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ a pa ra dzi ta/ ma ra se ni ye pra marda ni ye sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT//

'di ni rab tu sgrol ba yis// khro tshogs 'khor bcas mngag pa'o// oM badzra kI li kI la ma mo hA ya g+ha ta ya/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ dza ya dza ya badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ shi kri na kA ra ya/ ma ra se ni pra marda ni ye/ ma hA tsit+ta kha hI ma sha rbad/ ma hA sha ya thum myag rbad/ kaM ka sha ya mA ra ya phaT/ 'di ni rdzas kyis dmigs pa bsgral// khro bo khro mo sprul pa dang// yang sprul pho nya tshogs dang bcas// phung po lhag med rol par bya// oM badzra kI li kI la ya b+ha ga bAn/ mo ha ya g+ha ta ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// shi krin byi krin/ d+ha d+hi ma ma shI g+h+raM kA ra ya/ A+oM ru ru b+hak+Sha/ trag sha trag sha/ tsit+ta rag sha/ tsit+ta ni tung tung/ thum ling/ tsit+ta gtub gtub/ nr-i dzaHphrig phrig/ shaM shaM khyer b+h+yo// nr-i dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ brnag pa kho na nyid la de/ 'di yi drod tshad brtag la dbab// mtshan ma brtan po dbyung bar bya// zhes bka' stsal to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag po mngon du spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa chen po'i phrin las kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// gti mug 'dod chags nga rgyal dang/ phrag dog 'dul ba rab mdzad phyir// slar yang rigs kyi khro bor bstan// sangs rgyas khros pas gti mug gcod// mtshon chen dkar po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// mi rtog A+oM gyis dngos po sbyang// ye shes 'byung ba yum gyi mkha'// rnam dag dbyings nas shar ba'i b+h+ruM// phrin las yongs gyur gzhal med khang// rang lus rdzogs pa 'di nyid de// mtshon chen 'khor lo oM dkar po// lus kyi sgo ru shar ba dang// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// spyi bo'i steng du bsam par bya// 'di ni 'khor lo gzhon nu ste// bud+d+ha kI la ya zhes bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhi ru// badzra kI la ya sogs bsgom/ snying gar hUM mdzad yab yum sogs// sngar bshad bzhin du bsgom bya ste// A+oM dkar 'khor lo 'bar bar bsam// phung po 'khor los gtams byas nas// rnam par shes pa 'khor lor bsgom// A+oM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba shAn+ti oM hUM phaT/ dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la/ zlum por 'dus rdzas las la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma brtan gyur na// lha klu gnod sbyin bgegs rigs dang/ 'du ba bzhi gyur yan lag nad// 'jigs dang dus min 'chi ba brgyad// mi dge gnod pa'i las la sogs/ ma lus zhi ba'i phrin las so// rin chen khros pas nga rgyal gcod// mtshon chen ser po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// rtog med trAM gyis dngos po sbyang// kha dog rin chen trAM ser pos// dpral ba'i dbus su bsam par bya// 'di las

rin chen gzhon nu ste// rat+na kI la ya zhes pa'o// bud+d+ha kI la ya sogs dang// lte bar hUM mdzad la sogs bsgom// gser mdog trAM las rin chen 'bar// lus kun rin chen 'bar bas gtams// rnam par shes kun rin po che// A+oM rat+na kI li kI la ya sarba puSh+tiM trAM hUM phaT// gser ram se po'i shing rnams la// gru bzhi gnas pa'i rdzas la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma rab brtan nas// tshe dang longs spyod dbang phyug dang// bsod nams ye shes dregs pa dang// dpal dang 'byor pa rigs 'dzin dang/ dga' bde rang gzhan phun tshogs pa/ kun tu rgyas pa'i phrin las so// pad+ma khros pas 'dod chags gcod// mtshon chen dmar po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// mi rtog hrIHyis dngos po sbyang// chos kyi pad+ma hrIHdmar po// mgrin pa'i mtshams su rab tu bsgom// 'di sbyor pad+ma gzhon nu ste// pad+ma kI la ya zhes bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhi na// rat+na kI la ya sogs bsgom// dpral bar snang mdzad yab yum bsgom// gzhan yang rang gi gnas su bsgom// dmar gsal hrIHlas pad+ma 'bar// phung po pad+ma'i rang bzhin te// rnam par shes pa pad+ma'o// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba ba shaM hrIHhUM phaT// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams la// zla gam dbyibs kyi rdzas la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma brtan thob nas// phyi rol brtan pa'i sar bzhugs dang// log par blta dang the tshom can// nga rgyas dregs pas khengs pa dang// che btsan mtho btsun ldan pa dang// gdug rtsub gnod sbyor 'tshe ba dang// 'gyur rlom sems dang ldan pa dag/ mos shing 'dud pas dbang du sdud// rgya gram khros pas phrag dog gcod// mtshon chen ljang gu rab 'bar ba// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs par shar// rtog med hA yis dngos po sbyang// sku rdzogs las la byung ba ni// rgya gram brtan par hA ljang gu// lus kyi sgo ru shar ba dang// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa' yab yum bzhi/ gsang ba'i gnas su bsam par bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhi ru// pad+ma kI la ya sogs dang// rigs kyi sras bzhi bsgom par bya// phrin las gzhon nu rab sbyor bas// karma kI ya ya zhes bya// snying gar hUM mdzad yab yum dang// gnas gzhan so sor khro tshogs bsgom// hA ljang rgya gram 'bar ba yis// lus kyi phung po rab tu gtams// rnam shes rgya gram ral gri ste// oM karma kI li kI la ya sarba mA ra ya hUM phaT// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// gru gsum dbyibs kyi rdzas la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma gsal ba dang// lus can lus med rab rgyu ba'i// 'jig smod snyoms dang gnod cing 'tshe// bar gcod sgrol ba'i

phrin las so// phrin las 'di dag khyad par ni// shar lho nub byang 'jam dang sdug/ mdzes dang rtsub pa khyad par gnas// dge sbyong rgyal po bram ze dmangs// rgan po dar ma bud med dang// rgyud rtsub ldan pa gnad yin no// gtso chen las ni rigs kyi sras// gnas pa so sor sbyor ba'i mchog/ phrin las tha dad sbyor ba yis// lam lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// rigs lnga'i tshul gyis bgrod cing bsgrub// nyon mongs yul rab ltos pa yis// rigs kyi bdag po sbyor ba la// gang la gang gis gang gi phyir// rig pa 'dzin pa rnal 'byor che// mkhas rtogs shes rab ldan pas spyod// ces bka' stsal to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// rigs 'dzin tha dad kyi sgo nas phrin las bzhi so sor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu chen po rnams kyis ni// nga yi bstan pa 'dzin cing bsrung// de phyir de yi tshul bshad de// srid pa las kyi mthu rtsal can// bcu gnyis lcam bral bcas pa yis// dam tshig cho ga rab sbyor bas// rjes spyod nga yi rnal 'byor yin// gzugs brnyan chen po'i drung du ni// e bdun bsnol ba'i pho brang brtseg/ gcod sreg brtan pa rnams kyis bskor// gser dngul zangs lcags rin chen dang// khrag zhag 'o ma mar gyi mtsho// mi rta myur du bsgral ba'i khrag/ gsum gyi pho brang gsum du'o// lcags las byas pa'i phur pa ni// drag po'i gzugs can sor brgyad pa// dur khrod rgyu ba'i mgo nang du// wa dang spyang khyi 'phar ba khyam// tsit+ta btsal te gnas su dgod// rin chen sna bzhi'i dbus su dgod// kla klo'i yul nas thod pa ru// rigs gnyis bong bu bya lug snying// stsal ba mtshon chen gnas su dgod// rin chen mtshan ldan snod nang du// mi dbang tsit+ta sha khrag bcas// sul bzhi phur pa la btod do// ming gi rgyud med rigs med kyi// thod par rdo thun khrag thun dang/ skye sgo'i khrag thun rim bzhin bsag/ srin mo bcu gnyis 'di la brten/ drag po dkar dmar nag pa yis// rgyal bu e yi mtshams gsum la// gling bzhi ri rab sa rdos byas// gcan gzan 'dab chags rgyal mtshan 'phyar// bshos chang mchod tshogs rgyan ldan god// nga rgyal chen po rab ldan pas// lcam sras bod cing las la rbad// sbyor ba'i sgrol ba rab tu bskul// oM shwa na/ sha na/ sri la sri ka/ mu ka hUM dzaH/ trag rag+sha ru tra bi ru bin nan mug ti baM ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ pad+ma d+ha ri ru ma ti tsi la b+h+yo/ hu lu kyi hu me sen dza dza/ mu ti du ru tsa sa la mi dza dzA/ ya ma k+She yak+sha d+he ba k+She bag sha ba ra hi k+Shi trag tshal pa dum bu ru shag b+h+yo/ so so'i gnas nas drang bar bya/ badzra shwa na shwa na sri la sri ka ka pa tsit+ta nr-i dzaH/ sha la b+h+yo

b+h+yo/ ma hA yak+sha sna nag mo dun b+h+yo/ ma ma nr-i sha tsit+ta ma dzaH/ rbad ling ka mA ra ya b+h+yo// rag mo ag mo ro sha thun/ yak+sha tsit+ta shad shad b+h+yo b+h+yo// phra mun tsa mun shu la ko mun ha ri ma mA ra ya rbad b+h+yo// zhes pas dmigs pa'i yul la rbad// badzra shwa na mu kha sha na mu kha shI la mu kha sri ga mu kha tsit+ta pa mug mug thuM rbad thuM rbad/ thib thib yaM yaM tsit+ta la thuM rbad rbad/ trag rag+sha ma ma ru ti re ma ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la mug thum rbad yaM/ trag rag sha ru ti re ma ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la gtub gtub/ trag rag sha ru ti re ma 'dzu tsit+ta ril rbad/ rag sha ru ti thuM/ trag rag sha ru ti re ma dzA tsit+ta thuM yaM ril rbad thuM/ rag mo tsi bi ri ma ra ma thuM rbad/ yag mo tsi bi ri ma ra ya thuM rbad/ gardza tsi bi ri mA ra ya hur thuM rbad/ hu lu ma tsi bi ri mA ra ya hUM thuM rbad/ phung po myur du bsgral bar bya// drag po rnams kyis dmod pa ni// badzra su tri pa a pa ra tsit+ta tri tsa ba la ma sha tsit+ta hUM phaT/ nr-i dzaHmA ra ya du ya ma tsit+ta rak+ta tshal pa// du ma pra ma du tsi ta la khug/ bam ril/ ma ra phra ma a pa ra dzi ta/ a tri sa ma nr-i dza/ dun dun nr-i dza rbad thuM/ kun gyi rim pa'i rjes su brtsam// brdegs shing brdeg pa 'phang bsreg dang// gzir ba'i las kyis tshar gcad pa// 'di ni lus ngag yid gsum ldan// shin tu dmigs pas myur du 'grub// phyi nang gsang ba rtags dang tshad// mngon sum bzhin du gsal bar sbyar// thogs pa med par las 'grub byed// phrin las gcod pa'i mdo yin no// zhes bka' stsal to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sprul pa'i phyag brnyan dam tshig chen po'i phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rgyud don nye bar bsdus te bshad// rnal 'byor ye shes rang rig pa'i// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rtsa ba ste// gzhon nu rigs kyi gtso bo lnga// dus gsum sangs rgyas sras mchog rnams// kun sbyor nyis brgya lnga bcur rdzogs// khro chen phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du// yab yum nye ba'i sras gnyis las// sprul pa dang ni nye bar sprul// thugs kyi bdag dang bcas pa yi// brgya dang bcu yi lha rnams snang// mngon par spyod pa la sogs pa'i// 'dus byas lnga rnams gzugs brnyan la// khro chen zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// so so'i rigs kyi gtso chen lnga// gang gis 'dul ba der snang zhing// zhi dang dbang rgyas drag po yis// so so'i phrin las ngor 'byung ste// dbyibs dang kha dog rdzas dang sbyar// sku smad rang gi rgyu las grub// 'og gnyis skyed pa zhabs kyi dbyibs// zlum po gru bzhi zla kham dang// gru gsum rnams ni khyad par yin// steng 'og zhi ba zlum po ste// logs bzhi rgyas pa skyed pa dbang// zur rnams drag po nyid yin no// gong ma'i gnas la

gzhal med khang// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldan pa la// lte bar gtso bo yab yum bsgom// rtsibs la phyogs mtshams khro bo brgyad// yab yum steng 'og gnas su ni// hUM mdzad dang ni stobs po che// yab yum sras dang bcas pa'o// skyed pa zla kham gnas su ni// khro brgyad kyis ni sras kun gnas// 'og min gnas sogs bzhi la ni// phra men sgo ma dbyung zhing bsam// rtsa ba la sogs gnas de la// 'jig rten gnas pa bcu gnyis so// lcam dral nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// dbyibs dang sbyar ba'i gnas su bsam// gong ma'i gnas kyi logs bzhi ru// rigs dang phrin las rab phye ba'i// lhag ma'i sras mchog bsgom pa ste// bdun cu rtsa brgyad phyung ba yis// rdzas la dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// 'di dag me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// rang bzhin ma grub snang ba ni// chos sku skye med phur pa'o// ma lus sku la rab rdzogs pa// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i phur pa grub// ba spu'i bu ga'i tshul thams cad// 'bar ba'i khro chung gtams pa ni// bdag gzhan ma lus don byed pas// phur pa sprul pa'i sku yi mchog/ sku gsum yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor che// rang byung ye shes gnas la 'du// 'di ni sku yi dkyil 'khor yin// rigs lnga 'bru dgu kI la ya// thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsal// bris te yig 'bru dgod pa dang// phur bu dgod cing dngos grub blang// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba lnga// bris te phyag mtshan so sor dgod// mchod cing las bcol dngos grub blang// gtso mo yum gyi spogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor gnas su bri bya zhing// lha dgod rdzas spyad bskul bas rdzogs// bsgoms shing dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bskul zhing yon tan ldan pa yis// rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin dbyung// nyi shu rtsa gcig e yi dbyibs// tshad dang ldan pa rdzas dgod cing// dngos grub blang bar tha dad do// rdzas bsag bskyed cing tshad ldan bri// rgyan rtags dgod pas 'chol ba rdzogs// stong dang rtsa brgyad bsgrub pa'o// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems las byang// las kyi dkyil 'khor brtsig pa dang// bsag mchod gsad pa'i rgyu dang ni// chos ldan pha rol bskul ba yis// gzugs bsreg gnas spar las rnams kyis// ma lus 'dus par brgyad du bstan// rigs can lnga la kun sbyangs pas/ bsnyen bsgrub sku gsung thugs kyi ngang// thig le gcig la rab tu 'dus// zhes bka' stsal to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ khyad par gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba'i phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rang gi 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// shin tu gdams pa 'di skad gsungs// kye ma sras mchog 'khor

gyi tshogs// sprul pa pho nyar bcas pa rnams// snyigs ma'i sems can gdul dka' ba// thugs rje'i thabs chen sna tshogs kyis// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ thams cad du ni snang zhing ston// bdag gi don du bzhugs so snyoms// rang gi rnam rtog nye bar gnas// kha cig tu ni dge sbyong che// nyan thos rang rgyal spyod pa ston// la lar byang chub sems dpa' yi// spyod pa rlabs chen nus par mdzad// kha cig la ni longs spyod rdzogs// dpe byad brgyad cur ldan pa'i sku// dul bar gnas la zhi ba dang// gdug pa can la khro bo ste// zhing khams rab tu bkod pa dang// gzhal med khang pa'i pho brang rdzogs// gnyis med sbyor ba'i tshul can dang// rgyan gcig ldan pa'i sku yi rigs// yab dang yum gyi rnam pa can// gang gis 'dul ba der snang zhing// rigs drug sems can kun la yang// rang rigs gang yin der 'byung bas// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug dang// gnod sbyin mkha' lding mi'am ci// lha min dri za mi rnams dang// byol song yi dwags dmyal ba rnams// so sor gang 'dul de nyid kyis// rang gi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// dman pa rnams la rim pa ste// rtag pa ma yin sdug bsngal dang// mir skye sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang// phun sum tshogs pa rnyed dka' dang// skyabs 'gro gso sbyang bslab gnas bcu// kun rdzob don dam rang bzhin gyis// sems dbang bsgyur te bdag med pa'i// rtogs pa rab rdzogs dbu ma ston// de nas lus ngag bya ba dang// spyod pa rab sgrub rnal 'byor ston// bskyed pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor che// de yi rjes su rnal 'byor dang// rab tu rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag/ thabs dang shes rab 'jug pas don// sku lnga chos lnga ye shes lnga// lam lnga rigs lnga dag pa lnga// sa bcu stobs bcu ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad nges par 'byung ba dang// bskal pa chen po grangs med gsum// skad cig tsam la rdzogs par byed// blo dang dbang po bsam pa dang// tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur la// tshad med rnams kyi khyad par gyis// brtan dang thob pa dus gcig dang// tshe gcig srid pa bar ma dang// gsum mam lnga'am bdun dag gis// rang gi sa la gnas par ston// 'byung ba chen po rnams kyis mthu// phan tshun log par phyin srid de// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// dus la bab pa gang zhig na// sangs rgyas rnams ni cung mi 'da'// nga yi ye shes tshul 'di la// khyed rnams 'jigs par ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang// 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po khro bo chen po'i rgyal po chen po de nyid phrin las kyi rnam par rol pa chen po'i sgo

nas// yul gdug pa can 'dul ba'i rigs rnams kyi don rab tu rdzogs par mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang ba rgya che'i sgo nas bstod pa ni// kye ma bcom ldan rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo'i rje// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyi dpal chen po he ru ka/ rig pa'i rgyal po sku lnga ye shes lnga rdzogs lhun grub cing// dkyil 'khor gsum lnga brgyad kyi ngo bor sku la rab 'dus rdo rje 'chang// phrin las bzhi dang gtso chen drag po mngon 'byung sbyin mdzad pa'i// gzhon nu lnga ldan myur 'byung 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdus te/ sku las 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po snang bar mdzad nas/ mi gnas pa'i dbyings chos nyid mnyam pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang la dges pa chen pos bzhugs par gyur to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyi ma'i tshul nges par 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las 'dus pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ bi d+yot+ta ma 'bum sde las bsdus pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya'o// rgya rgya rgya//// rgya gar skad du/ ma ma sa mA dza mU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ ma mo 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan mngon rdzogs rgyal po he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa mngon par rab tu rdzogs pa'i rdo rje he ru ka zhes bya ba de/ thig le chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du sr-id pa'i chos kyi bsdus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas rin po che las grub pa'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo lha'i rgyal po'i gnas// bde ba chen po'i klong/ yum chen mo de kho na nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa mu kha le dgongs pa ma lus par shar ba'i klong// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa'i gnas na snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi rdo rje shugs chen po 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong chen po dang gnyis su med pa'i 'phro 'du dus gsum du rgyun mi chad par bkye ba las/ byin gyis rlabs kyi cho 'phrul chen po dpag tu med par snang bar 'di lta ste/ sa chen po dang/ me chen po dang/ chu chen po dang/ rlung chen po dag

gi gnas pa dang// bsraig pa dang/ gsher ba dang/ bskyod cing g.yo bar byed pa'i mthu chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang ba las srid pa'i 'jig rten bskyed pa'i sa bon dang rtsa ba dang/ bcud dang bcas pa/ dngas ma dang 'bras bur bcas pa/ yon tan dang nus pa rdzogs pa/ phyogs dus rab tu phye ba med par bzhugs pa las/ dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mo srid pa thams cad kyi bdag mo/ he ru ka thams cad kyi yum chen mo/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang phyug ma/ 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa thams cad kyi gtso mo/ de kho na nyid kyi gzhi mu kha le zhes bya ba de nyid rol pa chen po gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas// bcom ldan 'das la skul ba'i dbyings kyi sgra chen pos gsol ba btab pa/ e ma ho// bla med mngon rdzogs rgyal po he ru ka/ snang stong gnyis med kun la snang ba'i sku// mtshan med spros bral mi rtog grags pa'i gsungs// bde chen zag med zung 'jug khyab pa'i thugs// ma lus rang la rdzogs pa'i yon tan mnga'// phrin las mdzad phyir rol pa'i sku bzhengs shig/ a la la ho// zhes bskul ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang// mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang las mi g.yo zhing// ma rtogs 'khor ba ngang gis bsgral ba las// 'khrul pa'i blo la dngos por yongs mi snang// gdul bya'i bsam pa rnam dag som nyi med// dus la ma bab zhi bar gnas par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang yum chen mos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po las// ma nor ma lus mi zad mkhyen pa las// rtogs dang ma rtogs log pa'i blo can la// so so'i ston pa rig dbang thugs las phyung// ye shes rtsal gyi dgongs pa dmigs med las// gang la bsngags pa'i bstan rab sgo dbyer gsol// zhes bskul bas// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ dbyings kyi yum chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho/ srid gsum 'jig rten kun na rab bde ba'i// kha sbyor dga' ba skad cig gnas skabs bzhi// 'dod chags chen po mthong bzhad reg cing sbyor// blo dang rigs las khyad par gang snang ba'i// mthar thug rim pa bzhin dus 'byung nus par ldan// mkha' bzhi pad+ma byang chub sems kyi gnas// nam mkha' khyab pa mnyam nyid sbyor mdzad phyir// ze'u 'bru 'dab bcas pad+ma rgyas mdzod cig/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra ho haM/ rA ga yA mi/ sa ma ya badzra pra be sha ya phaT/ ces bskul nas/ yab yum gnyis kyi gzigs pa dang bzhad pa dang/ reg pa dang skyod

pa'i rol pas snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer kyi 'phro 'du chen po g.yos pa las/ phyogs bzhi dang dbus kyi b+ha ga yangs pa'i snang ba chen pos khams gsum pa rnams la gsal bar mdzad de/ phyogs lnga dang/ 'od lnga dang/ rigs lnga dang/ bsam pa lnga dang/ rtsa ba lnga dang/ 'bras bu lnga dang/ nus pa lnga dang/ khams lnga dang/ byed pa lnga dang/ las lnga dang/ khyab pa lnga dang/ dbang lnga dang/ rgyu lnga dang/ rkyen lnga dang/ bag la nyal lnga dang/ kun nas ldang ba lnga dang/ shes pa lnga dang/ phung po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ 'gro ba lnga dang/ yul lnga dang/ 'dod pa lnga dang/ spyad pa lnga dang/ bsrung ba lnga dang/ blang ba lnga dang/ dor ba lnga dang/ bsgrub pa lnga dang/ yon tan lnga dang/ yan lag lnga dang/ spyod pa lnga dang/ ma 'dres pa lnga la sogs pa thams cad yum chen mo nyid kyi mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga las/ snang zhing gnas par sprul pa mdzad do// gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhing gi bkod pa rgya chen po dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang/ yab dang yum snyoms par 'jug pa tsam dang/ rgyan so sor snang ba dang/ zhi ba'i rnam par snang ba dang/ khro bo'i rnam par snang ba dang/ khyab pa dang/ rdzogs pa dang/ tha dad pa'i sku rnams dang/ khyad par du sku'i rigs dang/ gsung gi rigs dang/ thugs kyi rigs dang/ yon tan gyi rigs dang/ las kyi rigs dang/ dregs pa'i rigs dang/ bsgrub pa'i rigs dang/ sbas pa'i rigs la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa snang zhing gsal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bla med rgyal po he ru ka chen po des mnyam pa nyid las bzhengs te/ cho 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// tshogs chen ma lus nga la nyon// khyed kyi khams dang byed pa dang/ lus dang rigs kyi khyad par dang/ phrin las grub pa'i mtha' la sogs// thams cad nga las 'byung zhing snang// lus dang ngag dang rnam par shes// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba byed// sku dang ye shes rig pa'i ngang// bsam pa longs spyod la sogs pa// dgongs pa'i cho 'phrul nyid las byung// gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa dag/ nga yi rang bzhin shes par gyis// nga las ma gtogs chos gzhan min// btags pa tsam yang yod ma yin// de bas nga yi don rtogs phyir// gus pa'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yum chen mo kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan he ru// 'di ltar bdag dang gzhan gyi chos// phyi

dang nang dang gsang ba dang// gsang ba chen pos rab bsdus pa'i// b+ha ga 'di la ci phyir dga'// phyogs dang ris kyi khyad par gang// 'od lnga kha dog ci yi phyir// bsam pa'i 'bras bu rtsa ba dang// nus pa rnams ni gang las byung/ khams dang byed pa las ni ci// khyab pa dbang dang bcas pa gang// rgyu dang rkyen gyis ci zhig bya// bag la nyal ba gang lta bu// kun nas ldang ba'i chos nyid kyi// shes par bya ba ci zhig yin// phung po lnga zhes gang la bya// stobs lnga zhes pa su la mnga'// su zhig grol bar 'gyur ba yin// yul lnga yang ni gang zhig yin// 'dod spyad bsrung ba ji lta bu// blang dor bsgrub pa ji lta bu// spyod pa'i yon tan yan lag dang/ ma 'dres chos kyi khyad par rnams// khyod las snang ba ci yi phyir// zhing dang zhing gi bkod pa dang/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa gang las byung// kha sbyor bde ba gang gi phyir// ci phyir thabs dang shes rab kyis// so sor rang la rdzogs par 'gyur// rang gi rig pa'i snang ba gang// ma lus snang ba'i don ched ci// de lta bu la gzhan dag gis// thob par bya ba'i thabs ni gang// bdag cag rnams la legs par ston// zhes gsol to// gleng gzhi mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon rdzogs rgyal po bla med he ru ka chen po des/ sprul pa'i cho 'phrul mngon par spyod pa'i don du thugs rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku drag shul spyod pa'i cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po rab tu 'bar bar bstan nas gsung gi nga ro drag po'i shugs phyung ba'i sgra chen pos gang bar mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe nam mkha'i khams kyi gtos thams cad sku'i rang bzhin gyis khyab cing/ gsung gi brda'i sgra chen por grags la/ thugs zhi ba byang chub kyi sems kyis dgongs nas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig srid pa'i rgyal mo che// khyod ni mu kha le zhes bya// sku yi dbu dang tsit+ta la// zhal lnga rtse mo lngar snang zhing// phyag bzhi zhabs brgyad mkha' bzhi dbyings// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru grags/ shar lho nub byang dbus dag gi/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal lnga las// dkar zhing 'tsher dang sngo la gdangs// dmar bzhad ljang gtsigs mthing nag khro// ljags kun rdo rje rtse dgu dang// rin chen ke ke ru 'bar zhing// pad+ma dgu brtsegs rgya gram can// 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan par snang// bskyed dang bsreg dang bzlum pa dang// g.yo zhing khyab par byin gyis brlabs// shel gser ke ke ru dag dang// in+d+ra nI la baiDUr+ya// 'od 'phros khyod kyi ral pa'i tshogs// bde gshegs rdo rje rin po che// chags pa dang ni phrin las kyi// so so'i rigs kyi dam pa'o// thugs mchog rigs pa skye med

dbyings// rnam shes ye shes lnga 'byung srid// sbas pa gnyis dang phyag bzhi yis// pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs nas// gtso mo drug rnams dbang sdud cing// bdud rtsi lnga la rol cing spyod// rnam par thar pa'i zhabs brgyad rdzogs// blon mo brgyad kyis dran byed brdzis// mkha' bzhi phyogs bzhi dus bzhir gnas// cha snyoms byed pa gcig yin te// brtan dang smin dang gsher ba dang// skyed byed yangs pa'i bdag nyid de// drod 'dzin brlan rtsub yangs pa yis// shel dang mar gad pad+ma dang// nI la baiDUr+ya dag go/ gsang ba'i mkha' la 'od 'bar zhing// rdo rje rin chen bye ru dang// lcags zangs ze 'bru'i rnam pa las// dus chen bzhi dang 'byung ba lnga// gtso bo'i sku yi phyed kyis sbyor// so so'i rigs su snang zhing 'dus// de bas mu kha le zhes bya// gsang ba'i bde chen 'byung ba'i gnas// skye dang 'chi las rab 'das shing// de la sdug bsngal yongs med pas// mya ngan 'das ma shes kyang bya// blang bya dor bya med pa yis// kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang bya// rnam par shes pa ma lus pa'i// mthar son pha rol phyin ma'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs// rang bzhin sku las 'byung bas na// rang byung rgyal mo'ang khyod yin no// dus bzhi dbyings las shar bas na// 'byung ba dus bzhi cha snyom ma'o// srid pa'i rgyal mo'ang khyod nyid do// rigs kyi gtso bo mkhar nub pas// rigs kyi gtso mo nyid yin no// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab pa yis// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'ang khyod nyid yin// pho dang mo dang ma ning dang// rgyal po rje dang bran dang dmangs// rang gi ngang gis skye 'gro'i bdag/ ma yi tshul gyis thams cad bskyed// mo yis tshul gyis thams cad sdud// ma skyes skye ba med pa'i dbyings// mi 'gag 'gag pa med pa'i klong// ma ni thabs mchog 'dod med mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med klong// de bas khyod ni mu kha le// skyed pa'i ma mo chen mo ste// rtag par gnas pa'i bu mo la// sems drod chu rlung bkrag las bskyed// mkha' dang dbyings kyi dwangs ma'o// kun gzhi yid kyi rnam par shes// nyon mongs yid dang sgo lnga yis// rnam par shes pa bsam pa yin// chags sdang rmongs dang sred pa dang// bsnyems pa las ni rtsa bar 'gyur// rgyud lnga'i 'gro ba gnas skabs dang// dag pa'i sku lnga mthar thug gi/ 'bras bu'i tshul snang ba yin no// de yis don gnyis nus par 'gyur// dngos po rten dang g.yo ba dang// 'phel 'grib rang gi khams yin no// gzugs rtogs 'gyur ba skye ba dang// 'gag pa dang ni byed pa yin// tshims shing ldang dang 'gro ba dang// 'byung dang 'jig par byed pa'i las// las dang skye ba sems dang chos// dngos dang bsam pas rab tu

khyab// ma yengs spro ba shes pa dang// myur dang rig pa dbang po mchog/ skyod cing byed pa sdig pa skyes// skal ba mnyam dang kun 'gro bas// ma lus rgyu zhes bya ba yin// bdag dang dmigs pa de ma thag/ lus dang bsam pa rkyen du 'gyur// khams dang shes rigs las nyon mongs// rang bzhin gyis ni bag la nyal// 'du byed dmigs yul rnam par spros// bde sdug rtog pa kun nas ldang// sems las snang ba yon tan dang// gzhi shes de yi rang bzhin no// gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed dang// rnam shes ma dag phung po ste// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang// rnam par grol dang ye shes kyis// rang bzhin shes pa dag pa'i tshogs// dad pa'i mchog dang 'dzin pa dang// dran pa bzang dang shes rab dang// stobs lnga dag kyang de yi dngos// phung po lnga dang rigs dang las// 'dzin pa las grol yon tan tshogs// gzugs sgra dri ro reg pa dag/ yul lngar snang ba 'dod cing spyod// dbang po'i bye brag tha dad de// sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa dang// rdzun dang ngag brlang spyad pa lnga// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba las// sdom dang slob dang spang ba las// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa bsrung ba ste// dman pa'i yul dang bsten pa'i rdzas// gsang ba'i spyod pa grogs dang bcas// dge bcu yan lag phra dang bcas// don chen mthar thug blang bar bya// 'jig rten chos dang de bzlog pa// dor bar bya ba nyid yin no// thun mong ba dang mchog gyur dang// rang gzhan don dang spyir 'gro dag/ bsgrub par gsungs pa nga nyid yin// gnas skabs gsum dang mthar thug gnyis// bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu lnga// yon tan tshogs su gyur pa'o// de dag gis ni phan par bsgrub// yan lag dag tu snang ba yin// bdag dang gzhan dang bar ma dang/ dman pa mchog gi spyod pa ste// rigs dang las dang rtogs pa dag/ gnas dang rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams// ma 'dres pa yi mchog yin no// gzhan yang srid dang zhi ba dang// 'khor ba pa dang mya ngan 'das// phyi dang nang du brtags pa dang// sems dang sems las byung ba dang// rig dang ma rig yod med mtha'// rtag dang chad dang 'gro dang 'ong// skye 'gag gnas dang stong pa dang// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yis// nus pa dang ni yon tan tshogs// phrin las ma lus spyod pa rnams// thams cad khyod kyi rang bzhin te// de bas mu kha le zhes bya// khyod kyi 'byung ba spros pa'i dngos// 'jig rten srid pa snang ba'i gzugs// 'pho 'jug bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid la// sa bon tshul du gnas pa las// rang gi thig le mnyam sbyar nas// dmigs med rnam dag ting nge 'dzin// skye med chos kyi dbyings su thim// dngos med bag chags rnam pa

las// de bzhin nyid kyi bsgom pa'o// de nyid mtshams su sbyar ba las// snying rje nam mkha' lta bur khyab// ma lus kun la khyab cing snang// khyod kyi sems kyi rnam pa las// rgyu yi mchog gyur hUM gi dngos// mi 'gyur rtsa ba 'od kyi gzhi// khyod kyi nam mkha'i ngo bo las// e zhes snang ba stong pa'i bdag/ khyod kyi drod kyi ngo bo las// raM zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i 'od// khyod kyi dbugs kyi ngo bo las// yaM zhes bya ba bskyod cing 'degs// khyod kyi chu yi ngo bo las// khaM shes bya bas dag cing tshims// khyod kyi sha yi ngo bo las// suM zhes bya ba brtan pa'i gzhi// khyod kyi rus pa'i ngo bo las// keM zhes bya ba gnas pa'i sa// khyod kyi b+ha ga'i dbyings phyug las// b+ha ga bcom ldan bde chen po// pad+ma 'khor lo gsang ba'i dbyings// sa bon lnga dang bcu bzhi las// gtso chen sprul pa lnga bcu brgyad// ye shes snying po bla na med// bla med khrag 'thung dpal gyi yab// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' 'gro kun gyi rter zhes bya// mkha' klong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// skye 'gro srid pa thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i phyir// mnyam gzhag ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa che// bcom ldan chu skyes dkyil 'khor ni// thabs las dbyings phyug bla na med// bdud rtsi chen po char du 'phro// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// sbyor mdzad gnyis med bde ba che// mkha' 'gro brtan ma'i sems mchog ma// mi 'jigs pa yi 'bru gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su stongs byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// mchod sbyin rtag tu rgyas mdzad ma// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dkar la dag pa'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul zhabs bzhi brkyang bskums bzhugs// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i mchog/ thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum thig le'i sgo 'byed cing// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ljang gu baiDUr+ya// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang mthar son phyag/ mkha' 'gro mnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ rol pa chen po'i dbu gsum gyis// srid gsum thar pa'i sgo 'byed cing// dmigs pa med pa'i sku mdog la// dmar po dbang gi na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang mthar son phyag/ 'od gsal 'bar ma sems ma'i mchog/ stobs dang ldan pa'i dbu gsum gyi// srid gsum thar pa'i sgo 'byed cing// snang du med pa'i sku mchog la// rin chen ne la'i na bza' brgyan// phyag drug gdengs shing zhabs bzhi bgrad// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ 'gyur ba med pa'i dbu gsum gyi// sku gsum 'bras bu'i sgo 'byed cing// cir yang gsal ba'i sku mdog la// btso ma gser mdog na

bza' gsol// pha rol phyin pa'i phyag drug dang// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i zhabs dang ldan// sa yi bdag dang gnod pa sbyin// chu bdag gshin rje brgyan byin dag/ rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyis brdzis par snang// kun kyang bla med gdan yin no// rdo rjes b+han+da dkrug mdzad cing// dgra s+t+wa gtun shing brdeg pa dang// seng ge mchog chen 'dzin pa'o// pad+ma b+han+da dkrug pa dang// zhags pas bcings dang tri shUl 'phen// ce spyang dang ni zhing chung stob// rgya gram b+han+da 'bar ba dang// dbyug pa dang ni rgyu phreng 'dzin// spyang ki dang ni zhing chung snyod// rin chen b+han+da 'bar ba dang// me dbal dang ni dbyug to 'phyar// stag mo dang ni zhing chung snyod// 'khor lo b+han+da 'bar ba dang// rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin pa yis// 'ug pa dang ni zhing chung stob// mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che// bzhad pa'i tshul gyis snying rjer ldan// khyod kyi lus las bskyed pa yis// srid pa gsum du bde 'gro zhing// khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ma// mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku mdog la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang pos 'khor lo rin po che// bar mas g.yang gzhi b+han dmar stob// tho ba ga'u lcags kyu 'dzin// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// mdog dkar sprin gyi na bza' can// 'ja' tshon spel ma'i cha ga can// lcags zangs 'khar ba'i snyings zhags 'phen// nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// dkar mo shel gyi go zu can// lag na shel gyi spu gri 'dzin// khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog nag mo thod khrag 'dzin// bdud rtsi bde sbyor khros ma ni// dmar nag bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin// srid gsum 'tsho byed khros ma ni// ser mo zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// srid pa kun gyi rgyas byed ma// dkar mo skra yi zhags pa thogs/ dbyings phyug rgyal mo zhes bya ba/ sngon mo zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// srid pa'i bdag nyid chen mo ni// dmar mo rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'dzin// nam mkhar gcig pur spyod pa ni// ser mo g.yang gzhi chen po brdeb// dkar mo mig gcig ces bya dang// mthing nag mche ba can gyi bdag/ dmar mo chen mo dbang gi rgyal// ser mo las kyi bdag mo che// b+han+da zlum po sul mang dang// lcang lo can dang rgya gram thogs// srid pa thams cad chags byed ma// mthing nag g.yang gzhi rlon pa gyon// mchog chen snying rlon 'dzin cing za// srid pa kun gyi cha snyoms ma// dmar mo stag lpags rlon pa bgos// thod pa khrag bkang 'dzin par byed// 'dod khams gtso mo chen mo ni// sngon mo stag gi g.yang gzhi gsol// lag na khram shing nag po 'dzin// ma mo e ka dza ti ma/ dkar mo sprin dkar 'ja' tshon bgos// kha T+wAM ga dang ti ra 'dzin// gling bzhi stong gi spyi phud ma//

dkar mo shel gyi na bza' can// lcags kyu 'od 'phro 'dzin cing dgug/ rin chen ri rab srid 'debs ma// sngon mo mu tig go zu can// rin chen g.yu yi ga'u 'dzin// rdo rje pad+ma gar dbang ma// dmar ser mdog la go zu can// thod pa khrag bkang lcang lo 'dzin// har ting dkar mo dun ting nag/ shan ting dmar mo grub ting ser// dkar nag dmar ser go zu can// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor 'dzin// skam pa mo dang phor thogs ma/ g.yang gzhi ma dang za ba ma/ gsod byed ma dang za byed ma/ snom byed ma zhes bya ba rnams// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ser/ rang gi mdog ldan go zu gon// thod khrag dang ni mtshon cha thogs// mche gtsigs ma dang kha 'byams ma// mchu 'jib ma dang rkang ldag ma// dkar nag dmar ser thod khrag 'dzin// lha dang gshin rje klu gnod ni// dkar sngo dmar ser srin mo bzhi// rdo rje thod khrag sbrul zhags dang/ ne'u le'i rkyal pa rin chen 'dzin// 'di dag kyang ni ma lus kun// nga las byung zhing khyod la snang/ de lus rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ste// rab tu grub par bya ba yang// phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ ma lus 'dir ni shes pa dang/ rang bzhin srid pa'i dkyil 'khor de// gnyis med ye shes dbab par bya// gsang chen sems kyi dkyil 'khor de// rtsa bar gnas pa'i nyon mongs drug/ dbyings chen drug tu dbab par bya// rten cing 'brel 'byung chos bcu gnyis// bya byed yid chos rtog par bcas// rje dpon mo ni bcu bzhir dbab// sems las byung ba'i rtog pa dag/ de dag ma lus 'khor du skye// de nyid der shes dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid kyang ni yang dag pa'i// dngos po'i mtshan ma ngang gis stong// dbyings las 'char zhing dbyings la thim// gnyis su med cing gnyis su snang// du+u ma las ni gcig dang bral// zhi ba dben pa rtag cing bde// bdag med stong zhing mtshan ma med// smon med mngon par 'dus ma byas// thams cad shes shing thams cad snang// ma bcos snying po bsam mi khyab// rigs kyi rgyal po rtags pa'i gzhi// tshogs kyi gtso mo srid pa'i bdag/ de las dman pa'i rigs can dag/ rang gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug/ gnyis med bsten pa'i sbyor ba'i chos// cho ga mnyam pa nyid du bya// gnyis su snang ba tsam gyi phyir// sgo lnga'i ngo bo gsum dag gis// mnyes pa chen po ma lus bya// ji ltar rig pa de nyid kyis// sku gsung thugs mnyes gyur pa yin// byang chub sems kyi char chen dbab// gang la gang gis rtog pa yi// ngo bo de nyid brtags par bya// brjod pa ma lus de bzhin te// snying po sngags su shes pa yin// de ltar khyod kyis he ru ka/ srid pa'i rang bzhin rdzogs

shes na// mngon rdzogs bla med go 'phang 'thob// ces bka' stsal to// mu kha le'i rang bzhin srid pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyis// nang gi lus la gnas pa ni// rtsa phran bye ba phrag brgya las// gnas pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// bsdus pas brgya dang nyi shu ste// 'khor lo'i rtsa ba bzhi la gnas// de nyid rnam pa gsum du gnas// g.yas g.yon gyi ni dbu ma'o// mi bskyod snang ba mtha' yas dang// sems dpa' chen po kun sbyor te// dngas ma gsum gyi rang bzhin rgyu// yan lag dag tu grags pa yang// steng gi tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu// sum cu rtsa gnyis rab tu gnas// 'og ma gnod pa bskyod pa'i gnas// grong khyer drug cu dag tu grags// me yi srid pa brgyad nyid ni// rnam par shes pa'i rten can no// ngan 'gro srid pa dgu po ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rnam grangs te// rtsib ma dang ni drwa ba dang// pad+ma khri'u lta bu ste// rang bzhin gcig cing tha dad to// ma hAM a ho ngo bo dag/ rang gi rigs kyi kha dog ldan// g.yas dang g.yon dang zung 'jug dang// thabs dang shes rab dbu ma ste// dkar dang ser dang mtshon du med// nyi ma zla ba 'dres dang bskyod// bde ba che dang longs spyod rdzogs// chos dang sprul pa zhes bya ba// ri rab dang ni dpag bsam shing// nyi ma zla ba'i mtshams na gnas// rgya mtsho'i gting du gnas pa ni// rgod ma'i kha yi me 'byung ba'i// ri rab nub tu bzhugs nas ni// gnas skabs bzhi dang brgyad kyis so// de dag bzhon pa lnga yin te// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ de dag bcu dang nyi shu dang// bzhi bcu brgyad cu brgya drug cu// rim gyis nyi khri chig stong dang// drug brgya la sogs bsam mi khyab// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs kun dang// skyes bu dang ni de bzhin du// lhan cig gnas pas gnyis med de// don chen ma lus sgrub byed pa'i// rtsa bar gyur pa zhes bya ste// las kun byed pa yan lag yin// rtsa bzhi dbus dang lnga las ni// dwangs ma yum chen gtso mo lnga// nyi zla dang ni rgya mtsho dang// rang gi dngos dang brgyad yin no// khros ma bzhi dang sgeg ma bzhi// rgyan byed ma bzhi bcu gnyis dang// gtso mo bzhi dang bcu drug gi/ 'dod pa spyod pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs// srid pa 'di dag thams cad kun// chags par byed dang snyoms pa dang// gcig tu gnas dang spro ba dang// nam mkha'i khams kyi rgyal mo dang// 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo dang// gling bzhi stong gi spyi phud dang// srid pa 'degs byed rin chen ma// gar gyi dbang mo gnyis las ni// srid pa'i gzhi 'dzin brgyad yin no// phyogs bzhir gru 'degs byed ma dang// las kyi dmag dpon chen mo bzhi// bcu drug

gis ni sum cu bzhi// gzugs khams pa yi 'khor lo'o// las kyi srin mo brgyad dang bzhi// dbang chen bzhi dang gdong mo bzhi// sa bdag mo dang ma mo brgyad// gsang ba gsum dang pho nya gsum// nag po'i chung mar grags pa gsum// 'jigs byed ma mo chen mo gsum// sum bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis// ngan 'gro'i srid pa dgag pa'o// drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo rdzogs// bya dang byed pa bdag po gsum// kun gyi bzhon par bcas pa ni// ri rab dang ni yongs 'du'i shing// srog shing tshul du gnas pa yin// 'di dag ma lus khyod kyi lus// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi bdag nyid kyis// phyi yi don du snang ba yin// longs spyod 'dod spyod dkyil 'khor la// dbyings drug lha drug rtsa ba ste// nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ste// ri rab steng gi 'khor lo yi// gnas chen bsam gtan bzhi la ni// bcu drug rang gi bdag po ste// bya dang byed pa'i tshul gnyis kyis// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dod pa bsdus// drug cu bzhi la zug rngu med// bde chen 'bras bu'i 'khor lo rdzogs// gling bzhi dang ni gling phran brgyad// lam rten chen po 'dzin pas ni// 'dzam bu gling du grags pa la// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya rdzogs// dmyal ba'i srid pa nyi shu dang// de yi nyon mongs nyi shur bcas// dbyings gnas pa dang 'thor ba dang// sgrib pa gnyis bcas drug cu bzhi// nyon mongs las ni sprul pa yis// rab tu 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs// phyi yi rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// lugs su byung dang bzlog pa yis// gnas dang yul du snang ba ste// nyi shu rtsa bzhi kun la khyab// lus la rdzogs pa phyi dang nang/ tshul de ma rtogs gzhan ma yin// rnal 'byor chen po grol ba'i tshul// 'khor lo bzhi la gang gnas pa// sad ldog 'bar 'dral 'du zhing 'char// zag med bskyed pas bde bar 'gyur// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig gis// pha rol skye ba bar ma do// drug gam bdun gyis slong bar brjod// de nyid g.yo dang rang gi khams// gzugs brnyan dag dang gsum yin te// 'phar dang 'phro dang brtan pa dang// thod rgal rab tu 'bar ba'o// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga// ngo bo ming gi bye brag go/ bsam gtan srog rtsol dbugs rngub dang// sdud dang 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin// ldang 'jug gnas pa gcig dang gsum// lus dang shes pa g.yo ba dang// rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyi 'gyur// srog 'dzin me mnyam thur sel dang// gyen du rgyu dang khyab par byed// chos dang sprul pa gsang ba dang// longs spyod bde chen dbang gi gnas// 'brel 'ju 'dzin 'phro rgyu ba'i las// zug rngu sgra 'byin 'gro 'ong gcod// smra zhing 'khor ba 'dzin par byed// stong dang gsal dang ring ba dang/ thung

dang bde bas lus khyab dang// gnas skabs rang gis byed par 'gyur// rgyu dang rab rgyu shin tu rgyu// mngon par rgyu dang yang dag rgyu// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// ba spu'i gnas kun khyab pa ste// mthong dang thos tshor myang reg ste// bsam pa de nyid rtogs par byed// dor zhing brlab dang bsgom pa yis// rtsa ba yan lag kun la khyab// snang dang dran rtog byung rgyal dag/ mos pa lhag bsam mnyes pa dang// yang dag thun mong lta ba dang// rten cing 'brel ba'i byin rlabs kyis// longs spyod snyoms 'jug bde ba bsgom// rgyas pa'i rten gyi nyi zla gnyis// g.yas g.yon mdun du ring dang thung// gsum gsum dgu dang bud dang rngubs// 'khor yug gsum gyi sbubs su sbed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab bsdams nas// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga bcing// nyi zla steng gi phyogs su 'phang// gling bzhi gling phran tshags su gzhug/ glog dbyung 'brug sgra bsgrags par bya// glang chen stag dang spyang ki wa// 'og ma'i gnas nas rim bzhin 'phang// rnam par grol bas lus la dgram// dbab dang bskyil dang bzlog pa dang// bgos pa skye rags zhags pa dang// 'khor lo bus pa'i 'dug stangs kyi// bdud rtsi'i don du 'gyur ba'o// yul gnad dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'dra// dgu dang drug dang gcig tu bsdu// me dang thog dang shing dang srub// de yi 'khor lo thig le ste// rang gi lam bzhin skyong ba'o// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gnas su byung// gtso bo brgyad kyi aM dang bcas// rab tu 'bar ba de nyid bsam// phyi nang gsang ba'i bzhon pa las// 'degs byed 'byung dang snyom pa dang// 'jig dang gcod dang bying ba dang// las byed 'bigs dang kun tu khyab// dang po'i rgyu yi bye brag go/ gyen thur 'gro dang dwangs snyigs 'byed// snying rje med dang snying rje dang// snyom dang 'byed dang snyom pa dag/ rten gyur byang chub sems yin no// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya dag/ 'byung dang 'jug dang gnas dang gsum// bcu drug re re skad cig ma// 'byung zhes 'gro ba 'khrul dang grol// ma lus de yis byed pa'o// rgyal po pho brang 'khor 'dra bas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor las byed pa// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad de// shar lho nub byang mtshams bzhir bcas// lha klu phyogs dang zhing skyongs shing// me chu shing dang sprin dang ri// skra dang ba spu so sen mo'o// zil dang rlung dang 'phro ba yis// rang gi phrin las nges bsgrub pa// rtags dang yon tan skyed pa'i tshul// sdig dang 'bral dang spang ba dang// thob dang rdzogs dang snang dang 'grub// bcom ldan b+ha ga las skyed cing// sbyang bya bsgrod bya gnas bya dag/ lnga dang bcu gsum gsum dang lnga// bdag nyid rdzogs pa der gnas so// de bas nga ni mngon

rdzogs pa'i// rgyal po bla na med pa'o// mu kha le zhes bya ba yang// mthar thug don gyi gzhi yin te// de nyid kho na'i bdag nyid do// zhes bka' stsal to// mu kha le phung po lus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi// byang chub sems la gnas pa ni// thun mong dang ni khyad par te// don dam kun rdzob rang bzhin gyis// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid brgyud// sdom dang bsdam par bya ba dang// bslab dang shes par bya ba dag/ snang dang rtogs pa rig pa'i tshogs// sgyu ma rmi lam smig rgyu dang// mig yor sprul pa dri za'i grong// gzugs brnyan brag cha sgra brnyan tshogs// ji srid tsam du mtshon pa las// skye mtha'i srid pa man chad du// smon lam tsam du dam bca' zhing// lus ngag yid kyis rab 'jug pa'i// rtsol dang bsgrub pa gang yin pa// phung pos bsdus pa'i shes pa lnga// kun gzhi khyod kyi bdag nyid la// mkha' bzhi dbyings lnga nyid dang bcas// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus dang yid rnams de yi yul// bskyed cing mched pa bcu gnyis kyi// rang bzhin bya ba yid kyi dngos// bcu bzhi 'khor gyi rtsa ba ste// gzhan yang khams dang nyon mongs pa'i// nye ba las ni mngon gyur dang// kun 'gro lnga dang 'gyur ba bzhi// khyab pa gcig gis lnga bcu brgyad// gtso dang 'khor gyis rab bsdus pa// thun mong sems kyi dkyil 'khor bstan// de las khyad par gyur pa ni// don dam shes pa zla ba'i gnas// byang chub sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'dod chags gtso mo yum dang bcas// mkha' bzhi las ni dga' ba dang// skad cig gnas pa dbyings ma lnga// gnas skabs dang ni nus pa drug/ tshul gnyis kyis ni bcu bzhi ste// de dag 'khor du skye ba'o// de dang de las srid pa yis// brda' dang gnas dang shes pa dang// phrin las byed pa la sogs kyi// rang gi chos dang longs spyod dang// bde chen sprul pa'i gnas dag tu// spro dang bsdu dang brtan pa las// bya ba sna tshogs spyod pa dag/ chos kyi bdag tu 'dzin pa grol// der snang chos kyi dbyings dkyil la// rig pa'i ye shes sna tshogs pa// gtso dang 'khor du bcasapa grub// de yi 'bras bu tshul chen yang// sku drug las ni ma nor dang// ma lus mkhyen pa bcu gnyis te// don gnyis mdzad pa de dag dang// gzhan gyis rig par bya ba las// 'das byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa// gdul bar bya ba rnams la snang// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa dang// 'bad rtsol bsam shes yod min zhing// gang la 'dod pa de bdag nyid// mu kha le yi chos nyid de// gsang chen sems kyi pho brang la// gab pa'i gter du snang ba ste// 'jig rten pa ru grags pa min// de bas nges bzung

brtag pa dang// bzlog cing dgrol bar bya ba ste// mnyam pa nyid du gang skyes pa// mnyam nyid skyes par de brjod do// snang ba dang ni sems nyid de// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu dang// gzhi dang lam dang rang bzhin dngos// lus dang longs spyod chud mi gson// gtong dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa// so sor 'gro bas thar pa dang// ma lus mnyam par rdzogs spyod pa// rig pa'i snying po byang chub pa// bla na med pa yongs bzung zhing// rang bzhin mnyam nyid 'byung ba'i gzhi// thabs kyi gnas skabs 'bras bu gsum// stong dang mtshan ma smon pa med// rten byed lus la g.yas g.yon dbus// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// 'byung 'jug gnas dang 'du ba bzhi// phan gnod btang snyoms sbyor lags so// thog mar mnyam pa nyid du skyes// thabs kyi mnyam nyid skyes pa la// shes rab lhan cig skyes pa yis// rab 'bring tha yi yul rnams la// 'du shes gsum gyis rab sbyangs te// sdug bsngal bral zhing bde ba dang// rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang// dngos kun ma lus gsal ba yis// stobs dang drod dang 'dren pa dag/ yan lag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rigs kyi don du snang ba yis// lus dang sems kyis gzhan don spyod// mdangs ldan zhen pa ched 'dzin bral// zug rngu 'bad pa rtsol ba med// mchog gi yum dang phrad nas kyang// rig pa 'dzin pa brnyes 'gyur zhing// ngan 'gro'i lus kyi rtog pa spang// skye 'chi las dang srid pa la// snga ma phyi ma rim gyis 'byung// gsang ba rig pa brtul zhugs spyod// dbang po pa las spags pa yis// mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i// rang bzhin yon tan rgyas pa yis// bar du gcod pa mtha' dag bzlog/ spros pa'i rtog pa nye bar zhi// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// mtshon rdzogs dpe byad 'bar ba dang// mnyam sbyor yan lag yul dang bcas// zag med bde ba rgyun mi 'chad// snying rje sreg dang mkhyen par ldan// yul snang dag pa rgyud mi 'chad// mnyam nyid lhan cig skyes pa'o// rang bzhin rgyu 'bras tshogs pa yis// dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa'o// nga nyid mngon du rdzogs pa ste// chos dbyings rig pa'i ye shes dang// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// dkar dmar mthing ga'i dbur bstan cing// dbyings las 'gyur med mthing ga'i mdog/ bag chags 'joms byed g.yas rdo rje// chos kyi sgra sgrogs g.yon dril bu// gdug pa 'dul mdzad sbrul zhags g.yas// 'khor ba dbang sdud g.yon b+han+da// dreg pa 'dul mdzad g.yas s+t+wa te// tshe srog mdangs sbed ga'u g.yon// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zhabs bzhir bgrad// gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang// nga rgyal phrag dog sel ba yi// glang chen mi dang stag

dang dom// thal ba rak+ta thod phreng dang// me ri 'bar bas brgyan pa'o// mu kha le ni dbyings kyi yum// mi 'gyur mthing nag chos kyi sku// ye shes lnga yi zhal byung zhing// 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' gsang can// rdo rje dril zhags bdud rtsi g.yas// dril bu b+han+da g.yang gzhi g.yon// nyon mongs 'joms shing snying rjes 'dzin// 'chi med dngos grub stsol bar mdzad// bcud 'gyur bde ba ston pa dang// chos nyid mnyam par longs spyod pa'o// zhabs brgyad rnam thar brgyad kyi ngang// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// don dam kun rdzob bden pa'i dngos// dbyer med 'du 'bral med pa dang// rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pas te// don chen gab cing sbas pa'i gter// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs// dgongs pa'i khyad par gang yin pa'o// snang zhing srid pas bsdus pa dang// rnal 'byor lam gyi ye shes kyis// grol zhing rtog pa ma lus dag/ shar zhing snang bar brtags pa de// mi spang mi 'geg lam mchog ste// de bas mu kha le zhes bya// zhes bka' stsal to// mu kha le gsang ba sems kyi dkyil 'khor
