bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyis// lus la 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gang// thun mong chos su bshad pa ni// drag po sngags kyi cha byad can// phrin las mi bzad cher sbyar bas// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas song ste// srid pa'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las// de dkyil mngon rdzogs he ru ka/ dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag dang ldan// chos nyid kun tu bzang mo nyid// mkha' bzhin dag pa'i rang bzhin las// 'bebs dang bskyod dang skul byed ma// len tshor tshims par byed pa dag/ snom byed ma dang ma mo bdun// yab kyi rnam shes tshogs dag las// ma mo brgyad ni phyag g.yas la// yul brgyad phra men phyag g.yon la'o// phra thabs bum thabs bsnams pa ni// phyag mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de yis 'jig rten dregs pa gzir// brgya byin gyi ni gdan dag la// sha las rnam snang gsal du bskyed// gshin rjer drod las 'od 'bar gsal// khrag las mnyen gsal chu bdag steng// dbugs las yang gsal gnod sbyin gnon// mdun du bdud la bkrag las ni// de nyid gsal ma bskyed pa yin// rgya mtsho ma dang nyi zla dang// bde chen byang chub sems rtsa las// dpal 'bar khro mo bskyed par bya// phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi dag/ so sor bskyed la bsgyel ba la// dwangs ma bzhi las yum chen mo// bde ba za byed rgyas 'debs ma// tshe 'phel ma dang rmongs byed ma'o// khros ma bzhi dang dges sde bzhi// gdan dang dbang po sgo bzhi dang// rnam shes rig par bcas pa las// khams gsum gdar sha

gcod ma bskyed// chags byed cha snyoms bsgyel ba la// gsang ba'i rtsa las dug gsum dag/ dbang sdud ma mo bskyed par bya// e ka dza ti spun drug la// gzhung chen rtsa las skye shi dag/ rtsa gcod byed ma bskyed par bya// 'dod khams gtso mo spun gnyis la// srog gnas pa yi rtsa la ni// pad+ma kro tI shwa rIr bskyed// nam mkha'i rgyal mo bsgyel ba la// lte bar gnas pa'i rtsa chen las// yak+sha kro tI shwa rir bskyed// ma bdun gdan la snying rtsa las// rak+sha kro tI shwa rI ma// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi nyid dang// srid bzhi'i gdan la rkang lag bzhi// sa ma kro tI shwa rI'o// dbang phyug ma mo nyi shu brgyad// nyon mongs yid kyi rnam shes las// g+hu h+ya kro tI shwa rI ma'o// bsgom bya ma mo bcu gsum la// lha chen drug cu rtsa brgyad bskyed// drag shul gdan gyi dkyil 'khor lo// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i dbu gtsug la// rta mgo mgrin sngon byung ba ni// thams cad dbang du byed pa ste// zhal nas hrIHyi sgra byung bas// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// nga rgyal gyi ni gdon rnams kyi// snying khrag zhal du rngub par byed// dam tshig pa la bzhag pa yis// rbod cing gtong ba'i phrin las nyid// srid gsum ma mo mkha' 'gro dag/ dbang gi ma dang tshe yi bdag/ nad rims mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis// rang gzhan don du bsgyur ba dang// gang rigs pa las dmigs pa ni// phrin las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// spyi bdun dmag dang dpung bsdu dang// dmag drangs pa dang dpon bsko dang// ngo bslang lhag ma bsdu ba dang// mdun dpung bshigs dang gtor ba dang// mchod dang dus gdab las rnams la// gcig tu dril dang so so yis// bsnyen pa dang ni 'khor lo bskor// sgo thun dbab pa brnag pa'i grogs// thams cad gzugs kyis bskang ba dang// zhi ba chen por byas pa dang// dbang dang drag shul phur pa dang// phra men so sor dbye ba dang// ngan sngags thun gyis bsad pa'o// gnad la dbab pa'i blta spyod kyi// dgug pa gsum gyis gdags pa dang// ma lus don la sbyar ba ni// phrin las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rang las bsngags pa'i gnas de ru// yo byad gsum gyi phun tshogs nas// mtshan dang ldan pa'i grogs mchog dang// rnam shes rten rdzas bcu gcig ldan// snod chen lcang lo yang dag ldan// rak+tar bcas dang mar me btang// shun pa'i sprin dang bla re dang// chas gos shun chen ral ga bgo/ spyi blugs zhwa dang phreng ba dang// rigs bzhi mchog gi phur pa dang// stag dang glang chen bgo ba dang// sems can chen po lnga dag gi/ dbang po don snying yan lag dag/ rgyal mtshan bla re za ra tshag/ rang gi rigs dang rnam grangs mthun// mchod chen rab tu sbyar bas

ni// gnas dang phrin las dmigs par bya/ A+oM hUM badzra shrI he ru ka hUM a a/ A+oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka gu h+ya dz+nyA na kro tI shwa rI s+t+wam/ ma ma yo gi nI ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM nyid bzhi mu kha le kro d+hI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+mar+ya bde klong 'dus 'dus na snying dza/ sha yu ti ni hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A+oM g+hi sa mu hUM ha/ A+oM dz+wa la ram pa ha/ A+oM b+hi sha san ti ha/ A+oM b+hi yaM yaM ha/ A+oM ma hA lo te ha/ A+oM kro d+hI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+mar+ya hUM hUM/ A+oM badzra shAn ti pad+ma ka ru ting b+h+yo/ A+oM mu tri ni b+h+yo/ A+oM a shan tri ni b+h+yo/ A+oM b+ha ga dun tri ni b+h+yo/ A+oM kha mun dan tri ni b+h+yo/ A+oM badzra sur+ya bi to a to ye/ A+oM badzra pad+ma bi to a to ye/ A+oM badzra kha rag bi to a to ye/ A+oM badzra sring 'gro bi to a to ye/ A+oM badzra a keM a keM b+h+yo/ A+oM badzra ta keM ta keM b+h+yo/ A+oM badzra nI la nI la b+h+yo/ A+oM badzra lan d+ha lan d+ha b+h+yo/ A+oM badzra dza traM mu raM shaM badzra dza traM mu raM shaM b+h+yo/ A+oM badzra kha rag snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ trag rag sha trag rag sha b+h+yo/ trag rag sha mu tra baM kha mu tra baM rak+sha b+h+yo/ pra ka ra ka ti tiSh+Tha b+h+yo/ pra g+hi wa g+hi sha b+h+yo/ oM hUM ka ri ka/ ba rod+d+ha rod/ nI la chu mi ha/ kha T+wAM ga/ da la tsa la/ pad+ma tsan+da/ ma gu ra ga te/ ting saM ting saM/ A+e A ra li/ bu byi ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ trag rag sha trag rag sha b+h+yo/ a ting a ting b+h+yo/ byi ting byi ting b+h+yo/ su ting su ting b+h+yo/ yu ting yu ting b+h+yo/ badzra shAn+tiM shIn+taM b+h+yo/ badzra dun+ting dun+ting b+h+yo/ badzra har ting har ting b+h+yo/ badzra grub ting grub ting b+h+yo/ te saM te saM b+h+yo/ a bar d+ha la a bar d+ha la b+h+yo/ d+ha la d+hu na d+hu na b+h+yo/ d+hi na ma ma ya sa ma ma ya sa b+h+yo/ rang gi las kyi mtha' yis te// gsang sngags thun gyis gsad dang gso// gang gis gang la bsngags pa de// he ru ka yi gsung gi sgra// drag sngags bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zhes bka' stsal to// mu kha le thun mong las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi// sku dang mtshungs par bstod pa ni// hUM bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// zhal g.yas dkar ba chos kyi dbyings// g.yon dmar rig pa'i ye shes nyid// dbus mthing gnyis med 'gyur ba med// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje ni// bag chags rtog pa ma lus 'joms// bar ma dril bu chos sgra sgrogs// tha ma sbrul zhags gdug pa 'dul// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+da ni// 'khor ba zhal du rngub cing gsol// bar ma g.yang gzhi ma tshogs 'dul// tha ma ga'u bkrag mdangs sbed// rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyi bdud bzhi gnon// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs pa ni// sa brgya mnan pa'i rtog pa 'dul// kun tu bzang mo mu kha le// dbu gcig zhal ni phyogs bzhir gzigs// sku gcig mkha' gsang phyogs bzhir bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag 'gyur ba med// chos kyi sku yi dbu gcig las// ye

shes lnga yis kun tu gzigs// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// dang po rdo rje dril bu bsnams// nyon mongs 'joms shing chos sgra sgrogs// bar ma dril zhags b+han+d+ha ni// khams gsum spros bral sa la 'god// tha ma bdud rtsi g.yang gzhi yis// thugs rje longs spyod mnyam par mdzad// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khril// rigs lnga gcig tu skyed cing sdud// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i lha brgyad gzir// rnam par thar brgyad lam la 'god// gnyis su med pa'i 'phro 'du las// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// ye shes ma mo 'char zhing 'phro// las kyi ma mo rbod cing gtong// sprul pa'i ma mo mchod cing lha// mngon rdzogs yab yum sku la bstod// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// sku mdog dkar mo shel ltar dag/ dkar la dag pa'i na bza' gsol// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi 'jigs seng ge'i gdong dang ldan// dang po rdo rje b+han+da 'bar// bar ma dgra s+t+wa gtun shing brdeg/ tha ma seng ge mchog chen snyod// zhabs bzhi brgya byin steng nas bgrad// lho phyogs mkha' 'gro ba glang gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od 'bar gsal// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' mthing sngon baiDUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rin chen b+han+da 'bar// bar ma me dbal dbyug to bsnams// tha ma stag mo zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi gshin rje'i steng na bgrad// nub phyogs mkha' 'gro sud ka'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo mnyen gsal ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dmar mo dbang gis mdzes// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po pad+ma b+han+da 'bar// bar ma zhags pa tri shU la// tha ma ce spyang zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi chu bdag steng na bgrad// byang gi mkha' 'gro khyung chen gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// sku mdog ljang gu 'bar ba la// na bza' ljang gu baiDUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rgya gram b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar ma dbyug tho rgyu phreng 'dzin// tha ma spyang mo zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi gnod sbyin steng du bgrad// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rdo rje mchu// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyam// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' ser po btso ma gser// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po 'khor lo b+han+da 'bar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin// tha ma 'ug pa zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi bdud kyi steng na bgrad// yum chen rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga// dbyings kyi yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma chen srid pa bde 'gro ma// khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ste/ sku mdog

mthing nag 'bar ba la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag g.yas dang po 'khor lo bskor// bar ma g.yang gzhi bsnams shing brdeb// tha ma tshe yi ga'u sbed// g.yon gyi dang po rin po che// bar ma b+han+da dmar gyis bkang// tha ma lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams// zhabs kun brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// ma gcig nyi zla thod phreng can// sku mdog dkar mo 'od dang bcas// sprin dkar brtsegs pa'i na bza' can// 'ja' tshon 'od kyi cha ga can// nyi zla stong gi dbu thod can// phyag g.yas zangs lcags dkar nag la// snying gis brgyus pa'i zhags pa 'phen// g.yon pas nyi zla'i zhags pa 'phen// zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' shel gyi go zu gsol// phyag na shel gyi spu gri bsnams// khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' g.yu yi go zu gsol// phyag na thod khrag 'dzin cing gsol// bdud rtsi khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' le brgan go zu gsol// phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// srid gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' ser po gser ltar 'tsher// phyag na rgyal mtshan zhing lpags bsnams// dkar mo srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na skra yi zhags pa thogs// sngon mo dbyings phyug rgyal mo ni// zhing gi dbyig pa phyag na bsnams// dmar po bdag nyid chen mo ni// phyag na rgyu ma'i zhags pa bsnams// ser mo chen mo gcig spyod ma// phyag na zhing gi g.yang gzhi brdeb// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// phyag na b+han+da zlum po bsnams// nag mo chen mo mche ba can// phyag na b+han+da sul mang thogs// dmar mo chen mo dbang sdud ma// phyag na b+han+da lcang lo thogs// ser mo chen mo tshe 'phel ma// phyag na thod pa rgya gram thogs// las kyi srid pa chags byed ma// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' g.yang gzhi rlon pa gsol// phyag na tsit+ta 'bar ba bsnams// rnal 'byor srid pa cha snyoms ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// stag lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// lag na thod pa khrag bkang thogs// ma mo e ka dzA Ti ma// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' sprin gyi go zu gsol// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// kha T+wAM dang ni zhing chen bsnams// 'dod khams gtso mo chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// sku stod stag gi g.yang gzhi la// sku smad zangs kyi sleng mas g.yogs// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing thogs// gling bzhi spyi phud bdag

mo ni// dkar mo sgeg pa'i cha byad can// na bza' shel gyi go zu gsol// phyag na lcags kyu 'od 'phro thogs// rin chen srid 'debs chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo chen mo la// mu tig khu 'phang go zu gsol// phyag na g.yu yi ga'u thogs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku yi cha byad dmar mo la// le brgan dmar mo'i go zu gsol// phyag na thod phrag bsnams shing gsol// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' gser gyi go zu gsol// phyag na thod khrag lcang lo thogs// ma mo har ting dkar mo ni// sku la shel gyi go zu gsol// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo chen mo ni// sku la gser gyi go zu gsol// lag na sa yi dkyil 'khor thogs// shAn ting dmar mo chen mo ni// sku la bye ru'i go zu gsol// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nag mo chen mo ni// sku la g.yu yi go zu gsol// lag na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs// srin mo chen mo skam pa mo// sku mdog dkar mo go zu can// lag na shel phur b+han+da thogs// srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// sku mdog sngon mo go zu can// phyag na thod phrag bsnams shing gsol// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma// sku mdog dmar mo go zu can// phyag na b+han+da thod sbam thogs// srin mo chen mo za ba mo// dmar mo phyag na lpags rlon thogs// srin mo chen mo gsod byed ma// ser mo b+han+da ral gri thogs// srin mo chen mo ze byed ma// ser nag b+han+da lcags kyu thogs// srin mo chen mo snom byed ma// dkar mo b+han+da rlon pa thogs// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// phyag na thod pa dkar po thogs// lho yi nag po kha 'byams ma// phyag na b+han+da sngon po thogs// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// phyag na b+han+da dmar po thogs// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// phyag na b+han+da ser po thogs// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring// dkar mo rdo rje rtse gsum thogs// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring// sngon mo phyag na thod dbyug thogs// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring// dmar mo sbrul nag zhags pa thogs// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring// ser mo ne le'i rkyal pa thogs// ma mo chen mo 'di rnams kyang// ye shes sngon du brnyes byas kyang// phrin las tshogs kyi gtso bo ste// thugs ni dbyings las 'gyur ba med// gsung ni grag stong chos kyi gsung// sku ni sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// yon tan ma lus phun sum tshogs// phrin las drag shul gdug pa 'dul// res 'ga' 'jig rten srid pa'i tshul// res 'ga' gab sbas gsang ba'i tshul// res 'ga' rnal 'byor grol ba'i tshul// res 'ga' drag po sngags kyi tshul// kun kyang dur khrod chas

kyis brgyan// ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bka' stsal to// mu kha le lus kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dgongs pa dag/ ma lus bskang bar bya ba yang// phyi ru thams cad gzugs kyis bskang// ri rab ri bdun bcas pa dang// gling bzhi gling phran bcas pa dang// rgya mtsho 'khor yug bcas pa dag/ 'dod khams lha dang shes ldan mi// mkha' lding bya dang 'dab chags tshal// cang shes rta dang theg chen glang// shel dkar lug la tshe tshe ra// gcan gzan gdug pa zhe sdang khyi// mkha' la rgyu dang sa las skyes// chu la gnas dang sa 'og 'dzul// sgra dang dri ro reg par bcas// ji ltar 'byor pa kun gyis bskang// nang du ma hA su khas bskang// lus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa bzhi// byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang tshogs// bskyed dang srog dang rtsol ba dang// spel dang bsdu dang snyoms 'jug dang// 'jug pa gnas shing ldang ba dang// dbab dang bskyil dang bzlog dang dgram// bzung dang rang gnas dgram pa ni// de dag bskang ba'i mchog yin no// gsang ba dbyings kyi ngang du bskang// snang ba dang ni stong pa ste// thabs dang shes rab nyid kyis so// bde ba'i rnam pa gsal ba ste// gsal ba de ni mi rtog pa'o// mi rtog pa ni ye shes kyi// ye shes de ni dbyings kyis so// ma lus pa ni des bskangs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa mnyes// yon tan tshogs su bskang ba yang// skyes pa'am ni bud med kyis// ti ra rgyu mchog mtshan ldan de// phyi nang khrus kyis dag byas te// shes pa dag gis byin brlabs nas// lus kyis mngon rdzogs rgyal po ste// yid kyis mu kha le khyed nyid// rnam snang mdzad pa rus pas te// 'od 'bar gsal ma drod kyis so// khrag gis mnyen gsal ma nyid de// yang dag gsal ma dbugs kyis so// gzhan yang don snying nang rol dang// dbang po yan lag nying lag gis// ma mo tshogs dang bcas pa yi// sku gsung bcas pa ma lus bskang// phrin las khyad par las kyi mchog/ bsgrub pa'i don phyir bsgral ba'i rgyu// srog mdangs ji snyed gnas pa yis// phrin las bdag mo de dag bskang// bsgrub pa chen po rgyun du ni// bskyed dang dgug dang gzhug pa dang// bcing dang gnyis su med pa dang// spyan drangs pa dang phyag btsal zhing// mchod cing bstod pa bzlas pa yis// bskang bar bya ba nyid yin no// 'di la byang chub bla med phyir// smin par bya ba 'di nyid kyi// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis// zhi ba byang chub sems shes byed// bum pa dang ni shes rab dang// kun rdzob don dam byang chub

sems// rim pa gang gis yang smin bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bskang ba'o// nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yi// snod bcud 'byung ba chen po dag/ rten sa gzhal med khang pa dang// brten byed lha yi 'khor lor shes// lus kyi bya ba sngon song nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan mchod pa'i tshogs// smra brjod tshig gis bstod pa dang// bzlas pa sngags kyi 'khor los te// sgra ni rnam pa ma lus pa// he ru ka yi gsung yin te// bzlas pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor yin// yid sems rtog pa bsam pa'i tshogs// myong reg 'gyu ba dran pa dang// blo dang bya byed 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// 'dzin pa dang ni bzung ba dang// bya ba dang ni byed pa'i tshogs// da dang mu kha le zhes pa'i// dngos por gyur pa thams cad de// nga dang khyod las ma gtogs pa'i// chos gzhan gang yang yod ma yin// nga yi rang bzhin yongs shes shing// mtshan nyid go bar byas mtshungs shing// 'du 'bral med par thag chod cing// blang dor med par la dor nas// dmigs pa med par bsgom par bya// mnyam sa gtsang sbras gzhi bzung zhing// rim pa'i tshul gyis smin byas te// byang chub chen po'i lam bgrod pas// ma lus 'thob par bya ba yin// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rigs kyis// tshe 'di dang ni bar ma do// brgyud pa'i skye ba tshun tshod kyis// dam pa de nyid 'thob par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las byung ba'i// yum chen mo mu kha le'i sku'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings kyi ngang du bsdus te// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen por snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// mngon rdzogs rgyal po yab yum gyi bka' rjes su bsgrub par gyur to// bstan pa'i tshogs thams cad ni// rdo rje rigs pa 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs la gnas par gyur to// mu kha le sku'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa kha skong ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// ma mo 'bum gyi ti ka bsdus pa/ rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang// bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ shog ser las bris so////

rgya gar skad du/ b+hid+yA ya ng+ha ra sa mu dA ya mU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa'i gnas/ ri'i rgyal po dang/ grong khyer chen po dang/ dur khrod kyi gnas ma rungs pa dang/ mchod rten gyi gtsug lag khang dag na/ rig 'dzin gyi tshogs chen po rab tu 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ gsung gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ thugs kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ yon tan gyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ phrin las kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ rbod gtong gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ bsgrub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ drag shul gyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ phyag rgya'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ grub pa'i rig pa 'dzi na pa dang/ sa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ rab tu smin pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ shes rab kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ dam tshig gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ sngags kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ slar gso ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs nye ba'i sras su gyur pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa du ma rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'dzin// chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// thos dang gzung ba rnams kyi don// rang gi rigs kyi 'khor la bstan// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dgongs pa rab tu bsdus pa'i don// rtsa ba'i tshul du bshad pa ni// mchog dang bar ma dman la sogs// gdul bya'i khyad par gang snang yang// thog ma nyid du bstan pa'i yul// sangs rgyas rnams dang de yi sras// gang gis 'dul ba de nyid la// de dang mthun pa'i gzugs ston te// 'bad pas rab tu brtsam par bya// dper na nad kyi gdungs pa zhig/ gso byed sman pa 'tshol ba'i phyir// bar du 'bad pa bskyed pa ltar// 'di ni nyon mongs rtsa ba dang// yan lag rnams kyi nad kyis gzir// gnyen po'i sman ldan rdo rje 'dzin// thabs mkhas chen po ma gtogs pa// dman pa'i sman pas nad de nyid// 'joms shing bsal bar nus ma yin// gzhan yang bus pa btsas ma thag/ ma yis bor na skyes bu gzhan// mthu stobs longs spyod ldan pa yis// gsos kyang 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ltar// thog mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba nas// yang dag don la shed ma bye// mi shes rmongs pa'i bus pa rnams// ma dang mtshungs pa'i rig pa 'dzin// snying rje dang ni nus par ldan// shes rab phun sum tshogs des gso//

mig dang bral ba'i skyes bu ni// gsal ba can gyis ma khrid na// de nyid dang ni de 'dra bas// bkri zhing don byed mi nus ltar// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gi// rab tu mdongs gyur rmongs pa dag/ ma lus shes bya rab gsal ba'i// mig ldan rig pa can gyis ni// thar pa'i lam la bkri dgos pa// rdo rje can dag nye bar bsten// de yis nges par bya ba dag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang gsung yang// rig pa nyid du bya ba yang// yon tan ma lus thams cad dag/ gong nas gong du spel ba dang// nyon mongs rtog pa'i sgrib pa dag/ gnyen pos spangs shing sbyang ba dang// myur du brtan pa ma mnyam kyang// 'phro mthud lam gyis bgrod pa'i phyir// bag chags bzang pos gnas par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// dgra bcom nyan thos rang rgyal dag/ so so'i skye bo dang po pa'i// yon tan phun tshogs ma lus pa// gong ma dag la brten nas 'byung// gsum/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ste drug/ dang lnga yi 'bras bu yis// drug dang nyi shu la sogs pa'i// 'bras bu bcu dang lnga sogs bskyed// de dag 'di la brten nas sbyang// thun mong pa yi sangs rgyas dag/ grangs med gsum du thogs par snang// snyigs ma can gyi sems can dag/ tshe thung nad mang skal ba zhan// tshe gcig nus pa yod min pas// phyi ma rnams su 'phro mthud de// theg pa chen po dge ba'i las// stong du 'phel bas skye bo dag/ rang rgyud gnas la de mi shong// dang po'i sar gnas la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnam dang 'phrad// de bas gnas skabs mthar thug tu// 'bras bu chen po 'thob 'dod pas// ngoms pa med cing sdug bsngal brdo// skyo dub med cing dka' ba bzod// gtong phod yangs pa'i blo dang ldan// chog par mi 'dzin rtsol ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa rab tu bsten// dper na 'jig rten skye bo gnas// las dang bzo la rtsol bar byed// 'di ni thar pa'i pha rol tu// bgrod cing phyin par 'dod pa yis// rdo rje 'chang ba'i tshul 'dra ba// mtshan nyid ldan pa cis mi bsten// rigs bzang rgyud dul spyod lam zhig/ thos dang yon tan brtson 'grus ldan// yang dag don rtog ston par mkhas// thos pas mi khengs shes rab che// 'jig rten rnyed pa don mi bsgrub// snying rje byang chub sems kyis 'dzin// skyo med dka' ba ma lus bzod// man ngag ldan zhing lam la goms// gzhan rgyud rig dang drod tshad mkhas// ma lus shes bya'i gnas kun rtogs// bslab pa'i gnas kun zhib par dpyod// tshe 'di'i yon tan don ma gnyer// de la sogs pa'i yon tan tshogs// ma lus rigs par ldan pa bsten// ston byed nges pa'i gang zag kyang// de nyid ldan

pa'i don sgrub bo// 'jig rten gso dpyad sgra dang gnas// rig pa nyid dang phrin las tshogs// gang bstan de nyid phyi yin no// 'tsho byed thabs sbyor lus dang sems// stobs skyed pa dang 'jig rten pa'i// tshul mtshungs ngo tsha khrel yod bcas// rten 'brel tsom tshatsam gyi gnas skabs so// grogs dang phung po nad dang dgra/ gnas dang 'brel ba longs spyod dang// bgegs dang sems dang brtson 'grus nad// lam gyi grogs 'gyur cha mthun zhing// phyi1nang2gsang3ba'i cho gas brtan// rab tu smin par byed pa 'di// thos pa'i lam dang rim pa gnyis// ldan pas grol ba'i chos bsnyen zhing// mthong ba dang ni gnas pa yis// gnas shing thob pa bstan byas pa// de dag de yis bye brag go/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rjes 'brang ba'i// kun nas bslangs pa'i bsam pa ni// 'jig rten khe grags rnyed pa dang// bkur sti gzhan gyi ngor spyod dang// ngo tsha khrel lta dbang med dang// chags dang dregs pa rang rgyud phyir// lus 'di che btsan ldan phyir min// 'khor ba'i sred pa 'dod phyir dang// gcig pu zhi ba'i phyir min zhing// gzhan don mchog tu bya phyir de// rang rgyud spyod pa'i mthun sbyor dang// 'khor ba'i yon tan dga' bde dang// zhi ba phyogs gcig dmigs pa bzlog/ mthar thug rdzogs dang gzhan don spyod// nad pa sman pa sman nyid dang// nad sos pa dang de yi g.yog/ nyon mongs nad dang de sos pa'i// sman dang sman pa grogs bzhin no// rgyal po tshong dang de yi nor// dgra dang dbul ba'i 'du shes min// thos shing bsam dang bsgom pa yis// sbub dang rdol dang dug can gyi// skyon rnams spangs te ma yengs shing// ma brjed pa dang gnyen po'i don// bsngags par ldan pa'i 'du shes so// 'di la ma 'ongs dus dag tu// lta ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// rdzogs byas sku yi bstan pa dag/ gnas pa'i dus su bab pa'i tshe// dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dag/ gnas dus mnyam pa bzhi pa'o// gsung tsam 'dzin pa'i dus su ni// rab tu lhag par blta bya ste// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// sku yi gdul bya rab zad de// ma 'ongs pa dag ma byung zhing// gsung tsam nyid la brten pas na// thugs brgyud skul ba'i sprul pa ni// dus de nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur// rnyog pa'i dus kyi rten can dag/ las dang bsam pa ma dag pas// dngos kyi gdul bya ma yin te// gzugs mi mthong zhing sgra mi thos// de bas rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// ma dag yul dang mthun pa'i tshul// rab tu spangs te khyad zhugs na// phan zhing rtogs par mi 'gyur te// dper na dud 'gror skyes ba la// lha mis don spyod mi nus bzhin// rnam pa ngo bo rang bzhin dag/ gcig dang mi gcig mthun mi

mthun// tha dad pa dang rtogs pas so// dus gsum bdag po ma lus pa// rig pa 'dzin pa bsten las byung// de nyid sngon nas yod min zhing// rang gar spyod pas 'grub pa yin// de bas rig 'dzin rdo rje 'chang// ma yengs rgyun du bsten byas te// lus kyi spyod pa ma dag pa// mchongs rgyugs nyal dang 'phras dang rnyongs// sgo dgu'i zag pa dus min 'dor// sgeg dang 'gying bag 'bru tshugs dang// khri che ba dang mthon por 'dug/ rgyan chas bzang po myur ba dang// bzhon pa dang ni byug dang mnye// bza' btung ro yis bstar pa dang// gzhan gyi bkur sti mchod dang mnyes// de yi drung du blang bya min// ngag gi smra ba ma brtags pa// rdzun dang phra ma brlang po dang// tshig rtsub ngag 'khyal bab col dang// bzhad gad co 'dri ga zha dang// bsting tshig chags pa'i bre mo'i gtam// ma rangs pa dang ma gus dang// ma bsam ma brtags ma dris pa'i// tshig dang ngo dga' lkog 'gyur dang// ngan pa'i tshul rnams brjod pa ni// nam yang smra bar mi bya ste// gzhan yang de yi drung du min// yid kyi bsam pa tshul min pa// 'dra mnyam zla dang drin mnyam dang// grogs dang tha mal yon tan dang// skyon dag bsam par mi bya ste// rang rgyud tsam du brtag pa min// de bas de yi mig lam du// thal sbyar pus btsug spyi bos btud// de yi rkang pa gus pas blang// mthong na langs shing phyag btsal te// bya ba thams cad de yi rjes// legs pa nyid du rab tu spyad// ngag tu 'jam pa'i tshig dag ni// brjod cing zhu ba nyid du bya// don ldan bstod pa yon tan dang// bsngags dang che ba legs par brjod// yid kyis sangs rgyas yon tan dang// mtshungs pa nyid du blta ba ste// de las log pa gzhan mi bsam// khro dang bsdu ba nyid rnams spangs// bsam pa thams cad legs bsams te// ma legs bsam pa mi bskyed de/ de la brjod pa ci zhig yod// bcom ldan rig pa 'dzin pa yis// thob bya ma lus de las byung// ci 'byor pa yi yo byad bstab// phyi ma'i dus na snyog pa can// dus dang nyon mongs longs spyod dang// tshe dang lta ba mthar thug ste// myur du bgrod pa cung zad tsam// brgyad khri pa nas bcu yi dus// dus min 'chi ba shin tu mang// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog la sogs dag/ stobs che de yi gnyen po chung// longs spyod rnams kyi phongs shing dbul// spros pa'i mtha' gnyis brgyad sogs 'dzin// de dus rig pa 'dzin min pas// skyabs mchog sus kyang mi nus te// de la mthar thug blta bar bya// de la sdig dang bya min pa'i// nyon mongs las byung ma lus spangs// dge ba phyogs sdud bya ba'i cha// gnyen po'i phyogs rnams spyad cing bsgrub// spang

blang phyi nang mi bya ste// gtsug gi nor bu bzhin du bkur// dngos po bsam pa yul rnams kun// rnam dag sgo yi ting nge 'dzin// chos dang lus dang longs spyod dag/ rang gi dgos pa rab spangs te// de nyid phyogs su rab tu spyad// lus ngag yid kyi 'bad pa gang// sku gsung thugs kyi rjes 'brangs shing// dka' thub spyad pa dang bsdaus te// rim gro dang ni bsnyen bkur bya// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mkhyen// gang du bstan pa 'das gyur te// lnga brgya phrag dgu'i dus nyid du// nga yi tshul ltar 'chos pa nyid// tshig don yan lag mkhas gyur kyang// nga rgyal dregs dang rloms pa yis// gzhan dag rten dang chos kun la// khyad tu gsod cing gshe skur brjod// bslab bya kun la legs gnas kyang// gzhan don mi spro rang bzhin 'dod// sems kyi lhag bsam bzang gnas kyang// 'jig rten chos kyi rab g.yengs te// phra mo'i rnal 'byor phyir spong byed// mthar thug gzhan don legs spyod kyang// yan lag gzhan rnams sdig par sbyor// legs spyad de yi yon tan dang// spro ba dag gi rgya che yang// gong ma'i rig 'dzin gtsor mi 'dzin// lus ngag dge ba rab 'bad kyang// rang gi sems snang yang mi dul// man ngag rgyud la yod rlom yang// bsrung sdom gnang bkag mtshams mi shes// longs spyod phan pa'i sems yod kyang// bgrod bya'i gnas la mi mkhas 'byung// gzhi dang ngang bzang legs gnas kyang// ltos pa'i gang zag blo ring dang// rtags dang drod tshad mi rtogs shing// sangs rgyas nyid tu khas 'che zhing// rloms pa tha dag skyed pa 'byung// kha cig rang gi phyogs 'dzin cing// de nyid legs pa nyid du gzung// gzhan phyogs tha dad sna tshogs pas// thabs dang yan lag kun sbyor zhing// smod cing sun 'byin 'geg par bya// rjes su gzung ba'i yul dag kyang// 'dod pa'i yon tan gtsor 'dzin cing// longs spyod g.yeng ba'i rjes 'brang bas// 'jig rten chos kyi dus 'das pas// 'di la don yod legs shes smra// kha cig nang gi yon tan ldan// phyi rol chos kyis nyid 'ching zhing// gcig pu zhi bde 'dod pa dang// gzhan don nus kyang skyo ba'ang 'byung// kha cig mang du thos shing bsam// legs spyad rnams kyi don shes kyang// gzhan gyi 'jig rten chos su mthong// rgya che chos la skyo 'gyod cing// gzhan 'jug pa'ang sun 'byin 'gyur// kha cig dang por mnyam bzhag pa'i// myong ba cung zad la brten nas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// bka' lung thos bsam 'gegs pa 'byung// kha cig mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i// mdo sogs brjod pa gtso bor byed// kha cig zhi gnas gnas bskyed cing// gzhi la yod pa yin zhes smra// kha cig rgyu yi tshogs la

'bad// kha cig de yang sun 'byin zhing// thos bsam bsgoms pas grol zhing smra// de la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'// phyin ci log dang yang dag pa// de nyid gsum dang dgu la sogs// bzhi dang brgyad dang bco brgyad dang// phra mo'i 'dod pa grangs med 'byung// de dag gcig gi gcig smod cing// 'geg dang sun 'byin khyad par 'byed// de yis rig pa 'dzin nyid kyang// brtag cing bstan par dka' bas na// nga yi bstan pa'i tshul dag dang// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs bzhin du// legs par brtag cing mtshan nyid ldan// nges par bsten bya'i yon tan ni// sems can don phyir zhugs pa yis// 'jig rten kha na ma tho spangs// bsags pa'i sdig pa stobs chen mdzad// gnyen po stobs dang ldan pas so// byin gyis rlabs dang mthu stobs rnyed// bar chad nyes pas yongs mi tshugs// bsod nams tshogs la 'bad bskyed pas// yon tan bde 'dod yid bzhin 'grub// nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i tshogs// mtshan nyid shes pas bgrod par btub// sdig dang las ngan bsrabs pa yis// ngan 'gro srid par yongs mi skye// thabs kyi lam mchog rab brten pas// thun mong ba dang mchog 'grub 'gyur// rnam thar bzang po'i rjes 'brangs pas// bstod dang bkur sti'i gnas su 'gyur// las dang bag chags bzang spyad pas// phyi mar rig pa 'dzin pa 'phel// mdor bsdus tsam du bstan pa las// mtha' yas pa ni bsam mi khyab// tshul bzhin ma bsten skyon dag kyang// bya ba ma lus gcig pur spyod// 'phya zhing smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// 'gyod cing bshags pa mi byed pas// sdig pa snga phyi rim bzhin bskyed// byin gyis rlabs dang mthu stobs 'gags// lus srog longs spyod bar chad mang// nus pa dang ni yo byad rnams// mi dge'i rgyu dang 'bras bur 'bab// nyon mongs lkugs par gyur pa yis// snang sems sdug bsngal tshogs su 'char// dge dang legs spyad 'phro med pas// bde skyid 'grib cing bsam don ldog/ thabs dang shes rab lam med cing// grub pa lam gyi 'byung khungs 'gags// ngan par spyod pa'i rjes zhugs pas// brnyas shing smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// nyes pa las kyi gnas brgyud pas// sdig pa'i grogs dang 'phrad par 'gyur// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun// che chung drag zhan ring dang thung// ma lus dus gsum myong ba kun// rig pa 'dzin pa ma bsten zhing// de yi rjes su ma 'brangs pas// des kyang rjes su+u ma bzung ba'i// skyon yin zhes su sangs rgyas gsungs// de bas dang po'i las can gyis// thog ma nyid du 'bad pa yis// rig pa 'dzin pa nye

bar bsten// yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma dang// pad+ma zla ba sprin lta bu'i// rdo rje can gyi rig pa 'dzin// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs// ngo bo rang bzhin yon tan dang/ sprul pa chos mthun nyid yin no// zhes bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rdo rje slob dpon yang dag par gzung ba gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rig 'dzin tshogs la 'di skad bshad// e ma rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// phyi ma phyi ma'i dus dag tu// skyes bu chen po rig pa'i sras// shes rab snying rje brtson 'grus dang// dad pa blo gros rigs ldan pas// shes dang shes bya ma lus pa'i// don la rtag tu bsam pa'i phyir// 'dus byas chos kun ma lus pa'i// dngos po mi rtag 'du shes bsgom// phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra ba// rab tu rnyed par dka' ba bsam// 'khor ba kun dang khyad par du// ngan 'gro'i gnas la yid 'byung zhing// thar pa myur du 'dod pa yis// tshad med bzhi dang pha rol tu// phyin pa drug gi gzhir byas te// bsdu ba bzhi dang snying rje dang// don dam kun rdzob rnams kyis sbyang// rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu dang// sprul pa dang ni dri za'i grong// sgra snyan brag cha mig yor sogs// chos kun de dag tshul bzhin bsam// de las 'byung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir// yul gsum la ni skyabs su 'gro// so sor thar dang rig pa 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab bya brten// de nas nga yi ston pa yis// blo chen rigs la gsungs pa yi// smin cing grol ba'i lam zhugs te// gnas dang yul dang rig byed dang// rang gi sems kyis dben pa yi// rang dga'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyi// bsrung dang bkru dang brtags pa dag/ ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du'o// sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag/ brtag cing sbyang dang gzung ba dang// blang dang byin gyis brlab pa rnams// legs par bshad pa ji lta bar// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i blos// rim pa dang ni dmigs par sbyar// rab 'bring tha ma'i tshad ldan pas// gzugs dang dbyibs dang kha dog gi/ nges dang ma nges las rnams ni// rab tu 'bad pa legs sbyar te// rig pa 'dzin pa'i pho brang ni// rtsod dang skyon med dmigs pa'i gzugs// brgyad dam bzhi'am bcu drug ni// lte ba khyams dang sgo bzhir bcas// rang gi rigs dang kha dog ldan// yongs su rdzogs pa'i rtags kyis brgyan// bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa yis// rten dang rdzas kyang de bzhin no// bsgom bya bsgom par bya ba dag/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// rtsa ba yon tan phrin las dang// drag shul spyod dang brten cing sngags// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dang// sa dang lam

la gnas pa dang// blta ba phyag rgya rab rdzogs dang// mi 'gyur tshe la dbang ba dang// man ngag lung ston byed pa dang// shes rab rgyud la spel ba dang// dbang dang dam tshig ston pa dang// lam gyis bgrod par byed pa dang// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// phrin las dang ni rab 'dus pa'i// zhing skyong byed dang mkha' la 'gro// yab yum pho mo'i rnam pa dag/ phrin las sgrub par byed dang bcas// nga dang nga yi tshul 'dra zhing// dbu rgyan thor tshugs rna rgyan dang// mgul rgyan dpung rgyan brang rgyan dang// snyan cha rin chen mgur chu dang// cod pan phyag gdub zhabs gdub dang// stod g.yogs smad g.yogs za ra tshags// pa ti dar la rnams kyis brgyan// rnga gling dung dang Da ma ru// dril bu cang te'u ting ting shag/ kha T+wAM gri gug thod pa 'dzin// rang gi sngags kyi sgra sgrogs pas// 'jig rten khams kun rab tu grags// A+oM badzra sarba gu ru hUM phaT/ de dag bsnyen pa'i yo byad kyang// sha dang bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// dri dang sman lnga spos lnga dang// ro drug btung ba yan lag lnga// bsreg dang bdug dang btsos pa'i rlangs// 'dod pa'i longs spyod ma lus shing// glu gar bro dang rtse 'jo dang// rgod dang steg cing 'khrig pa dang// rol dang stobs dang bza' ba dag/ ma lus mnyes par byed pa yi// thabs dang yan lag bsam mi khyab// ji ltar mdzes dang 'byor pa rnams// bstod dang bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis dbul// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// ji snyed pa dang ji lta ba'i// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan tshogs// gtso dang 'khor dang yongs su srid// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'gying bag sgeg nyams 'jo tshul can// gar dang 'dug stangs nyams dang spar// ldeg dang g.yo dang 'bar ba dang// rgyugs dang mchongs dang 'khrig pa'i lus// rgod dang mu cor smra ba dang// gsang tshig sngags dang glu tshig ngag/ bde zhing gsal dang mi rtog dang// zhi bar gnas dang lhag par mthong// mnyam par bzhag dang rjes la thob// ril por bzung dang rjes su 'jog/ so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang// ting nge 'dzin dang srog dang rtsol// sgyu ma'i lus dang 'od gsal dang// zung du 'jug dang spro ba dang// ngo bo rnam pa rang bzhin gyis// lam gyi chos su snang ba dang// rgyu dang 'bras bus yongs bsdus pa'i// chos kun rab tu snangabar bya// de ltar byas na rig pa 'dzin// 'das dang ma 'ong da lta pa// thams cad kun gyis dgongs shing 'grub// grub pa drag po'i dngos grub dang// thod phreng bsam 'grub dbang du sdud// dang po gnas nas spyan drangs te// rang gi

gzugs brnyan dag la bstim// phyag btsal mchod cing bstod dang bsnyen// dbab dang dral ba dbang dang bstim// dran dang las su byas pas bsten// gnas bsgyur ba dang lta ba dang// yid la bya dang sgom pa dang// sar gnas pa dang spyod pa dang// rab tu brten dang thob pa dang// ma lus pa dang rdzogs pa yis// rig pa 'dzin pa nyams su myong// zhes bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rig 'dzin tshogs la 'di skad bshad// e ma rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// phyi ma phyi ma'i dus dag tu// nga yi rjes su rig pa 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// shes shing lta ba 'di lta ste// srid dang zhi ba dngos dang stong// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// bde sdug rtog pa rab snang yang// chos can chos nyid ma lus stong// shes pa'i gnas ni rdul tsam med// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// rten 'brel 'byung dang ldog pa sogs// rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong// dngos po mtshan ma mtshan nyid dang// mtshan nyid gzhi la sogs pa kun// ma skyes mi 'gag mi rtag cing// ma chad mi 'gro mi 'ong ste// yod dang med pa'i phyogs bral ba// 'di ni kun la khyab pa'o// de ni rtogs par bya ba ste// bsgrub pa'i gzhi ni sems yin te// snang dang srid pa sems las byung// de nyid brtag cing bstan du med// mkhas pa zhig gis tshol byed kyang// nam yang rnyed cing mthong ba med// sems can rang bzhin byang chub ste// byang chub nyid kyang de yin no// de yang shes pa rig 'dzin mchog/ 'dod pa de la yongs mi 'byung// nam mkha'i mthar thug tshol ba bzhin// sgyu ma lta bur gang shes pa// de la mchog 'gyur yun mi ring// tha snyad tsam gyis mtshon pa yis// rtogs shing rig par 'gyur ba yin// dper na rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa'i ro// ma myangs rtogs par mi 'gyur te// nam zhig rtsol bas myang gyur na// the tshom bral ba'i ro myangs te// kun gyi lan tshwa'i ro shes 'gyur// de bzhin yang dag mtha' yi don// ma mtshon mtshon par mi 'gyur te// brda dang thabs dang byin rlabs dang// dpe don rtags kyi shes bya ste// ngos bzung drod tshad ldan byas na// rang rig ye shes mthong bar 'gyur// gnas dang bgrod dang thob pa ni// thos pa tsam gyis mi 'byung ste// ji ltar sman gyi lo 'bras dag/ 'khrungs pas nad la mi phan bzhin// nyams su ma myangs chos rnams kyang// gnyen por mi 'gyur de bzhin no// de bzhin chu chen sgrol ba dang// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang// ri mo dmus long la bstan dang// 'on pa'i rna bar sgra sgrags dang// sa bon me yis bsregs pa dang// sa yis

rnyogs pa'i chu bzhin du// ma rtogs gzhi dang ma bgrod lam// ma bsgrubs 'bras bu de bzhin no// gzhan yang me ni gtsub shing dang// mar ni 'o ma la gnas dang// 'bras bu sa bon las 'byung yang// ma bsrubs ma bsgrubs ma bskyed par// de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin// ma mthong ma shes ma go zhing// ma bsgrubs ma brten de mi 'byung// thabs med shes rab 'ba' zhig pas// chad pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur// thabs gcig pus kyang 'chings 'gyur te// shes rab bral bas grol ba min// gnyis ka med pa 'khor ba'i lam// phyogs gcig nyid ni gnyis kas 'chings// zung du 'jug cing dbyer med par// spyad ces rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// dang por kun rdzob tsam du brjod// de shes nas ni yang dag bstan// phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// kha cig nga yi tshul 'chos shing// gang zag rtag pa'i bdag yod ces// smra ba de dag sun dbyung ste// gang zag bdag ni byed pa po// bcu gnyis gyis bsogs byas pas rtag/ rang gi rgyu 'bras mi 'dor zhes// smra ba 'byung ste de mi rigs// rtag pa don byed med pas stong// dper na ri bong rwa bzhin no// ma khyab don byed nus she na// rim gyis sam ni cig char byed// rim gyis zhe na rtag pa nyams// de la rim pa yod phyir ro// cig char zhe na de yi rgyu// nus pa thogs med de 'bras bu// bskyed pa'i dus na de yod ltar// mi bskyed dus na yod dam med// yod na cig char bskyed pa nyams// de yis phyis kyang bskyed phyir ro// rkyen dang 'phrad pas 'byung zhe na// rtag par 'dod pa de nyams te// rgyu yis bskyed par mi nus par// phyi nas rkyen gyis bskyed phyir ro// 'bras bu mi bskyed dus na ni// nus pa thogs med min zhe na// thogs med thogs bcas 'gyur ba yis// rtag bar 'dod pa de nyams so// de bas cig char don byed na// 'bras bu skad cig 'grub 'gyur te// skyes ma thag tu rgas pa dang// myu gu 'bras bur smin bzhin rigs// cig char don byed 'dod phyir ro// de ltar 'dod na mngon sum skyon// gzhan yang khyod kyi 'bras bu de// mi rtag rgyu ni ma grub phyir// phyogs gcig rtags pas khyab ce na// 'bras bu yod dam med pa skyed// yod na bskyed pa mi dgos te// 'bras bu thug med skyon du 'gyur// med pa skyes par 'dod na ni// med pa de la rgyus phan nam// phan na 'bras bu ma grub ste// gdags bya'i yul du ma grub phyir// phan btags med na bskyed pa de// ma grub gang zag bdag ces pa// kun la phan btags med phyir ro// de lta bas na gang zag gi/ bdag tu 'dzin pa de bkag nas// chos la bdag 'dzin spangs pa ni// nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam gyi// chos kyi bdag ces yod par

brtags// dang po de yis gzung ba'i yul// phra rdul 'byar zhing ma reg pa// g.yag spu dang ni rtswa phung bzhin// de la 'dzin pa'i sems kun zhig/ tshogs drug don dam rdzas su 'dod// de ni mi rigs ma grub ste// gzung yul chos can don dam du// med de gcig dang du mar bral// de yis ma khyab yod ce na// gcig tu yod dam du mar yod// gcig na phyogs dang bcas ma bcas// bcas na gcig tu ma grub ste// phyogs cha 'dod pas du mar 'gyur// phyogs med yod pa ma grub ste// phyogs cha med pas dngos med 'gyur// de 'dod ce na sngar yod nyams// gal te du mar yod ce na// de nyid gcig la ltos ma ltos// ma ltos du ma'i 'dod pa min// gcig med du ma mi 'grub ste// ltos na de nyid ma grub pas// ltos pa'i du ma ga la srid// gcig bgrangs du ma yin phyir ro// gcig pu'i sangs rgyas 'dod rnams ni// phyi rol yul med de nyid la// 'dzin pa don dam rdzas su 'dod// de mi rigs te yul med na// de la 'dzin pa mi 'grub ste// rmi lam sgyu ma ma grub na// der 'dzin sems kyang mi 'grub bzhin// rang rgyal 'dod pa 'gags par 'gyur// sems tsam 'dzin pa zhes bya ba// yul rnams sems kyi snang ba ste// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong pa yis// bya byed gsal ba gzhan ma ltos// myang ba don dam rdzas su 'dod// de nyid mi rigs dgag pa ni// 'dzin pa'i sems de chos can de// don dam 'jal ba'i ngo na med// gzung bya'i yul de ma grub na// 'dzin byed sems kyi ci zhig 'dzin// phyogs gcig khyab pa med ce na// sngar gyi 'bras bu 'gags pa yis// yod med skyed bral der gnod do// sems kyi skad cig snga ma las// phyi ma phyi ma skye ba'i tshe// rgyu 'bras rdzas su yod pa las// skye'am gal te med las skye// yod na bdag gam gzhan las skye// bdag las skye na yod pas so// gzhan las skye na rgyu 'bras kun// nges med log par skye bar 'gyur// med las skye na snga ma yis// phyi ma la phan 'gyur ram ci// phan btags 'dod na yod pa ste// phan btags yul du byung bas so// phan med bskyed pa ma grub ste// rgyu med gzhan la ma ltos phyir// skye'am mi skye skyon dang bcas// de phyir kun gzhi ma bcos pa// don dam spros dang bral zhes bya// nga yi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dus gsum rgyud du 'di skad gsungs// kun gzhi la ni nyon mongs pas// btags pa'i nga bdag 'dzin pa de// lus kyi steng 'og mtha' dbus su// btsal bas gang du'ang mi rnyed de// bdag gir 'dzin rnams de bzhin no// yul gyi khyad par sna tshogs kun// kun rdzob 'khrul ngo la snang ste// rab rib can gyis skra shad bzhin// sems la gzugs dbyibs rgyu dang

rkyen// 'byung ldog ltos pa yod min te// 'dus ma byas pas nam mkha' bzhin// yul gyi snang ba 'di dag kun// ma 'ongs mi 'gro gnas med de// 'ja' tshon sprin dang na bun bzhin// yod dang med pa mtha' dbus kun// ma grub pa ni dbu ma'o// chos nyid dang ni de shes pa// spros dang bral la spros bral bzhag/ bsal dang gzhag pa ci yang med// dag pa nyid la dag pa snang// dag par mthong nas rnam par grol// chos bdag med pa'i mthar thug go/ zhi bar gnas pas lhag par mthong// mnyam par gzhag pa'i rjes la thob// ting 'dzin las su rung ba ni// tshogs gnyis grub pa'i 'bras bu yin// rnal 'byor pa yi blo khyad kyis// rim bzhi spyad pa 'og ma nas// gong ma'i sa nas sar 'phar te// lus ngag bya ba gtsor spyod dang// thabs spyod shes rab dman pa dang// dag pa gsum gyis gnas sbyang dang// zung du 'brel pa cher gnas dang// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// skad cig tsam gyi ye shes kyi// bsags thob brtan pas rten du 'gyur// kha cig tu ni mngon shes dang// sbyang ba lnga dang bgrod pa bcus// dri ma dang bral shes rab thob// nus pa thogs med chos skur 'dod// kha cig tu ni smin cing grol// snod gyur bzhi dang shes pa gsum// 'jug pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyis// yongs rdzogs snang ba'i skur 'dod de// mdor bsdus rang gzhan phun tshogs don// spang thob shes pa'i bdag nyid can// sbyangs shing rdzogs pas rten du 'gyur// khyab cing bden par nges dang ldan// ma 'ongs rnyog ma can gyi dus// nga yi bde gshegs ston pa la// kha cig chos sku gcig tu 'dod// kha cig gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang drug gi so sor 'dod// rang gis grub pa'i tshul du snang// mtshan nyid gzhi ni chos sku gcig/ ltos med ma byas lhun gyis grub// gnyis ni gzugs su snang ba ste// mkhyen zhing thugs rje nus pas 'phags// ma bcos ngo bo gzhi ru 'gyur// lnga dang drug ni nges pa dang// ma nges pa yi chos nyid kyis// 'dod pa'i mthun phyogs ldan pa yis// de yi yon tan ye shes tshogs// yod dang med ces so sor smra// ji bzhin shes pa de nyid las// ma lus shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag/ sems bskyed smon lam stobs kyis 'byung// 'bad rtsol med pa'i don chen rdzogs// skye ba'i mtha' son rig pa 'dzin// bcu gnyis mdzad pa rim gyis rdzogs// skad cig nyid la sangs rgyas tshe// chos kyi sku yi rnam par 'byung// yongs rdzogs sbrul shun brjes lta bu// a bcu'i rig pa 'dzin la snang// shun pa lta bu'i rigs drug 'dren// thun mong pa yi brtags pa yis// kha cig kun gzhi nges shes dus// skye med spros bral mngon sangs rgyas// ji

bzhin rtogs shing ji snyed mkhyen// ye shes tshogs dang byin rlabs kyis// nges pa lnga ldan skur gyur nas// sprul sku sna tshogs bstan ces zer// kha cig gis ni chos sku nyid// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul te// rig pa 'dzin pa longs skur bstan// so sor spyod pa'i skye bo yis// rang dang mthun pa'i sprul skur mthong// gang gis brtags pa de ltar snang// kha cig ye shes rgyun chad de// chos sku sgrib pa ma lus zad// chos nyid ngang du tha mi dad// gzugs sku gnyis ni de nyid kyis// byin gyis rlabs kyi rig pa 'dzin// sems bskyed smon lam btab pa dang// 'khor rnams bag chags sad pa las// yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma'i 'od// bum pa bzang dang dpag bsam shing// 'bad pa med par gzhan don byed// nam zhig sprul pa'i gdul bya zad// chos nyid tha mi dad du 'gro// mya ngan 'das zhes nges par brjod// ces bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rig pa grub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal la// rig 'dzin tshogs kyis 'di skad zhus// e ma rdo rje rig 'dzin gtso// ston pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang// 'khor tshogs gtso chen khyod nyid kyis// zhus shing bshad pa'i bstan pa 'di// sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi gnas shing// khyod kyi gdul byar ma gyur na// nam zhig su yis gsal bar byed// 'dri zhing 'dzin dang nyan dang 'chad// bsgrub cing ston par byed la sogs// gang zag phyi dus ji ltar 'byung// phyogs gcig tsam du ston pa'am// yongs su chad par mi 'gyur ram// bdag cag the tshom gcad tu gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs chen la// spro bar bya phyir bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rig 'dzin tshogs chen rnams// nga dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs// gnyis med ye shes bstan pa 'di// sems can las dang bsod nams kyis// mun pa'i bskal pa ma gtogs par// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro don spyod// bzang po zhes bya 'di nyid la// byams pa seng ge rab gsal tshogs// snang mdzad rgyal po'i mthar thug pa// rang gi gdul bya legs par sbyang// da lta nga yi ston pas kyang// sprul pa dge sbyong cha lugs can// gdul bya so so'i skye bo dang// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la bstan// byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin la// rdzogs par longs spyod sku yi bsdus// dman pa'i lus can drang ba'i phyir// tshangs dang brgya byin dbang phyug che// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za srin// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang// glang po ri bong sreg pa dang// byol song yi dwags dmyal ba'i bdag/ rang gi rigs dang las dang khams// byed

pa'i tshul dang cha lugs kyis// mthun 'jug thabs su rab bstan te// thabs dang yan lag sna tshogs kyis// rang gi gdul bya'i don spyod 'gyur// ston pa'i gsung mchog dpag med kyang// thams cad dga' dang nye bar 'khor// 'od srungs lag na rdo rje 'chang// blo ldan rnams kyis legs bsdus te// bstan la rgya cher ston par 'gyur// sku mchog mya ngan 'das 'og tu// lo ni brgya las lhag gyur na// legs par gsungs pa 'grol 'gyur te// de nyid du yang gang po dang// maung+gal bu la sogs pa yis// ldem po gnyis snang gzhung 'grol byed// dgra bcom pa ni mang zhig gis// bye brag smra ba rab gsal te// gzhan yang rab tu mngon pa'i chos// bstan pa nyams dmas gyur tshe ni// gsal ba'i tshul khrims zhes bya'i bu// Ar+YA sang+ga dbyig gnyen gyis// de dag rgyas shing gsal bar byed// gzhan yang nA gA rdzu+u na dang// tsan+d+ra kIt+ti A r+ya d+he ba// nA ga b+ho d+hi zhes pa yis// blo chen spyod yul rgyas par ston// phyogs kyi ban glang zhes bya dang// kIr ti chos shes bya ba yis// rang gzhan gtan tshigs rgyas par byed// dbang po rab la bstan pa dag/ nga dang nga yi 'khor rnams kyis// rin chen glegs bam bris nas ni// in+d+ra bo d+hi dza zhes pa// blo ldan de la lag gnyen gyis// legs par gdams te bstan nas ni// rab tu rgyas par phye 'gyur te// u rgyan yul gyi dur khrod du// rang byung mchod rten chen po la// stsal nas dbyings kyi yum la gtad// de nas las kyi dus sad de// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las rbod gtong mchod dang rten// drag sngags spyod dang las sna tshogs// gcig dang so sor phye ba yis// bka' rgyud de yi don 'grel bcas// ma lus gsal bar byed pa ni// d+ha na ko sha'i mtsho gling las// pad+ma'i steng du brdzus skyes pa'i// rgyal po'i sras su rab bkur ba'i// rig pa 'dzin pa der snang 'gyur// ma la ya yi yul dag tu// skyes pa'i mi tra many+dzu yis// sku yi sgrub lugs gsal bar byed// b+he ta li'i yul du sku 'khrungs pa// nA ga rdzu+u na zhes bya bas// gsung gi sgrub lugs rgyas par ston// sing+ga la yi yul du ni// hUM zhes grags pa byung ba des// khyad par thugs kyi sgrub lugs ston/ thar mchog yul du skyes pa des// phrin las spyod pa gtso bor ston// za hor yul du sku 'khrungs pa// dri ma med pa'i bshes gnyen gyi// yon tan spyod pa legs par 'byed// u rgyan tho gar yul du ni// skyes pa'i d+ha na saM skr-i tas// mngon rdzogs lha yi khyad par ston// lha yi zla ba zhes bya bas/ 'jig rten rang rgyud mang po ston// zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya bas// drag sngags spyod pa bsgrub cing ston// 'byung gnas gsang ba zhes

bya bas// de dag bstan pa'i snying po ni// shin tu gsal zhing rdzogs par byed// gzhan yang u rgyan mkha' 'gro'i yul// dpal ldan so so'i mchod rten la// legs par bstan pa'i snying po ni// brgya byin byang chub rgyal ba dang// btsun mo sras 'khor bcas pa yis// tshe 'dir grol ba mngon du byas// rjes su spyod la rim par bstan// u rgyan yul gyi rdzing phug dang// bar ta dang ni yang le shod// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad tu// yon tan zhing skyong mkha' 'gro dang// klu dang phyogs skyong mchod rten dang// me chu sprin dang shing chen po// legs bcas rigs pa 'dzin rnams kyi// legs par skyong zhing 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas byang phyogs mtha' 'khob yul// ti se gangs kyi shar ngos su// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// 'jig rten dbang phyug dngos gyur pa// chos kyi rgyal po de byung nas// kro d+hI yang tI rA tri dri'i yul dang bcas// phrin las che la thugs gzhol te// rig 'dzin mdzad pa mthar 'byin byed// wa gI shwa ri'i thugs rgyud kyi// rig pa 'dzin gyis de bzhin te// bstan pa'i snying po rab tu 'dren// skye ba 'ga' zhig rab bgrod de// las kyi tha ma rab sad nas// sngon gyi gdul bya lhag ma rnams// ci rigs su ni 'dul byed de// ma lus rgyas par spyod par byed// sprul pa'i skye ba dang po des// bstan pa'i snying po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las bla med pa// ma lus gsal zhing rdzogs byed pa// rat+na bud+d+ha dz+nyA na yis// khyad par sku yi gsang ba ston// stong pa'i snying pos thugs rnyed de// rta mgo 'byung bas gsung rnyed cing// rdo rje zla bas yon tan thob// mkha' spyod ma yis phrin las 'grub// shrI sid+has rang rgyud 'khol// dz+nyA na shrIs mo rigs 'grub// rnam snang mdzad pas drag shul spyod// brah+ma Na de ba puSh+pa yis// kun gyi lung rtsal snang bar byed/ mthar phyin byang chub son par byed// de bas sngon gyi tshul 'di dag/ nub cing nyams par mi 'gyur te// phyi ston pas bstan pa/ nas mthar phyin spyod par 'gyur/(cha)/ de yi dus su rig pa 'dzin// myur du thob par 'dod pa yis// 'chi ba'i dus la sleb kyang bla'i// gal te 'di nyid ma rtogs na// rten 'brel gzugs brnyan shar ba la brtag pa yis// nges pa can myur du 'chi mi 'chi du shes par 'gyur// gzhan yang rmi lam gyi bzang ngan la brtag pa dang// lus ngag gi skad che chung la brtag gnam gyi gzugs brnyan la sa yi du ba la chad dam ma chad/ brtag pa dang/ sems la snang ba'i ltas ngan pa rnams ni// tshe ring thung yang bsam pa'i yul du shes pa byas dag gis// cho ga rten 'brel gyis bslu dang bzlog pa dang don la sbyar ba chos gsum gyis 'chi ba bslu ba yis// mthar thug gi nus pa ma rdzogs tshe 'di'i rten gzhan la 'pho ste// sems la dngos po'am mtshan ma

med par skye ba rga ba na ba 'chi ba'i sogs pa'i/ rnam rtog sna tshogs 'di 'jig rten pa'i snang ba'i rtags// sems kyi snying po spros bral la// lus 'pho dang sems phyi mar 'gro ba yongs ma grub// rang byung rig pa 'dzin pa'o// gal te 'pho ba sbyang bar 'dod pa na// dben pa'i gnas su lam sbyangs la brtan pa thob par bya te// lam gyi grogs kyis mthun sbyar te// yi dam lha'i sku dang rdo rje sogs phyag mtshan hUM la sogs pa yig 'bru yis// mthar thug chos nyid snying po gsal byas nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa de// dag pa'i rten la 'phang bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// rten gsal nus pa skyes na mchog/ de yi 'phen pa ma rdzogs na// grong gzhan dag la 'jug pa ni// skyon bral rten bzang legs par sbyang// ngan 'gro chos lugs bsam zhing bskyed// lhag pa'i grogs kyis bsnyen bkur zhing// rlung sgo gnyis su snying po'i mchog/ rnam par shes pa snying po nyid// thim par gyur te brtan par gnas// pha rol po la yon tan 'byung// bag chags bzang po'i dran pa dag/ grogs mchog de yis mthun par brjod// snga ma'i rten de legs par sbyang// rig pa 'dzin pa ngo 'phrad 'gyur// stobs dang nus pa ma rdzogs na// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gang du'ang ma grub bar ma do// dgon par zhugs pa'i mi lta bu// 'khor ba'i gnas la thag bcas de// mya ngan 'das la nges par 'gro/ tha mal pa dang lam zhugs pa'i// snga ma'i shes pa de bor nas// lam gyi rtogs pa yang yang dran// ting 'dzin bsam pa'i bar ma do// smon pa'i sa mthong lta bu ste// sgo gsum rtsol ba'i gnad kyis gcun// snang ba 'di dang gnyid 'thug po// bar du rmi lam rtog pa ni// lus dang ma 'brel yid gzugs kyi// bde sdug nyams su myong ba ni// de lta'i gnyen pos grol bar gzung// phyi rol 'byung ba rim gyis dgag/ gnas pa'i rlung gi 'jug bcad de// phyir ma'i skye ba ma blangs par// skye 'chi srid pa bar ma do// snga ma'i gzugs kyi rtog pa can// dbang po yul dmigs snyam pa dang// stobs dang nus pa thobs med cing// mtshungs ldan rigs kyis spong shing shes// rigs drug snang ba skye zhing 'char// sngar bzhin lam gyi goms pa mthud// tha mal phung po'i lus spangs pas// ngo shes ma bsgribs 'jug par bla// snga ma'i 'khor gyi dge spyod grogs// lha dang mkhan po slob dpon gyi// ji bzhin dgongs pa der snang bya// mthun 'jug rig pa 'dzin par 'khrid// phung po dor ba'i rnam rtog 'ching yang 'chi// sku mchog lhun gyis grub pa dang// phyag rgya che dang tshe la dbang// rnam par smin pas yongs grub pa'i// rdo rje 'chang ba 'ba' zhig go/ de bas rig pa 'dzin pa khyed// ston pa rnams dang ngas bshad (0)

pa'i// don la the tshom ma bskyed cig/ legs bstan 'grel byed lung dang bcas// nub par 'gyur bar ma dgongs shig/ theg pa chen po gang gsungs lam// log par bgrod par ma dgongs shig/ tshe gcig rdzogs pa'i lam yin pas// dngangs shing skrags par ma byed cig/ nga yi bstan pa'i tshul 'di la// kha cig 'jug cing dga' bar byed// kha cig smod cing gshung bar byed// kha cig gnyis 'dzin the tshom za// 'di dag dar zhing spyod pa'i dus// pram shrI d+he ba'i sprul pa ni// sems rgyud dag pa rab mdangs ldan// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// shAkya'i yul du byung nas ni// nga yi bstan pa'i phyogs tsam dag/ mtsho skyes A ka ra zhes pas// gang bshad phal cher rgyas par byed// legs par bshad pa rab bsgrubs te// u rgyan yul du gdul bya sdud// nga yi rig 'dzin rnams kyis ni// de nyid byin gyis rlabs kyis ni// gdul bya kun la rgyas par byed// de nyid u rgyan bram ze yis/ zung 'jug spyod pa rab sbyangs te// bde ba can du nges par 'gro/ rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan dag kyang// de yi tshul bzhin rab 'bad pas// rim gyis myur ba'i sa lam sbyong// mthar thug sngar bshad gnyis su med// rang rig snang ba byang chub sems// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin cing// lus dang rtsa rlung byang chub sems// ji ltar rig pa'i don la 'jug/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang// 'khor los sgyur dang lha yi lus// rgyun du gnas dang gdul bya'i ngo// lha ris phal dang ma nges tshe// chos nyid nam mkha' stong gsum dang// gling gcig tsam khyab dgongs pa ste// mos spyod dang po brgyad bcu yis// skal ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o// lnga bsdus gtso dang rags pa sbyang// 'dul byed dang ni rang don rdzogs// sna tshogs grub par de dag 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyi ma'i gnas la yang dag par spro ba skyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor de rnams kyi/ gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa de la yang dag par dga' bar gyur pa'i tshig gi rig pa'i yon tan la mngon par bstod de rang rang gi gnas su dgyes par gshegs nas bzhugs so// gtso bo chen po ni rang gi ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te chos nyid kyi rol pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad do// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so/ :nuM/ ca/ b+ha~M: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa na bdag gi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya'o////

rgya gar skad du/ lo ka sto tra pU dza no bi ka sU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las ma lus pa yang dag par bsgrub par mdzad pa/ mthu dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang/ dbang phyug dang gzugs kyis 'jigs par byed pa/ gtum po dang drag shul can dang/ dregs pa can dang/ stobs can dang/ bzod par dka' ba dag myur du 'dul bar byed pa/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po// de kho na nyid las phyung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gtso bo chen po mthar phyin pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i dbang phyug lha'i rigs rnams kyi bdag po chen po/ lcang lo can gyi gnas dang/ ri rab kyi gnas kyi gnod sbyin rnams kyi/ sde dpon chen po de/ 'og min gyi gnas lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzangs na bzhugs te/ dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs bkye nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bskul to// kye kye gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa dam pa srung ba yi// mthu stobs bdag por dbang bskur te/ dam tshig chen po de gzigs la// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las// 'jig chen 'jigs par byed pa yi// sku mchog drag po'i gsung dang bcas// gtum pa'i thugs kyi shugs phyung la// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// sprul pa 'phrul pa'i phrin las kyis// sngon gyi thugs dam rol par mdzod// ces pa skul ma thag tu// bcom ldan 'das des sangs rgyas kyi phrin las chen po mdzad pa'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chos nyid de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang/ gdul bar bya ba'i yul drag shul can rnams la gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/ sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khro bo chen po'i gzugs 'di lta ste/ sku mdog mthing nag zhal dgu pa la/ g.yas kyi zhal ni kham nag gtsigs pa/ g.yon gyi zhal ni smug nag bsdus pa/ dbus kyi zhal ni mthing nag khro zhing rngams pa/ phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje 'bar bas g.yon gyi dung dmar dkrugs shing gsol ba// g.yas 'og ma brgyad na lha chen po

brgyad bsgral ba'i mgo bau bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi 'og ma brgyad na klu chen po brgyad gyi mgo bo bsnams pa/ de dag kyang g.yang gzhi dang bcas pa/ g.yas kyi spyan dgu gyen la bzlog pa/ g.yon gyi spyan dgu 'phred la gzigs pa/ dbus kyi spyan dgu thur la sdang mig mdzad pa/ khro gnyer drag po dpral bar bsdus pa/ shangs nas srid pa'i rlung drag po 'tshubs pa/ zhal nas bskal pa'i me 'bar ba/ mche ba dmar po bar snang khams su gtsigs pa/ sma ra ag tshom sprin bzhin du gtibs pa// dbu skra ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar zhing 'khyil ba/ snyan nas gdug pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa/ sbrul gyi chun pos yan lag dkris pa/ bdud dang rU tra bsgral ba dang/ glang po che'i pags pa na bzar gsol pa/ stag gi pags pas sku smad dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig le dang ri mos brgyan pa/ thal chen gyis lus byugs pa/ thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang/ sha khrag ra ri can gyi phreng ba byas nas brgyan pa/ zhabs brgyad kyis tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ brgya byin chung ma dang bcas pa dag mnan pa/ yum chen mo rab tu gtum mo 'jigs byed ma rang gi sku dang mtshungs pa zhig mnyam par sbyor ba/ grangs med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba/ bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa thams cad kyang/ A+oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan ta ga ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ ces bya ba'i gsung sgra drag po 'byin pa/ de dag re re las kyang sprul pa dang sprul pa'i yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang bar mdzad pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can/ lha'i tshogs dang/ bdud dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gza' bdud dang/ klu dang/ rgyal po dang/ ging dang/ ma mo chen mo rnams dang/ mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang/ rU tra dang/ mu stegs dang/ srog gi bdag po dang/ nor gyi bdag po dang/ tshe'i bdag po dang/ sngags kyi bdag po dang/ srid pa'i bdag po dang/ gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang/ dur khrod chen po dang/ yul chen po dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' khob kyi sa dang/ ri yi rgyal po dang/ ri phra mo dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ chu bran dang/ yongs su 'du ba'i shing dang/ nags tshal chen po dang/ gnas phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can pho dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa dang/ gtso bo dang 'khor gyi khyad par du rgyu ba dang/ bran dang g.yog gi tshogs dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi gnas nas myur du sngangs shing skrag la 'jigs pa dang/ ya nga ba'i sems dang/ dub pa'i sems kyis thon te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing

bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du rang la dbang med par lhags par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa dang/ khyad par du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling bzhi dang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang/ rol pa'i chu klung gi gnas dang bcas pa dang/ ri rab chen po dang/ ri bdun gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang/ lha'i gnas 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams dang bcas pa dang/ dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang byol song gi skye gnas na gnas pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i cha na gnas pa'i dregs pa can rnams so so nas rang rang gi mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi byin dpag tu med pa/ gzhan dag gi nye ba'i thug mi thub pa/ re re 'dug par mthong ste/ de dag thams cad tha dad du rang rang gi sde dpon chen po rnams la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do// sde dpon chen po rnams ni 'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas nas skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/ thams cad kyis rang rang gi gzugs dang/ long spyod dang 'khor dang/ rgyan dang/ bzhon pa dang/ gnas dang/ nye bar spyod pa phrin las kyi khyad par ma lus par bstan cing/ ming gi snying po rnams mngon du phyung ste smras so// ma hA de ba e dza/ u ma de ba e dza/ du pra ma du phrag du dza/ dun ting ma du dza/ 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yum bdud pho mo dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang gi ming phul ba'o// de nas gshin rje'i sde dpon rang gi tshogs dang bcas pas/ rang gi ming dang srog tu bcas pa phul ba// hrIHSh+t-IHbi kr-i tA na na ya ma pre ta dza/ ma ma ya mun ti b+ha tri dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas srin po'i sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po phul ba/ rak+Sha hi shaM ma ti rak+Sha ma shu tri dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas rang gi snying po phul ba/ yak+Sha ku be rak+Sha ti ma yak+Shi ma dza/ zhes phul lo/ de nas 'jig rten gyi gnod sbyin lha'i sde dpon kha ba can gyi dbang pos rang gi ming phul ba/ gaM ba b+ha ra d+he ba ta du ti dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi rgyal phran gyi sde dpon lha'i sde sum cu gsum gyi bdag pos rang gi ming phul ba/ gaM tri pa sha li ba ra tri laM ka ra sha dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas spyi bdud kyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po smras te/ du phra shaM dzaHa ka ru kaM tsa dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas ye shes las la grub pa dang/ dam tshig gi tshogs kyi bdag mo srid pa dbang sdud ma dang/ ral pa gcig ma dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kun gyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ baM ma ma trag mu tra rA dza/ e ka dza ti ru ru ro ti ta b+had to// re ma ti/ kha mun+t+ra tsa pa li ma sha dza/ zhes

phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi lha btsan po dang rU tra'i rigs kyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/ d+he ba a b+hi shu tri ru tra ni dzi haM shaM tri tri dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi bgegs kyi rgyal po dang/ mu stegs byed dang/ bdud dang/ dmu'i tshogs kyis rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/ bi nA ya ka ti thi ka du mun mun pa dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi srog gi bdag po dang/ gnod sbyin glu'i bdag po rdo rje can dang/ dgra bla'i rgyal po chen po dang/ lha'i dbang phyug nag po chen po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/ ging ka ra tri pa le ra tsa badzra bu ru dza/ badzra sA d+hu tri dza/ ma hA kA la yak+Sha dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi klu dang/ gza' skar gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/ nA ga tsit+ta hu ya na gi ma na k+Sha tra rA hu la g+ha he pa sha mi gi hUM dza/ zhes phul lo// gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa'i dbang phyug ma rungs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi lus dang srog tu bcas pa phul ba/ e a nr-i dza sa ma ya srog breng breng dza dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dbugs phyung nas/ mi 'jigs pa byin te 'di skad du/ kye ma 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// khyed rnams nga la ma 'jigs shig/ nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las bdag/ chos nyid zhi ba chen po yi// thugs rje dang ni ye shes kyi// dus gsum 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// skad cig nyid la mngon du gsal// ma 'ong sems can don gyi phyir// sna tshogs lus kyi gsang ba ston// dregs pa'i sde dpon khyed rnams kyang// thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur te// gnas ngan lan gyi bag chags kyis// lus ngag yid kyis mi dger spyod// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad// na rag chen por lhung nas ni// thar pa'i dus med 'byung srid kyi// de bas da lta'i dus mchog 'dir// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// mdzad pa'i phrin las rab son pa// bsgo ba'i gsung bzhin nyan par gyis// las dang srid pa don yod pa// mi dge'i bag chags dor bar gyis/ bslab pa'i gzhi zung sems bskyed la// mthu stobs nus pa drag shul dag/ sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rjes su spyod// rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka' bzhin skyongs// khyed cag rgyal po rje dpon dang// bran g.yog tshul du sus bsnyen pa// dngos grub gsol zhing phrin las sgrubs// gal te de ltar mi byed cing// gsang ba'i tshig las 'gal byed na// khyod kyi lus sems srog gi rgyud// da lta

nyid du ma rungs 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal nas// dam pa'i tha tshig la bkod nas bzhag go/ 'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs rab tu 'dus pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i dbang phyug chen po yab yum la sogs pa'i dregs pa can gyi 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bdag po chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten gnas pa'i drag shul can// 'dod chags zhe sdang sred len gyis// gang gis mchod cing bsten byas na// bdag cag rnams ni dga' mgu rang// khyod kyi bka' lung rjes bzhin du// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de dag la// phrin las spyod pa'i grogs bya'i phyir// bdag cag so so'i gnas dang dus// rang gi sde dang 'khor g.yog dpung// mthun pa'i las dang longs spyod dang// cha lugs rigs dang bsam pa dang// khams dang byed pa'i tshul dag dang// dam tshig sbyor ba'i khyad par dag/ bdag cag rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'i// rig pa'i tshul 'dzin don phyir du// ma lus rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gyi dregs pa can dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams la so so'i sa dang gcig tu sbam pa dang/ tha dad du sbyar ba dang/ nges pa dang/ ma nges pa dang/ rim pa dang/ 'chol ba dang/ phyi dang/ nang dang/ gsang ba dang/ sbas pa dang/ tshogs pa dang/ 'thor ba dang/ mthun pa'i rdzas dang/ snying po dang/ mngag pa dang/ gnyer gtad pa dang/ bskul ba dang/ rbad pa dang/ bzlog pa dang/ tshar gcad pa dang/ gzir ba dang/ spog pa dang/ las sna tshogs dag gi sgo nas/ rol pa chen po'i gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje/ dam tshig chen po las phyung ste bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'jig rten dreg pa'i tshogs// phyi ma'i tshe na snyigs ma'i dus// dge sbyong chen po'i bstan pa 'di// so so skye bo rnams la snang// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshul// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams kyi sku// rgyud dag pa la lam rdzogs gsal// spros med chos sku 'dul bral med// ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs pas 'grub// bsam pa che la smon pa yis// rigs drug so so'i bdag por snang// las kyi dregs pa khyed rnams ni// 'jigs rten 'jigs par byed pa yi// gtum zhing dpa' la ches dpa' bas// gdul zhing drang bar nus pa las// zhi bas 'dul bar mi nus te// rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu ni// stobs ldan dregs tshogs kun 'dul ba// khams gsum spyi la dbang bsgyur byed// nga dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ las

kyi bya ba rab rdzogs pas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs par// byin gyis brlabs pa'i dben sa ru// sgrib sbyangs bsod nams bsags pa dang// bar chad bdud bzlog las la 'bad// mthun rdzas sa la pho brang bzhengs// dam tshig drag po'i rdzas kyis bran// thod mkhar bam mdzod ldan pa'am// e traM grangs dang sbyar bar bya// dregs pa'i lus ngag yid gnas rten// ngas bshad tshul dang mthun par dgod// phyi rol sgo sogs rgyan 'jigs ldan// dur khrod chen po mngon du dbyung// tsa ra ma he chu glang dang// seng ge glang chen rta nag dang// bya khyi lug nag rnga bong dang// stag dang bya rgod khyi phag gnag/ bdud bya chu srin nya rus sbal// rgod dkar rgod gnag rta dkar dmar// so bya dre'u ban glang rnams// rgyal mtshan sha khrag snying dang bcas// so so'i mthun pa'i gnas su bshams// 'bru bzang bshos dang dam tshig rdzas// bdud rtsi sha khrag snying sbyar ba// rin chen bcud kyis sbreng nas ni// grangs mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir gzhag/ gdugs dang ba dan bla re dang// lda ldi dra ba za ra tshags// 'di la shis shing mthun pa ste// stag gzig dom dred 'phar sbyang dang// kang ka dur bya bya rgod khra/ mi rta ban glang ne le yi// sha rus lpags dang mgo yis bya// mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wAM ga/ ral gri chu gri spu gri dang// tri shUl phur pa so mangs dang// mtshon cha drag pos bskor zhing gtams// mdzes dang mi mdzes snyan mi snyan// dri nga ba dang bsung ba dang// kha mngar tsha skyur rtsub pa dang// tsha grang 'jam rtsub dro dang bsil// gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams kyis// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bstar// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa des// phyi nang gsang ba'i bsrung ba yis// gnod cing 'tshe ba tshar bcad de// bsod nams tshogs kyis rang rgyud sbyangs// gzhan phan byang chub sems kyis bsgrub// chos rnams gnas lugs bzhin du bsgom// ma mthong ba la snying rje bskyed// ngo bo bskyed rgyu hUM du bsgom// de nas snod kyi gzhi mo lnga// ye shes 'byung ba lnga ru bsam// steng du rin chen ri rab kyi// dbus su dur khrod gzhal yas khang// thod mkhar e traM sum cu la// gzugs brnyan bzhin du ting 'dzin bskyed// dbus su nyi zla pad+ma dang// ro bzhi bsnol ba'i steng nyid du// rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsung thugs// nga nyid kun la snang bzhin bsam// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// gtso dang gnyis med sbyor ba las// thabs dang shes rab 'od zer las// e u'i rnam pa sa bon tshul// 'phro 'dus gri gug khA T+wAM gsal// de nyid gsal ba'i rgyud sbyangs pas// 'dod khams dbang phyug gtso bo che// lha mo yum dang bcas par gyur// seng ge glang chen zhabs kyis

gnan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rngams// na bza' ljang nag bklubs ber gsol// gtso chen gri gug tsit+ta bsnams// yum gyis kha T+wAM thod khrag bzung// yab yum gnyis med thugs ka nas// ya ma dun ting rak+sha yak+sha// phyogs bzhir bdud dang gshin rje dang// srin po gnod sbyin sde dpon dag/ yab yum bcas pa gsal bar spro// gra he nA ga/ steng 'og du ni gza' dang klu'i// sde dpon yab yum spro zhing bskyed// d+he ba tri dza du tri// gangs bzang lha dang gnam rgyal dang// spyi bdud sde dpon shar du bskyed// ma ma dza TI DA ki maM// ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo dang// ral gcig ma dang mgyogs byed ma// ma tshogs sde dpon lho ru'o// ru tra a b+hi ba yang haM shaM/ gnod sbyin btsan dmar rol btsan gyi// sde dpon nub kyi phyogs su bskyed// bi tri tir thi rmu du// bgegs dang mu stegs dmu bdud kyi// sde dpon byang gi phyogs su'o// tri yaM ra tri sa tri na tri// srid pa'i srog gi bdag po dang// gnod sbyin klu tsha bdud rgyal po// sku lha gsang ba rdo rje legs// nag po chen po chos srung rje// shar lho nub byang sgo bzhi bskyed// phyi rol khyams la dregs pa can// so so'i 'khor g.yog mang po dag/ bka' nyan gsung sdod tshul du bskyed// rang rang sngags kyis brtan par bya// dbang po'i yul du gsal ba dang// 'jig rten rang rgyud so so yi// gnas nas 'od kyi kyo ba dang// gsang ba'i snying pos myur du bod// ting nge 'dzin gyis tshul 'dra ba// rang gi gzugs brnyan lus la bstim// rang rgyud pa dang gzugs brnyan bsre// oM AHhUM A+oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT// sku gsung thugs ldan byin brlabs shing// rdo rje 'chang bas dbang bskur bya// dur khrod gnas kyi sgo bzhin nas// bka' nyan las byed sde brgyad kyis// lus ngag gus pas phyag 'tshal zhing// phyi nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon tshogs// 'tshe zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa can// gzugs can gzugs med bcas pa rnams// dregs pa'i tshogs la mnyes par 'bul// sku yi cha lugs so so yi// don rtags mthun pa'i tshig gis bstod// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang// phrin las smos te thugs dam bskul// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// gsal brtan chad dang ldan pa yis// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' khyab kun// rang gi yul gsum gsal bar dmigs// dregs pa'i sde dpon re re'i drung// rdul snyed 'dul byed gnyen por gnas// phal pa re re'i gnas drung du// sde dpon chen po de bzhin bsam// bka' nyan gsung sdod g.yo mi nus// cung tsam 'da' bar mi spyod cing// rang gi 'dod pa mi spob la// skad cig tsam la don bsgrub dmigs// de nyid kyis ni gtso chen gyi// bsnyen cing bsgrub

pa tshad rtags ldan// yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas ni// dregs pa'i sde dpon tshogs rnams kyi// so so'i gzugs brnyan gsal btab ste// rang gi ming gi snying po dang// gcod 'phrog yi ge spel te bzla// dus tshod grangs dang mtshan ma yis// tshad bzung ma nor grub pa yi// rtags la bab ste las la sbyar// nga nyid rjes su sgrub byed pas// dregs pa myur du dbang du sdud// ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs nye bar bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba'i las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// de dag kun tu ngas bshad pa'i// sde dpon chen po rang gnas nas// 'bod dang gzhug dang mnyes pa dang// bstod dang thugs dam bskul ba dag/ tshig brjod 'di yis bstan par bya// hUM thugs rje rnam dag dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// chos sku stong nyid dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs rnams gdul bya'i phyir// khro chen dpa' gtum 'jigs byed skur bstan pa// thugs dam dgyes bskul gsang ba'i yum dang bcas// ma rtogs shugs kyis 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// dregs pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten lta yi gtso// 'dod pa'i lha mo bde chen 'byung gnas ma// 'khor tshogs drag shul mthu stobs dpung gi bdag/ khro gtum gdug pa'i rtsal 'chang dpal dang ldan// rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub// dam tshig cher dgongs gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// A+oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn aSh+ta na ya e dzaHb+h+yo// A gats+tsha ya sa ma ya hriM hriM// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// lha chen nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// bcom ldan khro rgyal rngom brjid 'bar ba'i sku// yab yum dgyes par rol cing bzhugs su gsol// snang srid dregs pa ma lus sde dpon gtso// 'dod khams bdag po dgyes mdzad yum dang bcas// lha srin tshogs kyi gtso chen 'khor dang bcas// phrin las mthun pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// badzra sarba duSh+tAn aSh+tA na ya e dzaHb+h+yo// sa ma ya tiSh+ta badzra dzaHhUM baM hoH// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyi snying po mchog/ chos kyi sku las gzugs sku 'gro don sprul// che btsan 'gran zla med pa khro bo rje// dbang sdud yum dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus sras dang bcas// dam chos bstan pa'i tshul srung 'jin rten mgon// zhing bcu sgrol mdzad phrin las drag shul can// sde dpon sum cu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// badzra sarba duSh+tAn aSh+ta na ya e dzaHb+h+yo// na ma A ral+li ho// dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum la// sku gsung thugs mnyes mchod pa 'bul ba ni// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bla re dang// phreng ba phye ma lda ldi za

ra tshags// bdug spos me tog mar me chab bsil dang// gzugs mdzes sgra snyan dri zhim ro bro dang// reg 'jam 'dod yon ma lus ji snyed pa// 'phags pa'i thun mong mchod tshogs bzhes su gsol// khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni// dug gsum gnas su sbyangs pa'i sha rus khrag/ dug lnga sman du sgrub pa'i dam tshig rdzas// stobs mchog nus pa ba liM mchod pa'i dngos// thugs rje mthun pa'i ngang gis bzhes su gsol// dpal chen yab yum bka' bzhin rjes bsgrub pa'i// dbang phyug chen po yab yum mnga' bdag rje// 'jig rten 'das kyang 'khor ba'i cha lugs 'dzin// bka' yi bstan srung sde dpon sum cu la// 'dod pa'i yon tan mchod cing sbyin pa ni// dkar dmar ser ljang la sogs mdog/ zlum po gru bzhi la sogs dbyibs// che chung sbom phra ring thung tshad// mdzes dang mi mdzes sdug mi sdug/ 'byung ba rten
