'brel rol mo'i sgra// glu tshig bstod dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig/ spos sman bdud rtsi me tog dri// bsreg gsur bam sungs dri dang ngad// kha mngar tsha skyur bska ba dang// lan tshwa spo dang bying ku dang// 'jam rtsub bsil yang tsha dang dro// so so'i yon tan tshogs dang bcas// 'dod dgur 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang// don snying lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang// phung po lnga dang nang rol lnga// 'tshe zhing gnod dang bar du gcod// gdug par sems shing log par blta// mi mthun phyogs sngar bcas pa rnams// so sor 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol// badzra sarba duSh+tAn aSh+ta na ya e dzaHb+h+yo// ma hA ba liM ta// a mr-i ta/ su ka ta mAM sa/ rak+ta pi ba tha ba su ta sa ma tha/ i daM gr-ih+Nan+tu sa ma du kha kha khA hi khA hi// bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul dang// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul 'khor bcas kyi// sku mchog 'gyur med me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// gsal zhing rtog med snang la ma 'gags pa// sku lnga lhun grub rdzogs pa'i dngos grub stsol// gsung mchog 'gag med brag cha sgra brnyan bzhin// snyan dang mi snyan grags stong tshangs pa'i gsung// gsung dbyangs nam mkha'i mtha' khyab dngos grub stsol// thugs mchog spros bral bsam 'das chos kyi dbyings// mi rtog bde chen thabs dang shes rab dang// rtsol med mi g.yo mchog gi dngos grub stsol// yon tan brjod kyis mi lang sna tshogs te// 'das dang ma 'das mchog dang thun mong gi/ grub pa brgyad dang mthar thug dngos grub stsol// 'jigs pa brgyad sogs zhi dang 'byor pa rgyas// log lta mos pa'i tshul gyis dbang sdud cing// mngon spyod dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i dngos grub stsol// badzra sarba duSh+tAn aSh+ta nA ya e dza kA ya sid+d+hi wA

ka sid+d+hi tsit+ta sid+d+hi gu Na sid+d+hi d+hi karma sid+d+hi hUM hUM hUM// bcom ldan dregs pa kun 'dul ni// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad de// sku mdog mthing nag khro zhing rngams// g.yas kyi zhal gsum smug nag bgrad// g.yon gyi zhal gsum kham nag gtsigs// dbu skra ral pa me dpung 'bar// spyan dgu sdang mig bzlog cing bgrad// shangs nas srid pa'i rlung nag 'thor// snyan nas stong gsum 'brug sgra ldir// sma ra ag tshom me ltar 'bar// mche gtsigs srid gsum rtsa ba gcod// phyag dgu g.yas g.yon dang po yi// rdo rje thod khrag dkrug cing gsol// g.yas kyi 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na// dregs pa lha chen brgyad bsgral ba'i// g.yang gzhi mgo bor bcas te bsnams// g.yon gyi 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na// klu chen brgyad kyi b+han+d+ha ru// dregs pa'i snying khrag bkang nas gsol// dpa' ba'i chas brgyad sku la gsol// zhabs brgyad brkyangs bskums dor thabs kyis// khams gsum bdag po sde bzhi mnan// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag sku// rdo rje phyar zhing thod khrag stob// gnyis med thugs kyi phrin las kyi// 'jig rten dregs pa bran du 'khol// lha srin sde brgyad las la 'gyed// dgra bgegs gdug pa rtsad nas gcod// khro rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal gyi bka' bzhin las mdzad pa'i// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// phyag g.yas gri gug tsit+ta g.yon// lha mo u ma de bI ni// sku mdog mthing nag gtso la 'dud// phyag g.yas rtse gsum thod khrag g.yon// seng ge glang chen gdan la bzhugs// sde dpon dregs pa kun gyi gtso// yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud kyi rgyal po'i sde dpon ni// khram shing g.yas la dgra sta g.yon// bdud rta nag po'i khri la bzhugs// sbyor yum bdud mo re ma ti// khram bam g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// bong bu gwa dmar gdan la bzhugs// gshin rje'i sde dpon chen po ni// be con g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon// sbyor yum gshin rje za byed mo// phyag gnyis srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// yab yum ma he chu glang gnon// srin po'i sde dpon glog phreng can// phyag gnyis thog ser 'dril zhing 'phen// srin po sbal mgo khrag mig ma// phyag g.yas phur pa khrag por g.yon// yab yum 'brug dang rnga bong zhon// gnod sbyin sde dpon me dbal can// phyag g.yas rin chen g.yon ral gri// sbyor yum gnod sbyin nag mo ni// phyag g.yas spu gri g.yon sbyang mo// stag seng phag mo zhabs kyi gnon// gza' bdud sde dpon chen po ni// phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon sbrul zhags// sku smad sprul 'khyil 'brug chen gnon// sbyor

yum thog gi bu yug can// g.yas g.yon phyag gis thog ser 'bebs// zhabs gnyis 'brug mo kha gdong gnon// klu rgyal sde dpon chen po ni// phyag g.yas sbrul zhags g.yon nad rkyal// sbyor yum klu mo nag mo ni// sbrul mgo phyag mtshan yab kyi tshul// yab yum chu srin rus sbal gnon// phyogs bzhi steng 'og gnas bzhugs pa'i// dregs pa'i sde dpon 'di dag ni// kun kyang sku mdog mthing nag la// khros pa'i cha byad 'jigs tshul can// dur khrod g.yang gzhi'i chas kyis brgyan// rang gi tshogs 'dul phrin las mdzad// yab yum bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnod sbyin lha yi sde dpon ni// shel gri ba dan dkar po 'dzin// rgod dkar ru bzang zhabs kyis gnon// gnam rgyal chen po'i sde dpon ni// phyag g.yas dar dkar g.yon shel gri// rta dkar rngog dmar zhabs kyis gnon// spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum tse// phyag g.yas ba dan g.yon shel gri// zhabs gnyis rdo rta gro bo gnon// dkar po'i sde dpon chen po gsum// shar phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid pa'i ma mo sde dpon mo// 'khor lo g.yas la me long g.yon// zhabs gnyis 'brug mo mgo dgu gnon// sngags kyi srung ma chen mo ni// tsit+ta g.yas la g.yu spyang g.yon// dre'u rta nag po zhabs kyis gnon// mkha' 'gro nag mo mgyogs byed ma// nad rkyal rgyu zhags kyang g.yon la tshon drub g.yas// so bya nag po chibs su chibs// nag mo'i sde dpon ma mo gsum// lho phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje bdud 'dul chen po ni// g.yas g.yon phyag gis thun khrag 'phen// brag btsan srog zan dmar po ni// mda' gzhu 'phen zhing dar dmar 'phyar// che btsan ging gi rgyal po ni// shang lang dang ni zhags pa 'dzin// dmar po'i sde dpon chen po gsum// kun kyang rta dmar zhabs kyis gnon// nub phyogs sbyong la phyag 'tshal bstod// bi nA ya ga bgegs kyi rgyal// phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon thod khrag/ phyi rol skyong ba'i mu stegs gtso// tri shUl g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// dmu bdud chen po bkrag med ni// mda' gzhu dang ni shang lang 'dzin// nag po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon gsum// bdud rta nag po zhabs kyis gnon// byang phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshangs pa'i rgyal po srog gi bdag/ spu gri g.yas la nyi zhags g.yon// seng ge dkar mo zhabs kyis gnon// bdud kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag/ bdud zhags g.yas la spu gri g.yon// ban glang sna ring zhabs kyis gnon// sku lha'i rgyal po yul gyi bdag/ phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon ba dan// ra dkar gnam ru zhabs kyis gnon// nag po chen po tshogs kyi bdag/ phyag g.yas bing chen g.yon gri gug/ rta nag mgyogs pa

zhabs kyis gnon// phyogs kyi sde dpon chen po bzhi// sku mdog dkar ser dmar nag mdzes// sgo bzhir gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// sde dpon dregs pa 'di dag ni// khros shing gdug pa'i tshul 'chang zhing// na bza' g.yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i chas// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan// rang gi 'khor g.yog tshogs kyis bskor// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab// mchod bstod chen pos khyed bsgrub na// so so'i tshogs 'dul phrin las mdzod// ces brjod cing// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yis// dregs pa'i sde dpon mchod cing bstod// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'jig rten gtso bdag myur du 'grub// rdo rje 'dzin dang gnyis su med// ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon nye bar grub pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mchod bstod kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang sdud cing// tshar gcod las la bkol ba'i phyir// byin rlabs gnas pa'i dbang bskur bshad// gsang zhing dben pa'i gnas dag tu// sngar bshad las kyi pho brang bshams// yo byad rdzas kyi khyad par tshogs// ma lus pa ni gzung bar bya// rdo rje 'chang ba rjes 'brangs bcas// mtshan nyid ldan pa mngon sum sbyar// dus kyi grangs dang mtshan ma'i rtags// bsnyen pa lung bzhin brtson par 'bar// gzugs brnyan bdag po slob ma rnams// khyad par gnas pa'i sta gon bya// bris dang brkos la sogs pa yi// sde dpon rnams kyi gzugs brnyan dag/ phur pa grangs dang mnyam par dgram// gzhan yang bum pa mchod gtor dang// dug gtor thun gtor thun rdzas dang// sha khrag bshos dang bza' btung tshogs// rgyal mtshan ba dan mda' dang gzhu// dpa' ba'i chas dang rol mo'i sgra// rab tu bstar zhing mdzes par bshams// rdo rje 'dzin pa ting 'dzin bsar// las kyi rgyal pos mchod bstod bya// rgyu dang mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang// bshags dral gcugs sbyang dbab par bya// mos shing spro dga' dwangs pa yis// bdud 'dul gtso la skyabs su 'gro// bstan pa bsrung bar sems bskyed de// bla ma sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// he ru ka dang gnyis med la// gdug byed log lta 'dul nus pa'i// mthu dbang chen po zhu 'tshal gyis// brtse ba'i thugs kyis dgongs nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug tu gsol// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs// gnas pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// spro bas 'jug pa khyod legs kyis// mngon spyod brtul zhugs dam pa yis// dam tshig chen po'i sar 'dug cig/ mgon po he ru ka dpal rje// 'dus

pa'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa yi// drag shul spyod pa'i pho brang du// mdzes pa'i me tog bdag 'bul gyis// rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di bzhes la// dregs pa 'dul nus dngos grub stsol// pra ti gr-ih+Na puSh+pa hUM// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi// rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu khyod ni// thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// bstan pa bsrung ba'i skal ldan te// sde dpon dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// bstan la rab dga'i sems kyis ltos// badzra sa ma ya maN+Da la tsak+Shu pra be sha phaT// rdo rje bdud rtsi dam tshig chu// 'di las dus gsum 'da' mi bya// grub pa'i 'bras bu gnyis yin te// tshul bzhin mi 'da' bro dor cig/ ma hA sa ma ya i dan ti na ra kan Sha ba mi laM// rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin can// thugs rjes rtag tu byin brlab cing// 'di nas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bar// mthu stobs dngos grub stsal du gsol// badzra sa ma ya tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM// thog ma'i sangs rgyas sras bcas kyi// rjes su bsgrub pa bdag yin gyis// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// lha dang dregs pa mthu stobs can// gtso dang 'khor du bcas rnams kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dgongs// rdo rje slob ma rig 'dzin la// dbang bskur dngos grub stsol mdzad cing// nus chen rtags mtshan bstan du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan gyis// khri stan chen po'i steng 'dug la// snod ldan slob ma mdun bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i bum pa yis// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur bya// gnyen po gtso dang gdul bya'i yul// dregs can yab yum 'khor bcas kyi// mdzes pa'i sku gzugs sku yi dbang// so so'i bstod tshig snying po dang// smon lam bcas pa gsung gi'o// rang rgyud gnas dag don rtags kyi// ches skur dbang bskur thugs kyi ste// rigs sbyangs stobs la ngang gis gsal// phur pa drag shul rdzas kyi dbang// mchod gtor bshos cha sku gsung thugs// ma lus mnyes par byed pa ste// yo byad tshogs kyis longs spyod spel// rgyal mtshan ba dan sgra dang bcas// dus rnams kun tu mnga' thang rgyas// sha khrag dug gtor thun rdzas rnams// dregs pa'i sde dpon dbang sdud cing// pho nya phrin las bskul mdzad de// mngon spyod gdug pa tshar bcad dbang// 'di dag kyang ni gzugs brnyan sgra yang 'dra// don ngo shes pas dbang bskur te// chos kun spyi dang dregs pa yi// sde dpon so so'i dam tshig stsal// thugs rje dang ni rtogs pa yis// rang gzhan don gyis sgrol byed pa'i// dpag med don chen 'dir 'dus te// tha dad mi gnas gcig yin no// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyis// phyi nang 'khor 'das so sor snang// ma lus dbang sdud zil gnan phyir// so so'i snying

po tshad kyis bstim// nga rgyal brtan pos mdun du bsgyel// don snying sha rus khrag sogs bza'// dug gsum tshar gcad dbyings nas dbyung// gzugs brnyan bstim la rab tu gsal// dbang bsdu las bcol gdul bya'i phyir// zhabs 'og bcug ste bran bzhin sgo// dam tshig rdzas mchod sngar bzhin gso// dam tshig dbab cing bstod bskul bcol// 'jig rten lha srin khyed rnams kyang// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// zhal mthong lung bstan mchog stsal kyang// srid pa'i sa bon phra mo yis// da rung 'jig rten las la spyod// rang rgyud rtsub mos phan gnod byed// da ni bka' yi dam tshig zung// ma 'ongs dus na bsgrub bya dang// sgrub par byed pa de dag la// mnyam par kun la dbang bsgyur te// chos nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs// theg mchog ma 'dres cir yang ston// ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i phyir// rgyal tshab spyi bor bzhag gnas pa// kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po nye bar bsgrub pa'i rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs mnyes bya'i phyir// mthun rdzas gzugs kyis bskang ba ni// ri bo'i rtse'am chu yi mdo// 'jig rten dbang chen 'du gnas su// skal med yul la mchod sbyin gtang// thod mkhar re mig dgu brtsegs sam// yang na gling bzhi ri rab brtsig/ 'bru dang sha khrag sna tshogs la// rin chen spos sman me tog gsal// dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi// gzugs brnyan rang gi 'khor dang bcas// sku mdog phyag mtshan yongs rdzogs shing// rang gi gdan khri bzhon par bcibs// ri rab thod mkhar yang steng du// lha chen yab yum 'khor bcas bzhugs// bang rim re mig dang po ru// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang// gnod sbyin gza' dang klu rnams kyi// sde dpon yab yum 'khor bcas dgod// gnyis pa la ni dkar po dang// nag mo dmar po nag po yi// sde dpon bcu gnyis gnas su bya// gsum pa'i phyogs bzhir sgo srung bzhi// 'khor bcas rang gi gnas su dgod// tha ma gsum mam bzhi pa la// phyi nang gsang ba sbas pa dang// gab pa gter dang drag po sngags// las byed btags chags lha ma srin// sde brgyad gzugs brnyan gnas su dgod// gtso chen so so'i mthun rdzas ni// rang gi gdan nam bzhon pa yi// srog chags gzugs ni snga'am bcu// brgya'am stong ngam nus tshad bya// skyes pa bud med glang chen rta// ba glang ra lug bya dang khyi// longs spyod dkor rdzas sngar bzhin no// sde brgyad phal pa kun la ni// shes ldan mi dang byol song ste//

'dab chags gcad gzan ri dwags dang// sa chu gnas dang phyugs dud tshogs// mthong thos dran pa rnams kyi gzugs// ji ltar nus pa'i grangs kyis bskor// 'di dag skong ba'i yo byad de// 'gro ba'i glud du dbul ba ni// rin chen ngar mi rgyan ldan dang// nam mkha' sems kyi gzugs brnyan dang// sku gsung thugs ldan ljang bu dang// shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang// skyes pa bud med phyag cha dang// rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// dregs pa so so'i sku mdog dang// mthun par grangs mnyam gnas su dgod// mchod gtor bshos cha mar me dang// gling tshad chung ngu de bzhin no// bzlog bsad drag po zor gyi rdzas// smin pa'i sa la zor phor du// gru gsum mnyam byas dug khrag dang// thun rdzas sna tshogs stsal ba dang// gdug pa'i shing gi rtsang phur dang// b+han+d+ha dug thun gtor mar bcas// bzhi brgya drug cu sum cu gnyis// ci rigs sbyar te mdzes par dgod// steng du zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'am// dar nag tshon skud gdugs kyis dbub// tha mar ras bzang yol ba bre// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// gtso chen bskyed cing rdzogs pa dang// dregs pa mchod bstod mnyes byas nas// gzugs brnyan mthun rdzas bsngo ba ni// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin nga rgyal bsar// bdud rtsi mchod skyems rak+tas sbreng// sha chen spos kyi dri gsur dbul// rnga gling rol mo'i sgra chen bsgrag/ mda' chen ba dan nag pos g.yab// hUM nga ni dpal chen he ru ka/ gdul dka' ma lus 'dul bar byed// 'jig rten dregs pa zas su za// khams gsum srid gsum nga yi dbang// snang srid 'khor 'das nga yi bran// nga yi bka' bzhin 'dir 'dus shig/ nyon mongs dbang gis dregs pa yi// lha bdud gshin rje srin po dang// gnod sbyin gza' klu rgyal po dang// ging dang ma mo lha btsan dang// rang gi sde dang g.yog tu bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// ri rab chen po'i yang steng na// lha chen dbang phyug chen po bzhengs// btsun mo u ma de bI bzhengs// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// chibs su seng ge glang chen bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// g.yas na pho rgyud pho nyar 'gyed// g.yon na mo rgyud las la 'khol// 'khor du 'jig rten dregs pas bskor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// rtsal gyi rgyal po seng ge dang// stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen dang// shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta// theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i ba// rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan ra// thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya// khyed kyis bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul/

rin chen rgyan ldan ngar mi dang// sems gyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha' dang// sku gsung thugs ldan ljang bu dang// shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang// pho glud mda' dang mo glud 'phang// rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul// dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang// mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang// snang gsal 'od ldan mar me dang// rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang// mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// lha chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdos glud mthun rdzas bzhed pa'i dgor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod kyis bstod// rnal 'byor sku dgra khyod kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgya cu'i bgegs rigs dang// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang// glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang// gshis ngan gum pa bco lnga dang// gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams// zhi dang bsal dang bzlog pa dang// gdul dang tshar gcod las mdzod cig/ ri rab chen po'i shar phyogs nas// srid pa'i rgyal po skos rje ni// bdud rnams kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar gtib// spyan mig nyi zla 'khyil pa 'dra// rno dpal mche ba zla tshes gtsigs// sma ra kham nag srid rtser 'bar// chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// khram thogs bdud sde g.yas nas rol// sho thogs rtsis pa g.yon nas 'gyed// snang srid pho bdud khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// shugs ldan rta nag la sogs pa// khyod kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul// rin chen ngar mi la sogs pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul// dam rdzas mchod gtor la sogs rnams// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// srid pa'i bdud rje 'khor bcas kyi// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs la// ji ltar bcol ba'i las mdzod cig/ bdud mo chen mo re ma ti// ma bdud kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// dpal ldan lha mo 'jigs gzugs can// nag mo sha bzlog bdud kyi ma// sku la mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su bong bu gwa dmar bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed/

nag mo stong sde las la 'dzud// snang srid bdud mo khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir byon// cang shes bong bu la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// srid pa'i ma mo 'khor bcas kyis// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i lho phyogs nas// gshin rje ya ma rA dza ste// gshin rje'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog nag po ral pa can// gdug pa'i thod sbrul g.yang gzhi'i brgyan// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags pas dkris// sha za'i mgo bcad thod du bcings// zhal bgrad mche ba rab tu gtsigs// ma he nag po chibs su bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gshin rje pho mo pho nyar 'gyed// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i btsun mo ni// gsod byed mon mo'i tshul 'dzin cing// gshin rje mo yi sde dpon bzhengs// za byed dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// g.yang gzhi nag po sku la gsol// chu glang nag po chibs su bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// yi dwags pho mo las la 'dzud// snang srid gshin rje khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// ma he chu glang la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// gshin rje pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i nub phyogs nas// srin po nag po glog phreng can// srin po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// glog dang 'od kyi phreng bas brgyan// 'brug chen 'ur ba chibs su bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin po 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed// srin mo gsod byed las la 'dzud// gcan gzan gdug pa phyi nas rol// 'khor du snang srid srin pos bskor// srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma// srin mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar nag 'asngigs su rung// lus la khrag gi lab nag gsol// rus sbal dkar po'i thor tshugs can// chibs su rnga bong gdong drug bcibs// khod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin mo kha 'bar pho nyar 'gyed// gdong srin nag mo las la 'dzud// snang srid srin mo'i 'khor dang bcas// srog gcod srin po yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug sngon rnga mo la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// srin po pho mo 'khor dang bca'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i byang phyogs nas// gnod sbyin yak+Sha me dbal can// gnod sbyin kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog mthing sngon 'bar ba la// me dpung 'tshubs ma na bzar gsol// stag seng rngam pa chibs su bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// g.yas nas me 'bar ya la la// g.yon

nas dud 'thul phyu ru ru// gnod sbyin stong sde pho nyar 'gyed// zhub can 'bum sde las la 'dzud// 'jig rten gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bskor// gnod sbyin chen mo glog len ma// gnod sbyin bu mo gdug pa can// nag mo rdo rje lcags mchu kyu yang ma// snyan cha rin chen ne les mtshan// sku la was+t+ra nag po gsol// chibs su lcags kyi phag mo bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// nor 'dzin mo ni pho nyar 'gyed// glo min nag mo las la 'dzud// gnod sbyin mo ni 'bum sdes bskor// shan pa gnod sbyin yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// stag seng phag mo la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// gnod sbyin pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ci ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i steng phyogs nas// gza' bdud chen po mi bzad pa// ming ni khyab 'jug rA hu la// gza' bdud chen po'i sde dpon bzhengs// mgo dgu smad sbrul mig mang lus// chibs su 'brug chen glog 'gyu bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'brug sgra stong gsum ldi ri ri// nam mkhar glog 'od khyugs se khyug/ gza' phran rgyu skar pho nyar 'gyed// thog ser ki kang drag tu 'bebs// gza' bdud stong gi 'khor gyis bskor// gnam sman thog gi thu yug ma// gdong mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar skya mdzes pa la// na bza' go zu mdzes pa gsol// 'brug sgra glog gi 'od la zhon// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gza' chen nyi zla klad la 'khor// rgyu skar tshogs ni zhal la 'char// lha sman 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed// gdong zor ma mo las la 'dzud// zor gdong srin mo'i 'khor gyis bskor// gza' gdong gnam sman yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug chen 'ur ba la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// gza' bdud gdong mo sman dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i 'og phyogs nas// klu bdud nag po mgo dgu pa// klu rnams kun gyis sde dpon bzhengs// sku stod dud ka nag po la// tsha ba'i 'bu srin nyi li li// sku smad dug sbrul nag po las// grang ba'i sbal lcong khral la la// chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// klu rgyal stong ni pho nyar 'gyed// klu bran 'bum ni las la 'dzud// klu bdud gdug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// klu mo yak+sha nag mo ni// klu bdud mo yi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dud kha 'asngigs bag can// sbrul nag gshibs pa'i ral pa las// mdze dang shu ba'i tsha tsha 'phro// sbrul gyi thul ba na bzar gsol// sbal sbrul nye'u thar ra ra// rus sbal nag po chibs su

bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// klu rigs lnga yi sprul pa 'gyed// sa bdag gdug pa'i pho nya gtong// snang srid klu mo'i 'khor dang bcas// gdug pa klu bdud yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// chu srin rus sbal la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// klu bdud pho mo yab yum 'khor// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi// bang rim gnyis pa'i shar phyogs la// gnod sbyin rgyal po gang ba bzang// srid pa lha yi sde dpon bzhengs// mdog dkar ral ka 'bar ba gsol// lha g.yag dkar po chibs su bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gnod sbyin stong ni pho nyar 'gyed// lha dmag 'bum ni las la 'dzud// ba dan can ni g.yas nas rol// go mtshon can ni g.yon nas rol// gnod sbyin lha yi 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu rnam rgyal chen po ni// rgyal phran kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' dar zab ber chen gsol// rta dkar rngog dmar cibs su bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// rgyal phran stong sde pho nyar 'gyed// grong rgyu phra mo las la 'dzud// the rgyal phra mo'i 'khor dang bcas// spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum tse// mi ma lha yi rje dpon bzhengs// sku stod rgya bya'i slag pa gsol// 'bum bye smad kyi sham thams can// dbu la shel rmog dkar po gsol// chibs su rdo rta gro bo bcibs// khyed kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srid pa'i khyung chen klad na lding// stag seng dar ma phyi nas rol// stong dpon mched lnga pho nyar 'gyed// ma sang spun dgu las la 'dzud// lha ma srin gyi 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu dkar po sde gsum yang// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// gnam ru rta dkar gro bo sogs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// dkar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i lho phyogs su// ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// snang srid ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// chibs su 'brug mo yid mgyogs bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// tshogs kyi rje mo pho nyar 'gyed// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'khol// snang srid ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// e ka dza ti ral gcig ma// bka' yi srung ma'i sde dpon te// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su dril rta nag po bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin mo nag mo pho nyar 'gyed// pal mo nag mo las la 'khol// mon mo nag mo sna tshogs sprul// nag smug 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor// dpal ldan lha mo mgyogs byed ma// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// na

bza'amathing nag go zu gsol// chibs su so bya rog po bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nyar 'gyed// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud// snang srid mkha' 'gro'i 'khor gyis bskor// dpal ldan nag mo sde gsum yang// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug dang dre'u rta so bya sogs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// nag mo sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i nub phyogs nas// skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// gnod sbyin ru dra'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar gtibs// chibs su dre'u rta nag po bcibs// khyed kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// zhing lpags bgos pa pho nyar 'gyed// ral chas bgos pa las la 'dzud// snang srid ru dra'i 'khor gyis bskor// btsan rgyal srog zan dmar po ni// srid pa btsan gyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku la dar dmar ral ga gsol// chibs su rta dmar glog 'gyu bcibs// dbu la bse rmog dmar po gsol// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// btsan po kha bzhi pho nyar 'gyed// mgyogs pa'i sde brgyad las la 'dzud// snang srid dregs pa btsan gyis bskor// skyes bu yab shud dmar po ni// rgyal 'gong rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku la zab dmar ber chen gsol// chibs su rta dmar yid mgyogs bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// g.yas na bro brdung chi li li// g.yon na bshud glu kyu ru ru// rta zhon stong ni phyi nas 'brang// srid pa'i btsan 'gong 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu dmar po sde gsum ni// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// dre'u nag rta dmar la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i byang phyogs na// bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyal// log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su rta nag mgyogs pa bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// rgyal chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyed// phyogs skyong tshogs ni las la 'dzud// snang srid bgegs kyi tshogs kyis bskor// dbang phyug gu lang nag po ni// mu stegs tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su stag seng ma he bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// sa bzhi kun ni dmag gis 'gengs// bar snang mtshon dang dar gyis bkang// nam mkha' glog dang 'od kyis 'gengs// gcan gzan 'dab chags rgyugs shing lding// mu stegs nag po'i 'khor gyis

bskor// dmu bdud nag po bkrag med ni// dmu bdud nag po'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su dmu rta nag po bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// dmu bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed// dmu bran stong sde las la 'dzud// snang srid dmu yi 'khor gyis bskor// skyes mchog nag po sde gsum yang// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// stag seng ma he la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang/ phyi rol nag po'i tshogs dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi// bang rim gsum pa'i shar phyogs nas// tshangs pa dkar po srog gi bdag/ lha chen ging gi sde dpon bzhengs// srid pa gsum du myur mgyogs can// sku la bya rgod thul pa gsol// chibs su seng ge dkar mo bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// ging chen bco brgyad pho nyar 'gyed// ging bdud pho mo las la 'khor// mi rta ra lug bya dang khyi// stag dang bya rgod la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// bang rim gsum pa'i lho phyogs nas// gnod sbyin rgyal po nor kyi bdag/ sku la dom gyi slag pa gsol// chibs su ban glang sna ring bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// skyes pa brgya dang bud med brgya// nyan thos rdo rje sngags pas bskor// 'bag seng mon bu bsam mi khyab// stag seng ban glang spra dang spre'u// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// bang rim gsum pa'i nub phyogs nas// rdo rje mdzes pa zhes bya ba// 'jig rten lha yi sde dpon bzhengs// skyin thang shel gyi na bza' gsol// ra dkar gnam ru chibs su bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'dzin shing bzhi bcu pho nyar 'gyed// the brang stong sde las la 'dzud// tsa ra rgya po la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// bang rim gsum pa'i byang phyogs nas// lha chen nag po chen po ni// bstan pa bsrung ba'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' ljang nag ber chen gsol// chibs su bdud rta bra nag bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// lha dmag tshogs kyi dbugs 'byin cing// lha min g.yul ngo rab tu bzlog/ phyogs skyong dpal mgon las la 'dzud// mi rta ra lug byadang khyi// nag po'i tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang// dregs pa'i bka' nyan sgo srung bzhi// rang gi bka' nyan 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang// dbang chen sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim tha ma'i phyogs bzhi nas// phyi yi lha srin sde brgyad dang// nang gi lha srin sde brgyad dang// gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad dang// sbas

pa'i lha srin sde brgyad dang// yang gsang gter gyi lha srin dang// drag po sngags kyi lha srin dang// las byed myur mgyogs lha srin dang// btags shing chags pa'i lha srin dang// sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta// theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i ba// rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan ra// thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya// khyed kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul// rin chen rgyan ldan ngar mi dang// sems kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha' dang// sku gsung thugs ldan ljang bu dang// shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang// pho glud mda' dang mo glud 'phang// rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul// dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang// mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang// snang gsal 'od ldan mar me dang// rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang// mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// 'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdos glud mthun rdzas bzhed pa'i dkor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed kyis bstod// rnal 'byor sku dgra khyed kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs dang// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang// glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'brog gsum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang// gshis ngan 'gum pa brgyad cu gcig/ gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams// zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang// gdul dang tshar gcod las mdzod cig/ ces brjod rang gi mthun rdzas bstab// bskang bzlog bsad dang gso la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i phrin las bcol// gang la dmigs pa de bzhin 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod bstod rgya chen po'i sgo nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kun// ngo bo rang rig byang chub sems// ma skyes dbyings las g.yo ba med// 'jig rten gnas dang mthun 'jug ste// mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bas// 'jig rten mchod bstod ces su grags// phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag ni// snang dang srid pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i rdzas// 'dod chags gzhi dang 'bru bcud rtsi// gnyis med pha rol snang byed pa// ngang gi ngang du mnyes byed cing// so so'i mtshan dang dpe byad dag/ nges par bstan pa nang gi'o// kun gsang ba'i bdag po'i de

nyid dang// gnas skabs mchod bstod phyi yin no// dbang po'i yul gyi longs spyod dang// gtsang sme'i rtog pa sbyang ba'i rdzas// 'dod chags gzhi dang 'bru bcud rtsi// gnyis med pha rol snang byed pa// ngang gi ngang du mnyes byed cing// so so'i mtshan dang dpe byad dag/ nges par bstan pa nang gi'o// sems dang sems la snang ba'i tshogs// thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor che// ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// 'ong nas ma lus 'dus pa las// chos gzhan med de yul nyid dang// yul du 'dzin pa snang ba'i bdag/ gnyis med rtogs shing khong du chud// mchod bstod rab tu gsang ba'o// lus las sprul zhing bsgrub pa'i sku// 'bru bcu sgra yi 'khor lo gsung// rang grol snying po ma bcos thugs// lha klu gnod sbyin btsan dang bdud// srin po gza' dang mo rigs rnams// dregs shing gdug dang khro zhing gtum// myur mgyogs rmugs dang 'thib pa dang// drag dang bcings pa so so'i sde// ri rab bshos gtsang rgyan dang bcas// 'bras lug snying rtse tsa ru'i dbyibs// dkar dmar bcud ldan dmigs kyis mchod// pha dang rgyal po grogs dang lha// ma dang rje khol bran dang bu// bsten pa rang gi tshul yin no// che btsan dbang gi dngos grub dang// longs spyod 'phel zhing mngag par sla// rgyud 'jam skyabs che bka' nyan cing// drag rtsal ldan zhing slar mi ldog/ shin tu nye ba'i yon tan te// rang la rtsub cing 'cha' ba dang// longs spyod mi 'byor mi 'phrod dang// glo bur nad kyis gzir byed cing// slar ldog bkra shis nyams pa dang// bsgo ba mi nyan don med cing// rang rgyud rtsub cing khengs pa dang// rigs brgyud mi 'phel kun gyis brnyas// bsam don mi 'grub mnga' thang nyams// rgyud don sbas pa ma shes skyon// khrims kyi bdag po lta bu'i lha// gnad kyis bcings shing bsgrub par bya// dbang chen pha dang mtshungs pa'i bdud// mtshungs med grogs dang 'dra ba'i btsan// gnod sbyin khrims kyi gtso lta bu// srin po srog la rgol ba'i gshed// gza' rgod lag yan bzhin lta bu// sdong ba'i dug sbrul lta bu'i klu// mo rgyud dbang chen rje dpon la// mtshungs ldan de yi gnyen pos bsgrub// khugs su+u ma bcug bsgo mi nyan// so sor gnad med bdud tu 'gyur// gcud phur ma thebs slar la ldog/ rang gi nga ros ma bsten g.yel// lto ba ma dkrugs las mi myur// log gnon ma bsten bdag nyid stobs// dbang du ma 'dus bsgo mi nyan// gnad kyi yan lag brgyad kyis ni// mchod bstod bsgrub ste phrin las bcol// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi zab pa'i mchod bstod gnad kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'jig rten dregs pa'i sde dpon rnams// drag po'i las la sbyar ba ni// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag tu// rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa sngon song nas// so so'i mthun pa'i rdzas bsags te// drag po'i las kyi khang pa ni// e dbyibs sum cu ldan par bsham// phyi nang gsang ba sku gsung thugs// gnas dang byin brlab bskang dang mchod// spyi dang so sor bsngags pa dag/ rab tu bde ba 'dod pas dmigs// gzugs sgra bsam pa'i nus pa yi// lus dang lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang// srog dang srog gi snying po yis// sems dang sems kyi ngo bo las// phyi nang kun tu bsngags pa de// 'phro 'du 'od kyi drang zhing dgug/ rang gzhan dmigs pa de la bstim// sha rus khrag sogs ma lus bzas// dregs pa'i sde dpon sku gsung thugs// ma lus mnyes pa 'di yis bya// gang la dmigs pa tshad kyis sgrol// ting nge 'dzin gyi brtul zhugs kyis// bul dang myur ba blo yi stobs// 'di la the tshom mi bya ste// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang ba'i bka'// gal te 'bar bas mngon spyod cing// myur du 'pho bar bya ba ni// rno dbal tsha rtsub dri nga ba'i// yam shing gdug pa'i dbyibs ldan brtseg/ gdol pa rigs ngan shan pa dang/ g.yung mo grogs bral khyim gyi mes// spar zhing dug khrag dngar ba la// gzugs brnyan rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o// slar yang dmigs te lhag ma 'bul// gtso dang 'khor gyi rab phye ba'i// drag po'i tshig gis rab tu sbrengs// dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi// che brjod gnad dang bcas pa yis// bstab cing sbyin pa rim bzhin bya// drang srong phrin las rdzogs par bya// thal chen dang ni drag po'i rdzas// dme khrag gsum dang gsod byed gsum// mtshon dbal rin chen gsum gyi dbyig/ rang byung bkra shis ldog pa'i rdzas// nang du 'du 'phrod sbyar ba ni// sgra tshig ting nge 'dzin ldan pas// stobs chen 'khor los dbab cing 'phang// dregs pa 'khor bcas las su dmigs// gzhan yang mchod rdzas gzugs brnyan bcas// rab tu bstan pa'i dmigs pas bstim// 'gyu gnas sa dang chus phug dang// sra gsher 'thab dang phung shul dang// rgya mtsho'i dbus dang sa yi lce// mtshon gyis brdegs dang rlung gis bsgyel// bag med lhung zhing me chus 'joms// lung nas dbyung ba'i rten 'brel te// brnags pa'i yid kyis 'dzin phur gdab// gdug byed 'khor dang zas su gtad// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// thar par mi 'gyur las bgyis kyang// byams dang snying rje'i sems mi gtong// 'di ltar mngon par spyad pa yis// bstan la rab sdang phyir 'gyur ba'i// rjes 'brang log par lta ba rnams// tshar gcod sgrol zhir 'dul ba yin/

zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i phrin las drag po'i las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// 'jig rten dregs pa rang gi gnad// gsang ba'i snying po drag shul gzungs// kun bsdus dril dang phye bar bstan// badzra sarba duSh+tAn/ lo ka pA ram aSh+ta na ya// ma lha he shwa ra de ba de bI/ du bdud phrag sngags sor bzhag byas dun ting/ ya ma gshin rje bre ta wi kr-i tA na na/ rak+sha srin po rak+sha/ yak+sha gnod sbyin k+Sha te byi tri gza' pa tra/ a be sman la dza/ nA ga klu gu li sha dza/ tsa lha bgegs Da ki gsum du tri tsa ra sa ma du tri/ ma ma ma mo ru lu/ man sngags srung tra ra tsa du ma ti// ma mgon po hA kA la rU tra rU tra tig ma sang sna tir mu stegs thig ka tha a btsan b+hi shu tri pa the'u rang sha li haM 'gong po shaM tri dza/ rA dza rgyal po ging ka srog bdag ra/ sA du tri dgra lha/ nA tha ka dmu la/ A gats+tsha hrIM hrIM dza dza/ bod pa'i sngags so// oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn e ka pa ra sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta A gats+tsha ba liM ta gr-ih+Na sa man ta gr-ih+Na tu ma hA ga Na pU dza kha kha khA hi khA hi/ 'di dag sbyar bas mchod par 'gyur/ sarba A yurmi tra sid+d+hi bu tra brta na sid+d+hi pu tra ba hu b+ha dra ba su d+ha ra rat+na puSh+tiM sid+d+hi/ ma hA dz+nyA na sarba d+harma gar+b+ha kA ya wA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ pha la sid+d+hi ma hA sid+d+hi A be sha ya A/ ha ha ho ho/ rab tu sbyar bas dngos grub blangs/ sarba sha truM yak+sha rbad rbad b+h+yo b+h+yo// 'di yis rab tu rbad par bya// nr-i hur thum dzaHsha trUM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rU pa ya gan d+ha rbud rbud phaT phaT/ ma ra ma ra/ thum thum/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tshal pa tshal pa/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha thun thun rbad/ 'di yis dmigs pa rab tu gsad/ mA ra ya mA ra ya a phri pre ta ka hring hring tri sha pa li ru pa ya bin ta bin ta hu lu hu lu rbad nan/ laM nan/ a nan hUM nan s+t+waM b+ha ya s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ zhes pa yis ni gnan par bya/ sarba ma ra ta ka raM rata? dz+wa la rata? dz+wa la rata? s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ho ha ya ho ha ya/ rata? tsa ya rata? tsa ya/ zhes pas ma lus bsreg par bya/ mA ra ya sha trUta? thun b+h+yo thum ril b+h+yo na he thun A be sha ya b+h+yo// dmigs pa 'di yis 'phang bar bya// badzra u tsa ta ya phaT/ a phri sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ sa ma ya rbad su myag bzlog/ sri sa ya sarba pa rmi dur na b+h+yo bzlog/ pha rol nus pa 'di yis bzlog/ ma hA b+ha ri sha ya/ a be sha ya pra tsa ya be tsa ya be tsa ye/ zhi bas lugs 'byung chu dbab po// na ga gra he bi tsa ya/ phroM phroM hril hril shar shar ra ma na tsa ga na phroM hril shar shar pa phob// drag pos bzlog cing bsdam pa'o// ma hA shIn+taM puSh+tita? ba shata? ku ru ma ra ma ra dza ya karma ma le a mU ka sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi ka ra swa sti swA hA/ phrin las thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// mthun pa'i rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi khyad par so sor dbye// gnas bsgyur dang ni grub pa'i mtha'// snying rje byams pas rab

bskul zhing// kun du khyab pa'i mchod sbyin bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang du bya// drag pos bsgral zhing tshar bcad pa'i// las kun rang gzhan don du spyad// 'jig rten gnas pa'i snying dang srog/ yi ge gsang ba rang 'byung gnas// mngon du rgyu ba thugs ka te// ring thung pho mo khrag dang dung// chags sdang snying srog snying rje brtse// rdo rje pad+ma rlung dang gnas// thabs dang shes rab chos can dang// chos nyid las kyi 'bras bu yis// ming mtshan gnad mtshang bod dang drang// grogs dang ldan pas las la sbyar// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi las sna tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i snying po gnad kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams// tshul bzhin rab tu bsgrub pa yis// grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams ni// dngos dang nyams dang rmi lam brtag/ 'di las so sor 'byung 'gyur te// dga' zhing mdangs ldan stobs rnyed dang// bde dang rtogs pa spro skye zhing// mngon rgyu yid kyi gdeng thob cing// nyam nga bag tsha dogs med ldan// nus ldan phrin las mthar phyin rtogs// 'di dag la sogs rigs par 'byung// lus 'jam dbugs kyis mi gnod cing// yangs shing bstan la spyod par dga'// nad dang gdon gyis brdzi mi nus// 'byung ba'i nus pas mi bskyod cing// kha dog mdangs ldan sdug cing mdzes// 'di la sogs pa lus 'byung brda// ji ltar bsgo ba gzhan gyis 'dzin// nga dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung// mthun pa'i tshul gyis yongs mi 'dor// snyan dang mi snyan ci brjod rnams// tshangs pa'i dbyangs bzhin yid du 'ong// grags thos tsam gyis dbang du byed// tshul rjes 'asngug pa ngag gi brda// gang la brtsam pa de 'grub cing// ma zhum mi spang mi 'dor bas// dbang dang ldan zhing mi g.yo la// gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thob// yid kyi yul du brda 'byung ba'o// snga phyi de ma thag pa yi// bag chags ma yin rmi lam ni// rgyal po mkhan po slob dpon dang// che btsan rigs ldan rgyan bcas ldan// gcan gzan 'dab chags dud 'gro dang// skyes pa bud med bus pa sogs// nye bar grub pa'i rtags yin no// bran 'bangs mngag pa'i tshul 'changs shing// bka' bsgo nyan pa las byed rtags// rang gi gnas nas glu len zhing// rgyang mig blta ba g.yel ba'i rtags// rang la chad pa'i las brtsams shing// nyes lan 'dod pa ldog pa'i rtags// zas skom 'dod cing khre len snyogs// rang nyid gnong 'gyod ma bskangs rtags// 'tshams shing ngud mos 'debs byed pa// ma dag lus snang nyams pa'i rtags// ngag gi bsgo ba mi nyan cing// slar zhing tshur la 'khol 'dod pa// gnyen

pos dbang du ma gyur rtags// mtshon cha rtul zhing tshad ma ldan// nus med bya ba mi 'grub pa// sngags kyi nus pa ma grub rtags// gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dang// rang gi yid la 'dod med rnams// mchod bskang mthun rdzas ma tshang rtags// sha rus khrag sogs longs spyod cing// ngo mthon rab tu che ba ni// las byas 'grub pa'i rtags yin no// pha rol dmag tshogs mang byung zhing// sgo med khang par bdag zhugs pa// ngan sngags gzhan gyis bzlog pa'i rtags// bye brag sde brgyad so so nas// mi dang dud 'gro 'dab chags sogs// pho tshogs nag po bdud kyi rtags// mo tshogs rgyan bzang ma mo ste// rje btsan 'bag seng gtsug lag khang// bus pa sbra spre rgyal po rtags// mi rta khra spyang ri dwags ni// brag btsan ri btsan rtags yin no// chu gnas dud 'gro klu yi rtags// ma he ra lug mig mang dang// mun pa bu yug gza' yi rtags// skyes pa chas bzang 'byor pa can// ri mtsho la gnas gnod sbyin rtags// nya dang shan pa bya ba dang// dmag mi go mtshon srin po'i rtags// 'di dag sngar bshad bzang ngan sbyar// bye brag bsgrubs pa'i rtags su 'gyur// zhes bka' k+p+ral to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po sgrub pa rtags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dregs pa can gyi khyad par rdzas// mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan sku yi rten// ming nas bod pa gsung gi rten// phyag mtshan dam pa thugs kyi rten// lug g.yag dkar po sbal sbrul nya// glang rta sngon po rin po che// g.yul gshoms myur bsgral bya gcan dang// snel bu shel nag bya nag dang// rta lcags khyi dang rgod nag dang// ra phag bya khyi dkar po dang// kla klo ra rog dom khyi gnag/ sprul nag bya rgod ra skyes dang// rta ra bya khyi dmar po'o// snying khrag mgo dang rgyal mtshan ni// lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang// ma mo bdud dang rgyal po ging// gshin rje gza' dang btsan rnams kyi// rim bzhin so so'i brten pa'i rdzas// rab tu gsang ba nyid yin no// e ldan gdugs bcas rgyud med kyi// thod pa mtshon cha phur pa dag/ dug khrag rin chen drag po'i 'bru// kun tshogs rab tu gsad pa'i rdzas// klus bzung snod ni sha khrag bcas// rus bzang rigs med myur song chu// myu gu sna tshogs dri ldan rdzas/ cu drag dbab pa'i rdzas yin no// mchod rten ri rab rgya gram bcas// sme rdzas rigs ngan mgo bo gsum// dmigs pa'i 'bab rdzas stog ma yang pad+ma ni// slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas yin no// rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas yin no// dug khrag tshogs dang mtshan ngan snod// dmigs pa'i rten la 'phangs pa'i rdzas// ngan pa'i sa yi rten mkhar dang// gdug cing rab tu tsha ba'i shing// 'bru nag dug

khrag bsreg pa'i rdzas// gzhan yang dbang chen dregs pa'i 'khor// so so'i rigs dang sder bcas pa'i// mthun dang ma mthun gtsang dang sme// sngags pa'i rdzas kun shes par 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus na rdo rje 'chang// rang gi rig 'dzin byang chub sems// brtul zhugs can gyi grub pa yis// dbus dang mtha' 'khob yul rnams dang// sangs rgyas zhing gi 'jig rten khams// kun nas sde dpon g.yog bcas pa'i// yid dang dngos po'i yul can rnams// khams dang rigs dang bsam pa dang// byed pa rten gnas yo byad dang/ ma lus rdzogs par rab tu rtogs// shes ldan mig can rnams la ston// de tshe dregs pa'i tshogs chen rnams// da lta nga yis gdams pa bzhin// yang dag don las ma 'da' zhig/ khyed rnams kyang ni dus nam zhig/ las kyi gnas ngan len spang ste// byang chub sa la myur 'gro yis// de bas bka' yi dam mnos la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin sgrubs shig/ gsang chen nga yi bstan pa'i tshul// phyi rol phyogs la sogs pa yis// nyams shing dmas par mi 'gyur bar// rgyas shing brtan par khyod kyis byos// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i rten rdzas dang las kyi gnyer bsgo ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po'i sku'i rnam par rol pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdu bar mdzad de/ dgyes pa'i gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i// 'jig rten dbang chen gtso chen rnams// mthar thug mya ngan 'das nas kyang// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bstan pa'i tha tshig sgrub pa dang// rnal 'byor las kyi grogs mdzad cing// dregs pa'i sku gsung thugs nyid dang// yon tan phrin las sna tshogs ston// phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu brtson ldan rnams kyis ni// gnyis su 'dzin par yongs mi bya// yul snang phyi nang ma lus kun// rang rig sems kyi rgyal por bsgrub// de ni ma bcos yul mi bral// ma chad ma lhung bdag po med// gnyis med mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub// nges 'gyur spang blang stsol sems bral// ma lus rtsa ba snying gi srog/ de nyid shes bya rab tu blang// dbang gi rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur// gal te nga dang dregs pa can// so so rang rgyud ldan pa yi// gnyis 'dzin yid kyis rtog dpyod cing// mtshan ma rab tu sgom byed pa// rkang med khams gsum bgrod 'dod cing// mig med stong gsum blta dang mtshungs// bdud bzhi dga' ba skyed par byed// de bas rigs mchog che rnams kyis// gsang bdag nga nyid shes par gyis//

zhes bka' stsal te nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dky-il 'khor chen po chos nyid de bzhin nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i dbyings su thim par mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor dang bcas pa chos sku mthar thug tu bsgrub par gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'jig rten mchod bstod bsgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ rgya rgya rgya// / rgya gar skad du/ rau dra man+t+ra sa mu dA ya mU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthu stobs thams cad kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid ri rab chen po'i yang steng/ lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog/ rab tu brgyan pa'i pho brang chen po na// yum chen mo 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid mo dang/ gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs te/ sku las 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu spros nas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can dang// dregs pa can dang/ gzi brjid can dang// drag shul can la sogs pa dag gi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing bskyod par mdzad pas/ de dag gi sde dpon dang 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du lhags pa ni 'di lta ste/ gshin rje 'chi bdag nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa dang/ bdud nag po chen po me'i kha rlangs can dang/ yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma dang// srin po'i rgyal po gsod byed nag po yum dang bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang/ yum gnod sbyin mo sha za ral gcig ma dang/ lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po dang/ rU tra'i bdag po thar pa nag po dang//

dmu rje btsan pa rgyal po chen po dang/ phyi rol lha'i bdag po kA la nag po dang/ khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyu dang/ klu'i bdag po gzhon nu gtum po dang/ lha'i rgyal po li byin chen po dang/ gnod sbyin chen po lag dgu pa dang/ bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang/ klu bdud chen po yab shud dmar po dang/ gzhan yang lha dang klu dang lha ma yin dang za byed dang/ yi dwags dang 'byung po'i tshogs dang/ pho nya'i tshogs 'abligs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'dus so// de nas com ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par mdzad de// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag/ gzugs su snang ba rab tu 'jigs// sgra ni mi snyan drag cing gtum// dri ni mi zhim rul myags sum// ro ni kha skyur tsha bar bro// reg bya tsha rtsub mi sdug spyod// zhe sdang chen po me 'bar zhing// nga rgyal keng rus brag tu spungs// gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs// 'dod chags khrag gi chu chen brub// phrag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs// ti ra chen po'i longs spyod dang// stag gzig gcan gzan ce spyang dang// kang ka dur bya 'dab chags tshogs// sha za khrag 'thung rus pa 'joms// bam dang rul dang myags pa dang// 'byed dang bral dang gzhig pa dang// zos dang 'thor dang rab tu 'thor// brul dang zag dang brlag pa dang// rtse dang rgod dang glal ba dang// 'jigs shing gdug dang rngams pa yi// rol pa'i longs spyod rab tu sprul// kun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'chang zhing// gsod gcod bsha' gtub lus kyi las// tshig rtsub brlang po'i nga ro 'byin// khros pa'i brtul zhugs drag po yis// ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'i// mngon par spyod la rab tu bkod// 'di ltar mthong zhing snang gyur kyang// kun rdzob tsam du snang ba las// sems can gcig gi ba spu la// cung zad gnod pa yongs med de// rang gi rnam rtog bde bar spyod// nges pa'i de nyid kho na'o// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po yis// dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kyis// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// ma lus bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa'i// gsang bdag chen por dbang bskur phyir// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'chang// lnga brgya'i grogs dang bcas pa yis// so so'i gtso chen mdun nyid nas// rang gi stan las rab tu langs// mngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad// thugs la gnas pa'i sa bon las// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug kun// ljang

nag rlung gis rab tu dkrigs// khrag gi rba klong 'khrugs shing g.yo// sha rus gtams pa'i sa gzhi la// bskal pa'i me ri rab tu 'bar// b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// gdug cing 'jigs su rung ba ni// stobs chen rnams kyang nyer mi spyod// phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad gzugs/ phyi nang mtha' dbus kun la khyab// bstan la rab sdang pha rol po'i// phung po zhabs kyi gdan du bting// 'od ldan gtsang ma yum dang bcas// che ba mchog gi skur mdzad de// rigs can mthar gnas dbur bstan cing// stong pa bco brgyad dag cing stong// phyag gis dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral// b+han+d+ha tsit+ta g.yas g.yon bsnams// thugs kyi dbang rtags dang por bzung// thugs rje mi 'gyur mthing nag mdog/ mi 'jigs rig par ldan pa'i zhabs// bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas pa gnon// ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// 'bar ba'i spyan gyis khams gsum gzigs// gdangs pa'i shangs kyis srid gsum rngub// snyan gyi rlung sgras stong gsum khyab// rno dbal tshems kyis gdug pa sgrol// ljags 'dril rkan sgra drag po rdeb// khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud// dpa' ba'i chas kyis rab tu brgyan// sprul pa'i lha rnams sku la rdzogs// stobs ldan de nyid mnyes mdzad pa'i// 'byung ba che la dbang bsgyur ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi la// gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi g.yas// b+han+d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon// gtso bdag tshul 'dzin rab tu sgeg/ dgyes mdzad rab tu rol pa las// 'dul byed sprul pa rab tu spro// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun gyi// gtum po gdug pa'i tshul 'chang ba'i// drag sngags bdag po ma lus kun// rang nyid so so'i 'khor bcas pa'i// rten dang gnas pa re rer snang// rang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yo// A+oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn e ka ya ma ma b+hi ra b+ha gr-ih+Na hUM phaT// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang// gnod sbyin lha dang log lta can// dmu rje che dang phyi rol phyogs// gdug byed mkha' la rgyu ba dang// byol song lto 'gro'i lus 'dzin dang// nga rgyal 'chang dang sprul pa can// mtha' 'khob gnas bcas ma lus rgyu// lha bdud mi ma yin gyi gnas// kha ba can du phyogs shing srid// las kyi lus kyi nus pa 'byin// ma lus rnam pa thams cad kun// shugs drag rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// rab tu 'dar zhing mdun du gnas// thugs rje'i bdag pos dgongs mdzad de// gtum rngams 'jigs byed chen po'i sku// gsang tshig drag po'i gsung gi sgras// ma lus tshims par bka' g+Nal pa// e ma 'asngig rten khams kun gyi// drag sngags bdag po dregs pa can// jon gyi rdo rje 'chang chen dang// nga yi bka'

las ma 'da' bar// khyed rnams rang gi 'khor dang bcas// so so'i lus dang btags pa'i ming// rigs dang rten dang byed pa'i las// sde dang cha lugs longs spyod rnams// 'jigs byed gnas 'dir myur du ston// khyed rnams 'di las 'gal byed na// nga yi sngon gyi dam tshig gis// khyod kyi lus sems srog dang bcas// ma lus gtan nas brlag par bya// zhes bka' stsal nas// drag sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to// A+oM sarba duSh+tan ta ka na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ ya ma ra tsa pre ta ka s+ya ma ma k+She ta mA ra ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ du pra phrag ra tsa dug dun ma ting mA ra ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ rag sha rag mo ma ya ra ti mA ra ya hriM hriM dza dza/ yak+Sha a pa sma rak+Sha mi du shaM pa mA ra ya dza dza/ ma hA de be shwa ra ra tsa mA ra ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ ma taM ka ru tra kA la mA ra ya kA la hrIM hrIM dza dza/ mun mun pa dza tsit+ta mA ra ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ tir+thi ka ma te ma hA mA ra ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ byi tri pa tra ro ga ti dza mA ra ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ nA ga rA dza ku ma tsa ta d+hi ra ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ rA dza b+hu ling e sa ma ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ ma hA khu lengs bi hu mA ra ya hrIM hrIM dza dza/ badzra sA d+hu se aM tsa mA ra ya hriM hriM dza dza/ a b+hi shu tri ling mA ra ya hriM hriM dza dza/ nr-i hur thum dzaHsha trUM mA ra ya rbad/ ces brjod cing sku 'jigs byed 'bar ba de slar yang 'jigs su rung bar bstan te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma rungs pa'i sgra chen po dang/ 'od dang glog 'bar ba dang/ rlung gi shugs drag pos rab tu gang bar gyur to// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas te rab tu 'dus nas/ rang rang gi rigs kyi dregs pa dag phul te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du nye bar gyur nas/ bka' rab tu bsgrub par rtsol bar gyur to// drag sngags 'dus ba rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ byin rlabs chen pos dbang du bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi rgyal po me'i kha rlangs can zhes bya ba/ mdog nag po kha nas me 'bar ba/ khram shing dang bdud zhags nag po thogs pa/ zhing lpags kyi gos gyon pa/ yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma zhes bya ba/ khram shing dang thod pa rlon pa thogs pa/ zhing lpags gon zhing bdud rta nag po la khyod shug gnyis car zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdud kyi ris kyi lha tshogs dang bcas nas rings par lhags so// de bzhin du 'chi bdag gshin rje zhes bya ba/ mdog nag thod pa gri gug 'dzin// chung ma gshin rje za byed ma// gri gug thod pa phyag gis 'dzin// khyo shug zhing lpags rlon pa bgos// ma he chu glang zhon nas ni// gshin rje pho mo'i/

tshogs dang bcas// 'gal byed gzir zhing myur du lhags// srin po gsod byed yab yum yang// mdog nag zhing gi pags pa bgos// ral gri gri gug yab kyi g.yon g.yas kyis bzung// g.yon yum gyis mi mgo yab kyi g.yas thod khrag thogs// stag dang seng ge bzhon pa bskyod// srin po'i tshogs bcas myur du 'khod// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang// chung ma sha za ral gcig bcas// mthing nag mgyogs byed rta la zhon// zhing lpags gyon te phyag gnyis kyis// ral gri yab g.yon dar nag zhing lpags yum g.yas bzung// gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas te bskyod// drag sngags bdag po sde dpon te// shar lho nub byang phyogs dag gi/ gnas su gtso la 'dud cing 'khod// dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba// 'jig rten lha yi sngags bdag ni// dkar po ba dan shel gri thogs// dar dkar gos can gnam ru zhon// dregs pa'i lha bdud 'khor dang bcas// rengs par lhag ste shar phyogs 'khod// thar pa nag po zhes bya ba// mdog gnag mchod gtor dug thung 'dzin// dom nag zhon te zhing lpags bgos// sde dang bcas te lho phyogs 'khod// dmu rje btsan po zhes bya ba// dar nag dang ni zhags pa thogs// ber nag gyon te dmu rta zhon// rang gi sder dang nub phyogs 'khod// mu stegs nag po chen po yang// kha T+wAM dang ni tri shUl 'dzin// mi lpags bgos te ma he zhon// rang gi sde bcas byang du 'khod// khyab 'jug rog ti zhes bya ba// mthing nag khram shing dgra s+t+wa 'dzin// sprin nag bgos shing 'brug jon zhon// gza' bdud tshogs bcas steng nas 'khod// klu rgyal sog ma med ces pa// ser nag sprul lpags na bza' can// bum pa dang ni rus sbal 'dzin// chu srin zhon te klu tshogs bcas// 'og gi phyogs su 'khod cing 'dug/ gzhan yang li byin lag dgu dang// the skyes gtso dang yams shud kyi// so so'i blags kyi bdag po dag/ dkar ser dmar po'i mdog ldan zhing// shel gri thogs dar dkar shing lag dgu 'gyed// dar dmar mdung dar dkar ring ral gri 'dzin// rta dkar bya rgod ra skyes dang// rta dmar zhon te zhing lpags bgos// so so'i sde dang g.yog bcas shing// phyogs kyi sgo bzhir gnas par 'khod// gzhan yang lha klu gnod sbyin dang// ma mo gshin rje srin po bdud// rU tra mu stegs 'gong thel dang// gying dmu gza' dang rgyal phran sman// snang srid lha srin dregs pa can// sde dpon chen po rnams bcas 'khod// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// yang gsang dang ni drag po dang// btags shing chags dang sbas pa dang// las byed shan pa thor shod dang// che grags btsan dang ma mo dang// mun 'thib stong 'khrugs srog gcod dang// gleng zhing dbang che la

sogs rnams// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi// bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub byed pas// ma thogs dur khrod gnas chen du// 'dar zhing myur ba'i shugs dang bcas// rang gi nus pa rab bstan te// bka' nyan gsung sdod rjes 'brangs gnas// de ltar 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa'i bdag po sngags kyi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gis/ rang rang gi 'khor dang/ rigs kyi sde dang/ mthu dang longs spyod kyi khyad par dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bstan nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po/ bdag cag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa ma rungs pa'i tshogs gdug pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ gnod pa dang/ shugs dang/ 'tshe ba dang/ rtsod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang phan pa'i sems skye bar mi nus pa rnams te/ rang rang gi khams dang/ byed pa dang/ rigs dang/ las ky-i bya ba dang/ rten dang/ nus pa dang/ dbang gi khyad par dag dang mthun pa'i bstan pa mi bzad pa stobs dang ldan pa dag bka' stsal bar gsol/ zhes gsol to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sku yi che ba rab bstan cing// gsung gi snying po gnad bskul te// thugs kyi dgongs pa cher mdzad nas// 'jig rten dregs pa mthu stobs can// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' g+Nal pa// hUM 'asngig rten dregs pa'i tshegs chen rnams// nga yi bka' bzhin nyan par gyis// nga ni chos sku bde chen te// ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub// snang ba'i sku la dngos po med// ye shes sku ste sku yi mchog/ nga ni sngags gsung mthu chen te// ye nas tha snyad sgra dang bral/ brjod pa'i gsung la 'dzin pa med// ma 'gags gsung ste gsung gi dpal// nga ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste// ye nas mtshan ma yang dag bral// gnyis med thugs la rtsol ba med// skye med thugs te thugs kyi dpal// nga ni yon tan tshogs chen te// lhun gyis grub cing bsam mi khyab// smon med dgos pa ma lus 'byung// dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhi// nga ni phrin las mdzad pa ste// yongs rdzogs brtson pa'i bdag nyid can// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon du spyod// sna tshogs gzhan don lhun gyis rdzogs// 'jig rten sngags bdag dregs pa can// gtso chen dbang bsgyur khyed rnam kyang// nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// thugs dang ye nas gnyis su med// gsung dang dbye ba yod ma yin// sku las so sor mi blta ste// yon tan mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs// phrin las gcig ste thun mong bsgrub// thog ma med nas da// lta'i bar/

nyon mongs las kyi rgyu 'bras kyis// gnas ngan len gyi phung por smin// nga rgyal dregs pa'i lus ngag sems// stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogs// che btsan dbang phyug ldan gyur kyang// yang dag nges pa'i don ma rtogs/ don dam bden pa khong ma chud// spros bral dge la blo ma phyogs// rang rig rgyal po'i stobs ma rnyed// skye med dbyings kyi rtsal ma shar// bde chen gnas kyi gdeng ma thob// mtshon med bcud kyi ro ma myong// chos nyid sku yi gzugs ma mthong// ye shes klong gi sgo ma phyed// de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyis// rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogs// lus la bdag tu yongs ma bzung// ngag la brjod par ma smra zhig/ sems la dngos por ga la rtog/ gnas yul rigs khams sde dang dpung// rten rdzas longs spyod dbang skal rnams// nga dang nga yir gzung bya min// thun mong dang ni tha dad gcig/ de dag ma lus stong pa ste// stong pa nyid kyang de dag go/ de las gud na gzhan med de// gzhan las gud na'ang de med cing// ma skyes ma 'gags mtshan nyid med// ma phri ma bsnan ma bslad cing// ma bcos ma bsgyur ma byung la// ma skyes ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'i// don chen de ni rang nyid las// phyi nang snga phyi steng dang 'og/ phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus dang sems// kun nas rnyed pa ma yin te// 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin no// sha khrag lpags pa rus pa dang// snying dang glo ba snod rnams dang// dbang po yan lag bcas pa la// bde chen dam pa de mi gnas// de las gzhan na'ang gnas med de// gnas ma grub la gnas shes brjod// gnas yod snyam na der rtogs shig/ ci 'dra ci zhig ji lta bu// gang nas 'ongs shing gang du song// gang na 'dug cing ji zhig byed// dbyibs dang kha dog ming dang mtshan// rigs dang khams la rab tu rtogs// de la de yis der bltas pas// mthong ba med pa blta ba'o// gang la gang gis gang bsgoms pas// bsgom dang bral bar bsgom zhes bya// ci la su zhig cir spyod pas// spyod rgyu mi gnas spyod pa che// su la sus thob ci bsgrubs pas// ma grub rang gnas 'bras bu ste// ma lus med cing rnam pa yi// yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug go/ zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyod// dbang du bsdu ba phrin las yin// rang la rdzogs shing rang gis grub// thag chod pa dang bstan pa dang// tshad ldan mthar byin la bzla dang// 'das dang ma 'das ston pa dang// bshad dang nyan dang sdud pa dang// gnas dus yon tan skyon rnams ni// rang gi de nyid rtogs pas 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ don dam pa'i gnas nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas

rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dgongs pa chen po 'di gsungs te// ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i// chos nyid don gyi snying po ni// gzung 'dzin mtha' bral ma rtogs te// nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis// dregs shing gzir ba'i rU tra de// ma bsgral ba ni nyes pa ni// thabs dang shes rab snying rje gsum// mthun zhing mtshungs ldan sras kyis bsgral// dam pa'i don de ma rtogs par// dngos por bshad pas 'khor bar ltung// mkhas rtogs ldan pas bshad pa yis// 'phags pa mnyes shing sems can sgrol// tshogs gnyis rdzogs te sku gsum thob// rnam rig mthong bas don thag gcad// brtul zhugs drag pos bsgrub pa brtsam// dbang du bsdu dang 'dul ba'i phyir// 'jig rten las kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud// nga dang ston pa rnams kyis bshad// chos dbyings dur khrod rang gnas su// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du bsdus// snyigs ma rab tu bdo ba'i dus// bstod cing gtsug lag ltos pa'i chos// skyon dang yon tan tshul du 'byung// bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan can// drag sngags stobs kyis bsgral byas na// rdzogs dang spangs pa thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rten yin te// lha dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// rdzas rnams rgyu dang rkyen du 'gyur// ling+ga nya bo dmigs pa'i rten// ming rus byang bu rnam shes dang// snga tshe 'khor ba'i rten yin no// 'gugs 'dren gyis ni de dag dgug/ pho nyas las kun sgrub par byed// sngags kyi rdzas kyis dpal bskyed cing// thun rdzas rnams kyis myos pa dang// rengs lkugs mtshon 'debs rdul du rlog/ gnad du 'bebs shing snying nas 'dren// lha dang 'byed cing rtsa ba gcod// byang chub sems kyi dngos po ni// don po khrag gi lan bu'i lan ma'i yang 'og/ kun gzhi til 'bru tsam zhig gnas// rtsa ba klung gnas dra ba ste// phur pa me dbal lta bu yis// bsdus shing bsregs te gcad pa yis// dmigs pa rten dang bral bar byas// bkrag dang gzi mdangs rang la bsdus// phrin las rnam bzhis gzir ba las// dge sdig ngo bo nyid du mnyam// blta spyod ldan pas zhing bcu de// pha rol bla med gnas su bsgral// bar ma do yi rnam shes ni// hUM dang phaT kyi 'phro 'du yis// sbyang dang spar ba'i las rnams bya// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// phung po lhag ma tsam nyid ni// rten gsum gyis ni rab tu sbyang// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan par bya// 'di ni pha rol snga na med// bsgral ba dus gsum sangs rgyas dang// rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yi// spyod pa rlabs chen bshad pa'o// drag jags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//

de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// las kyi bye brag 'di gsungs te// thog mar 'di la shis pa'i gnas// dur khrod chu gling ri yi sul// khros shing gdug pa'i gnas de ru// rab tu gnas shing gdeng ldan pa'i// dam tshig gnas pa'i bsgrub pa ste// yongs su rdzogs pa'i slob ma yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas nas// lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldan// rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka/ nye bar bsten dang gnyis su med// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa des// yang dag nges pa'i rtags mthong nas// rab tu 'bad par bya ba ni// smin 'byor gdug cing shis pa'i sa// las la bsngags pa de dag la// dregs pa'i gtso 'khor dmigs pa'i rten// 'dom gang la sogs tshad dang ldan// lte ba la ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs// bzhi'am drug gam brgyad du dgod// bar khyams phyogs bzhi sgo bzhir bcas// rim pa gsum gyi thod phreng ldan// rang gi rigs pa bsngags pa yi// dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang rtags// thams cad ldan pa nyid du bya// dregs pa can rnams sku yi rten// bres sam brkos sam brtsigs pa dag/ rang gi gnas su mdzes par dgod// gsung gi snying po'ang de bzhin no// thugs rten rang gi phyag cha'am// sngon nas bsngags pa'i rdzas yin no// rang sngags gsang ba'i 'khor lo dang// mthun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnams// nang du mtshon pa'i rten du gzug/ de dag tsit+ta so so ru// dmigs pa'i snying po dril te gzhug/ gsang ba sbas pa'i rten du 'gyur// de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams su// nga yis sngar bshad rgyud nyid las// e dbyibs bzhi dang brgyad bcu gnyis// khru gang mdzub gang thur du brko// bdug cing dregs pa'i rdzas kyis byugs// bdug cing bsreg pa'ang de yis so// de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// rgyud med gzugs ngan kA pa la// seng sdeng gser shing yan lag skyes// dpal ldan drag po'i phur pa dang// shel nag gnam ru nag po dang// gyi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dang// brda mi gcig dang srid shing dang// tsha ra dkar dang mgrin snyan dang// sa spyod chu spyod rnams kyis lus// phyi nang bar dang gsang bas brgyan// dregs can spyi yi mnyes pa'i rdzas// rgyan ldan gzugs dang rnga gling sgra// gsur chen dri dang sha khrag ro// tsha rtsub reg dang 'bru bcud bshos// sha chen dam tshig bdud rtsi'i tshogs// rab tu bstar zhing 'bad pas sbyar// dpa' zhing brtul phod skyes bu yis// nga yi sngon gyi phrin las bzhin// khro la khros pas zhi mdzad de// tha mal gnas pa'i 'byung chen lnga// drag po sngags kyi 'byung bar bsgom// keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bam// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khang// b+han+d+ha gnas rigs gsum gyis brtsig/ ti ra gsar rnying tshogs kyis

gtams// rak+ta dmar po brub cing 'bab// tshil chen dud pa 'khyil zhing 'phyur// dbang po don snying 'phyangs shing 'phrul// bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldan// yan lag nying lag skams shing rnying yang snyil// sha dang pags pa brgyang zhing 'phyar// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'og/ gcus dang 'phyar dang bskums dang brkyangs// rgyal mtshan dang ni za ra tshags// ba dan bla bre lhab lhub dang// 'phur ma dang ni lhab ma dang// mi mgo ka pA la rnams dang// rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// gzhal yas khang pa de 'dra ba// rab tu bsngags pa 'di la bshad// dregs pa'i bdag po yum dang bcas// sbyor zhing bsnol ba de nyid kyis// bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyed// 'phro dang las kyi khyad par dang// bsdu dang rang gi gnas su brten// skur gyur mtshan nyid ngo bo dang// byang chub sems kyi bya ba yis// yum dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs// de yi las kyang sngar bzhin du// rgyas mdzad rang gi spyan snga ru// dmigs pa myur lhag de yi 'khor// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang// gnod sbyin drag po sde dang klu// rang gi chung mar bcas pa dag/ ngas bshad bzhin du rigs par bsam// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag ste/ lha dang ma mo rgyal po ging// btsan 'gong dmu dang mu stegs dang// rang gi sde dang dpung du bcas// ma lus dregs pa can gyi tshogs// 'di la rab brjod gang yin pa// de nyid du ni gsal bar bya// nga yi sku dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes rigs kyi dbang bskur zhing// byin gyis brlabs la rgyas btab ste// de la rang bzhin gnas pa bstim// yongs rdzogs sku yi brtan par bsgrub/ phyag batshal mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod// rab tu mnyes pa rgya cher bya// phyi bshad nang dang gsang ba yis// bsdu dang sbyor dang sgrol ba dang// gnas dang rigs dang rol pa dang// bskyod dang dbab pa mnyes pa yi// gnas lugs lhun grub ma bcos pa// drag sngags rol pa ma 'gags spyod// rang gi las la sbyar ba ni// bdud kyi khram dang gshin rje rdo// srin po'i dmar dang gnod sbyin byad// lha yi chad dang ma mo'i dal// gza' yi ki kang klu yi dug/ tshe zad pa dang khri mon bcug/ gcan gzan 'ablum dang lcags sgrog tshud// nad dang mtshon ni khong zhugs dang// dug 'thung thog babs bzhin du drag/ thar zhes bya ba gdags su med// bdud ni ma brtags srog la rgol// gshin rje 'khor ba'i 'khor los gcod// srin po ral gri'i so yi 'gems// gnod sbyin gnam lcags thog gis 'joms// lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis gsor// ma mo dpag chen mda' 'phen 'bigs// gza' bdud stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdeg/ klu ni sa 'og ral gri'i sbos// thams cad

'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags// mun pa gling 'khrugs bdud kyi skad// ngu 'bod lta bu'i gshin rje ste// ro len dur ba srin pos khrid// lce mdud drag po gnod sbyin no// bka' chad drag rtsal lha yi dmod// ngu 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste// 'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud do// klu yi sbrul nag dug lces so// 'jig rten lha srin rang sgra yis// phal pa rnams la dmod par byed// de ni drag sngags dmod pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags dmod pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// so so'i drag sngags dmod pa bstan// phung shigs bdud kyi drag sngags ni// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// shel nag snying du nya bo stsal// dur khrod ras nag rgya yis gdab// tshon sna lnga'am nag pos bcing// gri lcags sbug ma srog rtsar gzhug/ nyung dkar nyung nag til nag dang// skye tshe shing tshe zi ra dang// zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma dang// dug phrag ngar dang bcas pa rnams// mu su ra yi thod par bsdu// bdud kyi srog tig sngags kyis bsngags// bdud po nag po kha mun de ba mi la cho// kA la mu tri mA ra ya dgra bo snying ling tsit+ta rbud/ nr-i zlum khyigs/ nr-i zlum khyigs/ bram bram ro la 'dus/ zed sprug dro sprug bdud rjes chod/ bdud mos rol/ bdud bus gtor// baM khyigs/ pra ma nr-i sha trUM mA ra ya rbad// mun pa gling 'khrugs zhes bya ba// ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad de// drag tu brjod cing sbug mar brab// gang la dmigs pa de myur du// snang srid bdud kyis srog nas 'dren// mi nag go mtshon bcas pa dang// sngags nag bud med mon dang rdo// khyi nag rta nag bya nag dang// rgod nag dre'u nag shel nag dang// ri nag mtsho nag shing nag tshogs// dmag dang 'khrug pa 'thab pa dang// 'khrid dang gsod dang bsha' ba dag/ las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur// de nas nya po bstab cing bsgral// gri mtshon phur pa rnams kyis gtub// lhag ma bdud rtsi sha khrag sbyar// ku ku nag po'i zas su sbyin// rol bar mi byed bskyar te bsgrub// rU tra myos shing 'thib nas 'chi// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i drag jags ni// rgyud med pho mo'i ka pA la// za mo tig tu kha sbyar te// nang du de nyid tsit+ta gzhug/ pho thod steng nas spyi bor phug/ bcings dang dgab pa drangs pa dag/ sngar bshad rdzas kyis brab cing brdeg/ ya ma me da k+She/ rA dza sa do me/ ru tsa na ya ni/ ro ma tsa ni/ ya ma ra tsa mu ka snying khrag rtsa la rbad/ ya ma dbugs la rngubs/ ro tsa ya ma ra tsa ra tsa bta? ril rbad/ ya ma ra tsa hri sti snying ling chod/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag ya ma du baM ril rbad/ gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i blags// rab tu bablags te

tsit+tar brab// sha khrag chen pos mnyes par bya// gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis// don snying rlon par ster ba dang// snying dang thod pa 'phar ba 'byung// de nas las la sbyar bar bya// gang la dmigs pa myur du sgrol// gtum khros srin po'i dmod pa ni// myur shi'i thod par de snying nang// dmigs pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan de// ming sngags ldan pa stsal bya ste// le brgan kha dog dar gyis dkris// sngon dmar skud pa'i dra bar gzhug/ ti ra gsar pa kha phye la// dbang po don snying nang rol gyis// srin po bskang zhing dmod pa bzla/ rag sha srin po sa mun dzaH/ rag sha rU tra hur hur b+h+yo// rU tra gnyen po dgra la b+h+yo// dgra bo mu li shig sod gtor// hab lo hob le kha thun b+h+yo// rag sha dza tri ta dza/ du+u ra dur shan dza/ rag sha rbad/ nr-i mA ra ya sod/ dmod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brdeg/ mi nag shan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// khrid dang gsod dang don snying ster// las la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyis// dgra bo'i dngos po myur du sgrol// drag rtsal gnod sbyin drag sngags ni// rta dkar snying dang thod pa ni// nya bo gzhug pa'i snod du bsngags// rin chen la phug mu pa la// snying sna khrag sna sbyar bas mchod// gnod sbyin srog tig dmod pa brjod// yak+sha baM hu da ri dza/ ma ga ma bag sha dza/ ru ru ma ru tra ma ti dza/ yak+sha snying la shad shad du dza/ yak+sha srog la breng thun dza// nyi shar tshogs dang 'od dang sgra// rlung dmar dug dang bu yug 'ong// bsad pa'i rdzas kyis drag tu brdeg/ lhag ma bsreg cing rlung gis gtor// de nyid khrag gis lkugs te sgrol// drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags ni// lha g.yag dkar po'i snying nang du// brnags pa'i gzugs dang ming rus bri// jon dmar skud pas ske nas gdags// rje rigs thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dar dkar gyis ni kha bcad la// tshon skud sna lngas bcing bar bya// bya rgod dar ma'i sgro rtsa ni// srog rtsar bcug la dkyil du brtol// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum thur du bru// lha rdo gsum gyi sgyed pu la// gang gi thod pa gzhag par bya// thun rdzas bshos gtsang rngon cha dang// ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying// bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dang// ba dan dkar po rten du gzug/ nyung dkar jags kyi mda' mchog ni// thun gyi rdzas su gzhag par bya// drag sngags snying gi nang du brab// stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas// lha rnams 'dus pa'i drag sngags sbreng// ma hA de ba te dza hi dza/ saM bra ma na rak+Sha kaM ka sa ma ya hUM/ de ba rA dza ma hA ni dza// dgra bo mA ra ya thun rbad/ thun rbad/ shag len dza dza/ shag len dza dza hUta? hUta? tsa tur mu kha rag sha man/ kata? ka ya ma hUta?/ ma hA de ba a mu ka mA ra ya sod// 'jig rten

dregs pa mthu rtsal can// lha yi bod rbad bsad gsum dril// drag tu bzla zhing snying la brab// rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon dang// skyes pa stag chas dar thogs dang// zhub can pho tshogs 'ong ba ni// gsod gcod byed dang snying 'byin dang// dngos su snying phyung 'phar ba 'ong// rtags byung snying nas ling+ga dbyung// mtshon gyis gtubs la me la bsreg/ thal bar nya bo byas nas ni// thod par bcug la lha rten nam// 'jig rten lha chen gnas sar mnan// lha yi dal yams dgra la 'bebs// nad bdag ma mo'i drag sngags ni// snel gri mo yi thod pa ru// de yi snying nang ling+ga gzhug/ mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad la// thod pa tshon skud lnga yis bcing// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum dbus// thod par bcug la bsgrub par bya// nag smug gsum gyi snying khrag gis// ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchod// nyung dkar nyung nag skye tshe sogs// drag po'i thun rdzas tshogs tshang la// ma mo rnams kyi dmod pas bsngags// ma ma snying kha rag ma ma rag sha ma ma rag sha/ trag rag sha snying khrag la hub dza/ snying rtsa la dun dun/ trag raka sha ma ma dza dza/ dam dam dgra snying rbad bu nan/ ma ma nr-i snying tsit+ta la thun thun/ tra raka sha raka sha rag mo thun thun/ mug mug myos myos rbad rbad dza dza/ ma ma thun snying khrag thun/ shasti sta ma ma rag mo sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma mo'i srog tig bsdus pa'o// bsad pa las kyi ngan sngags 'di// gri lcags las byas sbu gu'am// bya rgod sgro rtsa'i nang nas bsngags// ma sring mon mo bal mo dang// byi mo la sogs bud med tshogs// bya nag rgod nag tshogs chen lhags// dngos su sha dang mgo sug ster// tsit+ta dngos su 'phar ba dang// bsad rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang// snying la phur pas gdab cing gsad// dug shing mo la sbyin bsreg bya// thun khrag dmigs pa'i dgra la 'phang// thal ba sngangs la nya bo bya// dur khrod dbus su gnan par bya// rims nad rnams kyis dmigs pa sgrol// drag po gza' yi drag sngags ni// mon pa nag po'am ra rog po'i// thod par snying nag ling+ga gzhug/ srog rtsar gri lcags sbu gu gzhug/ nyung dkar nyung nag zangs lcags phye// thun du bajags te thod par brab// ma ra ya pa shaM mi ki du ru du ru/ ma ti dz+wa la ti dza/ tsa pa ma ni ru ru rA hu la/ a tra ta tra pad+ma sha ra sha ra sta a mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT/ tri laM ka shaM ga du hrIH/ dza dza yak+sha thun// baM tril shi ni baM b+ha ba ti/ kha yag kha dun tri/ ru ti shu ta trig/ shu+u la pra ti mA ra ya dza/ dbang chen gza' yi drag jags 'di// drag po'i rdzas la bsngags te brdeg/ sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rjen// dkar gsum mngar gsum rdzas kyis mchod// nyi zla klad la 'khor ba dang// mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang// sbrul

chen gshog can 'khyug pa dang/ bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang// dgra bo dngos su khrid nas 'ong// rgod dang ri dwags gsod pa dang// don snying nang rol ster zhing rol// de 'dra'i bsad rtags rdzogs pa dang// snying dang ling+ga hom mer bsreg/ gnod rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor// thod pa klu yi rten sar sba// chu 'khyags ser ba khrag tu 'bebs// hur thum nad kyis glo bur 'chi// kha lkugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyur// gdug pa klu yi drag sngags ni// lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas su// stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum brus// dgra yi pha mes mgo bo'am// yang na mdze can thod pa ru// dgra yi ming rus bris te gzhug/ gtsang ma'i snod du dkar gsum dang// mngar gsum klu sman sna tshogs stsal// rtag tu mchod cing bsngags par bya// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga ra tsa/ dgra bo he khu la phe shan// nA ga phos phos shig shig hu ya hu ya/ ti ya ti ya/ ti pa tsa ti pa tsa/ a sha nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga ra tsa dgra po mA ra ya rbad/ shag ti rbad/ srog ti rbad/ sbar ti rbad/ snying la ril shaM shaM rbad/ i nan nag po pher na sha u+u ta nan ra tsa nan/ thi li nan/ phi li nan/ drag tu brjod cing bsgrub pa yis// me chen 'bar dang chu chen 'brub// ba glang sbal sbrul sdom sdig tshogs// shing gcod ri bsnyil
