brag ral sogs// lus la shu+u ba skrang lo 'byung// stobs ldan gnyen pos rab tu gcun// de nas byang bltas chu mig tu// ba liM gtang zhing bden pa gdar// thod pa ling+gar bcas pa gnan// klu rgyal 'khor dag bcas la gtad// phung po lhag med bzhes par bsam// gnas su phyin la bsrung ba bya// dgra ni mdze dang rmugs pas 'chi// sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyi// 'jig rten las kyis mnar ba yi// bstan pa'i rU tra gdug pa can// ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyur// zhes bka' k+p+ral to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa'i sde so so'i las la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyi// so so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs dang// sde dang las kyi byed pa bstan// sngon gyi 'jig rten khams 'di nyid// phung po nyon mongs la brten nas// nga rgyal dregs pa'i dbang gis myos// rang gzhan kun la 'tshe zhing gcod// gnas ngan len gyis kha 'khrid byas// legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyod// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gis// gti mug mun 'thibs bdud dang klu// nga rgyal stobs kyis dregs pa dag/ lha dang rgyal po zhes par gyur// phrag dog gza' dang gshin rje'i rigs// 'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin rigs// zhe sdang btsan dang srin por gol// srog la 'bebs pas

bdud ces bya// yi dwags gshin tshogs rnams kyi rje// phra mor rgyu ba snang zhing dregs// de yi don gyis srin por byung// gang gis gnod pa sbyin byed pa'i// de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid do// gang las bskyed pa ma mo ste// skyob byed nus pa lha yin no// gdug cing gtum pas mi 'chor bas// gza' zhes bya bar brjod pa yin// glen zhing myos pas klu zhes bya// 'gro ba rigs drug so so las// bdud dang lha ni lha min sde// gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyud skar bcas// rgyal chen rigs bzhi lha yi sde// ma mo srin po mi yi sde// gshin rje yi dwags sde yin te// klu ni byol song sde yin no// bdud rigs pho dang mo yi rigs// ye nas gnas dang glo bur byung// 'thab dang myos dang dregs par byed// sre dang chags par byed pa ste// gshin rje las dang zhi ba ste// gzugs can gzugs med dbang chen dang// dbang med phyi dang nang khyad par// las kyis rab tu bsgribs pa'o// srin po sha za gad mo can// sprul pa dang ni gzu lums can// rab tu rgyu dang gcig tu gnas// gnod sbyin gtso dang 'khor gyi rtags// gro ba dang ni rang rgyud de// tha dad rigs ni bco brgyad de// gnod cing 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can// lha ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang// gzugs med lha ma yin du gtogs// rab tu gdug rtsub che bas ni// lha min mi ma yin du grags// gang las byung dang gang las srin// gang gi bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa// ma mo zhes su grags pa dang// las dang ye shes bsdus shing phye// phra dang rags pa'i khyad par gyis// che chung gtso dang 'khor du snang// mkha' la rgyu ba'i drag shul can// las kyi phung po kho na'o// rgyal po bla rje bram ze dang// dmangs dang gdol pa can rnams dang// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i yan lag 'gyur// tha dad rigs dang sde yin no// 'di dag thog ma'i las kyi dngos// dngos dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid kyis// ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin byung// bdag lta bag la nyal du gnas// g.yo 'gul phra mo kun nas ldang// 'khrug cing 'tshe dang rtsod par shar// bsod nams las dang de ma yin// las kyi mtha' gnyis g.yang sar lhung// gnag cing mi dge zag par bcas// kha na ma tho lung ma bstan// log pa lus ngag yid gsum gyis// gnas ngan len pa'i rgyun chags mthud// dus gsum phyogs dang bcas pa yis// rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa yis// 'khor ba'i rten gzhi dam por btsugs// so so pha rol srog la gcod// longs spyod 'phrog cing rnam par 'tshe// gzi mdangs 'byor pa bde dang rgyas// gang yin 'joms shing brlag nus la// rgyud dang sdug bajal skyed byed pa// ma rungs nyes pa 'byin byed las// srog len tshe 'phrog gtsod dang sha/ myos 'thibs byings nad

rims dang yams// cog 'gyel gdug pa'i nad 'bebs shing// dme dang 'khrug pa rtsod pa dang// thor shod las dang rmod pa yis// rang gi sde las re re'ang// kun la khyab pa brgyad brgyad de// drug cu rtsa drug yan lag bcas// las kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyab// dregs pa'i bdag po so so yis// rang bzhin dgos pa'i bye brag gi/ dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa dag/ tshul ldan bsrung ba'i dbang phyug can// drag sngags las kyi dmod pa la// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug gi/ nus pa rdzu 'phrul mthu la sogs// rang gi rigs la gang bsngags pa// de dang de la rab sbyar bas// las kyi mtha' la gang dmigs pa// rdo rje can gyi yongs 'grub ste// nga yi stobs dang nus pa dang// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan tshogs// lus ngag yid kyis rab 'bad pa// gang yin de la mngon par 'byung// de yis thun mong yongs grub cing// mthar nges pa yang son par byed// 'di la ma 'ongs rnyogs pa can// the tshoms skyed par ma byed cig/ nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis// 'di ni rab tu bsngags pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa can gyi sde rigs dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// las la sbyar ba'i rim pa gsungs// dur khrod chu gling ri rtse dang// chu 'dus ngam grog 'jigs su rung// thung shul nags khraud ma rungs pa// dregs pa las kyi gnas yin no// mi rus mi bsad phung shul sa// dur zad po dang rul chad sa// bsnyon pa'i dri chen ma rungs khrag/ las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i rdzas// rta nag dre'u nag ma he dang// chu glang dang ni stag seng dang// rta dkar te lo rgod dkar dang// dom nag dmu rta ban glang dang// 'brug chen rma bya rus sbal dang// bya khyi ku ku shel dang mi// rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khrag/ bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub sems// rang gzugs snying po 'khor lor bcas// rgyan ldan bshos cha mthun pa'i rdzas// dam tshig mchod cing bsten pa'o// so sor bsngags pa'i las khung du// thod pa 'bru nag dug khrag g.yos// rgyu gsum phur pa mtshon cha rnams// bsad pa thun gyi rdzas yin no// dme khrag gsum dang dri ngan gsum// srog chags gsum dang dme rdzas gsum// thab rdzas gsum dang bsreg rdzas gsum// brtan sa gsum dang dreg sa gsum// gzhug sa gsum dang dbab sa gsum// kun rdzob rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis// chu drag dbab pa nges

par 'grub// rigs yul snod dang mchod rdzas dang// gnas sbyor byang chub srid 'dor blos// legs blangs yid kyis mthun spyad pa// gang la dmigs pa der gtad pas// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rten khang la// steng 'og gnas gsum bdag po gsum// rgya mtsho'i gting dang ri rab zur// bar snang khams dang nam mkha'i dkyil// bsrung dang bzlog dang bsad pa'i las// dmag dpung bsdu dang dpal bskyed dang/ rab tu khros dang sbyor ba gzhig/ las kyis pha rol dmod pa bzlog/ ngan pa'i thod pa sna gsum dang// shis pa ma yin sa brgyad du// rten cing 'brel pa 'byung sbyor bas// dmigs pa'i mthu stobs gnon par byed// khyad par las kyi bye brag gis// rgyal po ya rabs rje dpon dang// chung ba slob dpon mkhan po dang// rab byung khyim pa sngags spyod dang// phyi rol phyogs dang chos kyi grogs// che btsan dregs pas bsnyems pa dang// nga rgyal ldan zhing skal ba bzang// kun gyis bkur zhing rjed pa dang// sems rgyud bsros dang yul gyi don// nye bar bstan cing blo sbyong gnas// lhag pa'i lha yis rab bskyangs te// thun mong nus pa'i stobs rnyed cing// yon tan gcig gis rab bsdus pas// tshar gcad dka' ba'i yul yin te// ma lus gang la bsngags pa yi// ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs pa'i grogs// rab sngags brtson 'grus can gyis bsgral// gzhan yang zhi dang rgyas pa dang// dbang dang mngon par spyod rnams dang// rdo rje 'dzin pa nga dang gzhan// mtshungs ldan rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin// thogs med nus pa'i stobs kyis spyad// de dag gsang ba'i dmod pa yang// dregs pa sde brgyad so so yi// gsang gnad snying po 'di dag go/ gong 'og sngags 'di rigs ma phyi sor bzhag byas/ ya ma bu ha na ha ti sta ti sta du kra ma sod sod/ khra tri ma ma tri dza dzaH/ shon tri dza dzaH/ yag sha dza da tri dza sha tri dza tri dza/ tsit+ta pra ma ya a mu ka srog la dza dza byo/ tri tsa pa la a shug me/ a b+hi sha a b+hi shu tsakra rag sha sa ma ya/ dun thum ri li li/ myag myag myog myog srog la thun rbad/ rag sha srog la phrig phrig a pa ta lo ka ni ya ma shri hri bi tri sta na/ kro ma ri pa tra srog la thun b+h+yo/ ma hA yag sha thum ril rbad/ ma ru tse d+ha sha g+h+rI ba pra ma ling// 'di dag gcod byed 'phrog byed kyi// ma lus las la bsngags par 'gyur/ nr-i hur thum dza/ sha trUM mA ra ya rbad/ a mu ka ma ra nr-i ya ka ma ru sod sod/ gsad pa thun gyi dmod pa'o// byi sha mo ki ru ru ma tri ka ta dz+wa la a ta dz+wa swA hA/ tsa pa ti rA hu la ma hA kro ta ka pa shar shar sta shar sti hUM phaT/ tsa shul ru ma ki sha dz+wa la a ta/ ma hA tsan d+ha rag sha hri ta bri ma ya ru tra ma sa ra tra byi na ga ra tsa be ga a nan ta rag shi ti san d+ha rag k+Shi na tsit+ta b+ha si ku ru mun tri

tsan d+ha dum bu dum bu khal rag sha thum ril li li// ma ma sa ma ya trag rag sha ma tri ga na// ma sa kha ya ku ru te tse b+ha li ta mu ha/ ha ra ha ra na da ra da ra yang/ tri ka ra mi tri dul dul/ snying khrag la ris ris/ rtsa la thun thun/ trag rag mo hril hril/ shag shag shar shar rbad// ma ma tsag sha trag tu phob/ be la ma byi ru lu ru lu/ ma ma trag sha hril hril shar b+h+yo/ ma ra ya raM hril shar hril/ shel tra hUM/ trag tu tsa ra shu ti phrom ka ra phrom/ re ma ti pa shang mi ki rA hu la shag shag hril byo/ khrag la tsa ri mu sha b+h+yo/ trag raM thun shag ril raM shar b+h+yo/ dud phrom kar phrom shu ti phrom/ nA ga hril san shag sa du ma ya hril b+h+yo/ pra ta pa sha ya/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag rA hu la hril hril shag shag ser ser dug dug/ ya ya phob phob/ mu ka ye/ pa ka ye/ a ba ye/ hrIHSh+t-IHbi kr-i na te/ dza pa ti rA hu la ma hA kro ta ka bab ta shar shal ta ste hUM phaT/ thig nig shu ti phrom dud phrom/ mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi reng sod/ rkyang rje rkyang mo tsu ru tsu ru/ ho ho phrom phrom/ mu ra mu ra sha du ru phrom/ thig hUM hUM sod sod/ rlung dang sprin dang rab rgyu dang// phyogs dang rtags kyi tshad ldan pas// dbab pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya// steng 'og bar gsum drag po'i las// gzhug dang gtor dang bsreg pa dang// bkol dang sbub dang sbreng ba dang// bod dang smre dang gdung ba dang/ gzir dang bskor dang gzhig pa dang// bcad dang dril ba'i las rnams kyis/ smin pa'i lo thog 'joms par byed// nag po ti pa tsa ye nA ga rA dza he gu la phe sha rag sha nan/ phos shig shig/ hu ya hu ya/ tir ya tir ya/ ka la nA ga b+han+d+ha dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ nag po ti pa ca ya phe sha rag sha dzaH/ nA ga ka la phe sha rag sha dza/ a sha nA ga ti pa tsa ya dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ nA ga rA dza shag ti srog la rbad/ snying la ris shaM shaM rbad/ i sha na nan/ phe sha rag sha u nan/ nA ga nan/ thi li nan/ phi li nan/ tsa ri nan/ a pa ra sod/ rmag dul dul/ ka la rngubs myogs thig mA ra ma dul dul/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ru ru ra ra/ ti ti/ tri li ti ti/ ga ru Na ra ga to ra dza ma ra he gad/ man dza phe sha rag sha u ta nan/ b+ha shi ni sha ra le shu ru mu le/ ta ta ma re na hu ya hu ya/ ra ti ra ti tsa ri shag tsag gi/ nr-i ma ra tri/ ma ma du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal pa baM ril/ nag po ti pa rag sha nan/ khug ri la baM dgra bo mA ra ya dza/ nag po ti pa tsa snying la dza/ shag shag nan khug thuM ril rbad/ tsit+ta rag sha rol khug thun/ ka la snying la thum ril rbad/ ka la sho ri snying la trag sha ha ra ka/ mu ka mA ra ya thum ril rbad/ khug dang 'gro dang las byed pa'i// rang gi rtags dang ldan pa na/ dmigs pa'i las la rab tu sbyar// ldog dang ma thub 'khyil pa dang// 'byams dang rdug dang zad

mthar gtugs// gnyan po ldab ma sna sel dang/ bsdu dang spro dang mi zad ster/ longs spyod thug pa med pa yis// dbyings kyi ngang du gtad par bya// sde brgyad so so'i ming gi sngags// rang skad dmod pa'i yan lag la/ d+he ba a pri sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ pra ma dun tse phob/ badzra g+h+ri ga ni sa ma ya hrI b+h+yo/ sa na ti ma du ru/ sa ma ya trig b+hu hu ta k+Shi pa le hUM/ bzlog bsgyur gdug pa'i drag sngags kyi// las kyi mtha' bsgyur ma lus pa// nga'am nga dang 'dra ba yi// rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyi// gang la bsngags pa de dag sbyar/ gzhan gyis the tshom mi bya ste/ nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/ de la rigs par gnang ba yin/ zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las dmigs pa'i khyad par las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// rang gi sku yi khyad par las// dregs pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa yi// yon tan bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hUM dur khrod chen po rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gtum drag me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na/ gdug byed ru tra ti ra'i khri steng nas// mdangs ldan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng na/ dregs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni// sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar// sa dgu rdzogs pa'i dbu dgu bstan// stong pa bco brgyad ldan pa'i phyag/ zhabs kyis 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi gnon// dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// khro zhing bzhad dang gtsigs pa'i zhal// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// khams gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigs// shangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngubs// snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gengs// tshems kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrol// ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyab// khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud// phrin las rigs kyis dbu la brgyan// bco brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis// dbang sdud rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na// dregs pa'i lha brgyad b+han+d+ha g.yas// tsit+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnams// 'bar ba'i chas kyis sku la brgyan// sprul pa'i lha brgyad sku la rdzogs// g.yas g.yon zhabs kyis dregs pa gzir// ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshed// lo lta rU tra 'dul ba'i dpal// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yum// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sbyor// gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi g.yas// b+han+d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon// mthing nag 'od kyis kun tu khyab// ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag khro zhing rngams// phyag drug

g.yas g.yon dang po yis// rdo rje dung khrag dkrugs shing gsol// g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag bzhi yi// lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta rol// yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// sku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyor// g.yas kyis nam mkha' stong pa 'degs// g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// dpal chen yum gyi byin rlabs las// sprul pa dregs pa pho mo'i tshogs// bdud nag me yi kha brlangs can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// khram shing tri shUl g.yas na bsnams// g.yon gyis kha T+wAM zhags pa 'phen// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// zhabs gnyis gdug pa'i snying la gzir// yum chen bdud mo khrag 'dzag ma// khram bam thod khrag phyag na bsnams// sku la zhing lpags gsar pa bgos// bdud rta nag po chibs su bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra bgegs shugs kyis sgrol// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ phyag g.yas thod khrag gri gug g.yon// btsun mo yum chen za byed ma// gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams// yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// ma he khros dang chu glang bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gzir/ srin po gsod byed sku mdog nag/ phyag na ral gri thod phrag bsnams/ yum chen gsod par byed pa mo// gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// stag seng rngams pa chibs su bcibs// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yang// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// dar nag 'phyar zhing zhing lpags rdebs// yum chen sha za ral gcig ma// yab kyi tshul 'dzin grub pa mo// zhing lpags gyon te gyi ling bcibs// drag sngags bdag po chen po ni// dbang phyug chen po lha yi gtso// mdog dkar shel gri ba dan 'phyar// na bza' dar dkar ber chen gsol// chibs su gnam ru dkar po bcibs// thar pa nag po rU tra'i gtso// mchod gtor dug thun phyag na bsnams// zhing lpags gon te dom nag bcibs// dmu bdud rje dpon nag po ni// dar nag 'phyar zhing ti ra bgrad// ber nag gsol zhing dmu rta bcibs// mu stegs kA la yag sha ni// mthing nag kha T+wAM tri shul 'dzin// zhing lpags bgos te ma he bcibs// khyab 'jug rog ti nag po yang// khram shing dgra s+t+wa phyag gis 'dzin// sprin nag bgos shing 'brug sngon bcibs// klu rgyal bA ru Na yi rje// ser nag sbrul gyi na bza' gsol// bum pa rus sbal phyag gis 'dzin// chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs// rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya yang// mdog dkar shel gri dar dkar 'dzin// sras mchog 'bar ba dmar po ni// mdung ring

g.yas la shel gri g.yon// rdo rje mdzes pa 'jam pa yang mdog dmar po// ru mtshon dar dmar phyag gis 'dzin// khu le lag dgu 'bar ba yang// mdog ser sprul pa lag dgu 'gyed// zhing lpags bgos shing ti ra gnon// drag sngags bdag po gtso 'khor bcas// rang gi rigs kyi 'khor 'dul ba// so so'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// gcod par byed pa bdud kyi sde/ 'ching bar byed pa btsan gyi sde// gsod byed shan pa srin po'i sde// gdug rtsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sde// drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sde/ nad gdon 'bebs pa ma mo'i sde// nam mkhar dbang bsgyur gza' yi sde/ glen lkugs gdug pa klu yi sde// sde brgyad dmod pa'i drag sngags can// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// 'khor dang sde rigs brjod mi lang/ phrin las mi zad longs spyod gter// yon tan nus pa dpag tu med// zhe sdang can la khro bar ston// nga rgyal can la lhag par ston// 'dod chags can la mi sdug ston// gti mug can la myos par ston// ser sna can la phrog par ston// phrag dog can la 'jigs par ston// khyod kyis mi 'dul gcig med kyis// mchod cing bskang ba'i mthun rdzas bzhes// bcol zhing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig/ bstod cing bsgrub pas dgyes par mdzod// de nas rang gi snying po dang// 'jig rten dregs pa'i bdag po rnams// so so'i sngags kyis las la sbyar// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yis// ltos dang re ba kun spangs te// sangs rgyas bstan la rab dmigs nas// drag sngags bdag po nyer bsgrubs na// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob cing// sems can rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// thun mong ba dang nye ba dang// mchog gyur ring ba'i dngos grub rnams// dpa' bo de la mngon du 'byung// yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cing// 'jig rten chos la rab bsngags pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang// sa chen po la gtogs pa yi// rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spyod// mthu stobs nus pas bsnyems pa yi// gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing// rang gi dbang du khug pa dang// bsgo ba rdzob pa med par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ nyid kyi sku 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs su sbrul pa de/ thugs chos nyid zhi ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i gnas thams cad la 'od zer gyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad

khyab par mdzad nas/ ma rungs shing gdug pa dang/ gtum pa'i sems dang bsam pa thams cad ma lus pa zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ gnod pa med pa dang/ brtse ba dang/ yi dga' ba dang bcas pas phyogs der snang bar gyur nas// thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// khyod kyis bstan pa gsang chen 'di// ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu// rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhe na// bdag cag 'jig rten dregs pa can// zhi ba'i sems su gnas byas pas// rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa/ de la phan pa rgyas par bstan// phrin las dang ni blta spyod kyi// khyab pa de la yongs rdzogs shing// grogs dang bran dang dmangs bzhin du// gang gis bsgo ba de bzhin bgyi// dam tshig lha yi yon tan dang// rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan de la// bka' las 'da' bar mi spyod cing// gsung bzhin bsgrub par rab tu spro// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis// ji ltar bsngags pa'i las rnams ni// bdag cag nus pas myur du bsgrub// byin gyis brlab par gtsor mdzod cig/ ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing byin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi bkod pa rnams dang/ rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad kyang nyid kyi sku'i dbyings su bsdus shing sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las// phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya'o// rgya rgya rgya'o// gu h+ya//// rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta sa mu dA ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa/ mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas shing/ sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad ltar gnas pa las/ skye 'gag med cing bdag dang gzhan du mi mthong ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad byang chub sems su gcig la/ snang ba du mar tha dad par snang ste snang yang gcig dang du mar brjod pa las 'das so// kye kye byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ngo bo gcig las med pa las// gcig la snang ba tha dad pas// gcig dang du ma'i brjod las 'das// zhes gsungs so// dpe mnyam

pa nyid dang/ don mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos thams cad lhun gyis grub pa mnyam pa nyid do// e ma ho// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gcig dang du ma'i brjod las 'das// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan par dka'// 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// zhes gsungs so// ma bcos ma bslad par rtogs na// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i phyir// gang ltar byas kyang lhun gyis grub// dbye ba med pa'i don rtogs so// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing// cir yang med par cir yang snang/ don dam kun rdzob gnyis su snang// gcig dang du ma gnyis su snang// 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// ma rig nyid kyang yang dag lam// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na// rtog pa g.yeng ba chos kyi sku// ma rig ye shes tha dad med// so so snang ba phye ba tsam// ma rig pa yang lam du gcig/ dang po gang nas ma byung bas// tha ma gar yang 'gro ba med// dang po skye ba'i rgyu med pas// tha ma 'chi ba'i lam yang med// dngos po ci la yang mi gnas pas// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan tu med// skye zhing 'pho ba'i gnas med pas// bsad cing bcad pa bsgrub tu med// ma rig pa yi rtog pa yis// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// rdo rje lta bur gnas pa la// sgyu ma chu zla brag cha 'dra// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so// kye kye thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs las// stong gsum rgyal ba'i skus gang yang// byang chub sems las g.yos pa med// dper na nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin// dkar dmar sngo ste ngos gzung med// de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin yang// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// mi shes bar snang 'ja' tshon 'dra// de phyir ma bcos ji bzhin bzhag/ ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// yab yum sras dang bcas snang yang// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ skye 'chi med pa byang chub sems// 'du 'bral med de chos kyi sku// bzang ngan med de 'khor 'das chos// rgyu 'bras med de mnyam pa nyid// 'gag pa med de sems nyid ni// dper na rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra// nam mkha' bzhin du ye nas gnas// nam mkha' 'di ni 'di 'dra zhes// tshig tu rab tu brjod du med// de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin yang// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// bstan na gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i chos// bstan du med pa blta ba'i mchog/ bsgom du med pa sgom pa'i mchog/ bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig ni// ma bsrungs bzhin du lhun gyis grub// ma nor pa yi chos nyid la// rang bzhin skye med chos kyi dbyings// ma bcos pa yi byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma bkag chos// dper na rgya mtsho

chen po la// chu bran thams cad 'bab cing 'du// de bzhin byang chub sems nyid las// 'khor 'das gnyis ka 'byung zhing 'du// zhes rdo rje'i tshig tu gsungs so// e ma ho// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po ni// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing// me long gzugs bzhin gzung du med// brag cha bzhin du brjod dang bral// bcud kyi rdo rje snying po 'di// bdag dang gzhan du brjod du med// bstan du med pa'i chos nyid 'di// brjod du med par go bar gyis// brjod med brjod pa brjod pa'i mchog/ mnyan bsam bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis// blo yi rtog pa kha phye la// nges pa'i don 'di rtogs par gyis// nges pa'i don 'di ma rtogs na// bsgom dang bsgrub pa yun ring kyang// mi shes gzung 'dzin 'ching ba'i rgyu// de phyir rtogs pa sngon du 'gro/ rtogs pa gdeng du ma gyur na// ci ltar spyad kyang 'ching ba'i rgyu// rtogs pa'i gdeng gi lta ba ni// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs brtags// nges pa'i don 'di ma rtogs na// mnyam bzhag bsgom pa chags pa'i rgyu// spu gri'i nags tshal la sogs kyang// rang gi rtog pas brtas pa'i phyir// de phyir rtogs pa sngon du gtang// rtogs pa'i don 'di rab tu gces// zhes bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi chos kyi sku skye ba med pa las chos nyid rang sgrar byung ba'i ngang las/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku skye ba'i cho 'phrul du 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa/ gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lor gsal ba la/ ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa rgyas pa'i gru bzhir gyur pa'i nang dkyil 'khor dgu la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud zlum po gru chad bzhi dang sgo bzhir ldan pa/ rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi rol byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ phyi nas bltas pas nang gsal ba/ nang nas bltas pas phyi gsal la/ ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du gsal bar gyur to// de ltar rang bzhin 'og min gyi gnas na/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin tu gnas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang/ yum kun tu bzang mo dang/ bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa rang bzhin gyis gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang/ yum kun tu bzang mo gnyis chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye kye// gtso bo gtso mo 'khor bcas kyang// rang bzhin 'og min gnas mchog na// chu zla gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la// nyon mongs dri mas gos pa med// rang bzhin don gyi dbyings

na bzhugs// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ston pa ltar// rang bzhin 'og min chos dbyings nas// gsung gis don rnams mi ston te// thugs kyis chos rnams mjal bar ston// zhes yab yum gnyis po mnyam pa la bzhugs nas/ mnyam pa dang rtogs pa'i sgo nas gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po// 'og min gyi gnas na yum dang 'khril tshul du bzhugs pa las/ yab kyis glengs pa// kye kye/ dag pa dri ma med pa'i chos// bla med byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog gzhom pa dang// drag pos 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// yab yum gnyis med 'khril ba'i tshul// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu brjod do// de nas yum yang mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bskul ba// kye kye/ bde gshegs rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// mnyam pa chen po'i don bstan nas// gang la 'dul ba bstan pa'i phyir// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i gtso mchog la// gnyis med chen pos 'khyud par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas dgyes pa chen po des// gsang ba'i thugs mnyam pa'i ngang gis/ kye kye snying po don gyi gtso// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi sras// 'khor ba yongs kyi ded dpon po// gnyis su med pa'i yum dang bzhugs// zhes glengs te mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yum gyis bskul ba// kye kye bde gshegs kun gyi gtso// ma rig mun la 'joms pa'i bdag/ kun kyang 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// dri med gsal ba nyi zla'i 'od// chos nyid mnyam pa'i klong na bzhugs// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso/ mun pa 'joms pa'i shes rab 'od// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i ded dpon gtso// 'khor ba'i dri ma 'khrud pa'i chu// 'gro ba yongs kyi gnyen gcig po// gnyis med bde ba'i dbyings dkyil du// dgyes pa chen po dbab tu gsol// zhes yum gyi mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas nas de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des/ rgyal po dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad glengs so// kye ho rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// rigs kyi yum dang gnyis med par// pad+ma chen po gdangs su gsol// 'khor gyi rnam pa bskyed du gsol// gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// de nas yum chen mo nyid kyi bsam pa g.yos par gyur to/ e ma ho// ston pas bstan pa 'di bstan phyir// 'khor ba 'dul ba'i ded dpon gtso// dgyes pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo yis// gnyis med dgyes par gyur nas ni// gsang ba chen po'i char chen phob/ a la la ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a nu rA ga ho/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ hUM trAM hrI hAH/ de nas yab yum gnyis su

med pa las/ bde bar gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thon par gyur nas/ rang bzhin gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gleng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa kun gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces zhus so// kye kye bde gshegs chos kyi sku// rtog pa'i dra ba gzhom pa'i phyir// bde gshegs rigs brgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs// legs par rgyas par bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos gsungs pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad ni// rigs brgyar 'dus pa ngas bshad do// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sa yi cho ga legs byas la// mgon po thugs dam can rnams mchod// bkra shis sa la maN+Dal bya// 'dom gang rgya la chag gang dpangs// rnam lnga sman gyis chag chag gdab// stangs stabs khro bos mtshams bcad la// dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// thig g.yog grogs dang rab ldan pas// ye shes lnga ldan srid bu yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// slob dpon nub la slob ma shar// rdo rje khu tshur byin brlabs la// pho brang dgu pa'i thig tu gdab// thig ni bcu drug btab pa la// cha ni bzhi bzhir mnyam par dbye// rtsa ba dbus cha gnyis te mtha' gnyis dor ba sgo// rgyan dang chas bya dbus brgyad cha las sgo 'gram dang// ya phubs logs la sgo khyud ngos la tshon sna lngas// bskor bya khyams kyi cha la longs spyod 'gram gyi cha// rin chen pha gu logs rgyab cha la 'gram dang phyed// logs rgyab cha gzhan ka ba cha lnga ya phubs btegs// rdo ra rnam bzhi rgyan gyis rnam mdzes rta babs dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo rtse bran gdugs mdzes ri dwags bcas// ba dan 'phan dang rin chen rgyal mtshan mdzes par bya// pad phreng me 'od rdo rje'i phreng bas mdzes par bskor// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rang gzhung ci rigs mdzes par bskor// sa tshon sna lnga dpa' bo 'bru lnga yis// ye shes lnga dang ldan par byin brlabs la// dbus su rigs sbyar mu khyud 'od zer ldan// rtsibs bzhi rigs kyis dbye zhing gong ra mdzes pa'i tshon// mu khyud rdo rje'i ra ba gru chad khyams tshul phyogs// sgo bzhi rigs dang sbyar la brtsig pa rigs kyis dbye// 'dod yon khyams dmar rin chen pha gu ser// drwa ba drwa phyed ser la da ru ka ni ljang/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dgu la sgo rgyan bcas// phyi khyams phyogs kyis phye la sgo yang de dang bstun// rtsig pa dkar mthing ser dmar ljang gis

bskor// 'dod yon la sogs gong 'dra rta babs la sogs sgo rgyan bya// mu khyud pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje phreng ba ldan// phur pa mda' dang me long ral gri la sogs dgod// dar dang ras kyi yol bre tshon skud dra bar gzhug/ de ni bsnyen bsgrub gnyis ka'i dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa'i lha tshogs rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das te bde gshegs gtso// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dam pa rigs brgya'i bsgom rim la// thog mar byang chub sems bskyed de// yan lag bdun gyis tshogs bsags la// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// stong zhing bdag med ma bcos bsgom// kun tu snang ba'i ting 'dzin ni// khyab pa'i snying rje chen por bsgom// de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// rang sems yi ge a ru gsal// yi ge a yi byin rlabs las// e las nam mkha' yaM las rlung// baM las chu dang suM las gser// laM las ri rab raM las me// b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal yas khang// dkyil 'khor dgu la dkyil 'khor gcig/ dbus kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad sgo bzhir bcas pa la/ phyi khyams rgyan gyis mdzes byas pa'i// gzhal yas gsal bar grub par bsgom// de nas nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// lha rnams kun gyi gnas su gding// de nas rang sems yi ge a// dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i gdan steng babs/ spro bsdus 'od zhu 'khor lor gsal// rnam par snang mdzad kun bzang mo// shar du mi bskyod sangs rgyas spyan// lho ru 'byung ldan gos dkar mo// nub tu snang mtha' mA ma kI/ byang du don grub dam tshig sgrol// shar phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dbus su kun tu bzang po dang// yum gcig rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' la// lho ru rdo rje rgyal po'o// nub tu rdo rje chags pa la// byang du rdo rje legs pa'o// shar du rdo rje sgeg mo la// lho ru rdo rje bdug pa mo// nub tu rdo rje lcags kyu ma// byang du rdo rje me sgron ma'o// lho yi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang// yum gcig rin chen dbyings phyug ma// shar du rdo rje rin chen la// lho ru rdo rje gzi brjid che// nub tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan la// byang du rdo rje bzhad pa'o// shar du rdo rje phreng ba ma// lho ru rdo rje bdug pa mo// nub tu rdo rje zhags pa ma// byang du rdo rje bde ba mo// nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo spyan ras gzigs dbang la// yum chen pad+ma dbyings phyug ma// shar du rdo rje chos dang ni/ lho ru rdo rje non

po dang// nub tu rdo rje smra ba ste// byang du rdo rje 'khor lo'o// shar du rdo rje dbyangs can ma// lho ru rdo rje mar me ma// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// byang du rdo rje gsal bkra ma'o// byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'chang chen sangs rgyas dang// yum chen las kyi dbyings phyug ma// shar du rdo rje las dang ni// lho ru rdo rje srung ba dang// nub tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te// byang du rdo rje khu tshur ro// shar du rdo rje gar bsgyur ma// lho ru rdo rje byug pa mo// nub tu rdo rje dril 'khrol ma// byang du rdo rje thog 'bebs ma'o// shar lho'i mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo sa yi snying po la// yum chen rdo rje sems ma ni// shar du chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang// lho ru dbang phyug rgyal po la// nub tu bkod pa'i rgyan dang ni// byang ru rin chen 'od 'phro'o// shar du bde ba rgyas 'debs ma// lho ru bde ba rmongs phyed ma// nub tu bde ba za byed ma// byang du bde ba tshe 'phel ma'o// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo nam mkha'i snying po'o// yum chen rin chen sems ma'o// shar du snang ba'i mchog dang ni// lho ru phyag rgya'i rgyal po'o// nub tu spobs pa'i rgyal po dang// byang du spobs pa brtsegs pa'o// shar du khrus kyi lha mo la// lho ru rgyal mtshan lha mo'o// nub tu bla re'i lha mo la// byang du gdugs kyi lha mo'o// nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo byams pa chen po la// yum chen pad+ma'i sems ma'o// shar du pad+ma'i rgyal po la// lho ru pad+ma dam pa'o// nub tu rdo rje mi g.yo ba// byang du rdo rje thogs med dang// shar du lha mo pad+ma can// lho ru lha mo 'dzin byed ma// nub tu lha mo skyon bral ma// byang du lha mo rnam rgyal ma'o// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo sgrib pa rnam sel dang// yum chen las kyi sems ma la// shar du rin chen dbang phyug ma// lho ru rdo rje thub pa'i las// nub tu dag par ston pa dang// byang du mi g.yo ba yi mtha'/ shar du lha mo dbyangs can ma// lho ru lha mo dri med ma// nub tu lha mo sgra gcan ma// byang du lha mo thogs med ma'o// dkyil 'khor phyi yi bar khyams la// shar stod mi yi thub pa la// shar smad lha yi thub pa'o// lho stod lha min thub pa la// lho smad byol song thub pa'o// nub tu yi dwags thub pa ste// byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa'o// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma// lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ma// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// byang du rdo rje dril bu ma'o// de ltar lha tshogs brgya po rnams// sku ni phyag rgya chen po la// gsung ni sngags kyi dam tshig ste// thugs ni phyag rgya chen por ldan// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// snang la rang bzhin med pa ni// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan nam// chu zla nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra// zhes gsungs

so// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// dam pa rigs brgya'i lha tshogs kyi// skyed pa rtsa ba'i sngags bshad pa// dbus kyi lha tshogs bskyed pa ni// oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na oM/ oM badzra dwe Sha ra ti oM/ oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya hUM/ oM badzra bud+d+ha lo tsa na hUM/ oM rat+na sam+b+ha ba trAM/ oM badzra paN+Da ra ba sa nI trAM/ oM badzra a mi ta b+hA hrIH/ oM badzra mA ma kI hrIH/ oM badzra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hA/ oM badzra sa ma ya tA rA hA/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi sngags/ oM badzra sa mAn+ta b+ha dra hUM/ oM badzra d+ha rA hUM/ oM badzra sa twa hUM/ oM badzra rA dza hUM/ oM badzra rA ga hUM/ oM badzra sA d+hu hUM/ oM badzra lA s+ye hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badzra ang+ku sha hUM// oM badzra dI bi shwa ra ti hUM/ lho phyogs dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sngags/ oM many+dzu shrI ku mA ra mu la trAM/ oM badzra rat+na d+ha rA hUM/ oM badzra rat+na hUM/ oM badzra sUr+Ya trAM/ oM badzra ke tu hrIH/ oM badzra ha sa hA/ oM badzra mA le hUM/ oM badzra puSh+pe trAM/ oM badzra pA sha hrIH/ oM badzra su kha hA/ nub phyogs lha tshogs dkyil 'khor sngags/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ti kA ru Na ma hA rA dza hrIH/ oM pad+ma d+ha rA hrIH/ oM badzra d+harma hUM/ oM badzra tik+Sh+Na trAM/ oM badzra b+hA ShA hrIH/ oM badzra tsakra hA/ oM gIrti hUM/ oM badzra A lo ke trAM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta hrI/ oM badzra rA ga ra ti hA/ byang gi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sngags/ oM badzra pA Ni sa man+ta hUM/ oM badzra karma d+ha rA hUM/ oM badzra karma hUM/ oM rak+Sha trAM/ oM badzra yak+Sha hrIH/ oM badzra san+d+hi hA/ oM badzra nr-i t+ye hUM// oM badzra gan+d+he trAM/ oM badzra g+haN+De hrIH/ oM badzra A be sha hA/ shar lho mtshams kyi lha tshogs sngags/ oM k+Shi ti gar+b+ha rat+na oM/ oM badzra nirti hUM/ oM d+harma ke tu hUM/ oM ke twI shwa ra rA dza trAM/ oM b+hU hA laM rA dza hrIH/ oM rat+na pra b+hA hA/ oM badzra kha T+wAM ka pra dz+wa la ya hUM/ oM badzra a mo g+ha sha ra ya trAM/ oM badzra rA ga sa ma ya hrIH/ oM badzra g+haN+De dza la ya hA/ lho nub mtshams kyi lha tshogs sngags/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha swA hA oM rat+na ni tre trAM/ oM A lo ke a gra pra be ho hUM/ oM mu dra rA dza pra b+ha ta trAM/ oM pra ti b+hA na rA dza ne hrIH/ oM pra ti b+hA na ku Ta ye hA/ oM badzra A p+lA baM hUM/ oM badzra ke tu trAM/ oM bi tA na d+hA hrIH/ oM tshar+t+ra hrIH/ nub byang dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sngags/ oM hrI ma hA mai tri hUM/ oM pad+ma ni ti oM oM ka ma la rA dza ma hA rA dza hUM// oM pad+mo t+ta ma pad+ma d+ha ra trAM/ oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya hrIH/ oM a mo g+ha rA dza ya hUM/ oM bi ma le karma many+dzu Sha ya hUM/ A+oM dza li mi li hu ba tre ba tu sa ba tre trAM/ oM ta ka ru na dz+wa la pu tsa pad+me hrIH/ oM tra sa ni bi tra sa ni ba tra sa ni hA/ byang shar dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sngags/ oM sarba Ni ba ra Na bi shwa d+ha ra ya ba re oM/ oM karma ni te oM/ oM rat+ne sha dar rat+na d+ha ra hUM/ oM karma sid+d+hi rat+na d+ha rA ya trAM/ oM A ra ha shA d+ha ra ya hrIH/ oM a tsa la ak+Sho b+h+ya d+ha rA ya hA/ oM dza ye dza ye ba ha sarba sha ni hUM/ oM dz+wa la pra

dz+wa la dA hA pa tsa trAM/ oM gan+d+he tsu ru ma hA pa sha ra a ti ti hrIH/ oM ha ka hu ru+u na pra ka ri hA/ dkyil 'khor 'khyams la thub drug sngags/ oM mu ne kriM swA hA/ oM mu ne trUM hUM swA hA/ oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ oM mu ne praM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir sgo ma'i sngags/ oM badzra aM ku sha dza/ oM badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badzra g+haN+De hoH/ dam pa rigs brgya'i rtsa ba'i sngags// sku bskyed gsal gdab bsnyen sngags yin// ces gsungs so// dam pa rigs brgya'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dkar// g.yas pa ye shes 'khor lo la// g.yon pa dngul dkar dril bu'o// zhabs ni mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// yum chen kun bzang bdag nyid dkar// g.yas pas yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// g.yon pas dril bu 'dud pa'i tshul// shar du mi 'khrugs mthing ga la// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// yum chen sangs rgyas spyan ma ni// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang mthun// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan ser// phyag na rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// yum chen gos dkar yab dang mthun// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// mA ma kI ni yab dang mthun// byang du don yod grub pa ljang// phyag na ral gri bsnams pa'o// dam tshig sgrol ma yab dang mthun// shar gyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su kun tu bzang po dkar// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// rdo rje dbyings phyug yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// lho ru rdo rje rgyal po ser// phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// nub tu rdo rje chags pa dmar// phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// byang du rdo rje legs pa ljang// phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o// shar du rdo rje sgeg mo dkar// phyag na 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lho ru rdo rje bdug pa ser// phyag na spos kyi sprin spro ba'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags kyu dmar// phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje me sgron ljang// phyag na gsal ba'i sgron me'o// lho yi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su 'jam dpal gzhon nu ser// phyag na rin chen ral gri'o// rin chen dbyings phyug yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje rin chen dkar// phyag na rdo rje rin chen bsnams// lho ru rdo rje gzi brjid ser// phyag na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams// nub tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan dmar// phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje bzhad pa ljang// phyag na so 'phreng bsnams pa'o// shar du rdo rje phreng ba dkar// phyag na rin chen phreng ba

bsnams// lho ru rdo rje me tog ser// phyag na me tog bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje zhags pa ma/ phyag ni 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// byang du rdo rje bde ma ljang// phyag na bsil yab bsnams pa'o/ nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// pad+ma dbyings phyug yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje chos ni dkar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho ru rdo rje rnon po ser// phyag na ral gri bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje smra ba dmar// phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje 'khor lo ljang// phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// shar du rdo rje dbyangs mkhan dkar// phyag na pi waM bsnams pa'o// lho ru rdo rje mar me ser// phyag na mar me bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje gsal bkra ljang// phyag na rma bya bsnams pa'o// byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo phyag na rdo rje ljang// phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o// las kyi dbyings phyug yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje las ni dkar// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// lho ru rdo rje srung ba ser// phyag na go cha bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje gnod sbyin dmar// phyag na mche ba bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje khu tshur ljang// phyag ni phyag rgya khu tshur mdzad// shar du rdo rje gar bsgyur dkar// phyag rgya sna tshogs bsgyur ba'o// lho ru rdo rje byug pa ser// phyag na spos chu bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje dril 'khrol dmar// phyag na dril bu 'khrol ba'o// byang du rdo rje 'bebs ma ljang// phyag na bum pa'i chu rgyun bsnams// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo sa yi snying po dkar// phyag na rin chen snyems ma bsnams// rdo rje sems ma yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje rgyal mtshan dkar// phyag na chu srin gser mdog bsnams// lho ru dbang phyug rgyal po ser// phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// nub tu bkod pa'i rgyan ni dmar// phyag na me tog bsnams pa'o// byang du rin chen 'od 'phro ljang// phyag na rin chen bsnams pa'o// shar du bde ba rgyas 'debs dkar// phyag na kha T+wAM bsnams pa'o// lho ru bde ba za byed ser// phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// nub tu bde ba rmongs byed dmar// phyag rgya thugs kar bsnol ba'o// byang du bde ba za byed ljang// phyag na dril bu bsnams pa'o// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo nam mkha'i snying po dkar// phyag na rin chen za ma tog/ rin chen dbyings phyug yab dang mthun// shar du snang ba'i mchog ni dkar// phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o// lho ru phyag rgya'i rgyal po ser// phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o// nub tu spos kyi glang po dmar// phyag na 'od kyi za ma

tog/ byang du spobs brtsegs kun 'dren ljang// phyag na gser tog mdog yang lcags kyu bsnams// shar du khrus kyi lha mo dkar// phyag na khrus bum bsnams pa'o// lho ru rgyal mtshan lha mo ser// phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// nub tu bla re'i lha mo dmar// phyag na bla re bsnams pa'o// byang du gdugs kyi lha mo ljang// phyag na gser gdugs bsnams pa'o// nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su gtso bo byams pa dmar// phyag na klu shing pad+ma bsnams// pad+ma'i sems ma yab dang mthun// shar du pad+ma'i rgyal po dkar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho ru pad+ma dam pa ser// phyag na pad+ma kha ma bye ba'o// nub tu rdo rje mi g.yo dmar// phyag na bsam gtan po ti bsnams// byang du thogs med rgyal po ljang// phyag na lcags kyu gser g.yu bsnams// shar du lha mo pad+ma dkar// phyag na dpal be'u bsnams pa'o// lho ru lha mo 'jigs byed ser// phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// nub tu lha mo skyon bral dmar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// byang du lha mo rnam rgyal ljang// phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo sgrib pa rnam sel ljang// phyag na po ti bsnams pa'o// las kyi sems ma yab dang mthun/ shar du rin chen dbang sdud dkar// phyag na rin chen zur brgyad bsnams// lho ru grub pa'i las ni ser// phyag na rin chen rgya gram bsnams// nub tu dga' ba ston pa dmar// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// byang du mi g.yo mtha' ni ljang// phyag na rgya gram bsam gtan mdzad// shar du lha mo skyabs can dkar// phyag na gdu bu bsnams pa'o// lho ru lha mo dri med ser// phyag na bum pa bsnams pa'o// nub tu lha mo sgra sgrogs dmar// phyag na 'bud dung bsnams pa'o// byang du lha mo sgra sgrogs ljang// phyag na gser gyi nya bsnams pa'o// dkyil 'khor phyi yi bar khyams la// shar stod lha yi thub pa dkar// phyag na pi wang bsnams pa'o// shar du lha min thub pa sngo// phyag na go mtshon bsnams pa'o// lho ru mi yi thub pa ser// phyag na gseg shang par bu bsnams// nub stod byol song thub pa nag/ phyag na po ti bsnams pa'o// nub smad yi dwags thub pa dmar// phyag na rin chen sgrom bu bsnams// byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa nag/ phyag na me chu bsnams pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi ru// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma// phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ser// phyag na zhags pa bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar// phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje dril bu ljang// phyag na dril bu bsnams pa'o// de ltar phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi

yi// bde gshegs thams cad dam pa rigs brgyar 'dus// rigs brgya bsdus pa rgyal ba rigs lngar 'dus// de yang chos sku thig le nyag gcig ngang du 'dus// zhes gsungs so// bde gshegs rigs brgya'i sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dang nges gsungs pa// bde gshegs rigs brgya'i lha tshogs rnams// rgyan dang cha lugs mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// mnyam par ma 'dres 'ja' tshon ri mo 'dra// snang la mi rtog me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// sku mdog rigs kyi phyag rgya so sor gsal// gsung gi phyag rgya oM hUM trAM hrIHhA lnga/ so so'i rigs kyi yig 'brur gsal// thugs kyi phyag rgya phyag mtshan ni// g.yas pa so so'i phyag mtshan bsnams// g.yon pa thams cad dril bu bsnams// de ltar rigs brgya gsal bsgoms la// chos sku thig le gcig tu bsgom// sku gsung thugs su byin rlob cing// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA la badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA shu n+yatA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kr-i t+yA nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de ltar byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/ phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed pa'o/ zhes gsungs so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis dpal kun tu bzang po la gsol pa/ ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de lags na// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar bsgrub// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dgug pa ni// thugs ka'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis// sprul pa'i lha mo 'phros pa yis// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// dam pa rigs brgya'i lha tshogs la// snyan gsan phab ste spyan drangs la// mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa de// 'od kyi nang du spyan drangs la// dam tshig la ni ye shes bstim// gnyis su med par brtan par gzhug/ gzhal las khang gi sgo bzhi nas// thugs las sprul pa'i gsang yum bzhis// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis phyag kyang btsal// 'dod yon lha mo lha tshogs kyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis tshim par mchod// mchod cing bstod pa dag par 'bul// bzlas pa'i 'phro 'du bya ba ni// oM A li kA li pany+tsa dz+nyA na sa twa kro d+ha mu na ye swA hA// dam pa rigs brgya 'dus pa'i

sngags// lha rnams thugs kar nyi ma'i steng// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bkod la// de yi thugs kar zla ba'i steng// sngags kyi phreng ba gsal bkod de// 'od zer 'phro 'dus bsnyen pa bya// bdag gzhan don gyi bzlas pa rnams// gang 'dod tshad du phyin par bzlas/ de nas ting 'dzin gtong 'dod na// lha tshogs rnams la bshags pa bya// gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la gtang// bkra shis brjod cing phrin las bcol// de ltar bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba ni// zla drug zla ba bcu gnyis sam// lo gsum lo drug bcu gnyis kyis// rig 'dzin sa la nges par sbyor// zhes gsungs so// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// rtags thon bsnyen bsgrub thon pa dang// cho ga'i rim pa rab rdzogs nas// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu byas te// dam tshig sems dpa'i lha tshogs dang/ ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gnyis med gcig la gnyis su dbye// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// oM AHhUM muM gyi sngags brjod pas// bdag la zhal bstan dbyings su gshegs// dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de// sgo ba rim gyis byang nas bsdu// sgo ba thub pa drug la bsdu// thub drug byang shar dkyil 'khor la// mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis bsdu// phyogs bzhi byang nas rim par bsdu// shar nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la// mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis bsdu// dbus kyi lha tshogs byang nas bsdu// dbus kyi gtso bo nyid la bsdu// gtso bo thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' la// de yang rdo rje nas tsam la// de yang yi ge hUM la bsdu/ hUM yang rim gyis thig le la// thig le chos kyi dbyings su bsdu// de yi ngang du blo bzhag la// slar yang lha yi ting 'dzin du// skad cig langs te spyod lam bya// 'di ltar bskyed rdzogs don bsgoms na// nges par legs pa'i don mthong nas// rig 'dzin sa la rdzogs par sbyor// zhes gsungs so// dam pa rigs brgya'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'o// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las mjug rdzogs rim gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// bde gshegs dam pa rigs brgya'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i skabs te dang po'o// de nas spyi dpal chen po kun tu bzang po la/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma ho spyi dpal kun tu bzang// 'gro ba'i log rtog gzhom pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// ye shes skyid pa'i sgrub thabs gang// spyi dpal yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// ma rtogs pa dang log

par rtog/ phyogs rtog yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul bar dgongs nas gsang ba dang// rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgras btags ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gsang sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gab// thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs te// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung// snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang rnams rdzogs par byas pa yis// 'dod yon g.yeng ba kun spangs te// dka' thub spyod pas ma gdungs par// ting 'dzin thub pa'i sa phyogs su// rab tu bde ba'i bstan la 'dug/ byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang// btang snyoms bzhi po rab bsgoms nas// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub bya zhes// bdag ni bsam pa brtan byas te// rang snying sa bon 'od zer las// sprul pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs spros te// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dang// bla ma la sogs rnams mchod de// de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang// skyabs gsol la sogs byas nas ni// bgegs rnams ma lus gzhom pa'i phyir// sna tshogs hUM las bskyed pa yi// rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsam par bya// rnam rtog 'du shes kun spangs na// bgegs kyi sbyor ba yod mi 'gyur// de bas rnam rtog bgegs yin pas// yang dag rig pa nyid kyis bsrung// dang po stong nyid byang chub sems// skye 'gag med pa'i don gsal nas// snying rje'i yul gyis blangs nas ni// sa bon shin tu gsal bar gyur// rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spros// phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur la// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med pa'o// de las ming tshogs gsal ba kun// spro zhing bsdu ba de bzhin te// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// rten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// de nas mtha' dbus med pa yi// 'og min chos 'byung bsam par bya// de nas yaM las byung ba yi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de steng yi ge raM las ni// me yi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// de yi steng du baM bsams te// de las chu yi dkyil 'khor ro// chu yi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// yaM las ye shes sa gzhir brtags// rin chen 'bar ba ri rab steng// b+h+rUM las ye shes gzhal yas khang/ ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin no// rgya rnams yongs su ma chad pa// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rgyas pas// kun tu gru bzhir gnas gyur pa// ye shes lhag pa'i glo 'bur mdzes// thams cad ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir// rtse mo kun tu 'dus pa yin// rin chen rgyan sogs bye brag

gis// bsam mi khyab par spras par gyur// tshad med bzhi yi sgo khyud la// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs ldan// kun nas bskor ba'i kha khyer la// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// phyi dang nang med kun tu snang// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang/ gru chad bzhi ldan bar khyams dang// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// dbus su mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri// brgya byin 'od gsal nyi zla dang// chags med pad+ma so sor mdzes/ gdan ni sum brtsegs dag tu gnas// seng ge'i gdan gyi dbus su ni// dam pa'i yi ge'i sa bon las// de las pad+ma rdo rjer btags// so so'i snying pos mtshon par bya// de las sangs rgyas sku ni spro// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// sems can don kun rdzogs mdzad nas// de nyid la ni thim par gyur// phyag rgya yongs su gyur pa las// kun bzang yum dang ldan pa ni// zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing gsal// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan gyis mdzes// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs las// sprul pas sems can don rnams mdzad// kun tu bzang mo 'jo sgeg tshul// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rgyan dang dbu rgyan yab dang mthun// phyag g.yas rdo rje thugs kar brten// g.yon pas dril 'dzin yum la 'khril// yum gyis pad+ma thugs kar brten// g.yon gyis nyi ma'i las su 'khril// dbu ni 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// de ltar yongs su bskyed pa ni// gnyis med chags pa'i sbyor bas drangs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'dus nas// yab la de bzhin gshegs rnams thim// rdo rje'i lam du phyung nas ni// yum gyi pad+ma'i mkha' dkyil du// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// ye shes dkyil 'khor rdzogs par sprul// de nas snying rje'i chags pa yis// sems can ma lus bsdus byas nas// dkyil 'khor phyi rol 'khod nas ni// de dag 'jug par gsol ba 'debs// gsol ba btab pa'i tshig brjod nas// thams cad dkyil 'khor 'jug par 'gyur// bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis reg par gyur// thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas shes// de ltar rgyal po'i byin rlabs kyis// rang lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che// rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma ki/ me rlung gos dkar dam tshig sgrol// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// de nas rgyal ba

sangs rgyas rnams// so so bzhin du dgod par bya'o// yongs sbyangs gsung gi yi ge ni// yab kyi thugs kar thim gyur nas/ yum gyi pad+ma'i chags rlan gyis// yab yum gnyis med thig ler sbyor// de ltar rgyal ba snyoms zhugs nas// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs mngon 'dra ste// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru dang// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtog pa rnam bzhi yis// mngon rdzogs rgyal po de nyid nges// de ltar rtog pa rnam bzhi yis// rgyal ba'i sku ni mngon spyod las// bu sha rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te// g.yas pa 'khor lo thugs kar brten// g.yon pa dril bu yum la 'khyud// thabs dang shes rab zhabs gnyis ni// mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs skyil krung bzhugs// mdun dang rgyab med kun tu zhal// mtshan dang dpe byad kun tu ldan// 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs chen las// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs spro// rgyal ba rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing// sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// btsun mo snang ba'i dbyings phyug ma// gzhon tshul 'khril ldem shin tu chags// cha lugs la sogs yab dang mthun// g.yon pa dril bu yab la brten// g.yas pa nyi ma las su 'khril// phung po dbang po rnam shes kun// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsgom// skye mched khams rnams byin gyis brlabs// sku gsung thugs kyi 'bru gsum gyis// 'od zer rnam pa mang po spros// phyogs bcu'i sku gsung thugs bsdus nas// bdag gi sku gsung thugs la ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs par bsam// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA wA ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de ltar sku gsung thugs gsum du// nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// yum gyi sku yi dkyil 'khor la// yig 'bru rnam gsum rnam shes la// yig 'bru'i byin brlab tshul bzhin bya// de nas yum ni byin brlab bya// oM AHhUM swA hA// gnas lnga dag tu dgod par bya// de ltar yab yum sku rdzogs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam 'phrul phyir// gnyis med chags pa'i sbyor don du// rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab// hUM las rdo rje rab tu shes// oM las byung ba'i nor bur bsam// oM las pad+mar bskyed par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba'i bsnyen// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub sems kyi byin rlabs las// yig 'bru rnams kyi 'phro 'du yis// sa bon mtshan ma sku rnams rdzogs// sum bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor 'gyur// de las 'gro ba

rmongs pa la// bstan phyir dkyil 'khor bstan par mdzad// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod dang// yum chen kun tu bzang mo bsgom// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan dang// yum chen na bza' dkar mo bsgom// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas dang// yum chen mA ma kI yang bsgom// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan don yod grub pa dang// yum chen dam tshig sgrol ma bsgom// de yi phyi rim rtsibs mchan la// shar phyogs sa yi snying po dang// yum du badzra lA s+ye bsgom// lho ru nam mkha'i snying po dang// yum du badzra mA le bsgom// nub phyogs spyan ras gzigs dbang dang// yum ni gir ti bsgom par bya// byang du phyag na rdo rje dang// yum du badzra nir ti bsgom// de yi phyi rim gru chad la// shar du sems dpa' byams pa dang// yum du badzra d+hU pe ma'o// lho ru kun tu bzang po dang// yum du badzra puSh+pe ma'o// nub tu sgrib pa rnam sel dang// yum du rdo rje mar me ma'o// byang du mkhyen rab 'jam dpal dang// yum du badzra gan d+he ma'o// sgo bzhir sgo ba sgo ma ni// shar sgor khro bo rnam par rgyal// yum du rdo rje ro langs ma// lho sgor khro bo gshin rje gshed// yum du rdo rje mi pham ma// nub sgor khro bo rta mchog dpal// yum du rdo rje ral gcig ma'o// byang sgor khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// yum du rdo rje spyan gcig ma'o// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa la// rgyal ba mchod pas mnyes par gyur// mnyes nas sems can don bya zhes// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan gyur na// sems can ma rig ky-is bsgribs nas// dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i skal med gyur// de las byang chub sems 'phros pas// oM sogs yi ge mngon par gyur// sa bon las ni phyag mtshan 'bar// de las thub pa'i skur rdzogs te// so so'i snying po brjod pa yis// mkha' dbyings sku gzugs gnas pa las// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur 'phros// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur ni// 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad// bltams dang rab tu byung ba dang// mngon par sangs rgyas bdud btul dang// 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho 'phrul bstan// mya ngan 'da' sogs thub pa yi// spyod pa rjes mthun ston par mdzad// mngon shes drug gi cho 'phrul gyis// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du son// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// bye brag sna tshogs ston mdzad pas// 'gro ba so sor 'dul ba bzhin// byin rlabs 'dul ba ston par mdzad// so so'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis// lha dang mi yi theg pa

sogs// theg pa rnam lnga so sor ston// rjes su bstan pas 'gro btul nas// 'gro ba sangs rgyas sar bzhag ste// slar byon khyams pa thub drug dgod// steng du lha yi thub pa la// shar phyogs mi yi thub pa'o// lho ru lha min thub pa la// nub tu yi dwags thub pa ste// byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa'o// 'og tu byol song thub pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bstan nas// khyad par kun tu bltas nas ni// sgyu ma bzhin du dmigs nas kyang// so so'i yab yum bye brag la// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// phung po dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin oM du shes par bya// spyi bor yi ge oM bkod de// lce la A ni rab tu gnas// snying dang lte ba chu sor ni// hUM dang swA hA rim pa bzhin// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// k+Shi traM hrIHdza rim bzhin bsam// mai thi hUM dang mUM dang bzhi// mig sogs phyi rol rim bzhin bsam/ de ltar yi ge'i rnam pa ni// yab kyi sku la rim par bsam// yum gyi sku yi dkyil 'khor du// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya sogs// rnam smin mUM sogs shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// spyi bo mgrin pa gnyis su ni// lAM dang mUM gnyis rim par bsam// snying ga lte ba chu sor ni// pAM dang tAM dang mAM rnams dgod// mig dang rna ba sna lce la// hUM dang trAM hrIHAM rim bzhin// mig rna sna lce'i phyi rol du// dzaHhUM baM hoHrim bzhin bsam// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur zhing// ye shes yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan kun la bsam// thub pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang// byin rlabs dbang skur ma gsungs so// zhes gsungs so// sku phyag rgya bskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// sku bskyed gsal brtan rtsa ba'i sngags// oM dzi na dzi ka/ muM d+hA twI shwa rI/ hUM badzra d+h+rika/ swa rat+na d+h+rika/ oM a ro lika/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+rika/ laM dwe Sha ra ti/ maM mo hA ra ti/ paM rA ga ra ti/ taM badzra ra ti/ k+Shi he rA dza ya/ traM A gar+b+ha ya/ hri pad+ma pra da ma/ dziM ku ru pA Na hrIH/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA l+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hrI gIr ti ra ga haM/ aM nir ti rA ga yA mi/ mai d+ha rA ya swA hA/ th+l+hiM nis+sa raM b+ha ya swA hA/ hUM swa rA dza ya swA hA/ muM shrI a rA gA ya swA hA/ dza d+hU pe pra be sha/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ baM dI pa pu gi ra/ ho g+han d+he tsit+ta ho/ oM mu ne krIM swA hA/ oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ oM mu ne hUM truM swA hA/ oM mu ne praM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ oM pra dz+nyA na ta krita phaT/ hUM ya mAn ta krita phaT/ hUM pad+man ta krita phaT/ hUM big+d+hAn ta krita phaT/ hUM badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/ hUM rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro ti shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/ hUM pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/ oM karma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta

oM/ a a a badzrI b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ sku bskyed gsal brtan rtsa ba'i sngags// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis snying po yin// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bzhugs tshul ni// brgya byin la sogs phyogs su gnas// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba ni// gtso bo gdan la rdzogs pa'i tshul// 'khor rnams sems dpa'i tshul du bzhugs// so so'i sku mdog yab dang mthun// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang// g.yas na mthong thos snom pa dang// myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang// thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams// btsun ma'i tshogs dang ldan par bsam// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang// bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// yab yum bzhugs tshul phyag mtshan ni// rnam snang dkar po 'khor lo bskor// mi bskyod mthing ga rdo rje bsnams// 'byung ldan ser po rin chen bsnams// mtha' yas dmar po pad+ma bsnams// don grub ljang gu rgya gram bsnams// kun tu bzang mo dril bu bsnams// sangs rgyas spyan ni thor tshugs bsnams// gos dkar mo ni rin chen bsnams// mA ma kI ni pad+ma bsnams// sa snying dkar po rin chen myu gu bsnams// nam mkha'i snying po dkar po ral gri bsnams// spyan ras gzigs dbang dkar po pad+ma bsnams// phyag na rdo rje ljang gu dril bu bsnams// byams pa dmar skya gar gyi gun+d+he bsnams// kun bzang dkar po rin chen snyems ma bsnams// sgrib pa rnam sel sngon po po ti bsnams// 'jam dpal dkar ljang me tog ut+pal bsnams// mA le sngon mo rgya gram me long bsnams// lA s+ye sngon mo rin chen 'phreng ba bsnams// gIr ti dmar mo pi wang rgyud 'dren bsnams// nIr ti ljang gu gar gyi cod pan bsnams// bdug pa'i sprin 'phro ma ni spos me bsnams// dga' ba'i mdangs ldan ma ni pad+ma bsnams// gsal ba'i 'od ldan ma ni mar me bsnams// gan d+he ljang gu dag byed dri chab bsnams// dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul che// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sgo bzhir sgo skyong yab yum ni// gshin rje gshed po dkar po thod dbyug bsnams// stobs chen sngon po rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams// rta mgrin dmar po thod sbrul pad+ma bsnams// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang gu rgya gram bsnams// ro langs

dkar mo 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu bsnams// mi pham sngon po rdo rje zhags pa bsnams// ral gcig dmar mo rdo rje lcags sgrol bsnams// khro gnyer ma ni ljang gu dril bu bsnams// dkyil 'khor 'khyams la thub pa drug/ lha yi thub pa dkar po pi wang bsnams// lha min thub pa sngon po go cha bsnams// mi yi thub pa ser po gseg shang bsnams// byol song thub pa ljang gu po ti bsnams// yi dwags thub pa dmar po sgrom bu bsnams// dmyal ba'i thub pa nag po me chu bsnams// de ltar sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// phyag rgya chen por gsal bar bskyed// snang stong dbyer med dkyil 'khor ni// ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub// ces gsungs so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// thugs kyi sa bon 'od zer las// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// phyogs bcu dus gsum dkyil 'khor tshogs// mi dmigs dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bde gshegs thams cad spyan drang ngo// lcags kyu la sogs phyag rgya bzhis// rang rang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ de ltar ye shes dkyil 'khor dang// dam tshig dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bya// dkyil 'khor kun la mnyam bltas nas// sgyu ma mig yor lta bur blta// de nas lha la mchod pa'i phyir// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon las// 'od zer mang po'i zer 'phros te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kun 'dus te// bdag nyid kyis ni thugs kar thim/ rdo rje'i lam du phyung nas ni// byang chub sems kyi mkha' dbyings nas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs spros te// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod par byed// de nas lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dgyes pa'i glu blang bstod par bya// de nas bsnyen bsgrub bzlas pa ni// lha rnams kun gyi thugs ka ru// zla dkyil steng du rang 'dra yi// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bsgoms la// de la bzlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA d+hu a/ ye shes lnga yi 'od zer gyis// phar 'phros bde gshegs thams cad mchod// tshur 'dus dngos grub rnam gnyis bsdus// spro bsdu mgal me lta bur bskor// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma yi// bsnyen pa'i rim pa rdzogs par bya// zhes gsungs so// ye shes rang bzhin gyi dkyil

'khor sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// de ltar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bskyed pa yongs su rdzogs byas te// slar yang bdag nyid thugs gar bsdu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing// yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson na// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu drug tshun chad kyis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi// zhing khams bsam yas rnam dag dang// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang// 'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong na nye bar bsnyen pa dang// rgya chen gsungs pa'i don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te/ rang byung ye shes gnas med snang// log par rtog pa rnam dag cing// ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas nas// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang// de ltar rgyal mchog dpal ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba'i shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus snang ba rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes sgyu mar snang// snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rab snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le de nyid dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag gi zhal mthong ba'o// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam

sbyor ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs kyis 'byung// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dus pa'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor ba// bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom la mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun dam lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes pa yis// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes bsgom pa'i gnas// mkha' dbyings dang po dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po yab yum bsgom// gang zhig glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan na/ dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas su// spyod lam rnam par dag par gnas// snang ba'i dngos po so sor ni// lha yi dkyil 'khor shin tu bsgom// yang na sgyu ma la sogs tshul// zas la sogs pa bza' ba ni// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs mngon sum nas// bdud rtsi lngar ni byin brlabs te// lce yi dbang po rab sbyangs nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs kar bkod// rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams tshims par byas// dam tshig nyams pa tshul bzhin bshags// yang na rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// byin rlabs kyi ni rnam par bya// sems can thams cad mthong ba na// snying rje byams pa'i sems bskyed de// sangs rgyas nyid du bya'o zhes// smon pa'i sems ni khyad par can// blo can rnams kyis rtag tu bya// de ltar dus bzhi nyin mtshan du// rnal 'byor tshul la gnas pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs rim bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsgrub pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// de nas spyi dpal kun tu bzang po la// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma spyi dpal kun tu bzang// rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// rigs lnga'i rigs 'dzin bsgrub 'dod na// dben par maN+Dal byi dor bya// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab/ oM hUM swA AM hA/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i dmigs rten dgod// yang na rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bzhengs// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru chad dang// sgo bzhi sgo khyud rgyan bcas bri// dang po byang chub sems bskyed de// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang// byang chub snying po'i rgyu yin yang// rtog pas

bsgribs pas 'khor bar 'khyams// rigs lnga'i dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do// de nas de bzhin nyid bsgom pa// chos rnams mi dmigs gdod nas dag/ stong zhing bdag med bsgom par bya// de nas kun snang ting nge 'dzin// gong gi don de ma rtogs la// khyab pa'i snying rje chen po bsgom// de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// rang sems dri med a dkar las// e yaM baM suM laM raM las// 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' dkyil du// rin po che yi ri rab brtseg/ de steng b+h+rUM las 'phro 'dus pas// kha dog sna lnga'i 'od phung las// rin chen sna lnga'i gzhal yas khang// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mdzes// ye shes bzhi yi gru chad la// tshad med bzhi yi sgo yis mdzes// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs la// chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor yug byas// phyi nang med pa'i gzhal yas bsgom// de dbus glang chen shar seng ge/ lho ru rta mchog nub rma bya// byang du shang shang khri brtsegs steng// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng la// dbus kyi gdan steng a dkar bsam// 'phro 'dus don byas 'khor lor gyur// de las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed// yum du sangs rgyas spyan ma bsgom// yab yum gnyis ka sku mdog dkar// phyag na 'khor lo 'dzin pa la// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// rgyan dang chas kyis sku la brgyan// yab yum gnyis su med par bsgom// yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// rigs bzhi sangs rgyas bskyed pa ni// shar du seng ge'i khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas hUM 'phros pas// don gnyis byas nas rdo rjer gyur// de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sku mdog mthing ga 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bzhugs// g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa'o// yum gyi thugs nas mUM 'phros pas// kun tu bzang mo yab dang mthun/ lho phyogs rta yi khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas swA 'phros pas// don gnyis byas nas rin chen 'bar// de las rin chen 'byung ldan ni// sku mdog ser po 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bzhugs// phyag g.yas rin chen thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa'o// yum gyi thugs las lAM 'phros pas// gos dkar mo ni yab dang mthun// nub phyogs rma bya'i khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas AM 'phros pas// don gnyis byas nas pad+mar gyur// de las snang ba mtha' yas ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// g.yas pas pad+ma thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// yum gyi thugs nas pAM 'phros pas// mA ma kI ni yab dang mthun// byang

phyogs shang shang khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas hA 'phros pas// de las don yod grub pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// g.yas pas ral gri thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// yum gyi thugs nas tAM 'phros pas// dam tshig sgrol ma yab dang mthun// de ltar rigs lnga yab yum ni// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul che// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// dbu rgyan phyag rgyan zhabs rgyan ldan// snang la rang bzhin med pa ni// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan nam// rnam mkha'i 'ja' tshon ji bzhin no// de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo// gnyis su med par bstim byas nas// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// bstod cing dngos grub gsol ba btab// gnyis su med pa'i bsnyen pa dbul// oM hUM swA AM hA/ lAM mUM pAM mAM tAM/ rigs lnga so so'i thugs ka ru// nyi zla ga'u kha sbyar te// so so'i yig 'bru gsal byas bzlas// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las dkyil 'khor mnyes// khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dug lnga sbyangs nas rigs lngar gyur// 'gro drug lam lnga'i sdug bsngal sbyang// sku lnga ye shes thob par bsgom// zhes gsungs so// de nyid rigs lnga phyi ltar sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// de nyid rigs lnga'i nang sgrub ni// bde gshegs thams cad rigs lngar 'dus// rigs lnga bdag nyid phung po yi// khams dang skye mched 'byung lnga las// logs nas btsal zhing bsgrub tu med// rang nyid ye nas rigs lnga yin// gzugs kyi phung po de bzhin rigs// rnam shes phung po rdo rje'i rigs// tshor ba'i phung po rin chen rigs// 'du shes phung po pad+ma'i rigs// 'du byed phung po las kyi rigs// sha ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// rus pa rdo rje'i rigs yin te// drod ni rin po che yi rigs// khrag ni pad+ma rigs kyi yum// dbugs ni las kyi rigs kyi yum// kha dog dkar po de bzhin rigs// kha dog sngon po rdo rje'i rigs// kha dog ser po rin chen rigs// kha dog dmar po pad+ma'i rigs// kha dog ljang gu las kyi rigs// sa ni de bzhin rigs kyi yum// nam mkha' rdo rje rigs kyi yum// me ni rin chen rigs kyi yum// chu ni pad+ma rigs kyi yum// rlung ni las kyi rigs kyi yum// lus ni rnam shes de bzhin rigs// yid kyi rnam shes rdo rje'i rigs// mig ni rnam shes rin chen rigs// sna yi rnam shes pad+ma'i rigs// rna ba'i rnam shes las kyi rigs// lus kyi dbang po de bzhin rigs kyi

yum// yid kyi dbang po rdo rje rigs kyi yum// mig gi dbang po rin chen rigs kyi yum// sna yi dbang po pad+ma rigs kyi yum/ rna ba'i dbang po las kyi rigs kyi yum// gti mug de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// nga rgyal rin po che yi rigs// 'dod chags pad+ma'i rigs yin no// phrag dog las kyi rigs yin no// zhe sdang yul ni rdo rje'i yum// gti mug yul ni de bzhin yum// nga rgyal yul ni rin chen yum// 'dod chags yul ni pad+ma'i yum// phrag dog yul ni las kyi yum// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba chen po lnga// kha dog lnga dang yul lnga dbang po lnga// rnam shes lnga dang dug lnga ye shes lnga// gti mug rnam dag chos dbyings ye shes yin// de bzhin rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// zhe sdang rnam dag me long ye shes yin// rdo rje'i rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// nga rgyal rnam dag mnyam nyid ye shes yin// rin chen rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// 'dod chags rnam dag kun rtog ye shes yin// pad+ma'i rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// phrag dog ma spangs nan tan ye shes yin// las kyi rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// zhes gsungs so// rigs lnga nang sgrub kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// gsang sngags zab mo'i man ngag 'di// thabs lam zab mo'i sgo nas bsgrub// nyon mongs dug lnga lam du slong// gti mug de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yin// zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs yin te// me long lta bu'i ye shes yin// nga rgyal rin chen rigs yin te// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// 'dod chags pad+ma'i rigs yin te// so sor tog pa'i ye shes so// phrag dog las kyi rigs yin te// bya ba nan tan ye shes so// gti mug phra rags ci skyes kyang// gti mug mtshan nyid btsal bar bya// gti mug mtshan nyid ma grub pas// gti mug skye ba'i yul btsal bas// yul yang ma grub stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing shes tsam na// gti mug ma spangs de bzhin rigs// chos dbyings ye shes thob pa'o// zhe sdang phra rags ci skyes kyang// zhe sdang rang bzhin btsal bar bya// zhe sdang rang bzhin ma grub ste// zhe sdang skyes pa'i yul btsal bas// yul yang ma grub stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing shes tsam na// zhe sdang ma spangs rdo rje'i rigs// me long ye shes thob pa'o// nga rgyal phra rags ci skyes kyang// nga rgyal rang bzhin btsal bar bya// nga rgyal rang bzhin ma grub ste// nga rgyal skye ba'i yul btsal bas// yul yang ma grub stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing shes tsam na// nga rgyal ma spangs rin chen rigs// mnyam nyid ye shes thob pa'o// 'dod chags phra rags skyes tsam

na// 'dod chags rang bzhin btsal bar bya// 'dod chags rang bzhin ma grub ste// 'dod chags yul yang stong par 'dug/ de ltar shes shing rtogs tsam na// 'dod chags ma spangs pad+ma'i rigs// kun rtogs ye shes thob pa'o// phrag dog phra rags ci skyes kyang// phrag dog rang bzhin btsal bar bya// phrag dog rang bzhin ma grub pas// phrag dog yul yang stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing brtan tsam na//
