phrag dog ma spangs las kyi rigs// bya ba nan tan ye shes thob// gti mug spangs na de bzhin rigs mchog spang// de bzhin ris spangs chos dbyings ye shes med// zhe sdang spangs na rdo rje rigs mchog spang// rdo rje rigs spangs me long ye shes med// nga rgyal spangs na rin chen rigs mchog spang// rin chen rigs spangs mnyam nyid ye shes med// 'dod chags spangs na pad+ma rigs mchog spang// pad+ma rigs spangs kun rtog ye shes med// phrag dog spangs na las kyi rigs mchog spang// las kyi rigs spangs nan tan ye shes med// dug lnga spangs na rigs lnga'i sku lnga med// rigs kyi sku lnga spangs pas sangs rgyas gdung rgyud bcad// grub par mi 'gyur dub pa'i skal bar 'gyur// dug lnga bsgrub na 'bras bu ye shes lnga// gti mug ma bkag ye shes klong gi lam// zhe sdang ma spangs ye shes rtogs pa'i lam// nga rgyal ma bkag ma nor rang gi lam// 'dod chags ma bkag chos kyi dbyings kyi lam// phrag dog ma spangs gnyis su med pa'i ngang// nyon mongs dug lnga ye shes lnga yi lam// de yang stong ba bde ba chen po lnga// 'bras bu skye med ngang du ma spangs lhun gyis grub// dug lnga rin chen dgos 'dod 'byung ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rigs lnga'i gsang bsgrub kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nyid rigs lnga bsgrub pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o// de nas spyi dpal kun tu bzang po la// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sogs pas zhus pa// e ma spyi dpal kun tu bzang// gsang chen rigs gcig ji ltar bsgrub// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub thabs 'di// khyad par mi mthun bye brag rnams// rang bzhin gcig la gsum tshang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod na// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas dag tu// maN+Dal byi dor byas nas ni// shel ltar gsal ba'i hUM bris la// dmigs pa'i rten du gzhag par bya// dang po de bzhin nyid ting 'dzin// cir yang mi rtog mi sems bsgom// de nas kun snang ting nge 'dzin// yongs la khyab pa'i snying rje bsgom// de nas rgyu yi ting nge

'dzin// rang sems hUM du gsal bar bsgom// de las 'od 'phros bde gshegs mchod// sku gsung thugs la mchod pa phul// khams gsum sems can rtog sgrib sbyangs// tshur 'dus 'od du zhu ba las// dngul dkar rdo rje rtse dgur gyur// de la 'od 'phros zhu ba las// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar gyur// sku mdog dngul dkar lta bu la// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// glang chen bsnol ba'i khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng na// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bsgom// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul che// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid 'bar// de lta bu yi skur bsgoms te// spyi bor 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// oM dkar shel ltar 'tsher ba bsgom// mgrin par pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i steng// AHdmar dmar la dwangs par bsgom// snying gar rdo rje rgya gram steng// mthing nag hUM gcig bsam par bya// de lta bu yi sku de ni// 'dod chags can gyi 'jug sgo ste// zhi ba'i sgo nas 'jug pa'o// khro bo'i sgo nas 'jug pa ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bgrad// g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// stag gi sham thabs sbrul gyis brgyan// glang chen ko rlon zhing lpags gsol// ming ni badzra he ru ka/ rdo rje khro bo zhes kyang bya// rdo rje dgyes pa zhes kyang bya// khro rngams gshe gtum 'bar ba'i gzugs// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// dus mtha'i me ltar bzod par dka'// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba brjid// thug choms ri rab 'bum snyil skad// spyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che// de lta bu yi khro bo la// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge dgod// zhe sdang can gyi 'jug sgo ste// khro tshul can gyi sku ru bsgom// sangs rgyas thams cad rigs brgyar 'dus// rigs brgya? bsdus pas rigs lngar 'dus// rigs lnga rdo rje'i rigs su 'dus// rgyal ba rigs lnga la sogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya ma lus kun// chos sku rdo rjer ro gcig pas// ji ltar snang ba de ltar yin// de ltar rgyal ba gcig bsgoms pas// gcig nyid med la kun gyi ngang// rnal 'byor rig pa 'di ldan na// bde gshegs ma bsgoms gang yang med// ces gsungs so// gsang chen rigs gcig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub thabs 'di// khyad par mi mthun bye brag rnams// rang bzhin gcig la gsum tshang ba// rdau rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus// skye med shes rab dbyings kyi ngang// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don// 'gro don

rdo rje sems dpar bshad// chos rnams thams cad 'gro ba mtha' dag ni// skye med don dam dbyings su ro gcig pas// de nyid dus gsum rgyal ba'i chos nyid de// kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'i ngang// de lta bu yi lha de ni// rang rig ye shes 'du 'bral med// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// oM ni bde gshegs kun gyi sku// AM ni bde gshegs kun gyi gsung// hUM ni bde gshegs kun gyi thugs// oM ni khams gsum sems can lus// AM ni khams gsum sems can dag/ hUM ni khams gsum sems can yid// oM gyis lus kyi sgrib pa sbyang// AM gis ngag gi sgrib pa sbyang// hUM gis yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang// oM gyis sku yi dngos grub thob// AM gis gsung gi dngos grub thob// hUM gis thugs kyi dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// gsang chen rigs gcig yig 'bru gsum gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// gsang chen rigs gcig bsgrub pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// de nas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad thugs zhi ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa las/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud ma traM ka ru tra zhes bya ba de bdag tu rmongs pa dang/ rtag pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis/ yang dag pa'i lam dang bral nas/ gab pa'i gsang ba dag ma rtogs par/ sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mor gyur nas/ rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so/ tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas/ shin tu grang ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// tsha ba dang grang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing/ bskal pa stong phrag bcu gnyis su nyams su myong ngo/ de nas bdud ma traM ka ru tra des/ yan lag sna tshogs pa dang/ gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa dang/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa'i lha'i rigs dang/ lha ma yin/ tshangs pa dang/ 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus so/ de lta bu'i gdug pa can de/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pas gzigs nas/ thugs rje'i byin rlabs sam/ bde ba gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka/ sku smug nag 'bar ba la/ dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig/ phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis 'jigs par brgyan nas/ sku shin tu 'jigs pa'i cha lugs su bstan nas/ yum khro mo gnam zhal ma zhes bya ba/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa/ g.yas dang po rdo rje 'og ma na gau rI ma

brgyad/ g.yon dang po b+han+d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba/ 'og ma na phra men ma brgyad/ dur khrod kyi chas kyis brgyan pa/ shin tu gtso la 'dud par gyur te/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las/ khro bo 'chol ba sna tshogs spros te/ stong khams khro bos bkang nas/ bdud ma traM ka ru tra la sogs pa'i dregs pa thams cad btul zhing bsgral te/ khog pa dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang du gyur to// dkyil 'khor dgu pa 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi/ bar khyams gru chad sgo bzhi/ lcags rir bcas pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi/ dbus dang bcas pa/ gzhal yas khang du grub pa'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi'i phyi rol yang/ phyi khams sgo bzhi sgo rgyan dang bcas par gyur to// de'i phyi rim rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khor yug gi phyi la rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ me ri me dpung gi 'khor yug dang ldan par gyur to// de lta bu'i gzhal yas khang de yang phyi thod pa rnam gsum gyi brtsig pa/ nang dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa phyi rol na dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad yod pa/ de lta bu'i dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang de'i dbus su yab che mchog he ru ka dang/ yum khro mo gnam zhal ma gnyis gnas pa las yab yum gnyis kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sprul pa las/ shar du thugs kyi sprul pa badzra he ru ka dang/ lhor sku'i sprul pa gshin rje gshed po dang/ nub tu gsung gi sprul pa pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po dang/ byang du phrin las kyi sprul pa rdo rje gzhon nu dang/ shar lhor yon tan gyi sprul pa bla med he ru ka dang/ nub byang du 'jigs pa'i stobs las sprul pa dregs pa kun 'dul dang/ byang shar du brjid pa'i stobs kyi sprul pa stobs ldan nag po dang/ lho nub tu rig 'dzin rdo rje'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyang dus gcig tu lhags so// de dag thams cad kyang so so'i btsun mo'i 'khor du bcas pas 'khod de// rang gi 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas so// de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab par sprul to// khro bo mngon byung gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas khro bo'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis/ dpal chen po la phyag dang bskor ba byas te zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ khro tshogs kun gyi rje btsan pau// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa yi// gdug byed log lta'i ru tra rnams// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// 'khor ba'i gnas nas ji ltar 'dul// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// dregs pas khengs pa'i ru dra rnams// zhi bas thul bar ma gyur pas// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa ni// thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin

te// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// bka' bzhin bskyed la bsgrub bya'o// dang po khro bo bsgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs la// gdug pa'i lha srin 'du ba'am// gcan gzan 'dab chags khros pa'i sa// gnam sa gru gsum sar gnas pa// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas chen der// gnas kyi bdag po mchod pa'i phyir// gtor ma gtang zhing glud kyang sbyin// bden pa bdar zhing bka' yang bsgo// sa sbyangs bka' sgrogs bsod nams bsags// phyi mtshams gcad cing dam sri mnan// sgo byang gdags shing dkyil 'khor brtsig/ bdud rtsi lnga yi chag chag gdab// ba su ta yi thag pa yis// dkyil 'khor dgu yi thig tu gdab// kun kyang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad bar khyams sgo bzhi ldan// kun kyang lcags ri ldan pa bri// de rnams phyi khyams dkyil 'khor la// sgo bzhi sgo rgyan rta babs ldan// 'dod yon rin chen pha gu dang/ dra ba dra phyed 'khor yug dang// 'bar phreng rdor phreng ldan par bri// de yang dur khrod tshon rtsi'am// yang na sa tshon lnga la bya// dbus rnams mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis mdzes// phyi rim ljang la 'od zer 'phro// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi phyogs kyis dbye/ shar dkar lho ser nub dmar byang ljang// mu khyud thod phreng dkar por bya// gru chad ljang la bar 'khyams phyogs// sgo bzhi rigs la brtsig pa lnga// phyi yi lcags ri nag po'o// dkyil 'khor dgu ka de bzhin bri// phyi khyams phyogs la sgo bzhi rigs// brtsig pa mthing dkar ser dmar ljang// 'dod yon khyams dmar pha gu ser// dra ba dra phyed mthing la mda' yab ljang// sgo khyud rta babs mdzes pa'i tshon// phyi rol rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dmar// rdo rje'i ra ba mthing nag la// me ri'i phreng ba dmar ser ro// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// zhing chen bla re'i gur yang dbub// ba su ta yi phreng bas bskor// mda' bzhi me long dar sna bzhi// ral gri bzhi dang phur pa bzhi// dkyil 'khor rgyan du dgram par bya// b+han+d+ha dgu dang mar me dgu/ phur pa dgu la sogs pa dgram// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// khro bo rol pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// phrin las nyams su blang ba ni// dang po mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad la// phyogs mtshams 'jig rten lha ru gsal// brda' sgo dbye zhing brda' phyag 'tshal// dam bca' byin dbab bshags pa bya// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs shing dbul// de nas ting 'dzin rim pa bzhin// dang po de bzhin nyid bsgom pa// chos rnams sems kyi rang bzhin te// gdod

nas ma skyes stong par bsgom// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin// khyab pa'i snying rje sems can don// yongs la khyab par bsgom par bya// de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba// thugs kar hUM dang ldan par bsgom/ de las raM yaM khaM gsum gyis// dngos dang mtshan ma bsreg gtor bkrus// mthing nag e yi nam mkha' la// rgya gram rlung gi 'khor lo chags// rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtshor 'khyil// zhing chen 'bar ba'i sa gzhir chags// 'byung ba drod snyoms me dpung 'bar// keng rus chen po'i ri rab brtsig/ smug nag b+hUM gyi 'phro 'du las// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang// pho brang dkyil 'khor dgu pa la// kun kyang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir mdzes// gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhir ldan// phyi khyams sgo dang sgo khyud dang// mu khyud rdo rje 'bar phreng dang// dur khrod rgyan dang chas kyis brgyan// phyi nang med par gsal ba yi// ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas bsgom// de dbus byol song gtso brgyad khrir// ye shes sems dpa' babs pa las// spro bsdu'i cho ga gsum sbyor bas// che mchog he ru'i skur gsal bskyed// sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gdengs// phyag na bud+d+ha bzhi bcu gnyis// zhabs brgyad bgrad pas gdan brgyad gnon// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas brgyad gsol// rngom brjid chen po'i sku ru bsgom// g.yon phyogs mUM gyi 'phros 'dus las// khro mo gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de// khams chen bco brgyad rtsad bcad nas// stong pa bco brgyad dbyings la sbyor// g.yas pa thabs mchog gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab yum gnyis med sbyor byas te// yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje la// oM las rtse lnga phaT kyis mtshan// yum gyi gsang ba'i pad+ma la// paM las 'dab bzhi AM gis mtshan// gnyis med rol pa'i brdas bskul te// phyag rgya bzhi yi sbyor ba bya// byang chub sems kyi sprin spros pas// mkha' las khro bo 'chol pa spros/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la ha la ha la phaT phaT/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams nas// bdud dang dregs pa rU tra rnams// thugs rje tshad med kyis bsgral nas// ma sring chung ma mdza' mo rnams// bran du bsdus nas bka' nyan gyur// 'khor bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus// de nas khro bo'i sprin bsdus nas// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir 'dus pa las// so so'i rigs kyi gtso bor gsal// btsun mo khrag 'thung yum rnams kyang// so so'i sku la 'khril bar bsgom// de nas dbus kyi gtso bo ni// che mchog yab yum thugs ka nas// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las// shar du rak+sha he ru ka/ rak+sha kro

d+hi shwa rI yum// lho tu gu h+ya he ru ka/ gu h+ya kro d+hI shwa rI yum// nub tu bi shwa he ru ka/ bi shwa kro d+hI shwa rI yum// byang du yak+sha he ru ka/ yak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI yum// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar du dri za 'dul byed lha// lho ru gshin rje 'dul byed do// nub tu klu gdon 'dul byed la// byang du gnod sbyin 'dul byed do// shar lhor me lha 'dul byed la// lho nub srin po 'dul byed do// nub byang rlung lha 'dul byed la// byang shar dbang ldan 'dul byed do// steng phyogs lha gdon 'dul byed la// 'og phyogs sa bdag 'dul byed do// sgo bzhir mthar byed sgo ba bzhi// shar du pradz+nyAn+ta krita la// lho ru ya mAn+ta kr-i ta do// nub tu pad+mAn+ta krita la// byang du big+h+wAn+ta kr-ita do// phyi rim lcags ri nag po la// bka' srung ce spyang ma brgyad de// che mchog lha tshogs nyi shu bzhi// gtso 'khor bka' srung bcas pa bsgom// shar gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gtso bo badzra he ru ka/ badzra kro d+hI shwa rI yum/ yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las// shar du bud+d+ha he ru ka/ bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI yum// lho ru rat+na he ru ka/ rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI yum// nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/ pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI yum// byang du karma he ru ka/ karma kro d+hI shwa rI yum// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar du gau rI seng+ha gnyis// lho ru tsau rI byA g+h+r-i gnyis// nub tu pra mo srI la gnyis// byang du bi tA shwa na gnyis// shar lhor puk+ka gr-iD+ha gnyis// lho nub g+hasma kang+ka gnyis// nub byang sma sha kA ka gnyis// byang shar tsaN+Da u lU gnyis// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir gdong mo bzhi// shar du rta gdong lcags kyu ma// lho sgor phag gdong zhags pa ma// nub tu sbrul gdong lcags sgrog ma// byang du spyang gdong thal byed ma// phyi rim lcags ri nag po la// bka' srung srin mo nyi shu brgyad// gtso 'khor bka' srung bcas par bsgom// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gtso bo 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sbyor yum za byed be tA lI// sgrol yum e ka tsa tI ma// yab yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshed chen bzhi// shar du ya ma rA dza dang// sbyor yum g.yu yi ral gcig ma// sgrol yum nam gru re ma ti// lho ru myos byed 'bar ba dang// sbyor yum gtum mo ser nag ma// sgrol yum khrag gi mnga' bdag mo// nub tu gshed chen ma ru tse// sbyor yum lha mo 'od zer ma// sgrol yum gling bzhi kun 'byams ma// byang du ral pa tshar dgu ma// sbyor yum nag mo re ma ti// sgrol yum srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar du kong rtse brag 'joms dang// yum du rdo rje ral gcig ma// lho ru gshin rje ya ba ti// yum du dred kyi ab sham mo// nub tu gshin rje rmig pa

dang// yum du sgeg mo bus 'gro ma// byang du lha mchog dud ka la// yum du smug nag ral gcig ma// shar lhor a ba glang mgo dang// yum du drang srong dkar skya ma// lho nub gshin rje mig dmar la// yum du khrag gi ral gcig ma// nub byang gshin rje til pa dang// yum du rlung lha spyan gcig kyang gsum ma// byang shar chos kyi rgyal po dang// yum ni spyan gsum mche gtsigs ma'o// steng du gshin rje nag 'joms dang// yum du shel gyi gdong dgu ma'o// steng du gshin rje phya sang la// yum du shel mig khro mo'o// 'og tu gshin rje dmar po ste// yum du nag mo ral gcig ma'o// 'og tu gshin rje thod dbyug dang// yum du dmar mo mgo dgu ma// sgo bzhir gshin rje'i sgo ba bzhi// shar du dung gi bya rgod mgo/ lho ru nag po stag gi mgo/ nub tu bse yi kang ka'i mgo/ byang du lcags kyi spyang ka'i mgo/ phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// ging bdud ma mo shan pa gnas// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa bsgom// nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su khro rgyal dbang chen po// yum du sgeg mo ral gcig ma// g.yas su las kyi rgyal po la// g.yon du las kyi rgyal mo'o// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// shar du ye shes zil gnon la// yum du khro mo mi pham ma'o// lho ru las kyi khro bo zil gnon la// yum du rdo rje khro gnyer ma'o// nub tu ye shes ma mo zil gnon dang// yum du rdo rje spyan gcig ma'o// byang du khyung chen zil gnon dang// yum du rdo rje ro langs ma'o// dkyil 'khor phyi khyams phyogs bzhi ru// shar du pho rgyud zil gnon dang// yum du rdo rje las byed ma'o// lho ru mo rgyud zil gnon dang// yum du gshin rje las byed ma'o// nub tu klu rnams zil gnon dang// yum du klu mo las byed ma'o// byang du gza' rnams zil gnon dang// yum du gnod sbyin las byed ma'o// phyogs bzhi sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma// lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma// nub sgo rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// byang sgor rdo rje dril bu ma// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// kham brgya dmus long khyi spyang dang// pho nya la sogs bka' srung dgod// pad+ma gsung gi lha tshogs rnams// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa bsgom// byang phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu dang// yum mchog 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// yab yum gnyis kyi byin rlabs las// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// shar du bud+d+ha kI la ya// lho ru rat+na kI ya la// nub tu pad+ma kI la ya// byang du karma kI la ya// dkyil 'khor bar mtshams phyogs mtshams su// shar du rnam par rgyal ba dang// yum du rdo rje snyem ma'o// phra men stag dang bya rgod mgo/ lho ru gshin rje gshed po dang// yum du

dur khrod bdag mo'o// sprul pa sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ nub tu khro bo rta mgrin dang// yum du rdo rje gtum ma'o// sprul pa byi la pu shud mgo/ byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang// yum du rdo rje rlu 'byin ma'o// sprul pa seng ge pha wang mgo/ shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po dang// yum du rdo rje sder mo'o// sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo/ lho nub mi g.yo mgon po dang// yum du rdo rje gtun khung ma// sprul pa gzi dang khwa yi mgo/ nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub dang// yum du rdo rje mda' snyem ma// sprul pa spyang ki khra yi mgo/ byang shar khams gsum rnam rgyal dang// yum du rdo rje skyod byed ma// sprul pa dom dang sre mo'i mgo// steng phyogs khro bo hUM kA ra// yum du rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// sprul pa phag dang smrig bu'i mgo/ 'og phyogs khro bo stobs po che// yum du rdo rje gsod byed ma// sprul pa dred dang byi la'i mgo/ dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir sgo ba bzhi// shar sgor pu shud mgo can la// lho ru skya ka'i mgo can no// nub tu srin bya'i mgo can dang// byang du khra yi mgo bo can// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// bse mo bzhi dang re ti bzhi// shwa na bzhi dang ging bdud bzhi// shan pa bzhi la sogs pa dgod// phur pa phrin las lha tshogs kyi// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa bskyed// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo bla med he ru ka/ yum du nyi bzhi bde mchog ma// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// shar du rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// lho ru rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// nub tu rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal 'bar// byang du rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// g.yas su rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal ma// g.yon du srid pa bde 'gro ma// mdun du nyi zla thod phreng ma// zla gam bzhi la khros ma bzhi// shar du nyi ma khros pa la// lho ru khrag 'thung khros pa'o// nub tu bdud rtsi khros pa la// byang du srid gsum khros pa'o// mtshams su dgyes sde chen mo bzhi// shar du dkar mo mig gcig ma// lho ru nag mo mche ba can// nub tu dmar mo dbang sdud ma// byang du ser mo tshe 'phel ma'o// gru chad bzhi la ma bzhi'o// shar lhor rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang// lho nub dbyings phyug chen mo la// nub byang bdag nyid chen mo ste// byang shar gcig pu chen mo'o// khyams la sman mo bskyed par bya// byang du srid pa chags byed ma// nub tu srid pa cha snyoms ma// lho ru 'dod khams gtso mo ste// shar du e ka dza TI ma// shar du gling bzhi spyi phud ma// lho ru rin chen srid 'degs ma// nub tu pad+ma gar dbang ma// byang du rdo rje gar dbang ngo// shar lhor har ting dkar mo la// lho nub dun ting nag mo'o// nub byang shan ting dmar mo la// byang shar grub ting ser mo'o// shar du dkar mo

mche gtsigs ma// lho ru nag mo kha 'byams ma// nub tu dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang du ser mo rkang ldag ma// shar du srin mo skam pa mo// shar du srin mo dri snom ma// lho ru srin mo phor thogs ma// lho ru srin mo skos byed ma// nub tu srin mo g.yang gzhi ma// nub tu srin mo za ba mo// byang du srin mo gsod byed ma// byang du srin mo za byed ma'o// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir sgo ma bzhi// shar du lha yi sring mo la// lho sgor gshen rje'i sring mo'o// nub sgor klu yi sring mo ste// byang sgor gnod sbyin sring mo'o// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// yang gab bzhi dang sbas ma bzhi// gdong mo bzhi dang phung gsum ma// gsang ba'i ma gsum pho nya gsum// ro kha ma gsum bsgom par bya// ma mo rbod gtong lha tshogs kyi// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa bsgom// nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo dregs pa kun 'dul dang// yum du khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// yab yum thugs kyi sprul pa las// g.yas su dbang phyug chen po la// g.yon du u ma de bI'o// rtsibs bzhi dbang chen yab yum bzhi// shar du ya ma rA dza dang// yum du za byed nag mo'o// lho ru gshin rje brang dkar dang// yum du nag mo re ma ti// nub tu srin po glog phreng can// srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma'o// byang du yak+sha nag po dang// gnod sbyin mon mo nag mo'o// steng du gza' bdud rA hu la// gnam sman thog gi bu yug ma'o// 'og tu klu bdud mgo dgu dang// klu mo yak+sha nag mo'o// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar stod nor bu bzang po la// shar dbus gnam the dkar po'o// shar smad spyi bdud gu rum tse// lho stod srid pa'i rgyal mo la// lho dbus e ka dza TI ma// lho smad nag mo mgyogs byed ma'o// nub stod ban chen bdud 'dul la// nub dbus srog zan dmar po'o// nub smad btsan 'gong dmar po'o// byang stod bi nA ya ka la// byang dbus kA la nag po dang// byang smad nag po bkrag med do// sgo bzhir dbang chen sde bzhi ste// shar sgor srog bdag tshang pa la// lho sgor rgyal po be dkar ro// nub sgor sku lha gsang ba la// byang sgor mgon po nag po bsgom// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// lha srin sde brgyad dmag tshogs bsgom// byang shar dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dbus su stobs ldan nag po la// yum du 'byung lnga'i bdag mo'o// yab yum thugs kyi sprul pa las// dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi'i phyogs bzhi ru// shar du 'chi bdag nag po dang// yum du 'chi bdag nag mo'o// lho ru mi yi kha rlangs can// yum du nag mo khrag 'dzag ma// nub tu srin po gsod byed dang// yum du srin mo gsod byed ma// byang du gang ba bzang po dang// yum du sha za ral gcig

ma'o// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar du ma hA de ba la// lho ru thar pa nag po'o// nub tu rmu rje btsan po la// byang du kA la nag po'o// steng du gza' bdud nag po rA hu la// 'og tu klu rgyal sog ma med// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bka' nyan bzhi// shar sgor li byin har legs la// lho sgor khu le lag dgu'o// nub sgor rdo rje legs pa la// byang du yam shud dmar po'o// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// rig 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// dbus su che mchog rig 'dzin la// shar du yang dag rig 'dzin no// lho ru 'jam dpal rig 'dzin la// nub tu pad+ma rig 'dzin la// byang du phur pa'i rig 'dzin no// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs bzhi ru// shar du lhun grub rig 'dzin la// lho ru phyag rgya'i rig 'dzin no// nub tu tshe yi rig 'dzin la// byang du rigs kyi rig 'dzin no// sgo bzhir rdo rje slob dpon bzhi// shar du dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon la// lho ru man ngag lung gi slob dpon la// nub tu shes rab rgyud kyi slob dpon te// byang du nyams chag skong ba'i slob dpon no// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// dpa' bo dpa' mo mkha' 'gro rnams// bka' srung dag tu 'khod pa'o// dkyil 'khor phyi yi bar khyams la// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// shar du mi sring tshangs ma dang// 'khrug mo dmar mo zhes bya dang// 'jug srid gzhon nu ma rnams so// lho ru dmar mo dbang sdud ma// zhi ba be con srin mo dang// za ba mo rnams bskyed par byed// nub tu dga' ma ra ro ma// gcig pu ma dang yid 'phrog ma// grub pa mo dang rlung mo'o// byang du gsod byed me mo dang// phag mo dang ni rgan byed ma// sna chen mo dang chu lha mo// sgo bzhir dbang phyug sgo ma bzhi// shar sgor nag mo lcags kyu ma// lho sgor ra ru zhags pa ma// nub sgor bum sna lcags sgrog ma// byang sgor gsus 'dzin dril bu ma'o// phyi yi 'khor yug rgya mtsho la// mkha' 'gro chen mo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// sa bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// ging chen bco brgyad lang ka dang// ma bdun sring bzhi 'bar ma brgyad// pho nya drug cu rtsa bzhi dang// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'o// de ltar lha tshogs thams cad ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan ldan par bsgom// bskyed dang mthar phyin bya ba'i phyir// so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags las bskyed// ces gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni// 'og min chos dbyings pho brang nas// pho brang ye shes dgur gnas pa// dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs

te// chos sku dmigs med ngang las ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gnas nas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gnas chen du// gnyis su med par brtan bzhugs la// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med bstim// mi g.yo brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ye shes dkyil 'khor brtan par bya// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ni// gzhal yas so so'i sgo phya yang bzhi nas// gnyis med dbyings su phyag kyang 'tshal// de nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa dang// 'dod yon phyi yi mchod pa dang// dam rdzas nang gi mchod pa dang// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang// rak+ta dmar gyi mchod pa dang// rmad byung gtor ma'i mchod pa dang// zab mo sbyor sgrol mchod pa rnams// dkyil 'khor dgu yi lha la mchod// bshags pa bya zhing bstod pa bya// gnyis su med pa'i bzlas pa bya/ oM badzra krod+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM pad+man+ta kr-ita badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka gu h+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM ma ma yo gi nI ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsan+Ta sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ oM badzra gu ru sarba sid+d+hi hUM phaT/ dbus su spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// che mchog lha tshogs thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// shar du spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// yang dag lha tshogs thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// lho ru spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// gshin rje'i lha tshogs thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// nub tu spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// dbang chen lha tshogs thugs kar bya// byang du spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// phur pa'i lha tshogs thugs kar bya// shar lhoraspro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// ma mo'i lha tshogs thugs kar bya// lho nub spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// rig 'dzin lha tshogs thugs kar bya// nub byang spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// dregs 'dul lha tshogs thugs kar bya// byang shar spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// stobs ldan nag po yab yum gyi// thugs kar sngags kyi spro bsdu bya// bsnyen bsgrub lo zla zhag sogs bsgrub// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba dang// dngos grub rim gyis blang bar bya// dus bzhir tshogs dang gtor ma gtong// lhag ma gtong zhing brtan ma bskyong// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing smon lam gdab// phrin las las kyi kha tshar rnams// gang 'dod bya ba bsgrub par gsungs// zhes gsungs so// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi skabs te bzhi pa'o//// de nas spyi dpal kun bzang he ru ka la/ 'khor gyi rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma

ho spyi dpal he ru ka/ gsang sngags zhi khro rgya mtsho yi// sngags kyi bye brag bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs kyi// sngags kyi rim pa bstan pa ni/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta oM/ a a a/ badzrI b+ha dra sa man+ta oM/ kun bzang yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags/ oM dzi na dzika hUM badzra d+h+rika/ swa rat+na d+h+rika aM a ro li ka/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+rika/ rigs lnga yab kyi rtsa ba'i sngags/ laM te shwa ra tI/ mAM d+hA trI shwa ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ paM rA ga ti/ taM badzra ra ti/ rigs lnga'i yum lnga'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// k+Shi hi rA dza ya/ traM A gar b+ha ba ya/ hri pad+ma pra da ma/ dz+hiMku ru pA Ni hriM/ mai d+ha rA ya swA hA/ th+l+hiM nis+sa ram b+hA ya swA hA/ hUM swa rA dza ya swA hA/ muM shrI aM rA gA ya swA hA/ sems dpa' brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags/ hUM lA s+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA l+ye sa ma sa s+t+waM/ hri gI ra ti ra go ha/ a nir ti rA ga sa ma yA mi/ dzaHd+hU pe pra be sha/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ baM dI pa su gi ri/ ho g+han+d+he tsit+ta/ sems ma brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags/ oM mu ne kriM swA hA/ oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ oM mu ne hUM truM swA hA/ oM su ne braM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ thub pa drug gi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ya man ta kr-ita phaT/ oM pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM pad+man+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM big+h+nAMn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/ sgo ba yab yum sngags so// rdo rje dbyings kyi sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//// che mchog yon tan gyi lha tshogs kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM shrI ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro tI shwa rI hUM phaT/ che mchog he ru ka yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM shrI ma hA rak+sha he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma hA g+hu h+ya he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma hA bi shwa he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma hA yag sha he ru ka hUM phaT/ rigs bzhi yab kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM rak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM g+hu h+ya kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM yaka sha kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ rigs bzhi yum gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA kro d+ha gar dza gar dza hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha da ha da ha hUM Ta/ oM ma hA kro d+ha pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha tshin+da tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha s+phoT s+phoT hUM phaT/ dregs pa 'dul ba khro bo bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA kro d+ha ya mAn kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha pad+man+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ ta kr-ita sgo ba bzhi'i

rtsa ba'i sngags so// che mchog yon tan gyi lha tshogs kyi rtsa sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// yang dag thugs kyi lha tshogs kyi rtsa sngags bshad pa ni/ oM badzra shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ badzra he ru ka yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rat+na shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM karmA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ rigs bzhi khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM karma kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ khrag 'thung yum bzhi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badzra gau rI hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsau rI hUM phaT/ oM badzra pra mo hA hUM phaT/ oM badzra bai ta lI hUM phaT/ oM badzra puk+ka sI hUM phaT/ oM badzra g+has ma rI hUM phaT/ oM badzra sma sha nI hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsan+Da lI hUM phaT/ gau rI brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badzra seng ha mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badzra shrI gA la mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badzra shwa nA mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badzra gr-id+d+ha mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badzra kang ka mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badzra kA ka mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badzra u lU ka mu khI hUM phaT/ phra men brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badzra Ar+ya te dza teng dzaH/ oM badzra a mu khe hUM/ oM badzra lo ga bam/ oM badzra b+hasmin pa la ya ba tu ho/ sgo ba bzhi'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// yang dag thugs kyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal sku'i lha tshogs kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM a kro te ka hUM phaT/ oM be ta lI rak+sha many+dzu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM e ka dza TI trag rag sha mu tra/ snying kha raka/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ya ma rA dza ti tha li hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza pre ta byi tri ti baM ma ra ta ka hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza pre te dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza ka mak+she pre to ka hUM phaT/ gshed bzhi yab kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM rag mo rag mo snying rtsa sha la ma b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rag mo khrag la mu sham b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rag mo ting laM ma b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rag mo ting ting ka la ma b+h+yo/ gshed bzhi sbyor ba yum gyi sngags so// oM te na te byid hUM/ oM ya ma na de byi hUM/ oM ya ma na ga te byi hUM/ oM kha rag di byi hUM/ gshed bzhi sgrol ba yum gyi sngags so/ oM ya ma badzra kro ta rag sha hUM phaT/ oM ya ma shrI ti hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma hA pa ta hUM phaT/ oM ya ma hri ku ru hUM phaT/ oM ya ma pa ti hUM phaT/ oM ya ma Ar+ya da ra hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rag sha hUM phaT/ oM ya ma sarba pa ta hUM phaT/ oM ya ma a smri ram hUM phaT/ oM ma da na ri tsa hUM phaT/ oM ya ma de ba raM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma hri di baM hUM phaT/ phyogs skyong bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags so/ oM ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rag sha ru lu b+h+yo/ oM yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ya ma rag sha hri ti snying ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma rag sha ru

lu b+h+yo/ oM rag mo ta na ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma nA ga ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ba ya de ba ru lu b+h+yo/ oM yag mo ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma badzra ru lu b+h+yo/ oM e ka rag mo ru lu b+h+yo// oM ka lI raka mo ru lu b+h+yo/ phyogs skyong yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ya ma a ku sha dzaH// oM ya ma pA sha hUM/ oM ya ma s+pho Ta baM/ oM ya ma g+haN+De hoH/ gshin rje sgo ba bzhi'i sngags so// 'jam dpal sku'i lha tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// pad+ma gsung gi lha tshogs kyi sngags bstan pa/ oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM e ka dza TI/ gu h+ya ya sid+d+hi sa ma ya b+h+yoHdza/ oM badzra kro d+ha pa tsa la mu kha hUM dza/ oM badzra bag shu ta mu kha hUM dza/ pad+ma dbang chen yab yum sras dang lha bzhi'i sngags/ oM pad+ma kro ta ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA kro ta da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro ta pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro ta b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro ta ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro ta tshin+da tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro ta gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro ta s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ zil gnon khro bo brgyad kyi sngags so// oM gu+u h+ya kro d+h+wi hUM/ oM dz+nyA na kro d+hI hUM/ oM rA ga kro d+hI hUM/ oM tsi ta kro d+hI hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI hUM/ oM ya ma kro d+hI hUM/ oM nA ga kro d+hI hUM/ oM yag mo kro d+hI hUM/ zil gnon khro mo brgyad kyi sngags so// shrI badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ hrIHbadzra pA sha hUM/ hrIHbadzra s+pho Ta baM/ hrIHbadzra g+haN+De hoH// dbang chen sgo ba bzhi'i sngags so// dbang chen lha tshogs rtsa sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//// phur pa phrin las kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM badzra kI li kI lA ya shrI ku mA ra hUM phaT/ oM tib+ta tsakra ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM rat+na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM karma kI la ya hUM phaT/ sras mchog rigs bzhi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM phaT/ khro bo yab bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags so/ oM badzra kro d+hI ra ba ya tI hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI lA se ki hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI Na na pa tA tA yang tI hUM/ A+oM badzra kro d+hI sh+ma sha na btaTI hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI mu sa la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI tsaN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI sa byA ti hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI sa byA mi ta hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI mA ra Na hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI tsun+da ya tI hUM/ khro mo bcu'i rtsa sngags so/ oM badzra sU ka ra mu kha hUM/ oM badzra byA g+h+ra mu kha hUM/ oM badzra tsa ma ra mu kha hUM/ oM badzra ha ri Na mu kha hUM/ oM badzra di pI mu kha hUM/ oM badzra pag shu mu kha hUM/ oM

badzra shwa na mu kha hUM/ oM badzra seng+ha mu kha hUM/ oM badzra ta rak+Shu mu kha hUM/ oM badzra rak+Sha mu kha hUM/ za byed pha bcu'i sngags so// oM u si ka eShu ba yang mu khI hUM/ oM badzra gr-iD+ha mu khI hUM/ oM badzra kA ka mu khI hUM/ oM badzra u lU ka mu khI hUM/ oM badzra pA la sa mu khI hUM/ oM badzra pak+Sha ti mu khI hUM/ oM badzra pa trI mu khI hUM/ oM badzra ti tI la mu khI hUM/ oM badzra na ku la mu khI hUM/ oM badzra mU Shi ka mu khI hUM/ gsod byed ma bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badzra yag sha ta hUM/ oM badzra pa ya be hUM/ oM badzra ba ya ta hUM/ oM badzra ma ra Na hUM/ sgo ba bzhi'i rtsa sngags so/ phur pa phrin las kyi sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// ma mo rbod gtong gi lha tshogs kyi sngags bshad pa/ hUM badzra shrI he ru ka hUM a a/ oM nyi bzhi mu kha le kro d+hI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+ma rgya/ bde klong 'dus 'dus na snying za sha yu ti ni hUM b+h+yo dzaHdzaH/ bla med he ru ka yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// 'gri pa mu hUM hA/ dz+wa la ra ma pa ha/ b+hi sha san ti ha/ b+hi yang yang te ha/ ma hA laM te ha/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga'i rtsa sngags so// oM badzra kro d+hI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+ma rgya hUM hUM/ oM badzra shan ti pad+ma ga ru ti b+h+yo/ oM mu tri Ni b+h+yo/ oM shan tri Ni b+h+yo/ ba ga dun tri Ni b+h+yo/ kha mun dan tri Ni b+h+yo/ oM badzra sUr+Ya bi to a to ye/ oM pad+ma bi to a to ye/ oM badzra kha rag bi to a to ye// oM badzra sring 'gro bi to a to ye/ oM badzra ake ma a ke b+h+yo/ oM badzra ta ke ma ta ke b+h+yo/ oM badzra ni la ni la b+h+yo/ oM badzra lan ta lan ta b+h+yo/ ye shes kyi rje mo bcu bzhi'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badzra zangs 'dra mu+u ra shwa/ badzra kha rag snying kha rag b+h+yo/ trag rag sha b+h+yo/ trag rag sha mun+t+ra ban kha mun tra pa rag sha b+h+yo/ pra ga ra ti ta b+h+yo/ pra g+hi wing gi sha b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hUM ka ri ka/ ba rod da rod ni la chu maM ta/ kha ting kha/ da la tsa la/ pad+ma tsan da/ ma bur rag to/ ding baM ding baM/ e A ral+li/ nu byi ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ trag rag sha trag sha b+h+yo a ti b+h+yo/ byi tiM b+h+yo/ bu ting b+h+yo/ mu ting b+h+yo/ shan ting b+h+yo/ dun ting b+h+yo/ har ting b+h+yo/ grub ting b+h+yo/ ti ba b+h+yo/ a pa ra ta la b+h+yo/ da la du+u la b+h+yo/ di la ma ma yams b+h+yo/ srid pa sman mo'i rtsa sngags so// ma mo rbod gtong gi lha tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu so gcig pa'o//// de nas slob dpon rig 'dzin gyi sngags bshad pa/ oM badzra gu ru hUM/ oM rat+na gu ru hUM/ oM pad+ma gu ru hUM/ oM karma gu ru hUM/ oM badzra yo gi ni hUM/ oM rat+na yo gi nI hUM/ oM pad+ma yo gi nI hUM/ oM karma yo gi nI hUM/ rig 'dzin brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// rig 'dzin rtsa sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten gyi lha tshogs kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum gyi rtsa sngags so// oM ma hA de ba e dzaHb+h+yo/ u ma de ba e dzaHb+h+yo/ ya ma ya dzaHb+h+yo/ ya man dan ti ya

dzaHb+h+yo/ du khrag du dzaHb+h+yo/ dun ting du dzaHb+h+yo/ rak+sha rA dzaHb+h+yo/ rak+mo ra dzaHb+h+yo/ yak+Sha k+Sha dzaHb+h+yo/ yag mok+Sha dzaHb+h+yo/ rA hu la pa tsa b+h+yo/ a se la a dzaHb+h+yo/ nA ga phu dzaHb+h+yo/ nA ga kro tI shwa rI phu dzaHb+h+yo/ de ba a dzaHb+h+yo/ tri ba sha li tri dzaHb+h+yo/ tig sna 'dre rum rtsam dzaHb+h+yo/ ma ma ru lu ma dzaHb+h+yo/ e ka dza ti trag dzaHb+h+yo/ d+ha ki ni lam pa b+h+yo/ ru tra nr-i dzaHb+h+yo/ a bi shuk+Shu dzaHb+h+yo/ haM shaM tri dzaHb+h+yo/ bi nA ya ga u dzaHb+h+yo/ tir thi ka tha dzaHb+h+yo/ mun mun ba dzaHb+h+yo/ ging ka ra tri dzaHb+h+yo/ rA tsa tso dzaHb+h+yo/ badzra sAd+hu tri dzaHb+h+yo/ ma hA kA la shrI dzaHb+h+yo/ 'jig rten mchod bstod kyi lha tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas dmod pa drags sngags kyi lha tshogs kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM badzra sarba duSh+tan hUM phaT/ stobs ldan nag po yab yum rtsa sngags so// sa ma ya tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ du phrag du tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ dun ting du tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ rak+sha tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ rak+mo ra tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ yag sha k+Sha tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ yag mo k+Sha tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ de ba a tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ ru tra ni tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ mun pa mun pa tsit+ta hriM hriMdza/ tir thi ka tha tsit+ta hriM dza hriM dza/ rA hu la pa tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ nA ga phu tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ rA dza tsa tsa tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ haM sha ma tri tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ badzra sA d+hu tsit+ta hriM hriM dza/ ya ma tri shu tsit+ta hriM hriM/ dmod pa drag sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu so bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal gyi bka' sdod kyi lha tshogs rnams kyi rtsa sngags la/ ma nu yak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ brah+ma NI b+h+yo/ ro'u hrI b+h+yo/ beSh+Na be b+h+yo/ ku mA rI ma ri b+h+yo/ in+d+ra NI b+h+yo/ biM ga laM b+h+yo/ a mr-i ta b+h+yo/ so'u mya b+h+yo/ dan+Da daM b+h+yo/ rak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ bak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ ra ti badzra b+h+yo/ rud+hi re mat+tA b+h+yo/ e ka tsa rI NI b+h+yo/ ma no ha raM b+h+yo/ sid+d+hi kaM b+h+yo/ bA ya bI b+h+yo/ ma hA mA' ra NA badzra b+h+yo/ aka ni b+h+yo/ ba ra hI b+h+yo/ tsa muN+DI b+h+yo/ pu ta naM b+h+yo/ ba ru NaM b+h+yo/ ma hA kA lI b+h+yo/ tsa kA la b+h+yo/ kum+b+ha kar+Na b+h+yo/ lam+bo da ra b+h+yo/ dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sngags so// badzra DA ki nI b+h+yo/ rat+na DA ki nI b+h+yo/ pad+ma DA ki nI b+h+yo/ karma DA ki nI b+h+yo/ mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags so// badzra king+ka ra b+h+yo/ rat+na king+ka ra b+h+yo/ pad+ma king+ka ra b+h+yo/ karma king+ka ra b+h+yo/ ging pho bco brgyad kyi sngags so// dz+wa la 'di man ma phyi sor bzhag sUr+ya b+h+yo/ dz+wa la ag+nI b+h+yo/ dz+wa la ya mA b+h+yo/ dz+wa la kro d+hI b+h+yo/ dz+wa la b+ha rA b+h+yo/ dz+wa la ya ma tik+ShitA b+h+yo/ dz+wa la yak+Sha ga ru Da ma b+h+yo/ dz+wa la yak+sha bA' ru NA b+h+yo/ 'bar ma brgyad kyi sngags so// ma ma b+h+yo rod rod b+h+yo/ ma ma ni la chu mi ta b+h+yo/ ma ma kha T+wA~M ga b+h+yo/ ma ma d+ha la tsa la b+h+yo/ ma ma pad+ma tsan d+ha b+h+yo/ ma ma bu rag ta b+h+yo/ ma ma deng saM deng saM b+h+yo/ ma ma bdun gyi sngags so// ma ma b+h+yo/ ma ma b+h+yo/ ma ma b+h+yo/ ma ma b+h+yo/ sring mo bzhi'i sngags so// badzra rak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ rat+na rak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ pad+ma rak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ karma rak+Sha sI b+h+yo/ lang ka grub pa bco brgyad kyi sngags so// badzra las

la b+h+yo/ rat+na las la b+h+yo/ pad+ma las la b+h+yo/ karma las la b+h+yo/ pho nya drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sngags so// in+d+ra ma ma b+h+yo/ ag+ni ma ma b+h+yo/ ya ma ma b+h+yo/ rag sha ma ma b+h+yo/ nA ga ma ma b+h+yo/ pa ya be ma ma b+h+yo/ yag sha ma ma b+h+yo/ I sha ma ma b+h+yo/ de ba ma ma b+h+yo/ nA ga ma ma b+h+yo/ mu la ma ma b+h+yo/ ma sa ma ma b+h+yo/ dun ting ma ma b+h+yo/ kang ka ma ma b+h+yo/ be ru ma ma b+h+yo/ so na ma ma b+h+yo/ rag ma ma b+h+yo/ kA la ma ma b+h+yo/ na ma ma b+h+yo/ sarba ma ma b+h+yo/ 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags so// dpal gyi bka' nyan gyi sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu so lnga pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi bka' srung gis srog gi snying po phul ba/ badzra shwo na sho rtse b+h+yo/ badzra a rtsu sa ma b+h+yo/ badzra dip+ta badzra b+h+yo/ badzra ma ka ra ya la b+h+yo/ badzra byi d+he badzra ni ka b+h+yo/ badzra kro ta ni ka b+h+yo/ ka ni ka ru te badzra b+h+yo/ badzra kro ti sti pa sta b+h+yo/ che mchog yon tan gyi bka' srung ce spyang ma brgyad kyi srog snying gi le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag thugs kyi bka' srung srin mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis srog gi snying po phul ba/ tsa ma ra mu khI b+h+yo/ nA ga si ra mu khI b+h+yo/ byA g+h+ra mu khI b+h+yo/ na ku la mu khI b+h+yo/ ti tI la mu khI b+h+yo/ rak+Sha mu khA+e b+h+yo/ ta rak+Shu mu khI b+h+yo/ ma ga ra mu khI b+h+yo/ bits+tsha mu khI b+h+yo/ pa trI mu khi b+h+yo/ shrI gA la mu khI b+h+yo/ byA g+h+ra mu khI b+h+yo/ graMd+d+ha mu khI b+h+yo/ ha ya mu khI b+h+yo/ mU Shi ka mu khI b+h+yo/ ku ku mu khI b+h+yo/ bik+Sha ti mu khI b+h+yo/ ha Ni mu khI b+h+yo/ tsa ti mu khI b+h+yo/ bA la pa mu khI b+h+yo/ sU ka mu khI b+h+yo/ ka ta mu khI b+h+yo/ hasti mu khI b+h+yo/ krau ki lA mu khI b+h+yo/ tsha ga la mu khI b+h+yo/ bI na ra mu khI b+h+yo/ shwa na mu khI b+h+yo/ srin mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi srog gi le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal sku'i bka' srung rnams kyis srog gi snying po phul ba/ ging ka ra ging ka ra/ karma rak+sha si karma rak+sha hrIH/ tri ku ru kha rag kham/ d+ha sha ru tra ma ra ya/ ru tra thun ya/ rag sha thun ya/ gri thogs ging bzhis phul ba'o// bdu+u na tri ni ra zung/ ya tri ni ra zung/ tri tsa ba la ni ra zung/ chuM shig yaM tri ni ra zung/ dun tri/ pa tri/ dan tri/ sho ma tri/ dun dzaH/ ma ra ya tri dzaHdzaH/ ya ya/ thing thing/ khram thogs bdud bzhi'i srog sngags so// tro ta ni tro ta ni hUM phaT/ pa tra pa tra hUM phaT/ shu la shu la hUM phaT/ d+ha sha g+h+ri ba d+ha sha g+h+ri ba hUM phaT/ sho thogs rtsis pa'i srog sngags so/ oM badzra d+ha ra yaM/ badzra snying go chod/ kha la mu zan da loM dun ting d+ha rA ya rbad/ oM badzra khrag ti tig rnar rbad/ oM badzra tsakra ru tri da ra ma rbad/ oM badzra shu tri da ra tri ya badzra hUM phaT/ rbad su rbad su/ rbad du rbad du/ da ra ka sha/ shwa pa ma ma/ nad gtong ma mo'i shan pa/ drag po gza'i shan pa/ glen pa klu'i shan pa/ myos pa btsan gyi shan pa bzhi'i srog sngags so// 'jam dpal sku'i bka' srung gi srog snying gi le'u ste sum cu so brgyad

pa'o//// de nas pad+ma gsung gi bka' srung rnams kyis srog snying phul ba/ bud+d+ha badzra oM/ sarba badzra hUM/ rat+na badzra trAM/ d+har ma badzra hrIH/ karma badzra ha/ g+ha h+ya badzra phaT/ kham rgya ma drug gi srog sngags so/ oM sho ri khA hi sho ri kha hI hUM phaT/ dmus long bcu drug gi sngags so// dIp+ta tsakra shwa na mu kha kha long kha/ ku ku rA tsa ra ga sha kha long ka hUM phaT/ khyi brgyad spyang brgyad kyi sngags so// hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ tri hUM phaT/ hrI hUM phaT/ ha hUM phaT/ pho nya bzhi'i srog sngags so// dzi na la te tse ram/ yak+sha ku pan dza hUM phaT/ me 'brug rlung 'brug srog sngags so/ pad+ma gsung gi bka' srung gi srog sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu so dgu pa'o//// phur pa phrin las lha tshogs kyi bka' srung gi srog gi snying po phul ba/ oM pra mun ta d+ha ti rA dza dza hUM/ oM badzra tsa mu na da ri dza dza hUM/ oM shu la da ri dza dza hUM/ oM ka mu+u na da ri dza dza hUM/ ma mo bzhi'i srog sngags so// oM shwa na mu kha dza dza hUM/ oM shwa na mu kha dza dza hUM/ oM br-i ka mu kha dza dza hUM/ oM srI gA la mu kha dza dza hUM/ shwa na bzhi'i srog sngags so// oM tad+yathA/ trag rag+sha ru pi ru pi nan mug ti baM ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ oM pad+ma da ri ru ma ti b+h+yo/ tsit+ta tsit+ta dgra bo snying la b+h+yo/ oM ru lu ko'u me sen me nan dza dzaH/ oM yug te ru ru tsa ba la me dza dzaH/ re ma ti mched bzhi'i srog sngags so// srog rtsa la yam yam// snying rtsa la spril spril/ srog tsa la chum chum/ tsit+ta srog la tung tung/ snying khrag shad thum ri li li rtsegs rtsegs/ 'ur 'ur/ shig shig/ gul gul/ myag myag/ sod sod/ d+ha ti ma ma shI g+h+raM karma kA ra ya/ mA ra si na pra marda ni hUM phaT/ bse'i skyes bu bzhi bdud bzhi ging bzhi'i srog sngags so// gcig tu dril ba'o// phur pa phrin las kyi bka' srung rnams kyi srog sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas ma mo rbod gtong gi bka' srung rnams kyis srog snying phul ba/ spyi ting kha la ma/ snying kha rag dza dzaH/ rag sha ma/ snying kha rag dza dza/ rag mo rag sha snying kha rag dza dza/ yang gab ma bzhi'i srog sngags so// ru lu snying khrag kha rag kha la rag sha ni rbad thum ri li li/ snying la rag sha na/ sha ti rbad thum ri li li/ nr-i sha ku ru rag sha kha ram ni/ ku ru ni ku ru kha tham/ trag rag sha kha mun+t+ra/ snying kha rag b+h+yo/ phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi'i srog sngags so// ma ma rag mo snying rtsa la ma b+h+yo/ rag mo rag mo ru ru ro ru tsa pa la dgra bo snying la rag mo b+h+yo/ rag mo rag mo tsam tsam ma b+h+yo/ rag mo rag mo khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ zor thogs gdong mo bzhi'i srog sngags so// trag rag sha mu tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma rag mo/ snying kha rag b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma snying gzer trag rag sha thun b+h+yo/ ma ma trag sha srog gzer thun rbad b+h+yo/ ma ma trag rag sha snying srog rtsa la thum thum b+h+yo/ zla gam

dbang gi bdag mo ro kha ma bzhi'i srog sngags so/ ru ni dun ti ru la ya dza/ du ru dz+wa la ni ha na dza// ru ma ra ma ha te dza b+h+yo dza/ 'brub khung las kyi bdag mo las kyi 'bar ma rtsis kyi ma mo nag mo phung gsum ma'i srog sngags so// ku ma rag sha na tri rbad/ sri ma ra du rbad ya/ ru ru ma ti rbad ya/ ba ya ru ru rbad ya/ chum chum ni ma tsa rbad ya/ sha ba ru pa ya/ chem chem rbad ya/ rbad bu rbad bu shag pa rbad ya/ rag sha thum rmugs rbad ya/ ru ru ra ti rbad ya/ bla srog snying gi bdag mo gsang ba'i ma gsum/ gsang ba'i pho nya gsum gyi srog sngags so// ma mo rbod gtong gi srog sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas slob dpon gyi bka' srung gyi srog sngags phul ba/ oM badzra DA ki nI b+h+yo/ oM rat+na DA ki nI b+h+yo/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI b+h+yo/ oM karma DA ki nI b+h+yo/ mkha' 'gro sde bzhi'i srog sngags so// oM badzra king ka ra rA tsa b+h+yo/ oM badzra rat+na king ka ra rA tsa b+h+yo/ oM pad+ma king ka ra rA tsa b+h+yo/ oM karma king ka ra rA tsa b+h+yo/ dpa' bo sde bzhi'i srog sngags so// rig 'dzin bka' srung gi srog sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gnyis pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa'i bka' srung gi sngags bstan pa'i skabs te lnga pa'o//// de nas spyi dpal chen po he ru ka la/ phyogs bcu'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ bde gshegs bsgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi// lha tshogs zhi khro thams cad kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// che mchog yon tan 'dus pa'i lha tshogs la// gtso bo dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ 'jigs pa'i dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// sbrul pa'i phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te/ zhabs kyang dor thabs rnam pa brgyad du bgrad// sku ni smug nag 'bar ba shin tu brjid/ rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku yi mdog dang mtshungs// dbus kyi dbu drug mthing la rngams/ g.yas kyi rtsa zhal dkar la 'tsher// g.yon gyi rtsa zhal dmar la gdangs// g.yas kyi gnyis pa sngo la gtsigs// g.yon gyi gnyis pa ljang la rngams// g.yas kyi gsum pa dkar la gdangs// g.yon gyi gsum pa dmar la 'dril// g.yas kyi bzhi pa nag la gtsigs// g.yon gyi bzhi pa ljang la 'tsher// g.yas kyi lnga pa dkar la bzhad/ g.yon gyi lnga pa dmar la gshe// g.yas kyi drug pa sngo la gtsigs/ g.yon gyi drug pa ljang la 'dril// g.yas kyi bdun pa zur mig gzigs/ g.yon gyi bdun pa thur mig gzigs// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na// zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsnams// g.yas kyi phyag na yab rnams bsnams/ g.yon gyi phyag na yum rnams

bsnams/ thub drug spel mar bsnams pa'o// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dang po na// byed pa yid ni rdo rje kun bzang bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dang po na// bya ba chos ni kun bzang mnyam gzhag 'phro// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi gnyis pa na/ rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi gnyis pa na// kun tu khyab pa dbyings phyug dril bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi gsum pa na// rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi gsum pa na// bskyed mdzad sangs rgyas spyan yang thor tshags bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bzhi pa na// rin chen 'byung ldan ser po mchod sbyin re skong bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bzhi pa na// sdud byed mA ma kI yang thor tshugs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi lnga pa na/ snang ba mtha' yas 'joms byed pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi lnga pa na// bsreg mdzad gos dkar mo ni pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi drug pa na// don yod grub pa mthar phyin rgya gram bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi drug pa na// skyod byed dam tshig sgrol ma ut+pal bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bdun pa na// sa snying dkar po rin chen myu gu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bdun pa na// lA s+ye dkar mo me long rgya gram bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi brgyad pa na// nam mkha'i snying po gcod byed ral gri bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi brgyad pa na// mA le sngon mo rin chen phreng ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dgu pa na// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag na pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dgu pa na/ gIr ti dmar mo pi wang rgyud 'dren bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu pa na// phyag na rdo rje 'joms byed rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu pa na// nIr ti ljang gu gar gyi cod pan bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gcig na// rgyal ba byams pa dmar skya gun+d+he bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gcig na// bdug pa'i sprin 'phro ma ni spos me bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gnyis na// kun tu bzang po rin chen snye ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gnyis na// dag pa'i mdangs ldan ma ni me tog bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gsum na// sgrib pa rnam sel klu shing lo ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gsum na// gsal ba'i 'od ldan ma ni mar me bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bzhi na// 'phags pa 'jam

dpal ut+pal mthing ga bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bzhi na// gan d+he ljang gu dag byed dri chab bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco lnga na// big+h+nAM ta kr-ita be con tho ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco lnga na// thugs dam skul mdzad ma ni lcags kyu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu drug na// ya mAn ta kr-ita 'joms byed thod dbyug bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu drug na/ gnas nas spyan 'dren ma ni zhags pa bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bdun na// pad+ma ta kr-ita dral byed dgra sta bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bdun na// brtan par bzhugs mdzad ma ni lcags sgrog bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco brgyad na// pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita gcod byed ral gri bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco brgyad na// rtog bral 'gyed mdzad ma ni g+haN+De bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu dgu na// lha yi thub pa pi wang rgyud mangs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu dgu na// byol song thub pa chos 'chad pusti bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi nyi shu+u na// lha min thub pa thags bzang go cha bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon phyi nyi shu+u na// yi dwags thub pa rin chen sgrom bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi tha ma na// mi yi thub pa shAkya gseg shang bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi tha ma na// dmyal ba'i thub pa me chu bsil drod bsnams// zhabs brgyad byol song gtso bo brgyad kyang brdzis// stag gzig seng ge dom rnams ni// g.yas kyi zhabs bzhi'i 'og tu mnan// glang chen ma he chu srin sbrul// g.yon gyi zhabs bzhi'i 'og tu mnan// lha brgyad g.yas kyi zhabs kyis mnan// klu brgyad g.yon gyi zhabs 'og mnan// nyi zla pad+ma'i steng na bgrad// yum chen gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// sku mdog dud ka cir yang ston// dbu dgu rol pa'i ye shes dgu// stong pa bco brgyad phyag tu gdengs// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje bsnams// g.yon gyi dang po b+han dmar dkrug/ g.yas brgyad gau rI bum thogs brgyad// g.yon brgyad seng+ha khrag thogs brgyad// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums yab dang mthun// yab yum rgyan ni dur khrod chas// rgya byi'u lcags chas 'dul byed bse khrab chas/ gcan gzan gzig chas sprul pa rdo rje'i chas/ rin chen sprul chas dpa' bo stag gi chas// gzi mdangs mi lpags chas dang dmar gsal khrag gi chas/ rtsal chen seng ge'i chas dang gdug pa dom gyi chas/ 'jigs pa'i rgyan chas rab tu brgyan pa'o// bcom ldan dpal chen rak+sha he ru ka/ dbu gsum smug nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po

'khor lo pad+ma bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni ti ra rgyu zhags 'dren/ tha ma gnyis na khyung chen ba su 'dren/ rak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril/ g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom ldan dpal chen gu h+ya he ru ka/ dbu gsum ser nag mthing dkar dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rin chen thod khrag bsnams// bar ma gnyis na dgra sta rgyu zhabs 'debs// tha ma gnyis na stong gi 'jig rten bsnams/ gu h+ya kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas na rin chen g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom ldan dpal chen bi shwa he ru ka/ dbu gsum dmar nag mthing ga dkar po'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po pad+ma b+han dmar bskyil// g.yas g.yon bar ma stong gi 'jig rten bsnams// tha ma gnyis na dgra s+t+wa gshol yang 'dzin// yum chen bi shwa kro d+hI shwa rI ni// g.yas pa pad+ma g.yon pa dung khrag stob// bcom ldan dpal chen yak+sha he ru ka/ dbu gsum ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rgya gram b+han dmar dkrug/ bar pa gnyis na ral gri zhags pa 'dzin// tha ma gnyis na dgra s+t+wa thong gshol 'dzin// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// yag shwa kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rgya gram g.yon pa dung khrag ltob// dri za 'dul byed khro bo dkar po la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'khor lo tri shUl bsnams// me lha 'dul byed dmar ser me dbal dbyug to bsnams// gshin rje 'dul byed mthing nag dgra s+t+wa thod dbyug bsnams// srin po 'dul byed smug nag ral gri zhags pa bsnams// klu rnams 'dul byed dmar po spu gri zhags pa bsnams// rlung lha 'dul byed dmar skya b+han+da rnga yab bsnams// gnod sbyin 'dul byed ljang gu rgya gram dril bu bsnams// bgegs rnams 'dul byed mthing ga dgra s+t+wa rtse gsum bsnams// lha gdon 'dul byed sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs/ sa bdag 'dul byed dud ka tho ba zhags pa thogs// ya mAn+ta kr-ita dkar po lcags kyu bsnams/ pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ser po zhags pa bsnams// pad+mAn+ta kr-ita dmar po lcags sgrog thogs// big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita ljang gu dril bu bsnams/ che mchog yon tan lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o//// yang dag thugs kyi lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan dpal chen badzra he ru ka/ dbu gsum mthing nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rdo rje kha T+wAM rnge'u chung g.yas// ti ri'i dbyug pa dung dmar rgyu zhags g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// yum chen badzra kro d+hI shwa rI sku+u la 'khril// g.yas pa kha T+wAM g.yon pa dung khrag stob/ bcom ldan khrag 'thung bud+d+ha he ru

ka/ dbu gsum smug nag mthing ka dmar ba'i zhal// ti ra'i dbyug pa rdo rje khyung chen g.yas// rgyu zhags b+han dmar ti ra'i ba su g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// yum chen bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom ldan dpal chen rat+na he ru ka/ dbu gsum ser nag mthing ga dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rin chen byis dbyug dgra sta g.yas// stong gi 'jig rten b+han dmar gshol rgyu gzhag kyang ni g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskum bgrad// rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung khrag stob// bcom ldan khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum dmar nag mthing ga dkar ba'i zhal// phyag drug pad+ma be con dgra s+t+wa g.yas// stong gi 'jig rten b+han dmar gshol ni g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom ldan khrag 'thung karma he ru ka/ dbu gsum ljag nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rgya gram ral gri dgra s+t+wa g.yas// stong gi 'jig rten b+han dmar gshol ni g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// yum chen karma kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob/ gau rI b+han dmar byis dbyug g.yon// tsau rI mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// be ta byi za rdo 'phyar nag/ puk+ka dmar ser byis rgyu 'dren// g+hasma dung dmar khrag 'thung ljang/ sme sha mthing nag byis snying za/ tsaN+Da ser skya byi lus 'bral// seng+ha ser mo zhing za seng// bya g+h+ra dmar mo lag bsnol stag/ sr-i gA nag mo byis ldag wa// shwa na mthing ga sha 'drad spyang// gr-id+d+ha dmar mo dung gri rgod// kAM ka dmar smug zhing chung dur// kAM ka nag mo b+han gri bya// u lU mthing ga lcags kyu 'ug/ rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren/ phag gdong sngon mo mche zhags sdom// dmar mo spre'u gdong lcags sgrog sdom// thal byed ljang gu dril 'khrol sbyang// yang dag thugs kyi lha tshogs sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe bzhi pa'o//// 'jam dpa' sku yi lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus nag zhal// rdo rje be con yang ral gri dgra s+t+wa g.yas// sdigs mdzub mdung thung b+han dmar g.yon// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la brgyan// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs kyis// yi dwags ma he'i steng na bgrad// be ta nag mo sku la

'khril// dgra s+t+wa 'phyar zhing dung dmar stob// sgrol byed e ka dza TI ni// baiDUr mdog sngon gsal 'tsher la// tri shUl g.yang gzhi g.yas na 'phyar// thod rlon tsit+ta g.yon na stob// ya ma rA dza gshin rje gshed// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo tri shUl lcags kyu g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra s+t+wa rgyu zhags g.yon// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yu yi ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// gtso la 'khyud cing dung dmar stob// sgrol yum nag mo re ma ti// ral gri ne'u le'i rkyal pa thogs// myos byed 'bar ba gshin rje gshed// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus ser nag/ be con ral gri dgra s+t+wa g.yas// b+han dmar 'khor lo lcags kyu g.yon// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// gtum mo ser nag g.yon nas 'khril// gtso la 'khyud cing dung dmar stob// g.yas na sgrol yum ser nag la// chags gzhi khrag gi bdag mo ni// g.yas pa spu gri tsit+ta zhags pa g.yon// gshin rje gshed po ma ru tse// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// be con dbyug to kha T+wAM g.yas/ b+han dmar kha T+wAM rgyu zhags g.yon// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yon na lha mo 'od zer ni// gtso la 'khyud cing b+han dmar stob// g.yas na gling bzhi gtsug 'byams ma// g.yas pa mi snying changs par bcug/ g.yon pa dung dmar b+han+da 'phyar/ ral pa tshar dgu gshin rje gshed/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ljang zhal// be con gtun shing rgya gram g.yas// b+han dmar rgyu zhags 'khor lo g.yon// g.yon na ljang nag mgo 'phyangs ma// g.yas pa dgra s+t+wa g.yon dung khrag/ gshin rje nag 'joms mthing nag zhal// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// dgra s+t+wa 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// nag mo ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// gshin rje phya sangs dkar 'tsher zhal// g.yas pa tshe yi bum pa 'dzin// g.yon pa rdo rje'i gshol yang bsnams// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// shel gyi gdong dgu g.yon nas 'khril// shel gyi gri thogs yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// kong tse brag 'joms dkar ser zhal// rdo rje brag nag g.yas pa na// me yi 'khor lo g.yon na thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// shel mig khro mo g.yon na 'khril// g.yas pa lcags kyu yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob/ a ba glang mgo smug nag zhal// g.yas pa kha T+wAM lcags kyu g.yon// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// dkar skya mche gtsigs g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa skar mda' thogs nas 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han

dmar gtso la stob// ya ba ti ni sngon nag zhal// g.yas na ral gri g.yon lcags kyu// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yon du dred kyi ab sham 'khril// g.yas pa khram shing thogs nas 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob// gshin rje mig dmar smug nag zhal// gcod byed ral gri g.yas pa na// ti ra'i dbyug pa g.yon na thogs// khrag gi ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// gshin rje rmig pa dud ka'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng ba g.yas pa na// g.yon pa lcags sgrog dmar po sdom// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// nag mo pus 'gro g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab kyi mgul du 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gshin rje til pa sngo nag zhal// g.yas pa spu gri 'bar ba thogs// g.yon pa b+han d+ha rak+tas bkang// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yon nas spyan gsum mche gtsigs 'khril// g.yas pa yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gshin rje bdud 'joms smug nag zhal// rdung byed tho ba g.yas pa na// rak+ta b+han dmar g.yon na bsnams// smug nag ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// chos kyi rgyal po dkar ser zhal// rdo rje rtse gsum g.yas pa na// g.yon pa bdud kyi khram shing thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// rdo rje ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa nyi zer zhags pa 'dzin// g.yon pa dung dmar yab la stob// gshin rje 'bar ba dmar po'i zhal// skye 'gro'i rtsis byang g.yas pa na// g.yon pa gtun shing 'bar ba thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// dmar mo mgo dgu g.yas nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud tri shUl 'dzin// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob// gshin rje thod dbyug mthing nag zhal// ti ra'i dbyug pa g.yas pa na// bdud kyi sho d+he g.yon na thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// nag mo phag mgo g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob/ dkar zhing 'tsher ba bya rgod mgo// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// lcags kyu 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// mthing nag 'bar ba stag gi mgo/ rin chen dbyug pa g.yas pa na// rgyu zhags 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// le brgan 'bar ba kang ka'i mgo/ me yi pad+ma g.yas pa na// lcags sgrog 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// ljang nag 'bar ba spyang ki'i mgo/ rgya gram 'bar ba g.yas pa na// shel gyi dril bu g.yon na thogs// 'jam dpal sku'i lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi

bcu zhe lnga pa'o//// pad+ma gsung gi lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal po ni// sku mdog dmar po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug kha T+wAM rdo rje sbrul zhags g.yas// dril bu b+han dmar lcags sgrol g.yon na bsnams// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul// yum chen e ka tsa ti sku la 'khril// sku mdog dmar nag spyan gsum sdang mig bgrad// g.yas pa kha T+wAM bsnams nas yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob par byed// sprul pa'i phra men byi la pu shud mgo/ sku mdog dmar nag bskal pa'i me ri 'dra// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa phur bu 'debs// ye shes zil gnon khro bo'i rgyal po ni// sku mdog dmar nag ser yang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo ljang yang dbus dmar zhal// g.yas pa 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// g.yon pa pad+ma ral gri dril bu bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen mi pham khro mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// las kyi khro bo zil gnon khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug pad+ma dbyug to spu gri g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra s+t+wa rgya gram g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen khro gnyer dmar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// ye shes ma mo zil gnon khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug sdigs mdzub lcags kyu sbrul zhags g.yas// lcags sgrog kha T+wAM rnge'u chung g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen ro langs dmar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// ye shes bya khyung zil gnon khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje sa dang me khyung g.yas// nam mkha' chu rlung byang khyung g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum gcig spyan gcig dmar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// pho rgyud zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje thog skam rgyu zhags

g.yas// dung khrag thod rlon zhing dbyug g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen rdo rje las byed sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung khrag stob// mo rgyud zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje ral gri mda' ni g.yas// zhags pa sdigs mdzub gzhu ni g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen gshin rje las byed sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// klu rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug sbrul dkar sbrul ser sbrul dmar g.yas// sbrul khra sbrul sngo sbrul nag g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// klu mo las byed dmar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// gza' rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje ral gri zhags pa g.yas// dung khrag seng ldeng dbyug pa khyung chen g.yon// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen gnod sbyin las byed sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// sgo ba dkar po lcags kyu thogs// sgo ba ser po zhags pa bsnams// sgo ba dmar po lcags sgrog thogs// sgo ba ljang gu dril bu thogs// pad+ma gsung gi lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe drug pa'o//// phur pa phrin las lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sku mdog mthing// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ni mthing nag zhal// g.yas gnyis rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon gyi gnyis na kha T+wAM me dpung bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas brgyad sku la brgyan// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs mthing nag sku la 'khril// g.yas pa kha T+wAM thogs nas yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob par byed// thugs kyi sras mchog bud+d+ha kI la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dgra s+t+wa bsnams// bar ma gnyis na rgyu zhags ral gri bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku smad dngul phur

zlum po e yi gdan la bzhugs// lho phyogs sras mchog rat+na kI la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po me dang dgra s+t+wa bsnams// bar ma gnyis na ral gri be con bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku smad gser phur gru bzhi e yi gdan la bzhugs// nub kyi sras mchog pad+ma kI la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ser dbus dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po ral gri mdung thung bsnams// bar ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku smad zangs phur zla gam e yi gdan la bzhugs// byang gi sras mchog karma kI la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ljang zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po mdung dang gri gug bsnams// bar ma gnyis na lcags kyu ral gri bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku smad lcags phur zur gsum e yi gdan la bzhugs// hUM chen sngo skya ser dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums tshangs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin sku la 'khril// g.yas pa be con g.yon pa thod khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa phag gi mgo bo can// g.yas pa tho ba g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa smig bu'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa nyi zla g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// rnam rgyal dkar po sngo dang ljang ser zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na 'khor lo tri shU'u la// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdangs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums brgya byin gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje snyems ma sku la 'khril// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa thod khrag stobs// yab kyi sprul pa stag gi mgo bo can// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa bya rgod mgo bo can// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// khro rgyal dbyug sngon dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na me dbal dbyug to bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums drang srong gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje sder mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa thod khrag stobs// yab kyi sprul pa g.yag gi mgo bo can// g.yas pa dbyug to g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa

bya rog mgo bo can// g.yas pa me dbal g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// khro rgyal gshin rje sngo skya ljang sngon zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na thod dbyug dgra s+t+wa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums grul bum gdan la bzhugs// yum chen dur khrod bdag mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa thod dbyug g.yon pa thod khrag stobs// yab kyi sprul pa sha ba'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa dgra s+t+wa g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa 'ug pa'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa zhags pa g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// mi g.yo mgon po ljang sngon smug nag zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na ral gri zhags pa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums bden bral gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje gtun khung sku la 'khril// g.yas pa tho ba g.yon pa thod khrag stobs// yab kyi sprul pa gzig gi mgo bo can// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa khwa ta'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// rta mgrin dmar po dkar dang sngo ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na spu gri zhags pa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums chu lha'i gdan la zhugs// yum chen rdo rje gtum mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa spu gri g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa byi la'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa zhags pa g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa pu shud mgo bo can// g.yas pa spu gri g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// 'dod rgyal dmar skya ser dang ljang dgu'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na ba dan rnga yab bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums rlung lha'i gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje mda' snyems sku la 'khril// g.yas pa tho ba g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa spyang ki'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa ba dan g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa khra yi mgo bo can// g.yas pa rnga yab g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag dkar dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na rgya gram dril bu bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa

nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums gnod sbyin gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje rlung 'byin sku la 'khril// g.yas pa dgra s+t+wa g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa seng ge'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa pha wang mgo bo can// g.yas pa me sgron g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// khams gsum rnam rgyal dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na rdo rje sprul zhags bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums bgegs kyi gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje gsod byed sku la 'khril// g.yas pa gri gug g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa dom gyi mgo bo can// g.yas pa dril bu g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa sre mo'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// stobs chen dud ka nag dang ljang gu'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na tho ba zhags pa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums sa bdag gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje skul byed sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rtse gsum g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa dred kyi mgo bo can// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa byi ba'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa sogs le g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// sgo ba dkar po lcags kyu pu shud mgo/ sgo ba ser po zhags pa skya ka'i mgo/ sgo ba dmar po lcags sgrog srin bya'i mgo// sgo ba ljang gu dril bu khra yi mgo// phur pa phrin las kyi lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe bdun pa'o//// ma mo rbod gtong lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan bla med he ru ka/ sku ni mthing nag 'jigs tshul can// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje sbrul khyung sbrul zhags g.yas// b+han+da zhing g.yab ga'u g.yon// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// zhabs bzhi bgrad pas ma mo gzir// yum chen kun tu bzang mo ni// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams gnon// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// dbu gcig zhal lnga srid pa gsal// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya la// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'bar// bar ma dril zhags b+han+da ldan// tha ma bdud rtsi g.yang gzhir ldan// sna tshogs bsgyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// shar gyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo

rnam snang gsal// sku mdog dkar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dkar po shel ltar dag/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po rdo rje b+han+da 'bar// bar ma dgra s+t+wa gtun shing brdeg/ tha ma seng ge mchog chen snyod// lha yi mkha' 'gro ban glang gdod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' ston po baiDUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po rin chen b+han+da 'bar// bar ma me dbal dbyug to la// tha ma stag mo zhing chung snyod// nub kyi mkha' 'gro phud ka'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo snyan mnyen yang gsal 'bar// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dmar mo dbang gis mdzes// dang po pad+ma b+han+da 'bar// bar ma zhags pa tri shU la// tha ma ce spyang zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi chu bdag steng du bgrad// byang gi mkha' 'gro rdo rje'i mchu// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// sku mdog ljang gu 'bar ba la// na bza' ljang gu baiDUr+Ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po rgya gram b+han+da dmar// bar ma dbyug to rgyu phreng 'dzin// tha ma spyang mo zhing chu snyod// zhabs bzhi gnod sbyin steng du bgrad/ nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rdo rje mchu// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'bar// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na
