bza' ser po btso ma gser// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po 'khor lo b+han+da 'bar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin// tha ma 'ug pa zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhir ya bdud steng na bgrad// srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum yum// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas gyi dang po 'khor lo bskor// g.yon gyi dang po rin po che// g.yas kyi bar ma g.yang gzhi brdeb// g.yon gyi b+han+da dmar gyi bkang// g.yas kyi tha ma tshe 'dzin cing// g.yon gyi tha ma lcags kyu thogs// zhabs drug rgyud drug sgo yang gcod// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can// na bza' sprin dkar brtsegs pa la// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i mtha' chag can// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// phyag na zangs lcags dkar nag la// snying brgyus pa yi zhags pa 'phan// nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo 'bar ba la// sku la shel gyi go zu mnabs// phyag na shel gyi spu gri bsnams// khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' g.yu yi go zu gsol// lag na thod pa khrag bkang bsnams// bdud rtsi khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' le brgan go zu mnabs// lag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// srid gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog ljang nag 'bar ba la/ na bza' ljang gu

baiDUr+Ya// lag na zhing lpags rgyal mtshan thogs// dkar mo srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na skra yi zhags pa thogs// sngon mo dbyings phyug rgyal mo ni// lag na zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// dmar mo bdag nyid chen mo ni// lag na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'dzin// ser mo chen mo gcig pu ma// lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi brdeb// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// lag na b+han+da zlum po thogs// mthing nag chen mo mche ba can// lag na b+han+da sul mang thogs// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo ni// lag na b+han+da lcang lo thogs// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// lag na b+han+da rgya gram thogs// srid pa'i ma mo chags byed mo// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// gos su mi lpags rlon pa gon// lag na mi snying rlon pa thogs// srid pa cha snyoms chen mo ni// sku mdog dmar mo chen mo ste// stag lpags rlon pa'i go zu la// mi lpags rlon pa'i na bza' bklubs// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang// 'dod khams gtso mo chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo chen mo la// sku stod stag gi pags pa la// sku smad zangs kyi zhabs mas g.yogs// lag na khram shing nag po thogs// e ka tsa ti ral gcig ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// gos su sprin dkar go zu yi// mtha' ma 'ja' tshon 'bar bas 'khrigs// lag na kha T+wAM mi ro thogs// gling bzhi spyi phud chen mo ni// dkar mo sgeg pa'i cha byad ma// shel gyi go zu sku la gsol// lag na lcags kyi 'od phreng thogs// rin chen srid 'degs chen mo ni// cha byad sngon mo chen mo la// mu tig khu 'phang go zu can// lag na g.yu yi ga'u thogs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku yi cha byed dmar mo la// le brgan 'bar ba'i go zu can// lag na thod pa khrag bkang thogs// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' gser gyi go zu can// lag na ban+da khrag bkang thogs// har ting dkar mo chen mo ni// sku la shel gyi go zu gsol// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nag mo chen mo ni// sku la g.yu yi go zu gsol// lag na sa yi 'khor lo thogs// shan ting dmar mo chen mo ni// sku la byi ru'i go zu gsol// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo chen mo ni// na bza' ser po'i go zu gsol// lag na rlung gi 'khor lo thogs/ srin mo chen mo skams pa mo// sku mdog dkar mo go zu can// lag na shel phur d+han+da thogs// srin mo chen mo phur thogs ma// sku mdog sngon mo go zu sngo// lag na b+han+da khrag bkang thogs// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi mo// sku mdog dmar po go zu dmar// lag na b+han+da thod sbram thogs// srin mo chen mo za ba mo// sku mdog dmar mo go zu dmar// lag na b+han+da lpags

rlon thogs// srin mo chen mo gsod byed ma// sku mdog ser mo go zu ser// lag na b+han+da gri snod thogs// srin mo chen mo za byed ma// sku mdog ser mo go zu ser// lag na b+han+da lcags kyu thogs// srin mo dri ma snom byed ma// sku mdog dkar mo go zu can// lag na b+han+da rlon pa thogs// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// lag na b+han+da dkar po thogs// lho yi nag mo kha 'byams ma// lag na b+han+da sngon po thogs// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jibs ma// lag na b+han+da dmar po thogs// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// lag na b+han+da ser po thogs// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring// dkar mo rdo rje rtse gsum thogs// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring// sngon mo yi mgo thod dbyug thogs// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring// dmar mo sbrul nag zhags pa thogs// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring// ser mo ne le'i rkyal pa thogs// ma mo rbod gtong lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe brgyad pa'o//// 'jig rten mchod brten lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul ni// dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// dbu gsum kham nag sbrul nag mthing// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// g.yas kyi gnyis pa lha brgyad mgo/ g.yon gyi gnyis pa klu brgyad mgo/ zhabs bzhi dregs pa'i snying gar brdzis// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// g.yas pa rdo rje yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// lha srin sde brgyad gtso bo ste// dbang phyug ma hA de ba ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// gri gug g.yas la tsit+ta g.yon// chibs su rtsal chen seng ge bcibs// btsun mo u ma de bI ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' ljang nag ber chen gsol// rtse gsum g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// chibs su 'degs pa'i glang chen bcibs// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// sku mdog nag po 'bar ba la// gcan gzan gdug pa'i lpags rlon gsol// be con g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon// chibs su ma he sngo nag bcibs// gshin rje gsod byed nag mo ni// sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// phyag na srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// bdud po skos rje drang dkar ni// sku mdog nag po 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// khram shing g.yas la dgra s+t+wa g.yon// chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs// bdud mo nag mo re ma ti// sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// khram bam g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// chibs su bong bu gwa pa

bcibs// srin po nag po glog phreng can// sku mdog nag po 'bar ba la// lus la glog gi phreng ba can// thog chen g.yas la glog chen g.yon// chibs su 'brug dang glog la bcibs// srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma// sku mdog dmar nag 'bar ba la// na bza' khrag gi lab nag gsol// khrag phur g.yas la khrag por g.yon// gnod sbyin yak+sha me dbal ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// rin chen g.yas la mtshon cha g.yon// chibs su stag mo rngams pa bcibs// gnod sbyin mon mo nag mo ni// sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// spu gri g.yas la spyang mo g.yon// chibs su lcags kyi spyang mo bcibs// gza' bdud chen po rA hu la// sku mdog dud ka mgo dgu pa// sku stod mi la sku smad sbrul// mda' gzhu g.yas la sbrul zhags g.yon// chibs su 'brug chen kha gdangs bcibs// gnam sman thog gi bu yug ma// sku mdog dmar skya 'bar ba la// na bza' gser gyi go zu gsol// thog chen g.yas la ser chen g.yon// chibs su 'brug mo yid mgyogs bcibs// klu bdud nag po mgo dgu pa// sku+u mdog nag po dud kha la// sku stod mi la sku smad sbrul// sbrul zhags g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// chibs su chu srin nag po bcibs// klu mo yak+sha sngon mo ni// sku stod dud kha nag po la// sku smad gdug pa sbrul du 'khyil// sbrul zhags g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// chibs su rus sbal nag po bcibs// srid pa'i lha rab sham po ni// sku mdog dkar gsal gangs ri 'dra// sku la dar dkar ral ga gsol// dar mdung g.yas la shel gri g.yon// chibs su lha g.yag dkar po bcibs// skyes bu gnam the'u dkar po ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' za 'og ber chen gso// dar mdud g.yas la ral gri g.yon// chibs su rta dkar phrum dmar bcibs// shar du spyi bdud gu rum rtse// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' rgya byes dkar po gsol// ru mtshon g.yas la ral gri g.yon// chibs su rdo rta gro bo bcibs// ma mo srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' dar dkar go zu gsol// 'khor lo g.yas la me long g.yon// chibs su 'brug mo ral chen bcibs// sngags srung e ka dza TI ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// tsit+ta g.yas la spyang mo g.yon// chibs su drel rta nag po bcibs// dpal ldan nag mo mgyogs byed ma// sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// tshon drub g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// chibs su so bya rog po bcibs// ban chen

rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// sku mdog dmar nag 'bar ba la// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// khrag thun g.yas la nyung thun g.yon// chibs su dre'u rta kham nag chibs// brag btsan srog zan dmar po ni// sku mdog dmar po 'bar ba la// na bza' dar dmar ral ga gsol// bse mdung g.yas la mda' gzhu g.yon// chibs su btsan rta dmar po bcibs// btsan 'gong yam shud dmar po ni// sku mdog dmar po 'bar ba la// na bza' dar dmar slog pa gsol// shang lang g.yas la zangs zhags g.yon// chibs su zangs rta dmar po bcibs// bgegs rgyal bi na ya ka ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// kha T+wAM g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// chibs su rta nag rting dkar bcibs// mu stegs kA la nag po ni// sku mdog nag po 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// rtse gsum g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// chibs su rtsal gyi seng ge bcibs// rmu bdud nag po bkrag med ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ral ga gsol// shang lang g.yas la mda' gzhu g.yon// chibs su rmu rta mchong rgod chibs// srog bdag tshangs pa dkar po ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// sku la bya rgod thul pa gsol// spu gri g.yas la nyi zer g.yon// chibs su seng ge dkar po bcibs// rgyal po chen po be har ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// sku la dom gyi slog pa gsol// bdud zhags g.yas la spu gri g.yon// chibs su ban glang sna ring bcibs// skyes bu sku lha gsang ba ni// sku mdog dkar po 'bar ba la// skyen dkar stod kyi slog pa gsol// rdo rje g.yas la ru mtshon g.yon// chibs su ra skyes dkar po chibs// mgon po ma hA kA la ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' ljang nag ber chen gsol// gri gug g.yas la bing chen g.yon// chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs// re re la yang 'khor g.yog ni// 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis 'khor dang ldan// sprul pa yang sprul bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// 'jig rten mchod rten gyi lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa'o//// dmod pa drag sngags lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// lha mchog stobs ldan nag po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dbu gsum mthing nag drag po'i zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// g.yas kyi gnyis na lha brgyad tsit+ta bsnams// g.yon gyi gnyis na klu brgyad tsit+ta bsnams// zhabs bzhis dregs pa pho mo gzir// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag mo ni// zhal gcig

phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// g.yas kyi phyag gis nam mkha' 'degs// g.yon gyi phyag gis sa gzhi gnon// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga yang 'char// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ thod pa g.yas la gri gug g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// 'chi bdag nag mo btsun mo ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ thod pa g.yas la gri gug g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// bdud po me yi kha rlangs can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ khram shing g.yas la bdud zhags g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ khram shing g.yas la thod rlon g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// srin mo nag po gsod byed ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ ral gri g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// srin mo nag mo gsod byed ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ gri gug g.yas la mi mgo g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// ral gri g.yas la dar nag g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// gnod sbyin sha za ral gcig ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// dar nag g.yas la zhing lpags g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// lha chen ma hA de ba ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// ba dan g.yas la shel gri g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// rU tra thar pa nag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ mchod gtor g.yas la thun gtor g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// rmu rje btsan po mthu bo che// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ dar nag g.yas la zhags pa g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// mu stegs kA la nag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ kha T+wAM g.yas la tri shUl g.yon// zhing

lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// khyab 'jug chen po rA hu la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// khram shing g.yas la dgra s+t+wa g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// klu rgyal sog ma med pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// bum pa g.yas la rus sbal g.yon// sbrul lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// rgyal po li byin har legs ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// shel gri g.yas la dar dkar g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// 'gong po khu le lag dgu ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// sprul pa'i lag pa dgu yang 'gyed// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// the'u rang rdo rje legs pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// dar dkar g.yas la dar dmar g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// btsan rgod yam shud dmar po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// btsan mdung g.yas la btsan gri g.yon// zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dam nyams dgra bgegs gzir// re re la yang 'khor g.yog ni// 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis ldan pa la// sprul pa yang sprul bsam mi khyab// dmod pa drag sngags kyi lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu tham pa'o//// che mchog yon tan rig 'dzin dang// yang dag thugs kyi rig 'dzin dang// 'jam dpal sku yi rig 'dzin dang// pad+ma gsung gi rig 'dzin dang// phur pa phrin las rig 'dzin dang// ma mo rbod gtong rig 'dzin dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin dang// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin dang// tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin dang// sa la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin dang// sa thob pa yi rig 'dzin tshogs// dur khrod rus pa'i rgyan cha yis// dbu rgyan phyag gdub zhabs gdub dang// dpung rgyan stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang// rgyan dang chas kyis brgyan pa'o// dbang gi thor tshugs shigs se shig/ g.yas pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// sku bzhengs 'gyings bag spyod pa mdzad// rig 'dzin gyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o//// che mchog yon tan bka' srung ni// ce spyang dregs pa ma brgyad ni// shar gyi phyogs kyi ce spyang ni// dbu ni seng ge'i mgo bo

la// shel gyi ral pa shel phur can// ce spyang rgyug tshul 'gyings bag can// lag na shel gyi rnge'u chung brdung// lho yi phyogs kyi ce spyang ni// dbu ni stag gi mgo bo la// gser gyi ral pa gser pur can// ce spyang rgyug tshul 'gyings bag can// lag na gser gyi rnge'u chung brdung// nub kyi phyogs kyi ce spyang ni// dbu ni gzig gi mgo bo can// byu ru'i ral pa phur bu can// ce spyang rgyug tshul 'gyings bag can// lag na byu ru'i rnge'u chung brdung// byang gi phyogs kyi ce spyang ni// dbu ni dom gyi mgo bo la// g.yu yi ral pa bur bu can// ce spyang rgyug tshul 'gyings bag can// lag na g.yu yi rnge'u chung brdung// shar lho mtshams kyi ce spyang ni// dbu ni spyang mo'i mgo bo la// g.yu yi ral pa phur bu can// ce spyang rgyug tshul 'gyings bag can// lag na g.yu yi rnge'u chung brdung// lho nub mtshams kyi ce spyang ni// dbu ni bse yi kAng+ka'i mgo/ bse yi ral pa phur bu can// ce spyang rgyug tshul 'gyings bag can// lag na bse yi rnge'u chung brdung// nub byang mtshams kyi ce spyang ni// dbu ni dur bya kA ka'i mgo/ lcags kyi ral ba phur bu can// ce spyang rgyug tshul 'gyings bag can// lag na lcags kyi rnge'u chung brdung// byang shar mtshams kyi ce spyang ni// dbu ni bse yi dred mo mgo/ zangs kyi ral pa phur bu can// ce spyang rgyug tshul zhungs se zhung// lag na zangs kyi rnge'u chung brdung// che mchog yon tan gyi bka' srung ce spyang ma brgyad kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu nga gnyis pa'o//// yang dag thugs kyi bka' srung ni// srin mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad de// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// shar gyi phyogs kyi srin mo drug/ smug nag g.yag gi mgo bo can// zhing dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar ser sbrul gyi mgo bo can// rtse lnga g.yas la b+han+da g.yon// ser nag gzig gi mgo bo can// spu gri g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dkar dmar sre mo'i mgo bo can// dung chen g.yas la b+han+da g.yon// ser nag pha wang mgo bo can// 'khor lo g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar ser dred kyi mgo bo can// zhing dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// lho yi phyogs kyi srin mo drug/ dmar nag dom gyi mgo bo can// zhing dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// sngo nag chu srin mgo bo can// zhing chen g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// sngo nag sdig pa'i mgo bo can// glo snying g.yas la b+han+da g.yon// ser nag khra yi mgo bo can// rnge'u chung g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// srin mo dmar mo wa yi mgo/ rdo rje g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// mthing nag stag gi mgo bo can// zhing dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// nub kyi phyogs kyi srin mo drug/ dmar nag bya rgod

mgo bo can// lcags sgrog g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar nag rta yi mgo bo can// rdo dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar ser byi ba'i mgo bo can// rdo rje g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar nag khyi yi mgo bo can// zhing dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dkar dmar pu shud mgo bo can/ pad+ma g.yas la b+han+da g.yon// ljang ser sha ba'i mgo bo can// zhing chen g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// byang gi phyogs kyi srin mo drug/ dmar nag khwa'i khra yang mgo bo can// rnge'u chung g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// ljang nag skyin gyi mgo bo can// rgyu zhags g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar ser phag gi mgo bo can// rtse lnga g.yas la b+han+da dmar g.yon// dmar nag skya ka'i mgo bo can// rgyu zhags g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// ljang nag ba glang mgo bo can// zhing gi bum ril g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang// sngo skya bya rog mgo bo can// zangs gri g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// srin mo phyogs kyi sgo ma bzhi// nag mo khu byug mgo bo can// lcags kyu g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// sngon mo ra yi mgo bo can// zhags pa g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar mo spre'u'i mgo bo can// lcags sgrog g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// ljang nag spyang mo'i mgo bo can// dril bu g.yas la b+han+da g.yon// yang dag thugs kyi lha tshogs srin mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//// 'jam dpal sku yi bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni/ gri thogs ging gi bka' srung ni// shar phyogs ging chen dkar po ni// sku la dung khrab dkar po gsol// phyag na dung gi ral gri bsnams// lho phyogs ging chen ser po ni/ sku la gser khrab ser po gsol// phyag na gser gyi ral gri bsnams// nub phyogs ging chen dmar po ni// sku la bse khrab dmar po gsol// phyag na bse yi gri yang bsnams// byang phyogs ging chen sngon po ni// sku la g.yu khrab sngon po gsol// phyag na g.yu yi ral gri bsnams// khram thogs bdud kyi bka' srung ni// shar bdud rol po ral pa can// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing bsnams// khrab bdag srog bdud mche ba can// phyag na bdun kyi khram shing bsnams// zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing bsnams// srog bdud gser gyi s+t+wa re can// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing bsnams// sho thogs rtsis pa'i bka' srung ni// nyi ma dang po'i rtsis byed ging// dkar po lag na sho rdo thogs// nyi ma gnyis pa'i rtsis byed ging// ser po lag na sho rde thogs// nyi ma gsum pa'i rtsis byed ging// dmar po lag na sho rde thogs// nyi ma bzhi pa'i

rtsis byed ging// sngon po lag na sho rde thogs// srog gcod shan pa'i bka' srung ni// nad gtong ma mo'i shan pa ni// nag mo chen mo kha gdangs ma// lag na thun dang ral gri thogs// myos pa btsan gyi shan pa ni// dmar po 'jigs byed khro gtum can// lag na btsan gri dmar po thogs// glen pa klu yi bshan pa ni// sku mdog mthing nag sbrul lpags gsol// lag na sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs// gdug rtsub gza' yi shan pa ni// sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa'i tshul// g.yas na mdung nag dar nag 'phyar// g.yon na snying dang zhags pa thogs// 'jam dpal sku'i bka' srung gi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// pad+ma gsung gi bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// sku las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// dung gi dred mo mgo gsum zhon// gsung las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// zangs kyi 'phar ba mgo brgyad zhon// thugs las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu zhon// yon tan sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// g.yu yi spyang mo rkang gsum zhon// phrin las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// gser gyi seng ge rngam khri zhon// gnyis med sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// dung gi seng ge mgo dgu zhon// shar phyogs long ba rgyab sprel ni// 'brug chen sngon po chibs su chibs// na bza' le brgan dpung thung 'bar ba yang gsol// lag na lcags kyu dgra s+t+wa thogs// lho phyogs long ba rgyab sprel ni// lcags kyi sdig pa chibs su chibs// phyag na lcags kyi khyung chen bsnams// na bza' sa yi ras ma gsol// nub phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// ban glang dkar po chibs su chibs// na bza' glu 'brug pags pa gsol// lag na sprul gyi zhags pa thogs// byang phyogs dmus long rgyab sbrel ni// lcags kyi spyang mo rkang gsum zhon// na bza' zhing gi g.yang gzhi gon// lag pa sbrel nas gar stabs byed// shar gyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// dung gi khyi mo ral pa can// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// gser gyi khyi mo ral pa can// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// zangs kyi khyi mo ral pa can// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// g.yu yi khyi mo ral pa can// shar lho mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// byu ru'i khyi mo ral pa can// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// mchong gi khyi mo ral pa can// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// bse yi khyi mo ral pa can// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// shel gyi khyi mo ral pa can// shar gyi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// dung gi spyang mo ral pa can// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// gser gyi spyang mo ral pa can// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// zangs kyi spyang mo ral pa can// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa

ni// g.yu yi spyang mo ral pa can// shar lho mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// mthing shul spyang mo ral pa can// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// mu men spyang mo ral pa can// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// mchong gi spyang mo ral pa can// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// ra gan spyang mo ral pa can// shar gyi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// dkar mo zla 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lho yi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// ser mo nyi 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nub kyi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// dmar po me 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// byang gi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// sngon mo chu 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rlung 'brug sngon mo g.yu yi 'dab gshog can// me 'brug dmar mo me yi 'dab gshog can// klu 'brug sngon mo sbrul gyi gshog pa can// chu 'brug dkar mo sprin gyi 'dab gshog can// sna tshogs gzugs can rdo rje'i 'dab gshog can// pad+ma gsung gi bka' srung gi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o//// phur pa phrin las bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// shwa na mu kha zhes bya ba// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu pa// mi mo lcags kyi ral can zhon// lag na lcags kyi phur pa 'dril// sr-i ka mu kha zhes bya ba// gser gyi 'phar ba lce brgyad la// mi mo gser gyi ral can zhon// lag na gser gyi phur pa 'dril// srI gAl mu kha zhes bya ba// zangs kyi wa mo rkang gsum la// zangs kyi mi mo ral can zhon// lag na zangs kyi phur bu 'dril// shwa na mu kha zhes bya ba// lcags kyi khyi mo ral pa can// mi mo lcags kyi ral can zhon// lag na dung gi phur pa 'dril// re ma ti zhes bya ba ni// nag mo ral pas stong khams khyab// g.yas na mchog gi phur pa 'dril// chibs su drel rta rkang gsum bcibs// re ma dza zhes bya ba ni// ser nag rma bya'i thul pa gsol// phyag na mchog gi phur pa bsnams// chibs su drel rta rkang gsum bcibs// re ma dzi zhes bya ba ni// dmar nag re lde nag po gsol// phyag na mchog gi phur pa bsnams// chibs su drel rta rkang gsum bcibs// re ma dzu zhes bya ba ni// ljang nag dar nag go zu gsol// phyag na mchog gi phur pa bsnams// chibs su drel rta rkang gsum bcibs// rdo rje ya byin zhes bya ba// mthing nag lcags phur ral pa can// chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs// rdo rje de byin zhes bya ba// ser po gser phur ral pa can// lag na gser gyi phur pa 'dril// chibs su gza' rta ser po bcibs// rdo rje bse byin zhes bya ba// dmar mo bse phur ral pa can// lag na bse yi phur bu 'dril// chibs su btsan rta dmar po chibs// rdo rje phag byin zhes bya ba// ljang mo g.yu phur ral pa can// lag

na g.yu yi phur pa 'dril// chibs su klu rta sngon po chibs// shar phyogs srin po'i skyes bu ni// srin po byad can phur pa'i lha// dkar po lag na phur pa 'dril// lho phyogs gshin rje'i skyes bu ni// gshin rje nag po phur pa'i lha// nag po lag na phur pa 'dril// nub phyogs ya bdud skyes bu ni// sog po mig ring phur pa'i lha// dmar po lag na phur pa 'dril// byang phyogs gnod sbyin skyes bu ni// mon pa gdong ring phur pa 'dril// shar bdud dkar po mche ba can// lag na dung gi phur pa 'dril// lho bdud sngon mo ral pa can// phyag na g.yu yi phur pa 'dril// nub bdud dmar po zhag pa can// phyag na zhags pa phur pa 'dril// byang bdud ljang nag ral gri can// phyag na ral gri phur pa 'dril// shar gyi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// phra ma rA dza srin po'i gtso// dkar po lag na phur pa 'dril// lho yi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// ya ma rA dza gshin rje'i gtso// sngon po lag na phur pa 'dril// nub kyi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// d+ha sha g+h+rI ba bdud kyi ging// nag po lag na phur pa 'dril// byang gi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// yak+sha grI ba gnod sbyin ging// ser po lag na gri yang thogs// phur pa phrin las kyi bka' srung gi le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o//// ma mo rbod gtong bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// mtsho sman rgyal mo dpal mo ldan// sku mdog sngon mo me long thogs// dkar mo chen mo dbu gsum ma// lag na b+han+da skam po thogs// srid pa'i bu mo dam tshig can// ser mo b+han+da skam po thogs// smug nag chen mo dbu lnga ma// lag na b+han+da rlon pa thogs// khram kha stong gi dbang mo che// dkar mo lag na b+han+da thogs// ri rab gling bzhi'i dbang mo che// ser mo lag na b+han+da thogs// theg chen sa gzhi'i dbang mo che// smug mo lag na b+han+da thogs// rgya mtsho'i gling gi dbang mo che// lag na b+han+da sngon po thogs// gnam gyi ye d+har chen mo ni// nag mo mun pa'i go zu can// lag na b+han+da khrag bkang thogs// bar gyi glog ma srin mo yang// khrag gi bud med dmar nag la// lag na b+han+da khrag bkang thogs// sa yi phung byed nag mo ni// mun pa'i bud med chen mo la// lag na b+han+da khrag bkang thogs/ gsang ba'i ma mo rbod byed ma// nag mo chen mo lcags kyu thogs// pho nya lcags kyi khyi mo khrid// gsang ba'i ma mo 'khrugs byed ma// lag na khrag gi lcags kyu thogs// pho nya zangs kyi khyi mo khrid// gsang ba'i ma mo sgrol byed kyang// lag na 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu thogs// pho nya dung gi khyi mo khrid// ma mo chen mo ro kha ma// nag mo thod pa khrag bkang thogs// ma mo chen mo tsa muN+Di// smug mo thod pa khrag bkang thogs// ma

mo chen mo nam gru ma// nag mo thod pa khrag bkang thogs// shar gyi stag srin zor ba gdong// dkar mo lag na zor ba thogs// lho yi bam srin dred mo'i gdong// ser nag lag na zor ba thogs// nub kyi kong srin ban glang gdong// dmar po lag na zor ba thogs// byang gis 'brog srin chu srin gdong// sngon mo lag na zor ba thogs// ma mo rbad gtong gi bka' srung gi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bdun pa'o//// rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka' srung ni// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// dkar mo rdo rje thod pa thogs// rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// ser mo rin chen thod pa thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// dmar mo pad+ma thod pa thogs// las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// sngon mo rgya gram thod pa thogs// 'jig rten las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// sna tshogs gri gug thod pa thogs// rdo rje rigs kyi dpa' bo ni// sngon po rdo rje thod pa thogs// rin chen rigs kyi dpa' bo ni// ser po rin chen thod pa thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi dpa' bo ni/ dmar po pad+ma thod pa thogs// las kyi rigs kyi dpa' bo ni// ljang gu rgya gram thod pa thogs// 'jig rten las kyi dpa' bo ni// sna tshogs bri dang thod pa bsnams// rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu brgyad pa'o//// dpal gyi bka' sdod kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams skyong ba yi// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang// tshangs pa dmar ser pad+ma 'dzin// lha chen dkar ljang tri shul 'dzin// gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'dzin// gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'dzin// brgya byin dkar mo in+d+ra gdengs// rdo rje ser mo tsan dan 'thung// bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma 'dzin// zla ba dkar mo puN+Da ri// be con ljang nag dbyug to 'phyar// srin mo sngo nag thod khrag 'thung// za ba ser nag ba su 'dren// dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'chang// stobs chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma// rdo rje ser mo spu gri gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor srung dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'dzin// gsod byed dmar mo ral gri'o// me mo dmar ser gsal shing 'dzin// phag mo nag mo mche zhags thogs// rgan byed dmar mo zhing za ba// sna chen ljang nag thod khrag 'thung// chu lha sngon mo sbrul zhags 'dzin// rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo zhags pa 'dzin// rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// rdo rje ljang nag dril 'khrol dgyes// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad// dkar po rdo rje lcags kyu thogs// rin

chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad// ser po rdo rje zhags pa thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad// dmar po rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs// las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad// sngon po rdo rje dril bu thogs// rdo rje ging chen bco brgyad ni// rdo rje rigs kyi ging chen bzhi// dkar po lag na shel gri thogs// rin chen rigs kyi ging chen bzhi// ser po lag na gri yang thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi ging chen bzhi// dmar po lag na gri yang thogs// las kyi rigs kyi ging chen bzhi// sngon po lag na gri yang thogs// steng 'og ging chen rnam pa gnyis// sku mdog dkar nag 'od zer 'phro// lag na ral gri thogs pa'o// rdo rje lang ka bco brgyad ni// rdo rje rigs kyi lang ka bzhi// lag na rdo rje tri shUl thogs// rin chen rigs kyi lang ka bzhi// lag na rin chen tri shUl thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi lang ka bzhi// lag na pad+ma tri shUl thogs// las kyi rigs kyi lang ka bzhi// lag na rgya gram tri shUl thogs// steng 'og gnyis kyi lang ka ni// lag na sna tshogs tri shUl thogs// gnod sbyin snying nas 'dren pa'i 'bar ma brgyad// 'bar ma nyi ma'i zhags pa can// 'bar ma me 'bar glog phreng 'dzin// 'bar ma gshin rje skar mda' gtong// 'bar ma srin mo mdung thung 'phen// 'bar ma chen mo lce 'bebs ma// 'bar ma chen mo khyung thogs ma// 'bar ma rlung bdag ral gri sna// 'bar ma 'jigs byed ban glang sna// sa bdag chen mo sum cu gnyis// sa bdag bdud 'dul chen mo brgyad// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// lag na lcags kyu tho ba thogs// gza' bdag gza' 'dul chen mo brgyad// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// lag na zhags pa phur bu thogs// sa bdag klu 'dul chen mo brgyad// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// phyag na lcags sgrog phur bu thogs// sa bdag btsan 'dul chen mo brgyad// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// lag na tri shUl phur bu thogs// phyi nang las byed pho nya ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi bstan pa ni// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya bcu drug kyang// lag na rdo rje phur bu thogs// rin chen rigs kyi pho nya bcu drug kyang// lag na rin chen phur bu thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi pho nya bcu drug kyang// lag na pad+ma phur bu thogs// las kyi rigs kyi pho nya bcu drug kyang// lag na rgya gram phur bu thogs// ma mo bdun dang sring mo bzhi// ma mo chen mo rnam pa bdun// ma mo ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// phyag na gri gug thod khrag bsnams// ma mo ye shes shugs 'gro ma// phyag na gri gug b+han dmar thogs// ma mo ye shes rtag 'gro ma// phyag na zhing gi dbyug pa bsnams// ma mo ye shes za byed ma// nag mo zhing chen za ba'i tshul// ma mo ye shes kha 'bar ma//

nag mo me yi kha rlangs 'bar// ma mo chen mo re ma ti// nag mo phyag na nad rkyal bsnams// ma mo ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// sngon mo phyag na khram bam bsnams// sring mo chen mo rnam pa bzhi// sring mo byis pa'i dur byed ma// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring// sring mo chen mo 'tsho byed ma// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring// sring mo chen mo sdom byed ma// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring// sring mo chen mo rlung 'byin ma// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring// kun kyang phyag na thod khrag bsnams// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// tshangs pa'i lha mo 'bum phrag gcig/ dri za chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ drang srong chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ grul bum chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ srin mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ klu mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ rlung bdag chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ gnod sbyin chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ dbang ldan chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ sa bdag chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ sman bran chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ sha za chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ bdud mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ dkar mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ ser mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ dmar mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ sngon mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ smug mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ mthing nag chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ nag mo chen mo 'bum phrag gcig/ la la gser gyi ri la gnas// la la rgya mtsho'i gting la gnas// la la gling chen bzhi la gnas// la la gling chung brgyad la gnas// la la gangs dkar rtse la gnas// la la sa yi 'og na gnas// la la nam mkha'i mthongs na gnas// la la dpag bsam shing la gnas// la la bar snang khams la gnas// la la gcan gzan sder chags zhon// la la rmig pa kha brag zhon// la la rmig pa zlum po zhon// la la gdong pa can la zhon// la la 'dab chags bya la zhon// la la rlung dang ser bu zhon// la la glog gi rkang la zhon// la la dgu tshigs gzhung la zhon// la la dus bzhi'i gung la rgyug/ la la nam gyi gung la rgyug/ la la nyi ma'i gung la rgyug/ la la zla ba'i zer la rgyug/ la la mun pa'i smag la rgyug/ la la grib so rta ru zhon// la la nam mkha'i mdangs la zhon// la la skya rengs mdangs la zhon// la la chu bo'i gzhung la zhon// la la gsal ba'i me long thogs// la la dar dkar g.yab mo thogs// la la lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs// la la zhags pa nag po thogs// la la be con nag po thogs// la la gcod pa'i spu gri thogs// la la mi mgo'i phor pa thogs// la la mi snying rlon pa thogs// la la mi lpags rlon pa thogs// la la ru mtshon nag po thogs// la la bdud kyi khram

shing thogs// la la sho yi rde'u thogs// la la nad kyi rkyal pa thogs// la la mtshon gyi dru gu thogs// la la byang dmar bam po thogs// la la tri shUl rnon po thogs// la la dpal rtse 'bar ba thogs// kun kyang gdug pa'i lag cha thogs// kun kyang dbugs dang srog la dga'// kun kyang sha za khrag 'thung ma/ kun kyang mdangs 'phrog bcud len ma// rgyal po blon mo yang g.yog bcas// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// phyi yi dur khrod gnas na gnas// zhes gsungs so// dpal gyi bka' sdod kyi srung ma'i sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu dgu pa'o//// bsgrub pa bka' brgyad rig 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rtsa ba'i lha dang/ 'jig rten pa'i bka' srung dang bcas pa'o// lha'i sku mdog phyag mtshan byung gnas gdab pa'i skabs te drug pa'o//// de nas spyi dpal kun tu bzang po la// 'khor gyi rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa// e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ blo ldan rnal 'byor gang zhig gis// bsgrub pa bka' brgyad dkyil 'khor lha// nyams su len par 'dod pa la// bskyed rdzogs 'bring po bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rnal 'byor bsdus la dga' ba la// bskyed rdzogs phrin las bsdus te bstan// dben zhing dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhal phyes la// phyi mtshams bcad la nang mtshams bsdams// gsang ba'i mtshams bcad bshags dang brlabs// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams bya// de nas bskyed rim don la 'jug/ de bzhin kun snang rgyu las ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rim pa brtsigs// b+h+rUM las ye shes gzhal yas khang// dkyil 'khor dgu yi gzhal yas ni// kun kyang 'khor lo bzhi pas mdzes// khyams dang sgo bzhi lcags rir bcas// phyi khyams sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan// lcags ri zlum po rdo rje'i ra// phyi rim bskal pa'i me 'bar bskyed// de nang gdan khri bskyed pa ni// dregs pa 'gro drug byol song gdan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su gding// dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i gdan steng du// rgyu yi ye shes sems dpa' babs// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// che mchog he ru'i skur bskyed la// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad la// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bgrad// dbus kyi dbu gsum mthing la rngams// g.yas gcig dkar la g.yon gcig dmar// g.yas gcig dmar la g.yon gcig ljang// g.yas gcig dkar la g.yon gcig dmar// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje bsnams// gnyis pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams// gsum pa gsang

ba'i rnge'u chung bsnams// bzhi pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsnams// lnga pa rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// drug pa pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsnams// bdun pa ral gri rnon po bsnams// brgyad pa dgra s+t+wa kha leb bsnams// dgu pa 'dren pa'i zhags pa bsnams// g.yon gyi dang pos b+han dmar bsnams// gnyis pa zhing gi dbyug pa bsnams// gsum pa gser gyi thong gshol bsnams// bzhi pa me shel nyi ma bsnams// lnga pa chu shel zla ba bsnams// drug pa rin chen ri rab bsnams// bdun pa chu yi dkyil 'khor bsnams// brgyad pa me yi dkyil 'khor bsnams// dgu pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsnams// zhabs brgyad glang chen dregs pa brdzis// glang chen ko rlon ya ba skor// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i stod g.yogs la// dpa' gtum stag gi sham thams can// gdug pa sbrul gyis sku rgyan byas// thal chen khrag zhag mtshan mar btab// dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// 'bar ba'i gar dgu ldan par bsgom// yab kyi g.yon nas grib ma'i tshul// yum chen khro mo gnam zhal ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab dang mthun// g.yas pa kha T+wAM yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob// gnyis su med par 'khril bar bsgom// yab yum mkha' gsang byin rlabs las// mkha' las khro bo 'chol ba spros// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa bsgral nas ni// slar 'dus dkyil 'khor brgyad la dgod// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi gtso bor gsal// shar du badzra he ru ka/ lho ru 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// nub tu rta mgrin rgyal po la// byang du rdo rje gzhon nu'o// shar lhor bla med he ru ka/ nub byang dregs pa kun 'dul la// byang shar stobs ldan nag po'o// so so'i yum bcas rdzogs par bskyed// lho nub rig 'dzin slob dpon yin// de nas gtso bo yab yum gyi// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dang// rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod pa yis// so so'i 'khor tshogs rdzogs par bskyed// che mchog yab yum sprul pa ni// che mchog rigs bzhi yab yum bzhi// dregs pa phyogs skyong 'dul byed bcu// ta kr-ita sgo srung khro bo bzhi// bka' srung ce spyang ma brgyad bsgom// badzra he ru yab yum las// rigs bzhi'i khrag 'thung yab yum bzhi// gau rI brgyad dang phra men brgyad// gdong mo sgo ma bzhi dang ni// bka' srung khro mo nyi shu brgyad// 'jam dpal gshin rje yab yum las// gshed bzhi sbyor yum sgrol yum bcas/ phyogs skyong bcu gnyis yum dang bcas// mgo brnyan sgo skyong gshin rje bzhi// bka' srung ging bdud rtsis pa dang// srog gi shan par bcas pa

bsgom// pad+ma dbang chen yab yum las// las kyi sras mchog yab yum gnyis// zil gnon khro rgyal yab yum dang// sgo skyong pho nya sgo ba bzhi// bka' srung kham brgya ma drug dang// sprul sku dmus long bcu drug dang// za byed dpal gyi khyi spyang dang// pho nya 'bar ba'i gshog pa bzhi// dur mo 'brug mo chen mo bzhi// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum las// sras mchog rigs bzhi kI la ya// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// za byed bcu dang gsod byed bcu// mgo brnyan sgo srung chen mo bzhi// bka' srung sho na bse mo bzhi// re ti mched bzhi bcu gnyis so// ging bzhi bdud bzhi shan pa bzhi// bla med he ru yab yum las// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam pa lnga// ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi dang// sman mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang// sgo skyong sring mo chen mo bzhi// bka' srung yang gab ma bzhi dang// sbas pa'i ma bzhi gdong mo bzhi// phung byed ma gsum ro kha ma gsum dang// gsang ba'i ma gsum pho nya gsum// dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum la// dregs pa nyi shu rtsa drug bskor// sgo skyong dbang chen dregs pa bzhi// stobs ldan nag po yab yum la// dregs pa can ni bco lngas bskor// sgo ba bka' nyan rnam pa bzhi// bka' srung so so'i 'khor g.yog ldan// rig 'dzin rdo rje thod pa rtsal// rigs kyi rig 'dzin drug dang ni// grub pa'i rig 'dzin rnam pa bzhi// sgo bzhir rtsa ba'i slob dpon bzhi// bka' srung dpa' bo dpa' mo dang// mkha' 'gro sde bzhir bcas pa'o// phyi khyams dbang phyug nyi shu bzhi// sgo bzhir dbang phyug sgo ma bzhi// phyi yi lcags ri 'khor yug la// mkha' 'gro ging dang lang ka dang// ma sring 'bar ma pho nya dang// mkha' 'gro 'bum phrag yangs pa rnams// rang bzhin dpal gyi bka' sdod pa'o// de ltar lha rnams gsal bskyed la// sku gsung thugs su byin brlab cing// ye shes lnga yi dbang yang bskur// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs shing// gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis phyag byas la// mchod pa dbul zhing dgyes par bstod// so so'i snying po bzlas brjod 'bad// phrin las bcol zhing bshags pa bya// tshogs dang lhag ma'i las rdzogs nas// gtor ma gtor la dkyil 'khor bsdu// spyod lam bzhir yang lha bsgom bya// yang na rdzogs pa'i rim pa la// ma bcos rang gsal rang sar bzhag/ ces gsungs so// bskyed rdzogs 'bring po'i le'u ste drug cu tham pa'o//// de nas spyi dpal kun bzang he ru ka la// 'khor gyi rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa// e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ rnal 'byor blo dman gang zag la// bsdus pa'i bskyed rdzogs bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen

pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// rnal 'byor shin tu bsdus dga' la// bskyed rdzogs shin tu bsdus te bstan// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom 'dod nas// sngon du 'gro ba'i las byas nas// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// rang bzhin dngos med spros pa med// kun snang kun khyab snying rje'i ngang// rgyu nyid mthing nag yi ge hUM// 'byung ba yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs// keng rus ri rab rtse brgyad steng// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// tshom bu+u dgu yi dkyil 'khor bskyed// dregs pa nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// kun la gdan du gding bar bya// gdan steng rgyu yi yi ge las// dpal chen khrag 'thung chen po'i skur// cho ga gsum gyis gsal bar bskyed// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// dbus ni mthing nag sku dang mthun// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa'o// bar ma rdo rje rtse lnga pa// tha ma rdo rje gsum mo// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+da ni// lcang lo khrag bkang gsol ba'o// bar ma thod rlon dmar gyis bkang// tha ma thod skam dmar bkang ba'o// zhabs gnyis gyad bzhi yin nam kyi dor stabs so// sku stod glang chen ko rlon gsol// sku smad stag gi sham thabs can// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i na bzar gsol// thod pa tshar gsum phreng bas brgyan// rdo rje'i gshog pa khyab par gdengs// khrag zhag thig le'i mtshan mas brgyan// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' la// sngags kyi phreng bas bskor ba'o// yum ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// sku mdog rigs dang mthun pa la// sku smad gzigs gi sham thabs can// yab yum gnyis su med par 'khril// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'jigs par bsgom// yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// phyogs bzhi'i mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// mthing nag hUM gi 'phro 'du las// shar du badzra he ru ka/ lho ru 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// nub tu pad+ma dbang chen no// byang du rdo rje gzhon nu ste// shar lhor bla med he ru ka/ lho nub rig 'dzin thod pa brtsal// nub byang dregs pa kun 'dul ba// byang shar stobs ldan nag po'o// yum rnams yab dang chig rdzogs bskyed// so so'i 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho rnams// rang bzhin dag gis gnas pa las// sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal mi dgos// skad cig rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs

shing// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing// gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// gnyis med ngang du phyag kyang btsal// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang// gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsis mchod// bstod cing phrin las bshags pa bya// bzlas pa bya zhing spro bsdu bya// oM ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka hUM phaT/ oM ha ya grI wa hUM phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM kA la rU pa hUM phaT// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ gsang ba sngags kyi bsnyen pa bya// tshogs dang lhag ma'i cho ga yang// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// gtor ma gtong zhing gtor gzhung mnan// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' rang la bsdu// skad cig lhar bskyed spyod lam bya// zhes gsungs so// bskyed rdzogs shin tu bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas spyi dpal he ru ka la/ 'khor gyi rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rgyun du bsgom pa la// rgyun gyi yi dam bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// sems can ye shes bskyed pa dang// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i phyir// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug nas// hUM las 'od zer 'phros pa las// phyi nang gsang ba'i 'od zer 'phros// bla ma dang ni yi dam lha// bde gshegs thams cad spyan drangs la// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang// rjes su yi rang gsol bskul gdab// skyabs gsol lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo// tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya// de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// 'od phung tshur 'dus bdag rang nyid// de yi nang du hUM gnas pa// de las tsa 'phros 'khor lor gyur// lto bar nyi bsam hUM de nyid// de las gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur// de thugs hUM gi 'phro 'du las// khro bo chen po bcu ru gyur// hUM bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis// khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug pa dgug/ sku gsung thugs kyi phur bus gdab// btul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur// de las hUM gi 'phro 'du las// rdo rje'i gur dang ra ba dang// drwa ba nyid du gyur pa'o// hUM gi 'phro 'dus slar la bzhu// stong pa nyid las 'od phung byung// de las nyi zla kha sbyar gyur// de steng rang sems yi ge hUM// 'phro 'dus 'od du zhu ba las// rdo rje dang ni dril bur gyur// de las bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sku// rdo rje khro bo he ru ka/ sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig la// phyag gnyis rdo rje b+han dmar bsnams// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum dor stabs

kyis// pad+ma nyi zla'i steng na bgrad// yum yang yab dang mthun par bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs shing// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la// phyi nang bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul// de ltar bsgom la bzlas pa bya// nyi steng ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan ma la sogs gsal bsgoms nas// 'od zer la ni yig 'bru bskyed// ma gsal bar du bzlas pa bya// oM AHhUM zhes bzlas pa bya// de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni// lha nyid sems su shes par bya// rang nyid lha la lha nyid rang// bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi sa lam sbyang// zhes gsungs so// rgyun gyi rnal 'byor gyi bsdus don/ khro bo phyag rgya rkyang pa'i sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// bsdus dang shin tu bsdus pa phyag rgya rkyang pa'i lugs kyi skabs te bdun pa'o//// de nas spyi dpal kun bzang he ru ka la zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ phyi sgrub rdul tshon dkyil 'khor la// brten nas sgrub pa ji ltar lags// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// bde gshegs bsgrub pa bka' brgyad lha// phyi ltar bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// phyi mtshams nang mtshams sngon 'gro rnams// mchod rdzas byin brlab la sogs bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum dang// 'byung ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas khang// gdan dang bcas pa bskyed nas ni// rgyu yi ye shes sems dpa' las// gtso bo che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog phyag mtshan cha lugs ni// rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i rim pa dag/ shar du yang dag lha tshogs la// lho ru gshin rje'i lha tshogs la// nub tu pad+ma'i lha tshogs so// byang du phur pa'i lha tshogs so// shar lho ma mo'i lha tshogs so// lho nub rig 'dzin slob dpon te// nub byang dregs pa kun 'dul la// byang shar stobs ldan nag po'o// phyi khyams dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// 'khor yug dpal gyi bka' sdod do// de ltar bskyed cing gsal brtan bya// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs shing// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// spyan drang bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal mchod// bstod cing bshags pa dag par dbul// so so'i rtsa sngags bsnyen par dbul// 'od dang 'od zer spro bsdu bya// bskul zhing phrin las bcol bar bya// tshogs dang lhag ma'i cho ga rnams// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// gtor ma gtong zhing gtor gzhong mnan// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' rang la bsdu// skad cig lhar bskyed spyod lam bya// ma bcos spros bral ngang la gnas// de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// zhes gsungs so// phyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas bsgrub pa'i rim pa ste le'u drug cu rtsa gsum

pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// nang bsgrub lus kyi dkyil 'khor la// brten nas bsgrub pa bshad pa ni// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin las// che mchog he ru'i skur bskyed la// spyi bor rig 'dzin slob dpon bsgom// dpral bar 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// mgrin par pad+ma dbang chen no// thugs kar badzra he ru ka/ lte bar rdo rje gzhon nu'o// gsang bar bla med he ru ka/ rkang g.yas dregs pa kun 'dul la// rkang pa g.yon la stobs ldan no// de rnams yum dang 'khor du bcas// rang bzhin 'khor du gnas par bsgom// de rnams thugs kar zla dkyil steng// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du yis// hUM ring hUM thung sgra las drangs// dregs pa kun 'dul stobs ldan nas// hUM gi 'od zer 'phros pa yis// rtsa'o che yi nang nas zhugs// bla med he ru'i thugs kar 'phros// de las rdo rje gzhon nu la// de las badzra he ru las// de las pad+ma dbang chen las// de las 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// de las bla ma'i thugs kar ro// de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis// lus kyi mgo mjug khyab pa yi// nyon mongs dug lnga dug gsum dang// bag chags sgrib pa rtsad nas bcad// chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas pa'o// de ni bsnyen pa zhes bya'o// de nas bsgrub pa'i dus su ni// bla ma'i thugs nas 'od 'phros pas// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i thugs kar spros// de nas pad+ma dbang chen no// de las badzra he ru ka/ de las rdo rje gzhon nu'o// de las bla med he ru ka/ de las rtsa chen g.yas zhugs pas// dregs pa kun 'dul thugs kar spros// de las rtsa chen g.yon zhugs pas// stobs ldan nag po'i thugs kar 'phros// de las ging bdud gshin rje sogs// phyag na mtshon cha thogs pa 'phros// gzas pa'i dgra bgegs rtsad bcad nas// slar 'dus dregs 'dul stobs ldan gyi// thugs kar 'dus te 'khor ba ni// sgrub pa las sbyor zhes su bshad// de las 'od de yang 'phros pas// rim pa bzhin du 'od 'phros nas// spyi bo 'khor lo'i gshin rje dang// bla ma'i thugs kar 'phros nas ni// rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes de// zla ba tshes pa lta bur rgyas// sgrub pa chen po zhes bya'o// bdag nyid gdod nas ma grub pa// rdzogs pa chen por la bzlas pas// sangs rgyas zhes kyang de la bya'o// de ltar yang yang spro ba ni// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// mar la spro bar byed pa ni// las kyi sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// de nas yar la bsdu ba ni// ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu yis// bag chags sgrib pa khad kyis 'bri// ye shes zla ba tshes ltar skye// de ni rdzogs chen rnal 'byor ro/ bar 'dir tshig

chad 'dra song ngam dpyad// sbyor dus yab yum gnyis ka las// lha bkod 'od zer spro bsdu dang// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang// 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi gzhom pa dang// gsang ba'i dgra gsum gsod pa dang// 'gro drug g.yang sa bcad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// nang lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// gsang ba'i sgrub pa bstan pa ni// rig pa ye shes dkyil 'khor la// brten nas a ti yo gar bsgrub// ma nor ma bcos chos nyid ni// btsal ba'i bsam pa kun las 'das// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i ngang// de bzhin nyid las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i de bzhin nyid ces bya// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid la// khyab dang ma khyab gnyis med de// kun tu snang las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i kun tu snang zhes bya// btsal ba med pa'i chos nyid las// ma bskyed par ni thams cad 'byung// rgyu nyid las ni khyad par 'phags// a ti'i rgyu yi ting 'dzin no// btsal ba med pa'i chos nyid las// bsgrub tu med pa'i 'bras bu shar// 'byung ba lnga las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i 'byung ba rim brtseg yin// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid las// phyogs dang ris la mi gnas shing// mtha' dang dbus la mi dmigs pas// sems nyid ye nas 'gyur ba med// gzhal yas khang las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i gzhal yas khang zhes bya// mi dmigs bsam gtan dbyer med pas// ma bcos spros pa med pa'i dkyil// skye med yongs la khyab pa'i 'khor// 'gyur med don rtags mnyam pa'i ngang// mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor las khyad 'phags// a ti'i dkyil 'khor bskyed ces bya// dbye ru med pa'i sems nyid kyi// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// ye nas dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas// lha tshogs bskyed las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i lha tshogs bskyed ces bya// dngos med sems kyi ye shes kyis// mtshan ma'i snang ba dbyings su bskyod// a ti'i dbang bskur byin brlab bya'o// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes ni// btsal zhing bsam pas mi bskyod de// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa ni// spyan drangs don las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i lha tshogs spyan drangs yin// spros pa med pa'i chos nyid ngang// btsal du med pa'i sems nyid ni// mnyam pa'i ngang du rtogs pas na// bzhugs su gsol las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i bzhugs su gsol zhes bya// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i dbyings// 'du 'bral med par gnas pas na// phyag btsal ba las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i phyag btsal de la bya// chos nyid btsal du med pa las// chos can

mchod pa'i rkyen du snang// sems nyid btsal du med pa las// skye mched khams rnams mchod par snang// nam mkha' dmigs su med pa las// 'byung ba sna tshogs mchod par snang// thams cad chos nyid rgyan du gsungs// mchod pa phul las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i mchod pa phul zhes bya// thams cad mi dmigs mnyam pa'i ngang// dmigs med bsam 'das brjod du med// bsnyen pa phul las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i bsnyen pa phul zhes bya// gnyis su med pa'i sems nyid kyis// thams cad bla med 'gyur ston pas// pho nya bkye las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i pho nya bkye zhes bya// khams gsum sems can thams cad dang// dus gsum gsum gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// thams cad dbyer med dbyings su bsgral// dgra bgegs bsgral las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i dgra bgegs bsgral zhes bya// snang ba'i yul ni chos nyid la// stong pa'i sems ni ye shes che// gnyis su med par rtogs pas na// phur pa gdab la khyad par 'phags// a ti'i phur pa gdab ces bya// 'khor ba thams cad dong nas sprug/ skye shi rtsad nas bcad pas na// tshogs mchod phul las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i tshogs mchod phul zhes bya// thams cad dbyings la bkod pas na// lhag ma'i mchod pa khyad par 'phags// a ti'i lhag mas mchod ces bya// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid kyis// skyes pa'i phung po skye rgyun bcad// mi dmigs pa yi nam mkha' yis// dmigs pa'i 'byung ba zil gyis mnan// thams cad skye shi'i rtsa ba bcad// gzir mnan byas las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i gzir mnan zhes kyang bya// 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid yang dag byang chub lam// thams cad mya ngan 'das las khyad par 'phags// skye med rdo rje lta bu'i ngang nyid las// skye shi 'pho 'gyur med pas khyad par 'phags// de lta bu yi don la gnas pa yis// rtogs pa'i blo ldan rnal 'byor gang gnas pa// de yi don la 'dris na sangs rgyas yin// btsal du med pa'i don rtogs bsgom pa yin// a ti'i yo ga'i don rtogs ngo mtshar che// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba rig pa sems kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// phyi bsgrub dang nang bsgrub dang gsang bsgrub bstan pa'i skabs te brgyad pa'o//// de nas spyi dpal chen pos ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// bde gshegs zhi ba'i sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// 'jam dpal sku yi sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// pad+ma gsung gi sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du

'dus// yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// che mchog yon tan sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// phur bu phrin las sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// ma mo rbod gtong sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// rig 'dzin slob dpon sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// 'jig rten mchod rten sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus/ dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// de phyir bsgrub pa bka' brgyad 'dus// bka' brgyad 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// zhi ba khro bo thams cad 'dus// zhi khro 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// bde gshegs thams cad 'dus pas na// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// rgyud 'dis dngos grub ster bas na// mi zad dngos grub gter gyi rgyud// gtad do 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams// chong zhig rig 'dzin sa thob rnams// khyed kyis yongs su gzung bar gyis// zhes gsungs nas spyi dpal kun tu bzang po chos kyi dbyings su thim mo// rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o//// lta ba thams cad kyi yang rtse/ man ngag thams cad kyi sdebs/ bstan pa thams cad kyi srog shing/ sgrub pa thams cad kyi bcud/ phrin las thams cad kyi rtsa ba/ bsgrub pa bka' brgyad 'dus pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ dngos grub gter gyi rgyud ces kyang bya/ spyi dpal kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa bkod pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya/ 'byed par byed la lde mig gi rgyud ces kyang bya'o// rgyud kyi mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// rgyud kyi mjug bsdu ba'i skabs te dgu pa'o// rdzogs so//// rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyi phyag dpe/ rgyas btab nas rin po che'i gter du sbas pa'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya//// bka' brgyad rgyud gsang ba 'dus pa/ gter kha 'og ma/
